30a2(rgyud 'grel): but+ti t+ye/ at+tan+ta b+ha ba sid+d+ha ya// / kye che ge mo zhes bya ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hiHsa ma ya sta b+hud+d+hAwA swAHzhes tshig 'di dang phyag rgya 'dis lung bstan pa byas pa daM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du mgrin gcig
30a3(rgyud 'grel): gos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/ mngon par mtho ba'i phyag rgya 'di'i mthu dang sngags 'di yi stobs la dad par gyis shig/ ces bya ba slob ma la brjod de 'di ni lung bstan pa'o// de nas gsang ba brjod
30a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba ste/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig/ gzhan ni khams gsum na myed de// des na rtag tu khyod kyis ni// 'dod chags bral bar mi bya'o// dam tshig sbyin pa ni hUM phaT gsang ba brjod pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
30a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// de ring khyod ni gnas par gyur// khyod ni yang yang mi mchi bas// de phyir bde chen theg pa mthong // srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das pa'i// srid pa khyod kyis shin tu
30a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// rdo rje phyag rgya zhes bya gang // gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid 'thob the tshom med // byang chub sems ni btang mi bya// gang phyir rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i phyir// dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bgyi// nam yang spang bar mi bya'o// ma
30b1(rgyud 'grel): rig pa 'am gti mug gis// rtag tu skur pa mi gdab po// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// nam yang btang bar mi bya'o// slob dpon brnyas par mau bya ste// de ni sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rang gi bdag nyid mi spang ste// dka' thub kyis kyang gdung
30b2(rgyud 'grel): mi bya// ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung // 'di ni ma 'ongs sangs rgyas nyid// de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud kyang zung // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dada' dang // lha rnams kyis kyang 'dod pa yin// sems
30b3(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir// cho ga bzhin du khyod kyis ni// 'bad pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sgrub pa pos ni rgyud la sbyar// zhes bya ba ni dbugs dbyung ba'o// 'di dang rjes su gnas pa bzhi po ni// dbang bskur ba'i rjes
30b4(rgyud 'grel): thogs sam dbang bzhi pa'i rjes thogs su yang sbyin par bya'o// slob dpon gyi dbang nyid la phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes kyang bya ste/ 'di ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o// da ni gos kyi yol ba la sogs pas dben par byas
30b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyogs cig tu slob mar zin pa mdzes pa gzugs la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa dam tshig gi sdom pa can sbyor ba bzhi lo mkhas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bla ma la gsang ba'i dbang gi don du dbul lo// de nas
30b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas rnams// ji ltar mchod chen stsol mdzad pa// bdag la'ang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir// no mkha'i rdo rje dang bdag stsol// zhes bya ba 'am/ gzhan gyis kyang gsol ba gdab po// de nas bla mas sbyor ba
31a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mngon du byas la chos nyid kyi pad+ma'i nang na rdo rje zhugs pa'i mtha' bskyed pas/ rang rig pa'i mthar phyin pa srin lag dang mtho bos blangs te slob ma'i kha ru bcug nas// btung ba rin chen 'di de ni// dza~M
31a2(rgyud 'grel): rje lus su rab snab byed// bu khyod rtag tu shes gyis la// yid las byung ba'i chu 'di 'thung // zhes bya bas sbyin no// des kyang e ma bde ba chen po// zhes brjod cing med par bya'o// des kyang rang gi pad+ma'i lhag ma
31a3(rgyud 'grel): yang der gzhug par bya ste/ 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo // de'i rdo rje la nga nyid ngom gzhon yang rung // rang rig pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sngar bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pa'i
31a4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i lag par dri'i lag pa gtang la/ mdzes pa 'di ni gzung ba dang // bstod bya sangs rgyas rnams kyi brtags// 'khor lo rjes tshogs sbyor ba yis// de phyir bde ba dam pa myang // thabs gzhan
31a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni sangs rgyas min// 'gro gsum 'di dag dag pa ste// de phyir 'khor ba spyod ba ni// khyod ni nam yang mya byed cig/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs blo na med// glen pa
31a6(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig 'das gyur na// dngos grub mchog ni de la med// ces brjod la sbyin no// de yang gur kum la sogs pas byugs la dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng bas brgyan te/ gos dang bral bas chu skyes rab tu
31b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgyas par gsol bar ston cing // skyob ma la 'di spyad brjod do// bu khyod dga' ba gang la yin// dri chen dro chu la stsogs zas// de bzhin khrag dang shuk+ka dang // shwa dang bud mod gus dang gzhan// de bzhin b+ha ga'i pad+ma la// 'o byed
31b2(rgyud 'grel): smros shig badre ba can// zhes brjod par bya'o// ngas kyang / lho mo ci phyir bdag mi spros// dri chen dri chu khu sogs 'tshal// bud ming la yang rtog dang bgyid// b+ha ga la yang 'o bgyid do zhes brjod do// de nis des
31b3(rgyud 'grel): u ma'o bdag gi pad+ma 'di// bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan// gang dog cho gas bsten byed pa// bdag ni dwe yi mdun na gnas// sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs pa// ji lta ba bzhin pad+mar byas// bde chen rgyal
31b4(rgyud 'grel): po rang nyid kyang // 'di nyid na ni rtag tu bzhugs// kye thar pa bstan cig ces brjid nos// des kyang bla ma'i man ngag gis// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mar// dmigs pa bstan pa'i cho ga'i bye brag gis// rnal
31b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas ni ji srid du// byang chub sems ni 'byung 'gyur ba// de srid rgyun mi 'chung 'thob pa// dga' ba'i bde las gzhan ci yod// dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur te// byang chub sems ni 'bab gyur pas// phung
31b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i rnam shes rgyal gyur pa// smad pas dngos grub ga la yod// rdo rje na mkha'i khams sbyor bas// der reg pa las ngo mtshar che'i// bde ba gang gang de las bskyed// mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o// dga'
32a1(rgyud 'grel): bral gyi ni dbus ngag tu// ltos la bstan pa mtshon por gyis// pad+ma'i rdo rje la rdo rje'i bar ta kas mnan pa'i gnas su rdo rje skyal krung gis// sems nor bu'i nang du song bas bltos la// gong /
32a2(rgyud 'grel): gi tshe ye shes skyes pa de'i tshe/ de'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min// dbus kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gang tshe shes mig gis// zad med bde la gnas pa ni// thun nam yang
32a3(rgyud 'grel): na nyin mtshan namo// zla phyed zla gcig lo dang ni// bskal pa 'am bskal pa stong dag tu// ye shes mngon par sbyor bas gnas// de ltar brtags nas nus pa ji lta ba bzhin sems pa btang ste/ bcud kyis len gyis rtogs
32a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bzung la chu skyes kyis mtha' de nyid du mthong ba'i byang chub kyi sems blangs nas// ro mnyam par gyur pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o// gal te 'dir dbang lnga dang // shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ma gsungs par
32a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po rtsa ba'i dbang yin te// gnyis par ral gri sbyin par bya// gsum pa rdo rje dril bu ste// bzhi pa zla ba bza' ba'o// bzhi po de ni dbang chen ste// nag po'i zhal nas byung ba yin// zhes rgyud las gsungs pa ma yin nam
32a6(rgyud 'grel): zhe na// dbang lnga po de nyid rtsa ba'i dbang zhes bya ste/ thams cad du rdo rje tsar tsi ka la sogs pa rtsa ba'i dbang gi byed par ldan pa'i phyir dang / 'dis thams cad du las rang dbang du gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro// rdo rje'i dam tshig sbyin
32b1(rgyud 'grel): bani ral gri'i dbang ste/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bstan pa nyid kyis rdo rje dang / dril bu spyi bor bzhag pas rgyud las thun mong du gsungs pa'i brtul bzhugs dang /
32b2(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan pa dang dbugs dbyung ba bstan pa'o// shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs su bsgom nas/ btsun mo thams cad blang bar bya'o// de nas btsun mos rdo rje blta/ der ni 'o ma bsgrub par
32b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rtse gcig sems kyis 'o ma bsgoms// phyag rgya chen por rab bsgrub pas zhes bya bas bsgrubs pa nyid ni bla na med pa'i 'gro ba'i don ma lus pa'i/ bsgrub pa brtags pa'i ngo bo dang bral bas yang rang gis rig pa dang /
32b4(rgyud 'grel): tha mi dad pa thub pa'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid/ yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba bstan pa'i rang bzhin slob ma la sbyin no// zhes bya ba 'di yang sbyin pa'o// slob ma de la phan yon gyis spro bar bya ste/ mthong dang reg pas
32b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog nyid kyi// snying po mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni// sdig pa kun las rnam grol baM// de ring khyod ni legs par gnas// khyod la yang yang 'chi ba med// bde ba chen po'i theg pa 'di// kun tu bzang po yin pas
32b6(rgyud 'grel): na/ gar yang ma 'jigs khyed rol cig/ khyod ni srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgal// srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i mchog gi mchog/ 'di ni rtag tu bsrung bar gyis// dngos grub dam tshig
33a1(rgyud 'grel): sdom pas yin// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par gsungs// dka' 'di rtag pa mchog yin no// slob dpon la ni brnyas mI bya// bde gshegs bka' las 'dar mi bya// de bzhin khros nas spyan zla yi//
33a2(rgyud 'grel): skyon rnams bsgrags par mi bya'o// sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems// nam yang btang bar mi bya'o// byang chub sems kyang spang mi bya// rang gzhan chos la smad mi bya// sems can yongs su ma smin la// gsang ba
33a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni bsgrag mi bya// bdag nyid smad par mi bya'o// rang gi chos la smad mi bya// gdug pa byams pas rtag tu spang // chos la tshad bzung bar mi bgyi// sems can dad pa can mi bslu// rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya// shes rab
33a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung bzhin dud myed rnams// skyon 'dri zhes kyang smang mi bgyi// rnal 'byor slong mos mi 'khor no// rnal 'byor nyid ni spang mi bya// rtag par rgyun tu gsang sngags bzla// dam tshig la sogs rtag tu bsten// de bzhin bla ma'i ngam
33a5(rgyud 'grel): tshig la// gnod na dkyil 'a khor bris byas lnga// bde gshegs rnams la sdig pa bshags// de ring skye ba 'bras bur bcas// de phyir 'di ni legs par mnos// mi mnyam pa yi lha rnams dang // mnyam gnas 'gyur bar
33a6(rgyud 'grel): the tshom med// sangs rgyas rdo rjer bcas kun gyis// tshe dang ldan khyod deng dbang bskur// khams gsum rgyal po chen po ste// de ring bdag por rab tu brtan// de ring bdud las rnam par rgyal// grong khyer mchog tu rab tu
33b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs// de ring sangs rgyas nyid thob par// gyur pa 'di la the tshom med// ces bya bas rang gi rdo rje dam tshig mi zad pa'i bde ba byin la// bstan cig 'gro ba myur ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa' bde bas dang // rab tu mtshungs
33b2(rgyud 'grel): par rtag tu gyur// bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// slob ma gus pa gsal ba yi// gsungs shig de bzhin bdag gis bgyi// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin// gal te yod par gyur na de'i lag pa g.yin
33b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sor mo thams cad kyis blangs la sbyin sreg gi zhi bar bya'o// sreg rdzas gcig gam gnyis sam/ bdun gyi bar gyis so// des kyang mgu ba'i yid kyis ji ltar 'byor pa'i sa gzhi dang / glang po dang / rta dang / gser
33b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / rgyan dang / bu dang chung ma la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i dngos po 'am/ bdag nyid kyang dngos grub la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir dbul lo// yon bza' ba dang / rang dang gzhan gyi 'khor los mchod par
33b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// sbyar ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma bzung la// mchog sna tshogs kyis de dag tshami par byas te/ gshegs su ga sol lo// de nas mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bdud rtsi myang ba byas la gsol ba
33b6(rgyud 'grel): bauta bya ste/ brtan pas lha'i nga rgyal bya'o// chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad ni dngos po mang ba'o zhes brjod do// rdo rje rtse mos 'khor lo gshegs su gsol lo// de nas 'dod pa la rdul
34a1(rgyud 'grel): tshon cung zad byin la/ chu chen por gshegs su gsol lo// snying po grong du gang bcug dang // sbyin sgrog 'khor lho'i nor gang yon// dri dag thams cad slob dpon no// rdo rje 'chang mchog
34a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bya// bzang po zhabs sogs kyis mdzad pa// gsang ba 'dus pa'i cho gar gsal// 'dir ni gsang ba'i rlabs 'khor lo// cho ga la 'bad nyid kyis dul// de phyir dbang po mchog rnams ni// skye bo
34a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang la bzod par gsol// gang phyir rang nyid dran pa'i phyir// dpal ldan ga shin gshed dkyil 'khor gyi// cho ga sems can don bslang byas// de las dge ba gang thob pa// rang gi shes las gzhan min pa'i// las
34a4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms shes rab dang ldan pa// spyod yul mi shes mun kun sel// srid pa mi 'jigs sad byed pa'i// legs pa'i tshogs gang thob pa des// budag dang 'gro ba blo ster shog/ gshin rje gshed nag
34a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thubs// slob dpon mkhas pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na kIr+Ni dang // / la tsA ba dge slong
34a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra sa ra sAtI stot+ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag
34b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// shes rab mnga' bdag rdo rje dbyangs can ma// yang dag lam ston bla ma rje btsun la// dad cing myos lnga gus par phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros spel phyir bstod pa cung zad bro// dpal ldan+da rdo rje
34b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs can ma// rang don grub nas gzhan don ni// mchog tu gzhol mdzad rje btsun ma// dbyangs can de la spyi bo yis// kun nas dang bras phyag 'tshal bstod// zhal gsum rnam thar gsum gyi dngos
34b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug pha rol phyin drug rdzogs// zhabs gnyis bden gnyis don rtogs ma// rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rjes 'gro ba smin mdzad pas// rtag tu pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ dbyangs can de la smri
34b4(rgyud 'grel): pi yis// kun nos dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pas// rtag tu chu skyes steng na bzhugs// dbyangs can de la spyi bo yis// kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod// rtsa bi'i
34b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal ni pad mA rA ga'i mdog/ 'dod chags rnam ngag gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas kyi zhal no in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ zhe sdang rnam ngag thugaso la phyag 'tshal bstod// goyon gyi zhal ni kun da zla ba'i
34b6(rgyud 'grel): mngag/ gti mug rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po pad ma bsnams// ma chags 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// bar pa ma rig gcod mdzad ral gri bsnams// shes
35a1(rgyud 'grel): rab rnam gsum gsol la phyag 'tshal bstod// tha ma rnam rtog gtsang mdzad glo gug bsnams// rtog mong tong nge 'dzin gsol la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag drug g.yon gyi dang byo ban+d+ha bsnam/
35a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag med don rtogs mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod// bar pa dbul ba gcong mdzad rin chen bsnams// 'gro kun raM 'dod skong la phyag 'tshal bstod// tha ma 'khor ba gcod mdzod 'khor lo bsnams// 'khor ba rtsang
35a3(rgyud 'grel): nus gcod la phyag 'tshal bstod // mtshan dang dpe byang sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ki la bing+ka'i gsung la phyag 'tshal po stong // shes bya kun mkhyen thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma rig mun sel
35a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstong pa slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta su maM ti kIrti dang
35a5(rgyud 'grel): tsa ba mar ngo chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// // bkra shis//
36a1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje dgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje 'thung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
36b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyag skad du/ mam sad+d+ha nA ba Sha nAn+ta gangs rnam bang nang du ga zan rdzo dadu 'a kyil 'khar bya rdzog na rdza ga nga 'byu ba sa bya/ dpal rdo klaklu nga la phyag 'gyu/
36b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mdzes pa'i sku 'bur thub dbang 'od tshogs can// rang 'ong gnyis med 'khrul cing dpe bral bde bas gang // rab chags mdzes pas lha dang khro bas 'khrugs lta la// blo mnyam 'jug mdzad gshin rje gshed ngor mngon
36b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs te// rgyud rgyal yon tan mang ldan mkhas pa'i spyod yul ba// gshin rje dgra yi don la bdag blo blun gyur kyang // zhal gyi pad ma las rnying de yi rjes 'byungs nas// dbang bskur sgrub bcas lo 'dab rtsa tsam bya bar 'dod//
36b4(rgyud 'grel): de la dang por sngags pa ni// rang lus 'jig na'ang gzhan den 'dod// rnyeng dang bkur sti la ma chags// rgyud 'dir gsang sogs dbang bskur bas// ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa yod// ljon shing gis klubs yid du 'ong
36b5(rgyud 'grel): skye bo 'dus nas rnam bral zhing // dris byugs me tog lags bkram par// dang por gdong stsogs dag byas la// spro bas bde ba'i stan 'dug nas// snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// yu sngon 'od dang ldan pa bsam//
36b6(rgyud 'grel): de 'od las byung rigs tshogs kyis// bla ma rdzogs sangs rgyas bkug nas// rnam thar gyis sgro dag byas te// dag par gyur pas mngon sum blta// gshin rje gshed por sgrub pa yang // bsod nams med par mi 'grub
37a1(rgyud 'grel): la// sbyin sogs bsod nams bya ba yang // dbul phyir bdag gos mi nus pas// to rlabs sngon nas tshang spring bzhi// 'bras bu yid bzhin nor bu ltar// 'gro ba kun gyi don byed pa'o// ya nyid rab tu dran
37a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de las bdag nyid moM sprul te// lan gsum bskor zhing phyag 'tshol bsam// de sprul rig ma'i tshogs rnams kyis// ma lus mchod pas mnyes par bya// lus ngag yid kyis sdig bgyis dang // bgyid du stsol
37a3(rgyud 'grel): dang yi rang gang // sgyu ma sgyu ma la sogs bzhin// thugs rje can rnams mdun du 'chub// sngon byas ma lus bshags nas ni// phyin chad nga la mi 'jug cing // byang chub snying por gnas kyi bar// mi dge kun las ldog par
37a4(rgyud 'grel): bgyid// sangs rgyas de sras 'phags rnams dang // srid pa mthar phyin dam pa'i chos// skyabs kyi dam pa de gsum la// deng nying gus pas skyabs su mchi// rnam rtog rgya mos rab bcings shing // 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub
37a5(rgyud 'grel): pa kun// bsgral phyir bde gshegs nyid thob par// byang chub mchog tu sems bskya // bde gshegs sras bcas 'phags skye bo// kun gyi dge pa kun bsdus la// sel myed rab tu yi rang zhing // legs so zhes
37a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang bsngags par bya// dus gsum bde gshegs sras bcas kun// gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs 'gyur ba'i// sbyin sogs lam gyi rang bzhin gang // ci yod stobs kyis yang dag bsten// yon tan rgyu
37b1(rgyud 'grel): mtsho ldan rnams la// bdag nyid bdag gis dbul lags kyis// thugs rje mnga' ba khyed rnams kyis// so sor nang 'khor sbyong du bzhes// gang zhig mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa// ji srid 'khor ba gnas byar du// de srid mya
37b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan mi 'da' bar// thugs rje can la gsol ba 'debs// byang chub shing la gzigs rnams la// theg chen bdud rtsi rab bshad par// 'gro ba'i yob du gyur rnams la// 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsol ba gang // bgyid pa
37b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus kun bsdus nas// 'gro ba kun gyi bde chen nyid// thob pa'i rjes su mthun gyur cig/ de ltar bsod nams tshogs bsags la// gzhan don lhur mdzad thugs mnyes nas// rigs kyi bu khyod legs so zhes//
37b4(rgyud 'grel): gtang rag gan de nas mi snang gyur// rnam rtog rgya mtsho gting zab par// yang dag lta ba'i gru shor cing // sna tshogs lta bas g.yengs rnams la// thugs rje chen pos dmigs nas su// rang bzhin med pas stong pa
37b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid// rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med// rnam rtog med pas rnam bral bar// byang chub sems mchog bsgom par bya// oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sngags 'di bzlas nas 'gro kun gyi// lus ngag ying rnams ngo bo
37b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig/ stong phyir de rnams brtags pa tsam// brtags pa yin phyir lus ngag yid// oM AHhUM yig gsum byas la// 'od 'bar ho gnyis par gnas pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni// nam mkha' la
38a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas bsam par bya// nga las aHchad byung nyi ma// de dbus yi ge hUM mthing las// sna tshogs rdo rje 'od 'bar ba// lte bar yi ge hUM bcas bsam// dri 'ong phyogs bcur rab 'phros
38a2(rgyud 'grel): pas// 'od 'bar rdo rje'i gur du bsam// de ngo bus pad+ma zla stengs su// sam dkar las byung rdo rje las// kun bzang yum bcas bsam par bya// 'bru lngas dri zhu lus byung ba// chos dbyings dkar po gru gsum
38a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gyen du gnas pa phyogs 'od bskor// pad mo sna tshogs po las skyes// 'dab ma 'bum ldan de dbus bsam// gaM sar dbus su khyaM yig las// sna tshogs rdo rje 'od tshegs can// lte bar bruM zer las
38a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i// rig bcu s+ho rtag pa las byung ba// gzhil yas khang mchog gru bzhi pa// sgo ba ni rta babs mu khyud bcas// rdo rje ra bo 'od phreng bskor// dbus su rdo rje rtswa gram mdzes// pad ma nyi zla'i gdan
38a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan bsgom// gzhi'o// / lte bu'i gdan steng bsamya bya ba// a dang aHmthar thugs phreng gnyis// de las zla ba de yis brgyan// ka sogs dpe byad 'od ldan pa// zung gcig las
38a6(rgyud 'grel): byung gnyis pa ste// dbus su 'dod chags yi ge raM// nges bzhu 'od kyis gong bu las// dkar dmer hUM ni rab tu bsam// de mdog rdo rje de yis brgyan// badz+ro ta ko haM nga rgyal bskyed// rdo rje 'chang mchog 'od
38b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs can// zhal gsum sngo dkar dmar ba la// rdo rje ral gri g.yas gnyis na// gzhan gnyis 'khor lo pad ma 'chang // gri gug ban ngas rang 'od 'khyud// bde bas gang ba bsam par bya// rnam pa lnga yi rang bzhin
38b2(rgyud 'grel): gang / de ni sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan no// rnal 'byor ro// 'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba yis// snod du 'jig rten mthong nas su// rang snying las byung 'od zer gyis// khyab ste sna tshogs sangs rgyas byas// bkug
38b3(rgyud 'grel): nas bdag la zhugs pa yi// bde ba chen po nyid du gyur// mkha' la gnas pa'i yig 'bru lnga// ji ltar skar mnga' 'pho ba ltar// khar thim khu bar rab 'phros pas// rig dang bcas pa'i kun bzang zhu// 'od kyi grong
38b4(rgyud 'grel): bur gyur pa las// thig le phra mo bzhi chad de// byams sogs tsa ra tsi ka sogs kyis// snyan po'i glu yis bskul bar bsam// rje btsun thugs rjes khro bzhengs la// gnas gsum kun gyi gti mug spongs// gtso bor
38b5(rgyud 'grel): bdun rnams kun las rgyal// rje btsun khros pa'i thugs kyis bzhengs// 'jig rten mgron gnyer gtor gnas shing // rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams bzhengs// kye/ khyod ni stong dmigs ci ste bzhugs// 'jig
38b6(rgyud 'grel): rten byang chub rang bzhin mgron// 'dod chags la ni dga' ba yis// zhu ba la ni bskul nas su// de nyid la thim yang sngon gyur// rdo rje las byung mi bskyod pa// g.yas g.yon dkar dang dmar ba la// 'od 'bar mthing ga sngon
39a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs phyag/ rgyan kun klubs pa'i sbrul gyis bcings// yum ldan thub pa'i 'od kyis 'khrigs// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das dngos kyi// sgra de byang chub sems mchog go// oM swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hi// rje su rnal 'byor ro//
39a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang byin brlab dang rjes chags ni// rgyud 'dir bdag gisu mthong med kyang // rgyud rgyal don 'dir myi 'gal phyir// byin brlabs rjes chags bya bar 'os// rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis// mkha' khyab byed gshegs kun
39a3(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas// rdo rje las byung pad lte la// bde ba'i rgyun tu 'phros par bsam// dga' ba'i thig le sa bon nI// 'og nas 'chad pa nyid du gyur// de las thugs kyi phyag rgya ste// de las phyag rgya chen por bAlto// snod tshun bzhi yang
39a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa dang // blo ldan phyi rol spro byar bya// hrIHSh+T+rIHlas sogs gsang sngags kyis// zhe sdang mthing kha rdo rje dang // ral gri 'khor lo pad ma 'chang // spros nas slar byon bdag la thim// dzi nA dzi ka ces brjod pa yis//
39a5(rgyud 'grel): gti mug dkar po 'od 'bar ba// 'khor lo ral gri rin chen pad// mkha' las bton nas shar phyogs su// lho phyogs rdo rje'i rwa nyid la// rat+na d+h+r-i kr-i gis ser sna ni// bac+doM mau gser dang mtshungs pa'i mdog/ rin chen ral gri
39a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo pad // A ro li ka gis nub phyogasu// 'dod chags bya ru bcag 'dra ba// pad ma dang ni rol gri dang // 'khor lo rin chen 'chang ba mchig/ padz+rA d+h+r-ika ces bya ba yis// byang du phrag dog chen po ste// spro bsangs ral gri
39b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang // 'khor lo pad ma 'dzin pa'o// mung+gar d+h+r-ika gis de bzhin te// ston po tho ba ral gri dang // rin chen pad ma 'dzin pa ni// shar gyi sgo ru bsam par bya// dAr+m+ma d+h+r-ika ces bya ba yis// be con 'dzin pa dkar ba ste//
39b2(rgyud 'grel): be con ral gri 'khor lo pang // lho yi sgro ru bsam par bya// pad ma d+h+r-ika gis nub sgo ru// pad ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// pad+ma ral gri rdo rje dang // rin tshon 'dzin pa bsam par bya// khan+ta d+h+r-ik+Sha gis byang sgo ru// ljang
39b3(rgyud 'grel): gu ral gri 'dzin pa ste// ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo can// rim bzhin 'chang ba 'khrugs pa'o// de Sha ra ti zhes de nyid// tsa ra tsi ka mdog dkar mo la// gtso bo dang mtshungs phyag mtshan can// me yi phyogs suM legs par
39b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ mo ha ra ti zhes pa yis// phag mo sku mdog ston mo la// rang gi gtso bo'i phyag rgya can// spros nas bdan bral grwa la'o// ra g+ha ra ti zhes sngags kyis// dbyangs can ma ni dmar mo la// pod ma la sogs 'dzin
39b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag/ rlung mtshams na ni 'gro don mdzad// badz+ra ra ti zhes pa yis// mdzod ldan ljang gu uta pal can// phyi ma gtso bo'i mtshan 'dzin ma// dbang ldan grwa ru bsam par bya// gti mug gshin rje lha mo bzhi// pad ma
39b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// lhag ma pad ma nyi ma la/ lnga phrag gnyis dang drug phyed lha// gri gug ban nga'i phyag zung cig/ mthun par rang gi rig ma 'khyud// bzhir gyur dbus su de 'od bsam// sngon po'i g.yas
40a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar g.yon pa dmar// dkar po'i g.yas sngo g.yon pa dmar// dmar po ser po ljang gu yi// g.yas sngo g.yon pa dkar po yin// ral pa'i thor tshugs 'od phreng can// ma lus 'khrugs pa sprul
40a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan// me mtshams la sogs ban nga bzhi// zla bas gang ba oM gyis mtshan// pad ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// de nyid gsum gyis rim bzhin gdon// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ro// dkyil 'khor lha rnams
40a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus yid sku mtshams bred rtsa ru// kl-i dzaM khaM gaM kaM sau las// gti mug gshin dgra sogs rim bzhin// rdo rje can sogs kha dog rgyo// mngon par shes pa'i don du ni//
40a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje skye mched rnam par bsgom// snying mgrin dpral ba'i zla sted du// rdo rje pad ma 'khor lo la/ hU~M AHoM yig bkod byas te// de las phyag rgya de byung sku// zhe sdang 'dod chags gti mug dang // 'dra bar thugs sogs
40a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom byas te// de dag thams cung rang rang rgya// mtshan ma'i lta bar hUM Any+tsa.oM// de las tsar tsa ka sogs spro// mkharu bkug sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas// spyan drangs thugs gsung skur bcug la// byan gyis
40a6(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa'i sngags 'di brjod// oM sarba tathA ga ta tsid+d+hi badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hI// oM sarba tra thA gA t+ya b+hA g+hAg+ha dz+nyA swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA gA t+ya kA ya badz+rI swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka yau// sa bon
40b1(rgyud 'grel): las 'od lha mor spro// phyogs bcu'i mgon po mchod byas nas// dbang bskur ba yang blang bar bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs dgu la// sprul pa'i tsar tsi ka la sogs// phyag na ye shes chus gang ba'i// bum pa zla ba
40b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od legs thogs te// yid 'ongs bkra shis gru len cing // sil snyan spos kyi sprin dag dang // dri mang dpung bskur sprin phab pas// so so'i gtso bos dbu brgyan no// rang snying 'od kyi tsa ra tsi ka/ bskul nas de yi thugs ka nas//
40b3(rgyud 'grel): rang 'dra 'phros te khro mo bkug/ rdo rje'i gur stengs bzhugs bsam la// khro bo rnams kyis mngon bskrad// rdo rje'i re ba bshig byas nas// zhugs te rang mdun pad+mar bsam// de nas snying 'phyos khro bo yis// gur bshig
40b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir gtsigs snying zhugs bsam// rang mdun dung chos sogs gsum bzhag/ me tog dkar ldan dri chus bkang // de mdun man 'dzi gnyis stangs su// gser sogs gsol ba'i snod gnyis bzhag/ g.yas phyogs
40b5(rgyud 'grel): dung ni gsum pa la// 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas su// byin brlabs bdud rtsi bcu phyed blugs// hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi ki'i sngags bzlas la// ku shi'i bam pos dang po'i chu// bzod zhal dang por lan gsum gtor// gnyis pa chu dang me
40b6(rgyud 'grel): tog bcas// bzung ste de yi snod nyid la// lan gsum nye reg sbyin par bya// gsum pa bdud rtsi dang ldan pas// gnyis par mchod yon chu yang sbyin// de nas me tog gzung byas la// zhabs bsil phyag rgya dang ldan pas//
41a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi snod la zhabs bsil sbyin// rnyang snying 'od kyis tho ba bskul// mUng+gu rarA dzaHzhes brjod nas dgug/ de bzhin be con bskul ba yis// dak+Sh+Na hUM zhes brjod nas gzhug/ snying pos pad ma bskul nas su//
41a2(rgyud 'grel): pad ma bam zhes brjod nas bI cing // de bzhin ral gri 'dzin bsgral te// khAn+ta ho zhes brjid mnyes bya// rang snying ye shes 'od zer gyis// mkha' khyab sangs rgyas kun bkug nas// khar thim lus kyi bcud gyur te// rdo rje lam
41a3(rgyud 'grel): byung shes rab kyis// pad ma'i snying por rab 'phros las// lha mo'i tshogs ni mdzes gyur te// ba spu'i buM ga las 'phros nas// me tog sna tshogs mdzes rnams kyis// sdong bu lag pas legs bzung nas// sgeg dang bcas pas
41a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod byas te// rab snyan yid 'phrog klu dang ni// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i gar gyis su// bde ba chen po rab tu ster// kye kye gshin rje dgra nag po// bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin// bdag gis khyod mthong rnam par 'jigs// khro bo'i
41a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin nyid spongs te// bdag po yis ni gar byas pas// mtho ris mi yul+la sa 'og 'dir// nag po khro bo yid kyis 'jigs// gar byed khyed ni 'jigs pa tshe// n+yag byor mi thung gshin dwags gnag/ gzugs ni rnam
41a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs sprul// rdo rje dbyangs can mas zhus pa// gar byed khyod ni bde ba che// hrI hrI'i sngags kyis gar byed khyod// gon so gsum kun gyi the tshom spongs// rje btsun gshin rje khro bo khyod// 'gro ba kun
41b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis gar byed mthong // oM sarba tA thA ga ta pu dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sgra yul thams cad bAg ca dang // 'dra bar rab tu blta byas te// rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas la// yon tan kun ni sgrogs par bsam// gA ti
41b2(rgyud 'grel): mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod // gshin dgra nag po rab tu 'jigs// ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ mi 'jigs sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod // sar sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin dgra nag po shin tu 'jigs/
41b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje rab snang ba// rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// gtso bo 'dod chags chos 'byung ba// dbyangs kun gyi ni mchog gi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// phrag
41b4(rgyud 'grel): dog rdo rje'i rang bzhi ni khyod// thams cad ltos kun+da gshin rje'i dgra/ las kyi rdo rje rab snang ba// rol gri'i phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa//
41b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor bdag la phyag 'tshal bstod// yaM las byung ba sngon po la// gozhu 'di' ba ngan mtshan pa ste// yaM gyis byin brlabs rlung dkyil 'khor// g.yo med steng na ma nyid ni//
41b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po gru gsum raM las byung // de steng a las ba dan ni// mtshon nyid thams cad rdzogs pa'o// de nang bdud rtsi rnam lnga ni// gshin rje lnga yi yi ge laso// lcags kyi lnga ni de nyid kyi// ming gi thog ma'i yi ge las//
42a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM da// ra las byung rdo rje yi// de la kha T+wAM bka' par bsnam// mtho gang sngags pa'i bar snang la// zla ba'i steng du s+yo dkar bsam// kha bka' rdo rje'i lte ba ya~MswA// hUM las 'od 'bros pa dan bskul// da yi swA rlung
42a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod des me bskul// rdzas kum nu zhing khol ba la// rdo rjes 'khrug cing zhu gyur pas// shin tu dri med bdag mthong nas// oM las 'od byung ye shes kyi// bdud rtsi bsdus nas der thim pas// gangs chu 'dra bar bsil gyur te// i
42a3(rgyud 'grel): ge gsum brjod bsrungs la bzhug/ gshin rje gshed kyi lha rnams kyi// ljags la rdo rje dkar po re// bsams te de las 'od zer ni// sbu gur gyur pa rab 'phros te// bdud rtsir zug lnga rang rang sngags// brjod pas sbu gus
42a4(rgyud 'grel): brngubs nas tshim// snying 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcur khyug/ dngos kun gi shin rje dgrar byas nas// bsdus te bdag la thim gyur pas// bdag nyid yar thim thaMg ler gyur// thig ler 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed// de yi
42a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi phreng ba yis// bdag sogs lha rnams gsal byos te// snying ger dkyil 'khor phra gonas pas// brtun par gyur nas sgro dang bsdu// las dang chos dang chen po dang // gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya ste// thugs gsung
42a6(rgyud 'grel): sku yi rdo rje la// rang rang sa bon thugs kar bsam// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka ru// hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs gsang sngags bsam// gsang sngags bzlas pas gnas bzhi nas// khro bo'i rgyun rnams spro bsdu ba/
42b1(rgyud 'grel): rim pa 'am lhan cig bya bar 'dod // dbugs dbyung 'phro bar bsam bya ste// dbugs bsdu sngags kyang bsdu bar bya// bgrang phreng dung chen la sogs la// bdud rtsi lnga sogs mchod byas nas// gshin rje dgra yi skur bsam//
42b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ mthe bo lcags kyus drang zhing bzlas// rang snying nge bzhin dmigs nyid pas// sems li nyams su chung 'gyur zhing // bzlas pas skyo na lag g.yas kyis// bsgoms te rdo rje gsor nas kyang // g.yon pas rdo rje dril
42b3(rgyud 'grel): gsil zhing // rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang // mchod pa sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod// dkyil 'khor bzhengs la yang bzlas so// bdag nyid gtong bar 'dod gyur na// 'gro ba'i don la 'gro bsams te// mchod bstod
42b4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi myang byas la// yig gsum mtha ru muHbzhag pa'i// sdigs kyis ye shes gshegs par bskul// ting nge 'dzin gyi lha rnams ni// oM AHhUM muHbdag la bsdu// bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' la//
42b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya ste// de yang yi ge de stong bsam// bzod pa gsol dang gsol ba gdab// sde dang smon lam gdab par bya// 'di ni rnal 'byor chen po'o// / rang gi lha yi nga rgyal gyis//
42b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag langs la spyod lom kun// gshin rje dgra yi ngo bor byas// zab cing rgya che'i rang bzhin no// kha zas ci za bdud rtsir brlab// kho yi ho khung sreg khong du// lha rnams tshim bya sreg rdzas rnams// lag pa'i gzar
43a1(rgyud 'grel): bus bstab par bya// phyi yi khrus rnams byed pa na// 'gro ba rang bzhin dag bsam la// dbang bskur ba yi cho ga bzhin// lha mo'i bum chus bkrus par bsam// phyi thun la yang de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor bsdu
43a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar du bya// bza' bya zos nas nyal ba'i tshe// shes rab snying rjer ldan pas nyal// ldan pa'i dus na dpal ldan pa'i// lha mo'i dbyangs kyis bskul bar bsam// 'di ltar 'di las dang po pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yis bya ba
43a3(rgyud 'grel): yin// ye shes 'ga' sogs rnal 'byor pas// sbyor ba rnam gsum rim bzhin bya// spyod lam ngag gi tshe na yang // lus ngag yid kyi bya ba kun// phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid du// bsams te bya ba kun bya'o// dpa' min
43a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig cig mthong ba la// bde sdug rnam par grol 'gyur ba// sems nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir// rtog med sems gnag grwa la 'gyur// sngon du bsnyon pa bya ba'i cho ga'o// / bsnyen pas bgegs kyi tshogs
43a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom la// gzhan gyi don la bya rtson bya ba'ang // mchin ma brtan po yang dang yang // mthong zhing gnang ba thob nas bya// yid dga' ba yi sa phyogs ni// shar dang byang gi cha nyid do// dbus mtho shar dang byang gzhol bar//
43a6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad phur btab gtor ma sbyin// gsol gdab rnal 'byor gsum byas nas// sangs rgyas la yang gsol ba gdab// mchod yon zhal bsil phul nas su// sbyin sreg gis kyang rab che mo bya// de nas mkha'
43b1(rgyud 'grel): la bkod nas su// bgegs mang sa ni legs brkos nas// slar yang sa yis rab tu dgang // sngon du dus ring bsnyen byas pa'i// glashin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas// dkyil 'khor sa ni rdzogs byas te// oM b+hu khaM zhes sngags kyis ni// mkha'
43b2(rgyud 'grel): la rI ni bskyed par bya// hU~M laM hUM zhes rdo rje'i bdag/ nyid dus byas du byin brlab// oM mi di ni badz+ri b+ha be badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM// sngon bzhin lha yi ting 'dzin ni// sa yo dbus su rnal byor bzhi// rim bzhin byos nas rdzogs pa dang // sangs rgyas kun bdag
43b3(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje ni// rdo rje dril 'dzin gtso bo la// grogs po rdo rje dril 'dzin bzhi// gti mug sogs bdag lhan cig tu// sprul pas dkyil 'khor gsum la ni// mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin
43b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan myin thams cad yang dag spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'kho/
43b5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos mchog yang dag byung // ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma myed
43b6(rgyud 'grel): kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sbyar// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gso la// de nas gshin rje gshed langs te// ma dang Ta yi yi ge las// g.yas dang g.yon gyi mig gnyis su// nyi ma dang ni zla ba bsam// blo can 'gro/
44a1(rgyud 'grel): ba kun bltas nas// dkyil 'khor sa la stang stabs bskor// rkang thil a lus rdo rjer bsgom// g.yas pas rdo rje gsor byed cing // g.yon pas dril bsil 'gying bag du// gnas te mche gtsigs hUM badz+re po/
44a2(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lha min lnga sogs pa// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams bskrad par bya// nyon cig bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun// sku gsung thugs la gnas pa yis// bdag ni dpal ldan ral gri 'dzin// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i don
44a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// ral gri 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// glal te gang gis bdag tshig 'das// lus ngag gsum las skyes pa bcang // 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de nas sa la bskor byas te// bgegs med bya phyir phur bus
44a4(rgyud 'grel): grogo ba// phur pa stong ni khro bo la// smad ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa// phur pa'i gsang sngags bzlas pa lta// mtshams dang dbus su gdab par bya// 'od zer rnon po rab 'phros pas// phyogs bcur yang dag gnas pa yis// bgegs
44a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phung po kun gzhom mo// shin tu bgegs med rab mthong nas// mtshams bcad phyogs bcing sngon bzhin du// blo yis byas nas sa rdzogs nas// sta gon gnas bya'i rim bzhin byo// baM ser las byung lha mo ni// 'od dang bcas pa
44a6(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas su// mchod pa phul nas gsol ba gdab// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang btsugs te// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis// ji ltar bdud
44b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sde bcom pa// de ltar bdag gis bdud sde las// rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// dri zhim chu yis sa byugs nas// me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dgram+ba// bdud rtsi dang ldan dri chu yi sa// lha rnams maN Da la rab tu bya// de la dkyil
44b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rang sngags kyis// bkug la mchi mes sogs bcing byas nas// mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang bar bya// de nas bum pa'i sta gon ni// rin chen bum po mi gnag pa// mgron pa ras kyis bcing ba las// ldum bu mchog gis kha la
44b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// rin chen sman 'bru sna lnga dang // dri chus bkang ba mngon par sngags// sna tshogs me tog rgyus pa yis// skud pa'i rtse mor rdo rje gdags// bum par bzhag la lag pas gzung // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gtso la
44b4(rgyud 'grel): stsogs// sngags bzlas nas ni mchod yon 'bul// me tog dbus dang spros sogs mchod// dri stsogs pad ma'i snod legs bzhag/ nyin dang mtshan mo thun gsum du// gtor ma sbyin zhing de bzhin bzla// de dag dkyil 'khor
44b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol la// gnas nas rgyal ba gtso bo yis// de nas g.yon gyi snang lnga chu// blugasu nas de yis gtor bas ni// bdag dang slob ma thams cad kyi sde// chu yis dbang bskur gyur pa yin// de nas rang gi lce brlabs la//
44b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas spos phor bteg nas su// pus mo btsugs nas blo ldan pas// dkyil 'khor gtso dang sangs rgyas zhu// mgon po zhe sdang gshin rje yi// rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis gshin rje'i dkyil 'khor
45a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste// slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// de bas bcom ldan gu ldanal/ byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par gsol// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs//
45a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba 'khor ba'i don byed rnams// 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang // gsang sngags kyi ni lha gzhan dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang // 'byung po yang dag rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan par mngon dga'
45a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / gang su lha yi myig can rnams// che ge zhes pa'i rdo rje yis// dkyil 'khor gshin rje las byung ba// ji ltar nye bar spyod nus paso// 'gro dgu don du bri bar bya// slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni// thugs rjes nye bar gzung nas su//
45a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dkyil 'khor la bcug nas// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// de ltar snyan gsan lan gsum du// byas nas gats+tsha la yon chab sogs// phul nas bsrungs te phyir byung nas// slob ma brtags pa gzung bar bya//
45a5(rgyud 'grel): byas pa gzo dang khengs pa med// rigs mdog na sor ldan pa dang // thag pa mchog la mngon dga' ba'o// de las bzlog pa'i slob ma ni// dman pas sta gon gnas mi bya// tshe 'dir 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// phyi ma'i tshe lam
45a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ngo // skyes bu tshe phyi mar 'dod pas// 'dir yang 'bras bu rgyas par 'gyur// de ltar slob ma la smras nas// blo ldan rang gi nang du 'gro/ yon tan de ldan slob ma yis// sgo nas gsol ba gdab par bya// dga' chen khyod bdag
45b1(rgyud 'grel): ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag la stsol// de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te//
45b2(rgyud 'grel): skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyid// de ltar lan gsum brjod nus pa'i// slob mya rab tshogs mdzes pa la// slob dpon rtse gcig tu byas la// tshig 'dis gnas
45b3(rgyud 'grel): bo sbyin par bya// 'dir shog bu 'di theg chen gyi// cho ga sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// tshul chen la khyod bsnyen pa gyis// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // da ltar
45b4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i mgon po rnams// 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa kun// de dag gis ni gsang sngags kyi// cho ga mchog bzang 'di brnyed nos// dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa mnyam med brnyes// gsang sngags cho ga
45b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam mang de// shAkya seng ge la sogs kyis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// 'jig rten 'jug par rab shes nas// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir//
45b6(rgyud 'grel): bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de nas bshags dang yi rang sogs// byas nas byang chub sems bskyed la// bsrung ba byas te de nas ni// thugs gsung sku yi byin brlabs la// yi ge gsum dang ldan pa der// mchod pa rnams
46a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod par bya// de nas lha yi sngags bzlas pa'i// so shing sor ni bcu gnyis pa// me tog rtser ldan sbyin par bya// tho rangs langs nas shwar bltas te// sa la ma lhung lci ba yis// sa la ba ko tsam byugs
46a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ rtse mo bca' zhing dwe ru dor// zhi dang rgyas sogs gar grub palta// de nas kha ba shal hub gsum chu// byin la sngags 'di bzlas par b+h+yo// oM hrIHSh+T+rIDAbiM shud+d+ha d+hAr+m+mAHsarba pA pe ni tsa s+ya sho d+ha ya sarba bi ka la pi A ba
46a3(rgyud 'grel): na ya hUM// gshin rje'i sngags bzlas kau sha ni// stan dang sngags su sbyin par bya// mdud pa gsum ldan bsrung skud ni// dpung pa g.yon par bcing bar bya// de nas sems kyi sbubs bskyed phyir// zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad de// theg
46a4(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// de phyir khyod rnams dong bas na// rab byung skal ba chen po pa// yod dang med pas rnam 'das shing // zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis// rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa//
46a5(rgyud 'grel): spros pa kun dang bral ba ste// spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa// rgyu dang las las kun tu byung // las dang bya ba sogs dang bral// bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi// tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur// ku sha'i lam du nyal bcug la//
46a6(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam mthong ba dag mi dag/ tha~M rangs bdag la ma 'jim par// smos shig ces ni bsgos la btang // de nas sdom pa bzung nas su// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba bsgom byas te// mchod cing gsol ba btab byas la// nam mkha' la ni dgod
46b1(rgyud 'grel): papApar bya// kha dog lnga yi sgrud pa la// yAk+She ma med bkod de// gshin rje dgra lnga'i sku ru bsam// zhe sdang gshin d+her bdag bltas la// dza las byung ba'i nyi zla'i mig/ 'bar mig lcags kyus drangs nas su// rang mdog spyad pa'i nang
46b2(rgyud 'grel): du thim// gti mug ral gr-i dang lhan cig/ thig sna drangs la bsgril bar bya// / a n+ye n+yA nu gra ta sarba d+harmAHpa ra s+pha rA nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA t+yan+ta nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmaHmtha' ma dkar ldan lag pa yi// gzung
46b3(rgyud 'grel): la sngags 'di bzlas par bya// sa ma ya su tra mA ti kra ma hUM// ring thung dkyil 'khor nyis gyur la// sbom phra sgo yi nyi shu cha// dri zhim bdud rtsi lnga yis ni// byug sa nas bsrungs la snod gtsang gzhag/ de la mchod pa rnams
46b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod// de nas skud pa sngags byas la// dz+dza yig gsum gyis btang bar bya// des kyang b+h+rUM yig gsum gyis drangs// lte bar khu tshur g.yon gyis gzung // nub tu gnas nas shar bltas te// mkhas pas na mkhar thig/
46b5(rgyud 'grel): gdab po// oM badz+ra sa ma ya su tra mA tI kra ma hUM/ sems can don byed dus drug tu// mkha' khyab pa yi de bzhin gshegs// 'dir gshegs pa yi don gyi phyir// thig skud sgra yis bskul bar bsam// lho nas byang du kha bltas
46b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ shar gyi thig ni rab tu gdab// de bzhin byang nas lhor bltas te// nub kyi phyogs kyi skud pa brtag/ de nas shar du drangs pa yis// byang phyogs kyi ni ngos gad ba po// shar nas bden bral mtshams bltas te// lho yi thig ni
47a1(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya// de nas me yi mtshams gnas te// rlung gi mtshams su gradab par bya// dAn bral mtshams nas dang ldan du// dwangs te grA y-i thig gdub po// de nas thig rnams kyi rigs par// lcug chung byed
47a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du gdab// de nas dbus su phur btab ste// de la brtod pa'i srang bu ni// dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur dag gis so// rdo rje ra ba la sogs bskor// 'di yi phyi yi 'khor lo ni// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis
47a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mdzes// kha khyer bzhi dang ldan pa la// rdo rje dril bu la sogs brgyan// sgo yi mtshams dang grwa bzhi ru// zla phyed rdo rje mdzes par bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni// sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs pa ste// rdo rje phreng bas rab
47a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i// kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya// hi las nyi ma zla ba dag/ mig tu bsams te khro bo yi// lta bar bcas pas kun bltas nas// sgo rnams dag nI legs bya ba// sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cher bya// sgo khyud chen
47a5(rgyud 'grel): po spangs pa yin// sgo yi tshang du khyams bya ste// de bzhin lha yi snam bu'o// kha khyer sgo yaM phyed du ste// 'gram dang gshog pa de yi tshang // dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang // rnga dang rdung dkrol la sogs brgyan// de phying tshan sna
47a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga yis// rdo rje ra ba'ang de'i tshad// rta babs sgo yi sum 'gyur la// ba dan dril bu l-i sogs rgyan// rin chen kun dang lcags rnams dang // 'byung khung dag gi phyi ma la// yi ge lde bkod byin brlabs bya// 'bar bar gyur
47b1(rgyud 'grel): dang gsang sngags bzlas// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM// sems can khams rnams grol mdzad cing // de ni chos dbyings ro yin no// de ltar dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i tshe// rlung la sogs pa byung gyur na// khro bo'i sbyor dang ldan pa yis//
47b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs bcing pa tshul bzhin bya// gshin rdzog/ shed po rgyal kun gtso// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor gyur pa// skon kun las ni rnam grol ba// de yi dbus su legs gnas te// dbang ldan mtshoms nas mnyam
47b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ru// bla mas g.yon gyi khu tshur gyis// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang gu sngon po de bzhin no// mnyam dang g.yas skor tshang ldan par// dkyil 'khor r-i mo bri bar bya// mnyam po bri bar ri mo ni// sgo yi nyi shu
47b4(rgyud 'grel): cha yin te// de bas sboms na nang 'byung lnga// phras na nor rnams zad par 'gyur// kyag kyog byung na 'thab mo 'byung // chang na slob ma bla me 'chi// g.yas skor du ni ma bris na// rdul mtshon gyi ni dngos grub nyams//
47b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse mo dkar po'i ngos// gzhan ser ba yi mdog yin te// gzhan ni pad+ma rA ga'i ngos// de bzhin mar ka ta ste// nang du sngon por shes par bya// de ni rdul tshon rim par bshad// shar gyi phyogs su dkar po ste// lho yi
47b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su ser po yin// nub phyogs dmar po bya ba ste// byang phyogs ljang gu dag tu 'dod// dbus ma'i sa yi cha nyid ni// in+d+ra nI la rab tu 'bar// rtag tu shes rab thabs ldan pas// shin tu mnyam gzhag yang dag
48a1(rgyud 'grel): b+hI/ zla ba nyi ma'i gdan ngag la// rdo rje'i 'od kyis kun 'khrigs pa'i// rdo rje dbus su yang dag bri// 'khor lo 'od 'bar rab 'jigs pa'i// 'khor lo shar gyi rA la bri// rin chen 'od 'bar rab 'khrigs
48a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// rin chen lho yi phyogs su bri// nub tu pad ma'i sprin 'khrigs pa'i// pad ma dmar po sdong bur bcas// ral gra'i 'od kyis rab 'khrigs pa'i// ral gri byang gI rA la bri// tho ba 'bar 'od gsal ba li// shar gyi
48a3(rgyud 'grel): sgo ru bri bar bya// be con 'bar 'od 'khrigs pa yi// be con lto yi sgo ru dugong// pad+ma 'bar bya rab 'jigs pa'i// 'od dang ldan pa nub sgor byi// ral gri 'bor ba'i sprin ldan pa// byang gi sgo ru bri bar bya// me
48a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams la sogs grwa bzhi ru// go rims bzhin du 'khor lo dang // rdo rje pad+ma ut+pa la// 'od dang ldan pa bri byar bya// phyi yi me mtshams la sogs par// zla bas gang ba'i snod bzhi bri// de ltar 'khor lo rdzogs pa
48a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / mkha' la bkod pa phab byas la// de nas sngon bzhin shes rab dang // sbyor byas 'khor lo bskyed nas gdon// dA l-i spyan sogs byin brlabs dang // thugs gsung sku yi rdo rje dang // dbang bskur la sogs bya
48a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yin// de nas sngon bzhin ye shes kyi// 'khor lo dgug dang bgeg dang bskrang sogs// byas lo sgo bzhi'i khro bo yi// sngogs la dzaHsogs mthar ldan pas// dgug gzhug pa cing dang dbang bya dang // ra ba dra ba
48b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bya// de nas lha mos sngon bzhin mchod// bstod dang bdud rtsi myang ba dang // rdul yab sbyang yab byasi la yab dang // khyams dang skyes mos tshal dgu dang // gzims mal dang ni gdan khri dang // myur 'gro rta dang glang po dang
48b2(rgyud 'grel): yi bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shong // rta babs dang ni bla re sogs// bza' btud bro mchog sna tshogs dang // glu gar la sogs mtha' yas mchod// de nas ci 'byor gzhan dag la// bzlas pa byas te mnyes par bya//
48b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi dang ldan dri chu yis// maN+Dal legs par byas nas su// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i te na na hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA// 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad ku sha ya dzaHoM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
48b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cang kI l+ya yau hUM phaT/ dgug dang phur bus gdab pa ste// de ltar byas pas 'od nyid du// gyur las rang rang yi ge ste// de las mtshan ma de las skur hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i rnam bzhi
48b5(rgyud 'grel): nini// dbang po gshin rje chu lus ngan// 'byung po me lha srin po rlung // ta A na na las byung ba'o// hUM hUM phaT dang yi ge gsum// nyi ma zla ba tshangs pa'o// phaT dang sA ste yi ge gnyis// sa bdag dang ni lha ma yin// hA ni
48b6(rgyud 'grel): khyab 'jug la sogs so// thams cad zhal gsum nyis 'gyur phyag/ dang po rang rang phyag mtshan la// lhag ma bde bar gshegs dang mthun// zhal mdog rigs kyi gtso bo 'ang // mig sogs brlab dang lus
49a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid // dbang bskur ba yang 'dra byas nas// gtor ma bdud rtsi bzhin brlabs la// lce yang brlabs te sbubs kyis su// rang sngags brjod pas brngub par bya// oM in+d+ra ya hrIHya ma yaSh+Tats+tshab ru NA
49a2(rgyud 'grel): ya wi/ ku be rA ya kr-i/ A shA nA ya ta/ ag+na ye yA nai rI t+ya ye na/ bA ya be na/ tsan+d+ran+da ya hUM arkA ya hUM/ brah+ma NA ya phaT/ ba su d+ha ra ya phaT/ be ma tsi tA ya swA/ sar+b+ba b+hu twe b+h+yo hA/ ha ha ha ha hUM/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ de yis phyogs skyong tshim
49a3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// 'thor 'thung byas le nang du 'gro/ de nas dkyil 'khor zhal bsro'i phyi ra// sbyin sreg gis ni tshim bya ste// sbyin sreg las las 'byung ba ltar// zhi dang rgyas pa bya bar 'dong // de nas slob ma rnams gzhug phyir//
49a4(rgyud 'grel): dang por bdag nyid 'jug par bya// bdag nyid sku sogs byin brlab cing // snang ba thob par gyur pa yis// slob mo gzhug po'i don du ni// de nyid rab tu brjod par bya// oM na mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma maung
49a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpar deng grub mdzod// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun+da gyi rgyul// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod//
49a6(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod// 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa// 'dod chags chen po dga' bo che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun
49b1(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa// rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ de nas bden
49b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byin brlabs brjod// sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing // sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs// sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid// 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'i// mgon po bden pa 'di yis no// bdag
49b3(rgyud 'grel): la khyod kyis 'dod rdzogs shog/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjed du mang // rgyu dang las las kun tu byung // de nyid de nyid bskyed pa ni// de dag bden pas dkyil
49b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la// gzugs brnyan gsal bar+ya slob ma ni// sdig med par+ya ni thams cad mthong // thun mong sdom bzung slob ma ni// sngon bzhin sku sogs 'od gsal ba// yol bas bar du bcad nas su// kun byed bum pa'i chu
49b5(rgyud 'grel): yis su// bkrus pa'i ngar ras dmar po yis// bu sdug de yis ngo bkab la// khyod su zhes no dri bar bya// bdag ni skal ldan yin zhes smra// khyod ci dga' zhes dris pa la// bskal pa bzung la byungag doga'i zhes//
49b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa pos kyang smra bar bya// de nas phreng ba sbyin bya ste// u dum ba ra man da ra// yongs su dag ni mo li ka/ ka ra ni ka yi phreng ba ni// legs par mnos te bus zung zhing // oM AHhUM bla ma slob dpon mgon rje su// 'bad pa
50a1(rgyud 'grel): chen pos dbang gi don// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen pos// rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang dbang bskur te// bdag la don mchog stsal du gsol// gtso la yon sogs
50a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dbul// gtong sems yang dag bskyed par bya// de yi snying gar rdo rje nI// me tog bcas pa'i snying por gzhag/ oM sarba yo gA tsit+ta/ ut+pA da yA mr-i su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho sid+d+hi badz+ra ya thA su khyaM/ da ring khyod la de
50a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i gsang chen 'di// dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi bya'o// ngad pa med pa la yang
50a4(rgyud 'grel): mi rung ngo // zhes brjod par bya'o// tho so gos sngags kyis drang bya zhing // yi ge gsum gyis gzhug par bya// nang du sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug/ de nas tshig 'di brjod par bya// de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
50a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs la rab tu chud do// de bas bdag gis khyod kyi rdo rje ye shos bskyed par bya'o// ye shes gang gis khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par bya ba ste/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos// dngos
50a6(rgyud 'grel): grub 'di ni khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o// khyod ni dam tshig las 'da' bar mi rung ngo // de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas// gal te tshul 'di smras nas ni/
50b1(rgyud 'grel): de ma thagA d+ha dra lA te gshegs// oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ pad+ma gnas yig gsum 'bar ba yi// bdud rtsi lnga ni 'thung bcug ste// 'di ni khyod kyis dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/
50b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// oM badz+rod ke ThaHde nas 'di skad smra bar bya'o// de ring phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis// ngas ci smras pa'i bya ba 'di khyod kyis bya dgoso// nga lA yang brnyes par ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma
50b3(rgyud 'grel): spangs par shi ba'i dus byas te// dmyal bar ltung bar ma 'gro zhig/ de nas de ltar smra ba la// slob mas 'di ltar smra bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas// rdo rje sems dpa'
50b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la 'bab par gyur cig/ ces smra bar bya'o// gsol 'debs de yi gnas bzhi ru// 'byung tshan bzhi yi dkyil 'khor ni// yi ge bzhi la dbyibs mdog ldan// ba dan lo sogs mtshan byas pa// bsams te rlung la
50b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs bskyod pa// rdo ba dag kyang 'bab gyur no// sems ldan 'bab pa ci zhig smos// ye shes babs nas 'phar gyur na// tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa brtan par bya// lce la yi ge a bsams te// dge dang mI dge byi bar bya// de nas mig
50b6(rgyud 'grel): gi snang ba bri// me tog 'khor lo la dor nas// pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hi zhes brjod// slar yang blangs la mgor bcings la// pra ti gr-ih+Na la sogs brjod// mtshan ma gang la bab pa ste// de ni de yi lha ru sbyin// 'od 'bar oM gnyis
51a1(rgyud 'grel): mig tu bsam// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis khyod// de ring nan tan mig phye'o// bla na med pa'i rdo rje'i mig/ thams cad rab tu phye bar 'gyur// badz+ra pa sha/ dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// nga ni dad pa rab tu
51a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ 'gro ba phun tshegs dngos grub kyang // khyod la sngon du phyogs par 'gyur// dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs// gsang sngags
51a3(rgyud 'grel): la yang brtson par gyis// ral gri gshin dgra nas brtsams nas// ji srid gtso bo'i mthar thug par// bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yin// spyi bor chu yis gtor bya zhing // badz+ra oM b+hi Shiny+tsa brjod// dbu rgyan dbang yang
51a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin te// de nas rdo rje sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang // de ring khyod la sbyin par bya// 'di nga sings rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje zung zhig rong grub phyir// rdo rje dril bu 'khyud byas nas// bdag po'i dbang yang bskur
51a5(rgyud 'grel): babar bya// oM badz+ra a d+hi pa tau tr-i a b+hau Shiny+tsa mAM// spyi bor gangab tshul ming dbang bskur// tiSh+Tha badz+ra sA ma yA s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra satwa traM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra na ma a b+hi Sha ka ta/ slob dpon gang dang gang dag gi/ lhag pa'i lha ni gang gi/
51a6(rgyud 'grel): lhago pa'i lha ni gang gang gi/ de nas de yi mtshan dag ni// dpal dang kye yis mdzes par bya// rig pa'i dbang lnga byin nas su// rig sbyor brtul zhugs lung bstan dang // dbugs dbyung dang ni gsum du 'dod// hUM gis rdo rje de
51b1(rgyud 'grel): snong la// 'od ni sangs rgyas thams cad do// phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug/ khyed kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya// phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba twa thA ga ta sad+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tham+b+ha/ e Shar+d+ha d+hA ra yA mi badz+ra satwA ti d+d+haH
51b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM hU~M// thog ma tha ma med pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyoms bdag bdag mdzod cig/ chos kyi dril bu gzung bar bya// 'dri de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab rjes 'gro
51b3(rgyud 'grel): ba yi dbyangs// rtag par khyod kyis kyang gzung ste// rgyal ba byang chub mchog tu banid// chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// srid pa rang bzhin gyis ngag phyir// rangadwa bzhin gyis ni 'byung bar byed// rang bzhin dgu pa'i sems dpa'
51b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ srid pa'i mchog ni 'grub par byed// srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung // sdug bsngal chen po dag bye'i phyir// shin+da tu bde ba dam pa'i thabaso// dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la//
51b5(rgyud 'grel): ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog bzhugs par gyur gyi tshe// de snying mtshungs med sems can don// mya
51b6(rgyud 'grel): ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// bsod nams byin brlabs kyis bsgrubs la// dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed// dngos grub thams cad phun gsum tshogs// phyag rgya chen po'i brtul zhug
52a1(rgyud 'grel): nr-i/ de yis rab tu sbyin par bya// de nas sdom bzung yon phul te// phyag byas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod rten bgyis pa ltar// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral
52a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol// 'jug sgor pad me 'dab brgyad pa// dar gyis bkab par 'dug byas la// bkra shis tshigs bcas gru sgra dang // rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du//
52a3(rgyud 'grel): til gyi gang bu bzhin grang ba'i// rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas su// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bas// dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam// chu dang de bu rgyan sngon bzhin te// rdo rje dril bu tshig 'ongs sbyin// shes rab thabs kyi/
52a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin du// grub pa'i rdo rje dril bu 'di// khyod kyis dad pas rab zung la// rdo rje khyod kyis slob ma bsdus// ming yang sngon dang 'dra bar sbyin// de nas bla mos chog 'di brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rol gri che// khams gsum
52a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis phyag byas pa// las kyi ral gri gcig pu mchog/ bdud rnams las ni rgyal bzung // dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid bstan po// mnyam pa nyid phyir gru bzhi ste// nye bar gzhag dang yang dag spong // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa
52a6(rgyud 'grel): dade dbang po// go rims bzhin du sgo bzhi'o// bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs te// ting 'dzin bzhi kha khyer yin// de rten gzungs kyi ring bzhin no// 'gro kun gdul phyir phyogs sgom// rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril sgra sgrogs/
52b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yan lag rnam dag phyir// dra dpyang la sogs smras// rnam thar brgyad ldan ka ba ste// rgyan bkod paka dus mdzes pan+te// bsam pa thams cad yongs bskur phyir// sna tshogs las kyi mthar thug phyir// pho brang sna
52b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje 'bar// theg che na 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir// rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs su bskor// sems can sems ni dgrol bya'i phyir// tshon rnams ye shes lnga yin no// dam pa'i tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// byang chub
52b3(rgyud 'grel): sems gang ka pA lA// bdug pa me tog mar me drang // bshos dang byug pa la sogs nI// snyan grags byang chub yAn lpag dong // dga' dang chos zas lus bde yin// ngo tsha khrel yod sdom pa yis// byed bskyed dbyangs
52b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gar sogs yin// sangs rgyas bzhugs phyir gzhal yas khang // snying po lan phyir dkyil 'khor ro// lha yi de nyid bstan bya ba// dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin// stobs rnams dag pa sgor gnas po'i// byas
52b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi// tsa ra tsi kra sogs lha mo bAzhi// shin tu rnam dag la sogs lnga// zhe sdang gA shin+da rje la sogs pa'o// 'khor bas ma chags pad+ma ste// nyi zla byang chub sems myu gu// gso dang smin par byed
52b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nas byang dang na sor ldan// ri dgas lte ba'i dri mnam dang // gser gyi sku cha g.yo ba zhig/ gcig cig legs btsal dbul bar bya// bla mas bzlas te byin brlabs la// sbyong ba'i tsho gas mnyes par bya//
53a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba mtha bong srin lag gus// slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya// badra ba'i btung ba ran chen de// brtan pa'i blo yis btung bar bya// a ha~M sa? kha zhes snang swA// de nas bu mo mig yangs mo// mdzes
53a2(rgyud 'grel): shing nu ma rgyas pa zhig/ rang gi bu la sbyin par bya// mgo bor lag bzhag gsang ba gtad // de yi gzungs la legs sbyangs mo// de dang bde ba myong bar bya// de nas slob dpon shes rab dang // bcas pas dkyil 'khor lha
53a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid// slob dpon las rnams brtan par bya// ji ltar dbang bskur la sogs 'dis// sangs rgyas sogs kun thob pa bzhin// byang chub spyod sogs gzhan dag dang // 'dul sogs dag pas de bzhin min// de bas dam
53a4(rgyud 'grel): tshig pus srungs shig/ rtag tu sdom pa yang bsrung ngo // sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' ste// de las gzhan pa'i dam tshig bsrung / dkon mchog gnod pa gsang kyi ste/ bud ni kun kyang spyad par bya// phyi rol nor yang blangs nas su// rtag tu brdzunanA gyi tshi sha kyang smra//
53a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rgyud las gang gsungs pa// de ni cho ga bzhin du bsrung // de nas de bzhin gshegs gyur nas// lung bstan pa ni bya ba yin// g.yon gyis snying gor chos gos zung // g.yas pa yis ni mchod sbyin bya// oM ngas khyod
53a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltaro lung bstan yin// srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton// srid pa'i mchog tu grub pa'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// kyai gshin rje mthar 'byin pa ni b+hur b+hu ba swaHde ltar lung bstan bsngags
53b1(rgyud 'grel): pa de// bla med nyid du lung bstan yin// de nas dbugs dbyung sbyin bya ste// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas// sdig pa kun las ngas grol zhing // khyed rnams de nyid legs par gnas
53b2(rgyud 'grel): bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// slar 'chi ba ni yong meng de// mi tshugs pa dang mi song pas// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod bton// srid pa shin tu
53b3(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i phyir// rtog pa mchog tu gyur pa yis// dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di// rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs// gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis su// sangs rgyas nyid du dog
53b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i// byang chub sems ni btang mi bya// phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'i// de las sogs pa'i bka' stsal ni// ci rigs par ni brjod par bya// de ltar bka' stsal thob pa dang // slob ma gus dang ldan pa yis// bla ma'i rkang
53b5(rgyud 'grel): par phyag byas la// thams cad bsgrub par khas blang ngo // de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni// ci nus pa yang bya ba ste// slob ma g.yon phyogs bzhag nasu// de yi srin lag nas bzung la// sbyin sreg bsang dang bsrung ba dang // me tog
53b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus te bla ma la// phul la mer dor smon lam bya// da ltar bya ba kun zin nas// de nyid gsum mothar muHldan pas/ ye shes sems dpa' gshegs par bskul// de dang mthun par bskyed par bsdu// thog mar a ldan
54a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyis// rdul tshon bsgoms te bsdu bar bya// rol mo bcus pas spyan drangs la// kI l-i kI lis chu bor dor// rdo rje'i skam khrus phur bu gdon// rig pa spyan bzlas 'o mas bkru/ ba yau lci bas
54a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor byug/ de stang dga' ston la sogs bya// dkyil 'khIg+ni ni yo byad kun// rdo rje slob dpon dbang bar bshad// de ltar bya ba las dang po'i// rnal 'byor pa yis bya ba yin// gzhon dag dbab dang sems nyid kyis// byas pa
54a3(rgyud 'grel): rmad du byung ba yin// de ltar dbang thob slob ma de// deng nyid slob dpon go 'phang 'gyur// de yis bsgrub pa 'bras bcas phyir// ngas ni bsgrub pa brtsam par bya// las kyi mthar thug rgyud 'di ru// thun mong ma yin 'khor lo no// dgos
54a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ma lus kun byed pa// de 'dir bdag gis bri bar bya// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas// legs byugs dur khyod ras ma la// dug dang nim pa'i khu ba dang // khrag dang dur khrod sol ba dang // da du ra sogs snag tshwa dang //
54a5(rgyud 'grel): rus pa'i smyu guso bI bya ba// gcer bu skra byashig go dong bsnyer te// khros pas lho ru mngon phyogs la// sngags bzlas rtse gcig pA yis bri// zlum por bskor ba gsum bya ste// dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu drug ste// le tshe rnams
54a6(rgyud 'grel): ni byas pa lo// yi ge gsang sngags sa bon bri// dbus su zhe sdang rdo rje nyid// yang shar du gauti mug rdo rje ste// lhor ni ser sna rdo rje yin// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje la// byang du phrag dog rdo rje'o// k+She ma me nga gnyis pa'i phyogs
54b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhir lhor brtsams nas// shar gyi phyogs la thug gi byar// khro bo yum dang snod dag gi/ re re gong ma mus rim bzhin// do yo ya/ mtshams kyi le tshe brgyad po la// bden bral mtshams na lha mo gnyis// rlung gnas mdzod ldan me mtshams
54b2(rgyud 'grel): snod// dbang ldan na ni thod pa gnyis// mi mtshams na ni sgo srungs gnyis// dzA sa ru Na ni rats+tsha ni// kun ming thog ma dbus su te// a/ lho ru ser sna ral gri 'dzin// nub tu chags dang dbyangs can ma// byang du phrag dog bden bral snod//
54b3(rgyud 'grel): shar du gti mug dang tho ba// mA ra me do yo k+Sha ya// gnas pa phyi nang so so yi// phyogs mtshams bye brag bklag pa dang // phyi nang thun mong phyogs mtsham su// bklag pa dag ste gnyis su 'dong // gnas pa sde tshan so so ni// gtso
54b4(rgyud 'grel): bo khro bo lha mo dang // ban da bzhi ru shes bya ste// sdom dang so sor bklag par bya// yok+She ma me da pA ts+tsho nai rA// dzA sa do ru Na ye nau ra/ yi ge bcu bdun dbang byas nas// rnam pa dgu ru bklag bya yin// rtsa ba'i sngagasu gdon pa la// yi ge
54b5(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang // rkang pa bzhi ru gden pa dang // so sor phye ste gdon pa'o// yi ma rA dza la sogs pa'o// dang po dang mgo mtha' ltag mtha'// glo tso bo lnga ru bstan pa yin// dang po tha mA yi ge brgyad// gshin+da rje dgra nyid
54b6(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// ya ya ya ya ya ya ya ya/ dang po mgo mtha' mtha' ma'i lhag/ ser sna rdo rje yin par 'dod// ma ma/ dang po'i mtha' ltag gnyis dang mgo/ 'dod chags rdo rje'i yi ge yin// me me/ gnyis pa'o
55a1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' ltag gsum dang 'og/ phrag dog nyid du bstan pa yin// dang gsum pa'i mtha' ltag bzhi dang 'og/ gaN+DI mug rdo rje'i yi ge yin// kle kr-i/ rkang pa dang po'i dbu ma bzhi// khro bro gcig dang lha
55a2(rgyud 'grel): mo gsum// rA dza sa // rkang pa gnyis pa'i dbu ma bzhi// lha mo gnyis dang thod pa gnyis// do ru Na yo/ rkang pa gsum pa'i dbu ma bzhi// snod chen gsum dang khro bo gcig/ yo ni rA ya/ rkang pa bzhi pa'i dbu ma bzhi//
55a3(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bzhi ru shes par bya// yats+tsha na rA/ 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa dang // 'phel dang mgrin dang mu bzhi dang // thun meng dang ni rnam pa drug/ gcig gnyis gsum bzhi gong nas 'phel// gsum gnyis gcig dang zad mthar
55a4(rgyud 'grel): thug/ rA do ru yo// ni rA yots+tsha ni rA/ dzA sa dro na ya ya/ tha ma gcig dang gong mya gsum// 'og ma gnyis dang gong ma gnyis// 'og ma gsuM dang dang po gcig/ ma 'dres bzhi dang mu bzhi'o// 'jug dang ldog dang thun mong ni//
55a5(rgyud 'grel): gang du bstan pas shes bya ste// 'jug ldog phyogs kyi gtso bo la// thun mong phyi yi phyogs la'o// dgu dang brgyad kyi yi ge ni// bcu bdun dag ste lha ru 'dod// re re'ang mgo dang mthar ldan pa// gsang sngags gdon par
55a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yin// dbus kyi phyogs min stong pa ru// sa bon gnyis par ming spel bri// rim pa gsum pa'i l-i tse ni// bcu drug pa la bri bya ba// sngags min skul tshig bcas pa dang // yi ge gnyis par ming bcug pa// spel
55b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing spel zhing bri bar bya// da ltar bris pa'i 'khor lo ni// lugs dang lugs min gnyis byas la// so sor mthun par mgo spyad la// til te phyi rol mar khus byug/ thod pa gnyis ni kha sbyar bar// mar khus khrag blugs der
55b2(rgyud 'grel): bcug la// skud pa sngon pos khris bdun dkri/ de la me tog nag po dang // dug sogaso nag pos mchod par bya// rgyal po'i sgo khangs dang ni// grog khyim la sogs sa dag las// bau/ shin+da rje'i dgra yi sku bya ba// 'khrugs
55b3(rgyud 'grel): pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// khru gang tsam gyi tshang byas la// de yi mdun du dkyil 'khor ni// gnag po khrag gi chag chag can// byas la de steng spos chen dbul// de nas bdag gi gsang sngags ni// skul tshig
55b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan par rab tu bzlas// khro bo'i rgyun ni rnam spros te// gazlas pa'i lus las go cha dang // srung ba phrogs nas bdag la thim// de nas de ni gos med cing // sdug bsngal sna tshogs pas gzir bsnam// du bkug mthar
55b5(rgyud 'grel): byibyed lto bar gzhug khrib ban gAzan+d+ha sna tshogs kyis// gshin rje gshid kyi lto ba nas// rkang dang zlum khrag tshal bu/ phyogs bcur khyer nas 'gro bar bsam// de ltar brten par gyur pa dang / shing gcig dur khrod
55b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs par// gshin rje'i lto bar bcug la sgra// 'khor lo dgos pa kun byed 'di// so so'i bye brag shes byas la// zhe sogs las rnams thams cad ni// ji ltar mngon par dga' bar bya// la li badz+ra zhes bya nus pa
56a1(rgyud 'grel): kun dang numA d+hA lA yang // zlu ma'i rjes 'brangs dad pas de yi phyogs tsam+b+ha ga dung bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mog 'di byas dgye byad mU gang yin ga/ de yis 'gro kun glu shin d+hu ma lus mthur blon byung rgyu/
56a2(rgyud 'grel): tsug/ gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ ge shrIn+da rjeg shing 'byung ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po l-I l-I t+yA badz+ra ljin la snganas mdzod pa rdzogs so// rgyu gang gyi mkhan po u mo g+ha badz+re dang / 'o oM ts+tsha hU~M
56a3(rgyud 'grel): cog gu shes rab thams bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// myu gar skad du/ bo ngan+yad+d+ha to ka/ byed skad du/ mchod rten bsgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshin drug shing
56a4(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshalo// dbang thob gzhan don la dga' bas// dur khrod la sogs dben gnas su// byams dang snying rje sngon btang la// yon tan kun rdzob mchod rte nA gdab// de la dang por bdag nyid kyis// las dang mthun pa'i sa
56a5(rgyud 'grel): blangs la// khrus dang rgyan rnams ci rigs bgo'o// de nas rdo rje rnam bzhi yis// yang na gar mo lho yang rung // bdag nyid rdzogs nas 'jim pa brdzi// oM hrIHSh+T+rIwi kr-i tA na nA hUM hUM phaT phaT A pri taM ku ru swA hA/ zhes bAs
56a6(rgyud 'grel): brdzis 'dzin rdo rje bzhi// gong bzhin ci rigs spyan drangs la// mchod bstod las dang bstun la bya// 'od kyi gong bur gyur pa las// 'bi 'bi 'od kyi thig bral can// gong bus dza saM do ru bkod// yang na oM bkod yum gyi mkha'
56b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bi 'bi'i rdul phran rA re la// yi grA yA la sogs pa bkod// thabs dang shes rab gnyis meng gdeb// sgra yi dam chos la sogs sgrogs// mkha' byung byed gshegs kun dpag med// rdul re sku re de ltar brtag/ mAN+Dalu
56b2(rgyud 'grel): las mthun ras de bzhin// dang po snying po phyag rgya dang // che gaM las dang bstun par gzhug/ de nas rgyan dbul srog 'khor lo// dar chen chu srin rgyal mtshan gsol// legs par rdzogs nas gzhan yang ni// de nas rang snying 'od
56b3(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas spyan drangs la// mchod bstod la sogs rdzogs byas la// gnyis meng tshul du bsre bar bya// de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis// tsa ra tsi ka sogs lugs pa'i glus// lha mo chu yis sku khrus gsol// de
56b4(rgyud 'grel): nas las dang mthun pa yi// gsol ba btab pas shes par bya// gdab pa'i sngags ni hrIHShIH'am nang gi yi ge bcu bdun pa'am// 'khor lo'i sngags sogs so so 'am// bsdom pa la yang 'gal ba med// rang rang
56b5(rgyud 'grel): las dang sbyar ba'i sngags// sdig pa zhi bar bya ba yis// surbo pA pa shAn+ti ku ru yaM ku ru swA hA/ nor dang bsod nams rgyas byed na// dbusu puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ dgra la sogs pa dbang sdud na// bA shAM ku ru swA hA/ gang dag gnod byed
56b6(rgyud 'grel): gsod 'dod na// mA ra ya hUM phaT bsgrub bya ngan byed par 'dod na// bi di sha ya phaT// gnas nas spo bar 'dod pa no// uts+tsha Ta ya phaT/ gang dag mnan par bya bar 'dod na/ sti b+ha ya hUM laM/ bsgrub bya dgug par 'dod pa
57a1(rgyud 'grel): yis// a k+Sha ra ya dzaHde la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni// rgyud las byung ba bzhin du brtag/ de skad du yang / nye ba'i las ni gang grub pa/ phyag rgya snying po bris bcug na// gang bsgom the tshom med par 'grub// dngos
57a2(rgyud 'grel): grub gang 'dod sbyin pas nges// gzhan yang nang gi sbyor ba ni// ting nge 'dzin la rag las pa// gzhan nus byung ba yang shes par bya'o// bdag gi dge ba cung zad 'ang // 'gro ba gshin rje gshed gnas thob par shog/ rgya gar
57a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mkhan po la li ta badz+ra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ rak+Sha sA d+ha no pi ka/ bod skad du/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam
57a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal gshin rje ngag mgon la// yang dang yang du phyag byas la// bar chad zhi bar byed pa yi// srung ba dam pa bshad par bya// bsnyen pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa yis// de yis bsgrub pa 'bras bcas phyir// nga ni srung ba'i las
57a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams bya// rab tu shis pa'i gnas mchog tu// khrus byas byug pa dri zhim byug/ mchog gi gos bgo rgyan rnams gdags// bde stan skyil krung shar bltas la// phan pa'i sems dang byams par ldan// spro bar 'dod
57a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lhar bskyed de// bsod nams tshogs bsags gnyis med bsre// mtshan bcas sngags bzlas gtor ma sbyin// gsar zhing dge ba'i ras ngag la// tsan dan ga bur byug bya ste// skyes bu zhi byed gur kum ste//
57b1(rgyud 'grel): bud med la ni gi wang ngo // ser ba la sogs zhi byed dang // nad dang gnod pa thams cad la// guR+Sha kum dag gis yang dag bya// de dag bri ba'i smyu gu yung // gser ram dngul lam shis par bri// de dag bri ba'i rim pa yang
57b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi dro maN+Dal legs byas te// mchod par ldan pos yang dag bri// bden pa bdar la bri bar bya// thig chen brgyad ni yang dag gdab// zlum por bskor ba gsum byas te// tha ma thod pas bskor bar bya// thig thung rnams
57b3(rgyud 'grel): kyong gdab bya ste// dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu drug mig/ dbus kyi re mig dgu pa la// dbus su ya la shar du k+She// lho ru ma dri nub tu me// byang du da ste mtshams bzhi ru// rak+Sha rak+Sha bur ming gzhug/ rim pa
57b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa shwar brtsams nas// ya tsa ni ra dze saM do ru NA yo ni rA// rim pa gsum pa'i shwar brtsams nas// shaMrI gyi ri mAg dang pri lA// oM dz+nyIHSh+Tiwikr-i tA nA na hUM hUM phaT phaT sIhA/ che gre mo rak+Sha rak+Sha/ de 'og
57b5(rgyud 'grel): re mig gnyis pa la// che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha/ de ltar re mig bcu drug pa// spel zhing spel zhing dgod par bya// de ltar bris pa'i 'khor lo ni// lugs da nga lugs mr-in gnyis byas te// sa skor lugs su byung ba la//
57b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas skor dag ni lugs las ldog/ yid sngags mthun mthun mgo sprad de// so sor mnyan par bris la dril// kham phor yang ngag gtsang ma'i nang // phyi rol spra tshil dril byas te// rtse mar sbrang rtsi ri bcas pa
58a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhug/ bas bskyed skung pa dkar po yis// khris bdun dag tu dkri bar bya// maN+Dal dkar po khru gang tshad// ba yi rnam lnga dri yis byug/ de stengs kham por kha sbyar bzhag/ stong nyid ngang las/
58a2(rgyud 'grel): thig le ste// de las yig 'bru phyag mtshan sku// kun kyang zhal gsum nyis 'gyur phyag/ rang gi rig bcas bde ba gang // sku mdog phyag mtshan rdzogs par bskyed// dbang bskur byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya// rang nyid hUM gi
58a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis// ye shes 'khor lo rdzogs pa dgug/ phyag dang mchod sogs sdom po gzung // de nas gnyis med 'od zer gyis// dam chog 'khor lo gnyis med bsre// phyi nang gsong ba'i mchod pas mchod// de nas thugs rje
58a4(rgyud 'grel): rjes dran nas// bsrung ba'i don du 'ong du zhu// thig le dag las yi gar gyur// lha rnams sngags kyi gzugs kyis bzhugs// de la byin brlabs 'di dag bya// spyan gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i// hUM ya mAn+ta kr-ita badz+ra d+harmA tsuk+Shu pra be sha ya
58a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do// zhal gyi phyag rgya shes pa yis// oM ya mAn+ta ka de ba shrI d+ha ya traM pra be sha ya phaT ces brjod// gtsug tu phyag rgya rob byas la// oM ya mAn+ta ko ba/ tsho ba'i phyag rgya ldan pa yis// oM gu h+ya gu laM/ de nas mchod dang
58a6(rgyud 'grel): bstod byas la// spro bsdu ldan pas gsang sngags bzlas// bsrung ba'i don du rab tu sbyar// de nas kham phor dbyung byas la// spra tshil dag gis dril byas la// yang na rgya skyegs bskus byas pa'i// dri dang bsres te byug par bya//
58b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya khrus bya rgyan bgo ste// dris byugs mAn+tal steng bzhag ste// bden pa bdar te skyes pa g.yon// dpa' min ngag ni g.yas su gdags// phas kyi rgol ba'i dmag rnams dang // me dang chu dang nad la sogs// gang dag
58b2(rgyud 'grel): rlung dngo ser po rnams// bsrung bar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// shin tu gtsang zhing mthon por ni// mA nA la legs byugs mye tog dgram// de ni rgyal mtshan rtse la gdags// nyin re dus gsum yang dag mchod// skul
58b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig ldan pas gsang sngags bzlas// gtor mo rgyun tu sbyin par bya// sbyin sreg thal ba phyogs bcur gtor// 'khor lo 'dod pa'i bskul tshig ldan// de dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// srung ba kun gyi mchog
58b4(rgyud 'grel): yin pas// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bad par bya// smyung baM kun gyi cho ga dam pa 'di// sgrub pa po dang sems can don du byas// de yis dge ba cung zad gang thob des// 'gro kun bdud bzhi kun gyis gnod
58b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsrung bar shog/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
59a1(rgyud 'grel): yal gshin gsheng nag po'i sgrub thapas nyin byed grags pas mdzad pa bajug so//
59b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri na ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gsheng nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs// dpal khro bo 'jigs pa can la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje
59b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ drag shul che zhing 'jigs par byed// khro tshan de la phyag 'tshal te// de yi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad bya// de la sngags pa dbang dang dam tshig dang ldan pa/ snying rje che ba/ brtul phod pa/ shes rabye dang ldan pa des/
59b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas dur khrod la sogs pa yid dga' ba'i gnas su gnas te// brtul zhugs mchog spyad par bya'o// bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis lhar bskyed de// snying gar nyi ma'i steng du hUM bsam/ de la 'od zer gyis bskul
59b4(rgyud 'grel): nas spyan drangs te// bzhugs pa la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa'i bye brag dbul// de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang bya ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / tshangs
59b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas/ de nas stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya ste/ gang gi rnam par yang mi bsgom mo// oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha At+ma ko haM/ der rjes hUM las 'od 'phros pos// sdang ba thabs cad bsreg par bya//
59b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pas rdo rje gur du gyur// ra ba dra ba bsam par bya// de nos na mkha'i dbyings bsam bya// de yi nang du gan lo yas khang // rdo rje rgyu grim yang dag ldan// rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bsgom// nyi gdan ma he li
