89a5(rgyud 'grel): bar byas la/ de rnams la mngon par 'dud pa dang / mchod pa dang mdun du sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yau rang ba dang / de yongs su bsngo ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / smin pa
89a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / rgyal po'i lam la brten pa dang / 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / slar btang ba'i bar du bsgrub po// de nas yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dran pas stong pa nyid
89b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod de// 'di ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpal gshin rje'i dgra skyed par byed pa'o// de bzhin du rang bzhin gyi lus dang ngag dang yi ngag/
89b2(rgyud 'grel): oM AHhUM zhes pa'i yi ge gsum phi dang ma'i dbus na gnas pa steng du zla ba la gnas pa bsam mo// mdun du nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM nag po las byung ba'i rdo rje nag po 'bar ba las// rdo rje'i sa dang gur rnams bsgom par
89b3(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing // bgegs med pa'i sems kyis dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su gyur pa las chos kyi 'byung gnas dbus na paM las byung ba'i pad ma sna tshogs dang / kham las byung
89b4(rgyud 'grel): bo'i sna tshogs rdo rje can bsams te/ de'i zla ba la yi ge b+h+rUM wa b+hung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa yi ge b+h+rUM gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad rigs ma dang bcas pa'i
89b5(rgyud 'grel): yan lag las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dra ba dang dri ba phyed pas mdzes pa/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gnas pa/ sna tshogs rdo rje la brten pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma la zla ba dang nyi
89b6(rgyud 'grel): mas mnan pa bcu bdun gyis mdzes pa rnam par bsgo mo// de'i dbusu zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum la gzigs nas byin pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ dbyings bcu drug dang ya ra la wi da d+ha lhag pa'i gsal
90a1(rgyud 'grel): byed bzhi bcu'i gzugs nyes 'gyur du byas pa byon nas/ rim pa bzhin 'og dang steng du zla ba gnyis su gyur bar bya ba ni/ me long lta bu'i ye shes so// zla ba gnyis dang yi ge gsum 'dres
90a2(rgyud 'grel): pas gang ba'i zla ba gsum du gyur pa ni mnyam pa nyid do// de yongs su gyur pa las yi ge hUM dkar pos mtshan pa'i rdo rje bsams te/ oM badz+ra at+ma ko ho/ zhes ngar 'dzin pa ni so sor rtog pa'o// yi ge hUM las byung ba'i ngo
90a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs par byas te/ yi ge hUM gi nang du son pa dang / oM ya thA sarba ta thA gi tAHta thA a haM/ zhes nga rgyal bya ba ni bya ba grub pa'o// yi gi hUM las byung
90a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul te/ hUM la zhugs pa dang hUM dang rdo rjer bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i/ rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo sgeg pa'i nyams can/
90a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba/ rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku thams cad dkar ba/ zhal g.yas g.yon sngo ba dang dmar ba/ phyag dang po g.yas dang g.yon gyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab mA la 'khyud pa/ phyag
90a6(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje dang ral gri dang / 'khor lo rang pad+ma bsnams pa/ dbu rgyan du mi bskyod pas mnan pa/ 'di ltar bdag nyid bsgom pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'o// 'di ni dpal gshin rje'i dgra sgo ngar 'jug
90b1(rgyud 'grel): pa rab tu bsgom pa'o// de nas rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas su byas pa drangs te/ rang gi lus la gzhug go/ de'i 'og tu yi ge gsum pha dang ma'i dbus
90b2(rgyud 'grel): na gnas pa d+ma za'i sems can lta bu rang gi kha nas zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pa rdo rje'i lam nas byung ste/ rang gi rig po'i pad+mar lhung ba dang / de las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar pos de la reg pas rig ma 'dod
90b3(rgyud 'grel): chags chen pos zhu zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyang zhu bar blta'o// zhu ba'i sgo nga las byung ba'i tsa ra tsi ka la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi stan la 'khod pas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs par mthong ste/ yid mi dga' bas mgrin
90b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bshibs te/ slong ba'i glus 'di ltar bskul lo// rje btsun thugs rjes khro ba bzhengs mdzod la// jo bo de ring bdud las rgyal ba'i phyir// srid gsum kun gyi gti mug mthar mdzod cing // 'jig rten ma lus thugs/
90b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi mgron bos nas// stong pa nyid du ma bzhugs rje btsun bzhengs// 'jig rten bsod nams bya ba'i ched du ni// stong pa nyid du ma bzhugs rje btsun bzhengs// byang chub dngos la 'jig rten mgron pos nas// tsas na bsam pa
90b6(rgyud 'grel): mi mnga' rje btsun bzhengs// nga ma thag tu tsar tsi ka la sogs pa sgo nga la zhugs shing zhugs ma thag tu/ sgo nga yongs su gyur pa las/ gshin rje'i dgra ma he'i steng nas sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma la g.yas brkyang bas gnas
91a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku mdog mthing nag/ zhal g.yas dang g.yen dkar ba dang dmar ba/ phyag rnams rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma dad ldan pa/ rus pa'i rgyun gyis
91a2(rgyud 'grel): smras pa/ 'od zer mthing ga'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa/ smin ma 'bar zhing khro gnyer brtsegs pa/ phyag dang zhabs kyi san mo rno ba/ gsus pa che ba/ mi thung gi gzugs can/ skra khyam pa gyen du brdzes pa/ klu chen po mthong
91a3(rgyud 'grel): de'i dug tshan phuHzhes zer ba rnams kyis yan lag rnam par brgyan pa/ 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par bsams pa'i 'og tu bdag nyid la chu'i nang gi zla ba ltar sbreng bas/ oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes
91a4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa bya'o// 'di ni dpal gshin rje'i ngagra sgro nga las byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// de nas rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te/ rang gi kha nas zhugs pa dang / rdo rje'i lam
91a5(rgyud 'grel): nas song ste/ shes rab ma'i pad+mar gnas pa'i gong bu las/ zhe sda nga rdo rje dang / gti mug rdo rje dang / ser sna rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje dang / phrag dog rdo rje rnams yaM dang kwa dang ya dang me dang de rnam kyi sa bon las sngo zhing
91a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du gong bu las byung ba'i sa bon ya dang tsa dang ni dang rA dang dza dang sa dang / do dang ru rnams las thob pa dang / ba con dang pad+ma dang / ral gri dang tsa tsi ka dang / phag mo dang dbyangs can ma dang / mdzod ldan ma rnams
91b1(rgyud 'grel): du byung bar bya'o// yang gong bu las byung ba'i sa bon/ na dang yo dang ni drang rwa rnams las grwa bzhir zad pa bzhi dbyung bar bya'o// de ni 'di ltar sa bon las rang rang gi stan gyi steng du rang rang gi rtsa ba'i mtshan ma des mtshan ma dbyung hrI
91b2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyu pa las rang rAng gi lUs su gnas pa'o// de nas ri mi b+ha bzhin du/ oM d+hI Sh+T+rI wikr-i tA nAn+ta hU~M d+hU phaT phaT swAn+ti/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ smr-i twA d+h+r-ik+ShA/ au ai ro la ki/ badz+rA d+hag+ta/ oM mud ra T+Te/ oM dAH d+hIH/ oM
91b3(rgyud 'grel): khaD+ga d+ha kaM/ oM dwe Sha ra ti/ oM mo ha ra ti/ oM rA ga rA ti/ oM badz+ra ra ti/ oM AHhUM zhes pa'i sngags rnams kyis sngor bshad pa'i lha rnams dang / thod pa bzhi spos te/ 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ rang re'i stan las bon
91b4(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i lus rnams la zhugs par blta'o// da ni de dag gi gnas dang stan dang / kha dog dang lag che rnams bshad par bya ste/ dbus su ni nyi ma la zhe sdang rdo rje sngar bshad pa'i mdog dang lag cha'o//
91b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje'i shar phyogasu na grati mag rdo rje zla ba la gnas pa dkar po// zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas na 'khor lo dang ral gi dang / g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma can no// sna tshogs rdo rje'i
91b6(rgyud 'grel): lho'i cha la ni/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i ser sna rdo rje gser btso ma lta bu/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas na rin po che dang ral gri can/ g.yon dag ni 'khor lo dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o//
92a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje'i nub tu nyi ma la 'dod chags rdo rje mdog dmar ba/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dag na pad+ma dang ral gri can/ g.yon dag gis nor bu dang 'khor lo thogs pa'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i
92a2(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs su nyi ma la gnas pa'i phrag dog rdo rje sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dgau na ral gri dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// 'di rnams ni rtsa ba'i zhal sku dang 'dra ba//
92a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal lhag ma dag 'chad par byed pa lta bu/ phyag dang po gnyis thod pa dang gri gug dang bcas pa/ rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa 'dug stangs dang / rgyan thams cang zhe sdang rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ sna tshogs pad+ma la brten pa'o//
92a4(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi sgor rdo rje tho ba mdog dkar ba/ g.yas ngag nA tho ba dang ral gri/ g.yon ngag na nor bu dang pad+ma'o// lhor rdo rje byo con mdog sarar+ya po// g.yas dag na be con dang ral gri/ g.yon ngag na pad+ma dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// nub tu rdo rje
92a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mdog dmar ba/ g.yas dag na pad+ma dang ral gri/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang 'khor lo can no// byang go skor rdo rje ral gri mdog ljang gu/ g.yas dag nA ral gri dang 'khor lo can// g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma can no// 'di
92a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi ma la bzhugs pa/ zhal rnams 'chad par byed pa las rtsa ba'i zhal rang rong gi sku dang 'dre ba/ dang po'i phyag ni gri gug dang thong pa 'dzin pas/ rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa/ gshin tu
92b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzags par byed pa'i gzugs can ni// de bzhin du sna tshogs rdo rje'i shar lho'i mtshams su rdo rje tsa ra tsi ka sha chung ba mdog dkar ba/ g.yas dag na 'khor lo dang ral gri can/ g.yon dag na rin po cha dang pad+ma 'dzin
92b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// lho nub tu rdo rje pag mo mdog ser ba/ g.yas ni rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa/ g.yon ngag na 'khor le dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// nub byang du rdo rje dbyangs can ma mdog dmar mo g.yas ngag na pad+ma dpar la gri tsan//
92b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dag na nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// byang shar du rdo rje mdzod ldan ma mdog ljang khu g.yas ngag na ral gri dang 'khor lo cani/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// 'di rnams ni shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs
92b4(rgyud 'grel): can ma sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla ba la gnas shing / dang po'i phyag dag gis glo gug dang thed pa 'dzin cing / rang dang 'dra ba'i thabs rnams la 'khyud pa/ g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ zhal gsum pa la gang gi rtsa ba'i
92b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal sngo ba ni g.yas pa dkar ba'o// g.yon pa dmar ba'o// yang gang gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar ba de'i zhal g.yas sde ba'o// g.yin pa dmar ba'o// gang gi rtsa ba'i zhal ser ba de'i ni/ g.yas dang g.yon sngo ba dang dkar
92b6(rgyud 'grel): bste/ ljang gu dang dmar ba yang de bzhin no// grwa bzhin gnas pa'i mi'i bong pa rnams ni kha dog dkar po bcud kyis bkang ba'i pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i dbus su gnas pa'o// / de nas ye shes kyi
93a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dam tshig gi 'khor lo la bstims te/ thams cad kyi mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs la de bzhin du thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs byin gyis brlabs nas cho ga ji lta bas
93a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur te/ rjes su mthun par spyi bo la rgyas gdab par bya'o// de nas man ngag ji lnga bas mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bya'o// de nas rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar pad+ma la gnas
93a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa gyen du 'greng ba zla ba la gnas pa'o// de'i lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de la dbus su yaM sngon po nyid do// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes pas bskor ba yi ge shin tu phra bas
93a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bltas la/ de las byung ba'i gshin d+ha'i dgra dbugs la zhen pas 'gre zhing de dang lhan cog 'jug pa gsal bar spobar bya'o// gang gi tshe skye bi ni/ rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi phreng ba bdud rtsi bcus legs par
93a5(rgyud 'grel): byugs pa blangs la/ ril bu re re zhing yi ge mo yongasu gyur pa'i 'dod chags gshin rje'i dgra'i gzugs su rnam par bsnam pa 'am/ mI'i mgo bo 'dral du bcad pa khrag 'dzag pas khyab par bsams tAM/ g.yas
93a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthe bo dang srin lag gis gzung la/ khro bo'i brjod pa kho nas gsang sngags bzlas pa bya'o// 'di la gang gi tshe rim gyis zlos pa de'i tshe/ sa bon yaM las zhe sdang gshin rje'i ngagra la sogs pa re re lha me dang bcas
93b1(rgyud 'grel): par spro ba dang / gsang sngags re re'i yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'on te tsi tsAr du ni sa bon yaM las kyang zhe sdang gshin rje'i dgra nas/ ji srid mdzod ldan ma gshin rje'i b+har+Na du dus gcig tu spro zhing / sngags kyang re re yongs
93b2(rgyud 'grel): su rdzogs par bya ste/ cig car pa'i phyogs la sgo rdo rje la sogs pa yang ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon dang lhan cig spro ba'o// 'dir yang thogs pa dang / shin tu myur ba dang shin tu gsal ba dang / mi gsal ba dang
93b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa mo yin pa'i rnam par rtogs pa spangs pa'i sngags pas ni grangs 'bum gyi phra mo'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// bye bas ni mkha' la spyod pa'i dbang po phyag rgya chen por gnas pa'o// de nas bzlas pas
93b4(rgyud 'grel): yid skyo ba na/ ye shes 'khor lo mdun na bzhugs pa legs par mchod de/ bstod cing bdud rtsi bcu phul la/ oM AHhUM muHzhes pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// yang ngam tshig 'khor le bdag nyid kyi yaM
93b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi sa bon gyi nang du bcug la// bdag nyid zhe sdang gshin rje'i dgra'i ngar 'dzin pa dang gnas par bya'o// thun mtshams bzhi po thams cad du 'di ltar sgrub pa 'di ni/ dpal gshin rje dgra'i las rab tu bsgrub pa/
93b6(rgyud 'grel): las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bya ba'o// gzhan ye shes cung zad bebs pa dang / ye shes la dbang thob pa dang / ye shes la yang dag par dbang thob pa rnams kyi bsgrub par bya ba ni le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam
94a1(rgyud 'grel): parar+ya bshang pa rgya cher byas pas 'dir yang ma smraso// de bzhin du bdud rtsi myang ba dang / gtor ma ston pa drug kyang / bdag gis le ru gsum pa dang drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i skabs su gsal ba
94a2(rgyud 'grel): byas pa khe nas shes so// phyogs dbang zla ba zhis grags pa// dpal ljin chos skyong de yi bkas// gshin d+hA'i dgra gang nag po yis// sgrub thabs cho ga rnam gsal ba// zla ba'i zer gyis reg pa yi// ku mud rab tu rgyas
94a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba// 'di ni rnam sbyar dge gang des// 'gro rnams 'chi bdag las rgyal gyur// g+ha shin+da rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ ku mu ta khi bye bu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas kyis
94a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// s+yA shwen+na bA~M nA ya tsan+d+ra dang / lo slob dge slong rgyas kyi shes rab kyis pa ra p+pa nus te gat+tenI li phab dzo// / d+hU gar skad du/ shrIk+Sha~Mr+N+Na ya mA rI s+yA d+hAdz+nyA nAM nA mA/
94a5(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag la tshal lo// gus pa yis ni bla ma yi// zhabs kyi pangad+ma phyag 'tshal te// bla me'i zhal sgra'i bka drin gyis//
94a6(rgyud 'grel): nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o// mdor bsdus pa yi sgrub thabs bshad// dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// stong pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste// snying ga pad+ma 'dab
94b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bsam// de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// de yi steng du hUM bsams te// hUM las 'od byung mdun du ni// bla ma mkha' 'gro bzhugs par bsam// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byas la// sdig bshags la sogs tshogs
94b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu bsag/ de nas snying ga'i hUM las ni// 'od byung lus ngag bag chags rnams// bsres nas stong pa nyid du bsgom// de ni ye shes tshogs yin no// sems ni hUM gi rnam par bsam// hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur// rdo rje las
94b3(rgyud 'grel): ni skur bskyed do// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog nag/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal/ spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// dbu skra kham nig gyen du brdzes// rdo rje ral gri gri gug gsum// g.yas
94b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi ni phyag na bsnams// 'khor lo pad+ma thod pa gsum// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa yin// g.yos skum g.yon brkyang bsus po che// lha mo phag mos mgul nas 'khyud// phyag mo zhal gcig phyag
94b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mo// g.yas pa gri gug ban+d+ha g.yon// gtso bo'i sku la 'khyud pa'i tshul// gnyis su med pa'i gnas su bzhugs// mig dang lus sogs dbang po drug/ sangs rgyas drug kyang yod par bsam/ sku gsong
94b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyang byin gyis brlabs// snying ga'i hUM las 'od byung bas// ye shes mkha' 'gro spyan drangs la// tshig gi dbang yang blang bar bya// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun// bcom ldan mnga' bdag chen po
95a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// khyed kyis bdag la dbang bskur gsol// de skad bdag gis dbang blangs pas// ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis// bdag gi spyi bor dbang bskur byar// rigs lnga cod pan gyur
95a2(rgyud 'grel): par bsam// mchod dang bstod dang bdud rtsi bza'// rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya bya ste// bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin no// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na ne hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ thams cad grub pa'i don du bzlas// gtor ma'i
95a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni 'di yin te// oM u kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twA oM AHhUM phaT swA hA// bar chad thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir// des ni gtor ma sbyin par bya// des ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor
95a4(rgyud 'grel): ngalu gso bya// snying ga'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis// khams gsum ma lus kun la khyab// kun kyang sangs rgyas sku ru gyur// gyur po kun kyang bdag la sku// bdag kyang hUM la bsdu byos la// hUM yang thig ler gyur par
95a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// lhag ma'i rtog pa spangs pa ste// yang dag bde ba'i rnam pa'o// phyag mod zhal med kha dog med// mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do// 'di byas bsod nams gang thob des// sems can thams cad
95a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shog// nag po zhal gsum phyag drug po'i mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thapas rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri kro d+ha rA dza ba tra sa ra sA naM nA ma/ bod skad du/
95b1(rgyud 'grel): khyo bo'i rgyal po gshin+da rje gshed nag po dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tsha lo// spros bral thugs chud bdag 'gro ba kun khyab pa// ma lus bdud 'joms
95b2(rgyud 'grel): thogs med khro bo kun gyi gtso// pad+ma rdo rje snyoms 'jog zhi ba de mdzes pas bsgyings/ longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhes pa'i snying po la btud de// sangs rgyas thugs kyi rgyud rgyal 'a bum pa thu bo che// na de ku be ra la
95b3(rgyud 'grel): yab kyis rjes gdams shing // ngo yis de nyid bsdus pa'i byang chub sems chen po'i// rnam par rgyal ba gshing rgyud las byung bshad par bya// 'gro kun sangs rgyas snying po ste// gtso bo mi yang dang ldan bstan//
95b4(rgyud 'grel): ral gri pad+ma skyon med gnas// cod pan brgyan pa mthong bar bya// mtha' yas myi gnas gtso bo la// dmigs dang pad+mos rjes bzung nas// rgyal byor dran pa byas nas kyang // lhag pa'i lha rnams sbyin drang ngo /
95b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam dge bdun gyis sbyangs pa lnga// tshangs phye ba ni yi sems gnas nas// 'phrog pa med pa'i snying po nyid// thog mtha' ming pa dmigs par bya// oM shU n+te tA dz+nyA na badz+rA swa b+hA byA At+ma kro tsa/ yi ge gsum g+hi rang brten
95b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ bde gsal stong po'i rang bzhin nyid// thog mtha' med nas sems can la// gnas phyir rig pa nyams mi bya// hUM las re pa byung nas kyang // nyi dkyil rdo rje 'khor lo bsgom// de rjes hUM las hUM byung ste// rdo rje
96a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' chos 'byung gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar ldan// pad+ma rdo rjes mtshan byas pa'o// gong mtshungs b+h+rUM lus gzhal yas khyang // oM las rtag pa sna tshogs mnyam// gdan
96a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rjes mthun gnas pa'o// a las mar ldan nyi ma zla// mnyam pa hU~M lus rdo rje ste// sku yi gzi brjid bsdus nga rgyal// rgyud gshed rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgom// phab pa'i sbyor ldan byang chub sems// yongs 'gyur thabs/
96a3(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab sku// yig 'bru lnga yis gang ba las// 'phros pa'i lce mos bskul nas bzhengs// chos kun bdag po bsgom pa bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ yaM les skyes pa'i gshin rje gshed// in+d+ra ni/
96a4(rgyud 'grel): la'i mdog 'dra ba// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phag mos 'khril// ma he ser skya la bskum brkyang // g.yas pa gI gug g.yon thod pa// rdo rje ral gyi 'khor lo pang // thod po lnga yis dbu brgyan cing // dbu skyes
96a5(rgyud 'grel): gyen 'greng brgyad kyis brgyan// rlon pa khrag 'dzag lha bcu 'phyang // mye dpung nang na gnas par bsgom// rang mtshungs ye shes sems dpa' ni// cho ga gsum dang ldan paso// yi ge lnga rdzogs de bzhin gshegs
96a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi mdog dang mtshan mar ldan// sku ni mtho gang chad yin to// phra mo lnga ni tshon gang ngo // sku gsum rab tu thob byi'i phyir// lus ngag yid gsum byin brlabs bya// spyi gtsug rtag pa'i rgyal po ste// mgrin par
96b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nyi ma bsgom// snying gAr+ya mi skyod rdo rje 'chang // oM AHhUM/ mig la sa'i snying po ste// rna ba la ni rdo rje 'dzin// sna la na mkha'i snying po mchog/ lce la 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon// sgrib pa rnam sel lus la dgod// kun
96b2(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang po yid kyi'o// kl-i dzaM khaM gau kaM s+yai/ cho ga gsum dang ldan pa la// oM dang hUM gis spel bar bya// rdo rje lnga ni mchog byas la// gsol btab dbang gis mi bskyod 'gyur// mi bzang rdo rje 'khor lo nyid// mchod
96b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod byas la dgug gzhug bya// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ tsikra maN+Dal d+hA tu dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM a haM a la l-i la la ho// a a a a/ rdo rje na mkha' byini brlabs la// bskyed byas lnga 'gyur byang chub
96b4(rgyud 'grel): sems// mkha' yi pad+mar rdzus skyes nas// sa dgur bskyed la rab rgyas sku// ba spu'i bu ga che nas spro// sangs rgyas sprin yang rjes bsams nas// rigs kyi don yang bsgrub par bya// oM badz+ra d+hikaM ya hU~M/ oM dzaM
96b5(rgyud 'grel): na dzika kle hUM/ oM rat+na d+hAk+ki ma hU~M/ oM A ro li ka me hUM/ oM byAdz+nyA d+hak+saM da hUM/ shar du gti muk+ka g+hashed po ste/ lho ru nga rgya lA grwa shed po'o// nub tu 'dod chags gshed po ste// byang du phrag dog gshad po'o//
96b6(rgyud 'grel): shar la 'od zer gzhin rnon po// dkar ser dmar ljang rang 'od rig/ rigs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya 'dzin// gzhan ni rim sbyor shes pa'o// Na yo ni ni rA 'phros pa las// byang chub sems kyis rab rgyas pa'i
97a1(rgyud 'grel): tsa ra tsi kA sogs lha mo yis// mchod pas rab tu mnyes par bya// de nas rdo rje dril 'chang bas// bstod pa yang ni ched du brjod// dam tshig bzang po byin brlabs nas// rdo rje hUM gis myang bar bya// sgo
97a2(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po 'jig rten khams// thogs pa med pas bsdus byas nas// du mar brtson 'grus ldan yid kyis// yang dang yang du goms par bya// rdo rje snying ga'i dkyil 'khor lo// yid skyob bkod nas bzlas par bya// oM
97a3(rgyud 'grel): hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rim dang cig car sbyor ba yi// sems can don du bzlas par bya// zla ba'o cog gi bcu bzhi la// dri chu saM byugs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum ldan zhing me tog sbas// mchod pa
97a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang ldan gtor mas bkang // mi rus lnga bcu tham pa la// khrag gis sbags pa'i mgo bor bsgom// ri lu re la gshing nag pos// brgyan pa khri yi bar du bzlas// mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes byas la// gsol
97a5(rgyud 'grel): btab gtir ma dur khrod sbyin// oM An+d+ra yU d+d+hod+hayA mA y+yaSh+TaM ba durtA ya wi/ kU be+e rA y+ya kle/ I shI nA ya te/ ag+na ye A/ nai rI ta ye naM/ bA ya be ya na/ ts+tshin+d+rA ya hUM/ s+yAR+YA ya dz+ha/ brah+mA r+N+Na ya baTo ba su d+ha rA ya \u0f7f
97a6(rgyud 'grel): be ma tsi tra ye swA/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo hA/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ pheM pheM pheM pheM phaT swA hA/ gad mo chen mo brgyad rgang nas// gnang ba byin nas gshegs par bsam// 'di ni bsnyen po'i cho ga'o// srid pa gsum gyi 'khor lo ni//
97b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang po skye mched stong pa yi// lcags kyi khang pa bcu bdun gyi// rdo rje snying po dgod par bya// chu yi dkyil 'khor shing rta dang // de spang brgyug pu lta bu'o// sbyor ldan man dag dam pa ni// dam pa'i zhal las shes par bya/
97b2(rgyud 'grel): las dang rjes mthun 'khor lho ni// gzhan du rgyu che bshad pas ne// 'dir ni mang du mr-i smos so// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru/ Na yo da ya/ ya nga ye ni/ ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ zhi ba'i mthar
97b3(rgyud 'grel): nI swA hA/ rgyas dang dbang la oM dang ho// drag po hUM gis rten par bya// 'phrin las bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// rgyud dang bstan bcos mukhasra pa bdag min te// daM pa bla ma'i zhabs la brten nas chos 'dri byas// rgyung
97b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi mngon rtogs nges par byin pa'i yon tan dpal// dad dang shes rab snying rjer bcas rnam nges sbrel shog/ bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim// zab mo'i sgrub pa rnyed dka' ba// nor bu lta bu'i gzhung 'di yis//
97b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun gshin rje gshed nag shog/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po'i dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po shrI paN+Di tAs mdzad
97b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa prad+hA shI dz+nyA na kAn+tis rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ kr-iny+dza ya mA ra sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gsheng nag po'i sgrub
98a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs zhes bya bya// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// rje btsun rdo rje sems bdag sngags// 'jigs byed dpa' bo dgra nag la// btud de brgyud rim lus rnyed pa// dngos grub
98a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung phyir bshad par bya// rang gzugs rdzogs pa'i snying ga ru// ya yig las ni 'gro ba sbyang // bdun po yid kyang sbyang byas nas// tshangs pa'i gnas la gzhag par bya// stong pa'i snying po gsal bar bsam// bsrung
98a3(rgyud 'grel): ba pad+mar ldan pa'i nang // chu skyes ri bong can rnon po// byang chub rgyu yi gshin rje gshed // rtsa ba'i zhal gyi khyad par can// zhu ba'i thig la byang chub sems// ya lus mtshan ma bsdu bar bya// de las 'jam
98a4(rgyud 'grel): dpral gshin rje gshed// in+d+ra nI la lta bu ste// g.yas dang g.yon pa dkar dang dmar// phag mo de mtshungs dam 'khyud pa// gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag/ rdo rje bar dang tha ma gr-i/ gzhan na 'khor lo pad+ma
98a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// thod pa lnga yi dbu rgyan can// ser brdzes spyan dgu bzlog cing 'gyur// lnga bcu'i ngo shal mnyam du sbyangs// gdug pa brgyad kyis sku brgyan tsong // rus pas brgyan cing dum bus bsgegs// mtshon
98a6(rgyud 'grel): cha bcu gnyis 'khrug par bsam// ma he la bzhug sa srid rtser 'bar// sku gsung thugs dang skye mched dang // dbang dang byin brlabs mchod dang bstod // bdud rtsi myang dang spo bsdu dang // bzlas pa'i rim
98b1(rgyud 'grel): pu'i mun ngag lngas// shes pas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// oM kA la ru pa hUM/ oM ya ma rA dza/ sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo dA ya/ ya nga yo ni/ ra yak+Sha ya/ yuk+Sha ya ts+tsha nI rA ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA
98b2(rgyud 'grel): oM hrIHlIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ drug pas gtor ma'i bsnyen pa bya// sum cu brgyad pas nye bar bsnyen// bco lnga pus ni thams cang bsgrub// lusi kyi 'khor lo bskor byar bya// gshed na ge
98b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud dang 'byung ba las// rnying de sgrub thabs 'di bris pas// blo ni rab dag gyur nas kyang // ga shin+da rje gshed du 'gyur bar shog/ gshin rje gshing nag po'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon mkhas pa chen po
98b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal mar mye mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyAM na kIrta sa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ bai ro tsa na ya mA ri ne/
98b5(rgyud 'grel): pi ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed rnam byar snang mdzad kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ dpel rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rdo rje rtag pa'i dpal// me long ye shes byang chub
98b6(rgyud 'grel): sems// 'od gsal rdo rje kun zhi ba// gti mug rdo rje li phyag 'tshal// sa rnams pha rol bgrod pa'i lam// rtag pa'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya// dang por sngags pas snying rje dran pas rang lus rdzogs pa dang
99a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyang gar sa blon gsal ba las ni dam pa rnams bsams nas// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum gyi yon tan bsam byas nas// bsod nams rgyu rgyu R+Sha rab tu rgyas bu
99a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rab bsag par bya// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms ldan pas stong pa bsgom// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo byas nas pad+ma zla ba rgyas pa'i steng // k+She yig gyur pas chos kyi 'khor lo domar zhing 'ong
99a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba/ bsdu ba'i de nyid las ni rtag pa'i skyer gyur pa de khro la sgeg/ rtsa ba'i zhal dang gzhan gnyis dkar sngo dmar zhing phyag drug yum dang bcas// gri gug 'khor lo ral gri pad+ma rin chen chu skyes rab tu
99a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs// glang chen bags pas stong dang smad dkris mi mgo rlon 'dzag pa// thod pa drug ldan skra ni dmar ser gyen porjes sbrel brgyad yan lag spras// me dkyil na bzhugs ye shes sems dpa'
99a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal nas yan lag drug byas te// rlung dang me dang thod pa snod mchog sgron ma bcu yig kha bkab nas// bskyod dang 'bar bas glang po la sogs bcur gyur sbyor ba'i sems byab nas// oM AHhUM/ byin
99a6(rgyud 'grel): brlabs rdo rje'i bu gus rab drangs mnyes byas spro bsdus thim// rdo rje rtag pa rim gyis bskyod la rab thim nas ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bsam// yod dang meng pa las 'das spros bral na mkha' lta bu'i byang
99b1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dran nas// rma lam sang ba'i rnal 'byor phung po khams rnams kun spangs deman nas na ldang ba brnam// khams sogs pad+ma ba chen por mdog gyur gzugs brnyan lta bur rab rtogs byung n+yar+b+ha wA sgyuH
99b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzig/ snying b+h+r-ini khyer ljang bur bzlas pa 'ag+h+ri bkun la phan+d+ha pA rA bA b+h+ri 'bum du byazlas// rnal 'byo Sh+Te ma'i gzugs kyis steng 'og la spyod 'jig rten don 'gyur thams cad gi shin rdzog shing thob shog/
99b3(rgyud 'grel): nadzika mo ha ra ti/ hUM hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// ston pa sangs rgyasaM kun rang bzhin// rdo rje mi 'jigs phyag 'tshal bstod // sgrub thabs spangs rgyas la
99b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa// bskyed po dang ni rdzogs pa'i rim// gong ma'i go 'phang ston pa po// sngags rnams sgrib pa grol gyur cig/ gshin rje gshung nag por snang mdzad kyi mngon rtogs zhes bya ba// rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas
99b5(rgyud 'grel): pabyar grags pa dpal mar mi mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// / rgya garar+ya skad du/ rat+na sa~M b+hA ba ya mA ri sA d+hA na nA ma/
99b6(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// gzhan don yid bzhin 'byung gnas rin po che// ro 'dod skong mdzad rin chen 'byung gnas
100a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal// dun rtog bral ba mnyam pa nyid la shes// sar sna 'joms mdzad de la phyag 'tshal te// ngargyal rab rgyas sems can dngon du// phra ma mthar mdza rab tu bshang par bya// byang chub
100a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dang shes rab ni// snyoms 'jug dran pa'i sngags pa yis// skad cig lha yi rnal 'byor pas// spro dang bsdu ba rab tu bya// bla ma rje dpal mgon po dang // sdu gu lha sogs rab dmigs te// phyag 'tshal la sogs
100a3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par / ma lus lus pa med par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi lam gyur pa'o// go rims tshangs pa'i gnas rnams bsgom// rang bzhin stong pa rkyen gyis te// ye shes tshogs rab byasags par bya// ma yig hU~M
100a4(rgyud 'grel): gos sna tshogs las// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo 'bar ba'o// chu skyes thabs dang shes rab ste// ma las rin chen zur brgyad pa// spro bsdu'i nga rgyal gsol bar bya// oM rat+na saM b+hA ba At+ma kro haM/ de las gyur pa'i rdo rje ni//
100a5(rgyud 'grel): btsem gser gyi mdangs mnyam zhing // rang 'od dang mtshungs rog mar ldan// zhal gsum g.yas g.yon sngo dang dkar// spyan dgu mche gtsigs phyag drug pa// gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag/ rin chen ral gri 'khor

101a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs// stong slang stobs 'jigs pags pa gnyis// gri gug thod pa ril gri dang // 'khor lo rin chen shin tu 'khrug/ sbrul dang rus pas rnam brgyan pa// dbu skra brdzes la spyan mig 'khrug/ mche
101b1(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs 'bar+ya ba'i me dpung bsgom// rdo rje mig dang rna sna lce// lus yid l+ya ni sa snying sogs// rdo rje lus dang ngag yid la// rdo rje sku gsung thugs ldan pasam// nI spyod la ni dbang blang ste// dbu la gsh-in
101b2(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed po bsgom// sgo bzhi sngags kyis bcug nas kyang // tsa ra tsi ka sogs rnam 'phrul mchod// gshin rje gshed po re ba 'jigs pa// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas brnyed// dbyangs mchog
101b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum la phyag 'tshal bstod // oM AHhUM gas byin gyis brlab// bdud rtsi myangs la spro bsdu bya// sngags pas ji srid mi skyo'i bar// bzlas shing spro bsdu rgyas par bya// oM a ro l-i ka pa rA ga ra te hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ thang 'dod
101b4(rgyud 'grel): chags rjes dran nas// 'dod chags chen por rab dmigs te// tshang mdo yi ge spungs po yis// a ngon bsam mi khyab pa bsgom// snying rje sad pas langs nas kyang // phyag rgya bkrol la spyod lo mi bya// thams cad du ni

106a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag las// chu skyes 'dab brgyad mtshan mar ldan// 'phros nas bsdu ba bya ba ni// rigs kyi 'khor lo ma lus pa'o// oM badz+ra rA ga ra ti At+ma ko ho/ gyur pas pad+ma rA gi'i mdog/ zhal gsum g.yas g.yon sde
106a3(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar// phyag drug gri gug pad+ma drang // ral gri thod pa 'khor lo dang // g.yon bskum g.yas pa brkyang bas gnas// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ hUM lis thugs kyi rdo rje ste// AHlas gsung dang oM les
106a4(rgyud 'grel): sku// k+ShaM las sa snying rdo rje mig/ dzaM las rdo can rna bar// khaM las na mkha'i snying po snar/ khaM las 'jig rten dbang phyug lhur// kaM las sgrib pa rnam sel lus// saM las kun tu bzang po yid// rig pa'i dbang bskur gshin rje
106a5(rgyud 'grel): ge shed // dgug gzhug brjing dang dbang du bya// mchod pa b+ha ga'i byang chub sems// rdo rje gsung ni ye shes che// pad+ma shes rab pha rol phyin// 'dod chags chen po nyid sbyor ba// rdo rje mthar mdzod khyed la
