106b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po can dngos bsgom par bya// 'tshod chags chen po sbyor ba bzlog pa'i phyir// bde ba sems par sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas// gzung dang 'dzin bya'i dri ma dag nas kyang // dga' ba rnam sna dag smon lam
106b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs gyur shog// rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thobs zhes bya ba rdzogs// / rgya gar skad du/ karma badz+ra Ni gau rI sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ las kyi rdo rje gau rI'i sgrub
106b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// btang snyoms rnam par dag pa phyag rgya che// yis pha rol phyin ma la phyag 'tshal// brtson 'grus thogs pa myed pas sems can don/ 'grub phyir gau rI'i/
106b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs bai shad par bya// khrus dang rgyan dang gis dang byug pa rnams// pi nang rnam par dag pa shes par bya// rangat+na gI rnal 'byor dam pa mchod nas kyang // bde ba'i 'khor lo bdag la gzhug par bya// tshad med
106b5(rgyud 'grel): ba zhi la rnal 'byor sems gnas nas// chos kun snying po 'od gsal bar bsgom// bdag rgyud sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ni// ro gcig thig le'i ngo bar gyur pa las// chung pa nyi mya'i steng gi rdo rje nyid//
106b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gsal bar bya// pad+ma zla ba'i steng du ru dag gyur pas// u ta pal ral gri ljang mdog gi/ dkyil nas 'phros shing 'dus nis nga rgyal bya// oM badz+ra gau rI swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/
107a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i sku ni mAr kata ljang mdog ste// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni dkar dang dmar// gri gug ral gri 'khor lo thod pa dang // rin chen chu skyes rnams kyis mdzes pa'i phyag/
107a2(rgyud 'grel): dbu skra gyen 'greng thod pa lngas brgyan cing // tshangs pa brgya byin mgro bo lnga bcus sbyangs// klu dang mar kat+ta rus pa'i rgyan 'jigs paste// sdug lpags bsnams pa'i zhabs ni g.yus brkyang ste// gzi borjid
107a3(rgyud 'grel): me yaM dkyil na cher 'bar ba'o// sku gsung thugs dang spyan sogs byin brlabs la// yi ge mtshan ma sku nr-i gang 'dod brtsam// snying ga'i sa bon 'phros pas 'khor lo bzang // gsol btob rig pa'i skyes bu
107a4(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa// rjesu mthun pa'i lha ni spyan drangs nas// mchong bstod mnyes par byas nas rlung la thim// mu chod pa'i rnam grangs na mkha' rgyas gang ba// b+ha ga'i rnam 'phrul dag gis ci bder mchod // sngags pa rje
107a5(rgyud 'grel): rje dril bur ldan pa yos// snyan pa'i glu dang ldan pas mchod par bya// rdo rje las ni kun grol ba// phrag dog rdo rje dbyer med sku// thams cang rdo rje btang snyoms nyid// rdo rje las mya phyag 'tshul bstod// yi ge gsum
107a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdzas// rgyal ba thams cad mchod phyir myang ba dang // sems can thams cad rdo rje'i skur byas nas// sngags kyi 'khor lo ji ltar 'dod pas bzlas// oM badz+ra ra ti hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA rgyal
107b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gyi khams su 'o ma sgrub// thabs kyi gzugs las rtag tu dang 'gyur bas// rtag pa'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag las// mthong ba'i sgrub thabs bdag gis 'di byas pas// 'gro kun spros bral zhi ba la
107b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas te// sangs rgyas ye shes mngon du rtogs par shog// rdo rje las gau rI'i sbubs thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ b+hAn+ta kau many+dzu shrI ya mA ri pu dze kra ma bi d+hi nA pra
107b3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ rje btsan 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba// bla ma rje btsun rnams lo phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab snying rjer ldan nong legs bArta nI dang // sangs rgyas snying po
107b4(rgyud 'grel): 'drod phyir gang zag dbang thob pas// bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i rim pa khong du chud byas naso// rje btsun rnams la btung de rgyud 'dis sbyang bar bya// bdag nyid dran pa gcig phyi'i 'gro blor ldan bdag med pa las
107b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog cing 'byor pa gsum dag pas// bsnyen dang sgrub la rab tu mkhas byiste te// nyin dang mtshan mi thams cad g.yeng med tshul gyis 'bod// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rdo rje can bcas dang // dri med snying po
107b6(rgyud 'grel): mthir mdzad blo ma rdo rje 'dzin// dgra las rgyal ba gshin rje gshing nag lho yi tshogs// thugs rjes thugs chung spyan ras nyid 'tsho dgongasu gsol// chos sku longs spyod rdzogs deng sprul sku'i rang bzhin can/ rgyal
108a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rang bzhin phung pos sems can re 'dod skong // 'byor ldan phun sum tshogs pas nad gsos sman pa'i mchog/ bla ma mgon po de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// phung
108a2(rgyud 'grel): po lnga las rgyal zhing nyon mongs lnga rnams drug/ rang gzhan don rdzogs gang zhig phog mo la sogs 'khril// ye shes rigs mtshungs lnga ldan rin chen lnga yi mdog/ rnam thar pha rol phyin zhal khyod
108a3(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud// bdud bzhi las rgyal lta ba'i nges sgrol bcom nas kyang // dang sogs rnam ngag khro bo'i rtagasu nges 'byung ba// thabs kyi phyag rgya sgrib pa thams cad mthar spangs pa'i// 'jigs shing
108a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gtum phyag mtshan rtags ldan phyag 'tshal bstod// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi ni rnam dge sku// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms nyid// thabs dang smon lam ye shes rdzogs mdzad pa//
108a5(rgyud 'grel): tsar tso phyag mo gau rI dbyangs ldan phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod yon gdon ma chog zhabs bkru ldan pa dang // spos dang me tog mar mAM zhal zas tshogs// rol mo'i sil snyan me tog phreng dang ldu ldi dang //
108a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod sdong/ bye bas brgyan pas rab tu mchod par bgyi// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i dod pa'i yon tan tshogs// du mar spyad kyang tshim pa med cing ngo mtshar ba// yid ldan sems kyis ngal si khyad par
108b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa rnams// mos blo dad pa'i mthu yis bad gshegs 'khor la mchod// 'khor lo rin chen rta dang glang po rang mtshan ldan// rgyal po btsun mo blon po mchog ni ni zhing mdzes// 'byor ldan phun sum chog
108b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'khor lo sgyur ba yi// khyad par rdzas kyi bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod// gdugs dang nying ldan dung dang pad+mas rab tu mdzes// gun de dpal be'u rgyal mtshan 'khor lo mdzes pa'i mchog
108b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten de ga na grags shing snyan par gang brjod pa'i// bla myed rnams kyis bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod// dri chen rdo rje chur ldan byang chub sems dkar dmar dang bcas// mo shwa
108b4(rgyud 'grel): rta dang ba ljang glang chen khyi sha dang // sgron ma che dang ldan pas dur khrod mdzes byas pas// rnam par rtog bral bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod // drong gshegs khyed la ji snyed gnas pa'i
108b5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan ni// bdag gis bskal ba'i mtha' bar brjed pas ma ldang bas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyilte 'khor namakha' tsam mos 'dis// rgyal ba gcig bzhin sangs rgyas 'khor lo thams cang/
108b6(rgyud 'grel): bstod// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug mang gis bskyed cing // lus ngag yid gsum sgo ru smon pa'i mi dge bcu// so so thar dang byang chub sems dang rig pa 'dzin// tshul khrims sdom
109a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dam tshig nyams pa ji snyed bshags// bdag gis bgyis dang de bzhin bgyid du stsal// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i cho ga ste// slob dang myi slob sems
109a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi grogasu gang gyur pa// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar da ltar dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas zhing la bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// gdul bya'i snang ba rab tu tshim mdzad khro dang zhi// 'gro/
109a3(rgyud 'grel): ba mig ljongs shes rab sman gyis gso ba'i phyir// ches kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bskor bar bskul// rgyal ba bcom ldan mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams// khyod mi bzhugs na 'jig rten 'di dag
109a4(rgyud 'grel): mgon med pas// na mkhas gar khya sem sa ngan dza srid mchis pa ru// de srid rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa bzhugs su gsel// bdag gis lus ngag yid kyi dge ba'i tshogs ji snyed // sbyin dang tshul
109a5(rgyud 'grel): khrims bsgoms pa nyid du nges bsdus te// bdag gir bzung ba med cing sems can kun don du// dmigs pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi// bdag gis rje btsun rnams la shin tu dang sems
109a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis// sems can kun la pan phyir bsod nams ye shes tshogs// 'das dang ma 'das da ltar gsum du bsdus byas te dpal ldan bla ma rje btsun mchog gi zhabs drung shog/ nyon mongs tshogs rnams dag
109b1(rgyud 'grel): cing sems rtogs nas// rgyal ba mgon po bcom ldan 'das kyi skur gyur shog/ mye teg shu k+Shu len cing spros pa nyid spangs te// nyon mongs mang la du mi 'jug bde ba len par shog/ yid ches sems kyis
109b2(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa rnyed gyur to// 'byor pa'i rus pas rdo rje lta bu'i lus thob shog/ chos rnams ro gcig bsam mi khyab kyi ro thob nas// rlig dang che ges kyi spyod pas sems can 'dul gyur cig/ zhi rgyas
109b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang drag po'i phrin las nyer thob ste// gdugs pa can rnams gshin rje gsheng la mngon gzhol shog/ thun mongs dngos grub thogs pa med par thob nas kyang // blo stobs dman pa'i rnal 'byor
109b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyis 'tshe shog/ na mkha' dang mtshungs bde ba chun po'i sa thob nas// bdag dang sems can gshin rje gshad po nyid grub shog/ sgrub po dang ldan lhas ngagra yid gsum rab sbyang phyir// rje btsun
109b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams mchod pa'i cho ga 'di byas pas// nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa byung gyur te// rgyun chad med dang phun sum tshogs sku thob par shog/ 'gro ba thibs po nyon mongs lam la rab tu gzhol//
109b6(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa'i dpa' klong 'khrug pa'i nang du rtag tu zhugs// rnam smin cha srin gdug pa can gyi khar zhugs nas// g.yeng bas ngal ba don med ma byed dge ba sbyongs// rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed
110a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba// slob dpon chen po kr-iny+dza paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri bud+d+ha sA d+ha naM nA pa/ bo skad du/
110a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba// 'jam dpal ga/ zhon nur pa la phyag 'tshalo// bla ma rje btsun bla med dang // sku gsum mgon pa gshegs nyid las// btad pa de ny-id skab
110a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs// blo dman bdag gis bshad par bya// sngags pa blo dang ldan pa yis// snying rje chen po rab bskyed de// skad cig dran pas gsal bar bya// gnyis pas rdzogs pa thig la che// bzang po nyid da/
110a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi mgon// so so las kyang bani 'byung bya// rdzogs dang rab tu gnas pa dang // mngon par btung la mchod byas te// ya yig sprul pa'i las bya'o// bshags dang rje su yi rang dang // bskul dang gsol ba
110a5(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa dang // skyabasu 'gro dang sems bskye che// lus dbul yongs su bsngo ba bya'o// smon lam gdab dang gshegs gsol// chings pa'i gnas bzhi ston song bas// rnam thar gsum gyi bdag nyid bsgom
110a6(rgyud 'grel): oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHsa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ gnas dang dag pa'i ngo bo dang // bde ba bzang po 'di bsgom bya// shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kaM haM/ sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid ni// yi ge gsu
110b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi ngo bor blta// dag pa'i thig le na mkha' yis// rgyun gyis gnas pa'i nyi ma hUM/ gyur pa rdo rje gzhal med khang // zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par gnas// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil nyid du/
110b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba yi ge bcu drug bcas// re pra las byung gnyis pa las// gsal byed yi ge khor yug blta// ro mnyam pa las sa bon nyid// nor bu rdo rje sgo dang bsdu// nga rgyal gyur pas rdo rje sems// dkar dring gnag dang dmar/
110b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i zhal// shes rab gnyis meng sgeg dang stangs// gdug dang dur khrod rgyan gyis spras// gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag/ rdo rje ral gri g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na 'khor lo chu skyes so// sa bon 'od kyi bdag nyid
110b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal// rjes su gyur pas khu bur blta// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gnas// nyi ma dmar po ya gcig bcas// gyur pas rdo rje sngon po ste// si bon 'od las gshin rje gshed // char sprin gzhon nu lta bu'i mdog/
110b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa zla ba lte bu ste// g.yon pa pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ rang gri yum dang ldan pa'i sku// rtsa ba'i phyag gis 'khyud pa'i sngangs// rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang // pad+ma 'od zer chen po 'bar// gri gug rdo rje mtshan pa
110b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // thod pa byang chub sems bkang ba// yum dang mtshungs par 'dzin pa ste// gcer bye rgyan bral skra grol ba'o// snyoms par 'jug pa'i stengs dang ldan// brgya phyid mgo bo'i phreng ba can// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan steng
111a1(rgyud 'grel): su// ma he nyi ma gnas pa'i stangs// rdo rje gsheng po bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa yis// sems dpa'i rdo rje bde bar bsgom// skye mched zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// sems
111a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i yi ge gsal bar bya// k+Sho dz+riM khaM gaM kaM saM/ s+thi gtsug mgrin pa snying ga'i steng // zla ba pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil// dkar dmar gnag pa'i yi ge dgod// oM AHhUM/ so bon las 'phros gshin rje gshed/
111a3(rgyud 'grel): yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba yis// bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgyun// phab ste spyi gtsug byab gyur pas// dri meng dag pas rdo rje sems// spros dang bsdus pas de nyid don// mnyes par byas la rgyud la bstim//
111a4(rgyud 'grel): nges dang gsal dang brtan pa dang // phab la thig le thig le che// byed pa sbyor dang pra mo dang // go rim na mkha'i rdo rje'o// 'di ni 'grub med 'grub pa med// rang bzhin nyid nas rdo rje semaso// rdo rje na mkha'i kham
111a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas// gnyis med ye shes chos kyi sku// 'di ni rnam par dag pa'o// ldang ba sA lu'i 'bras ltar du// gnas pa rgyal po'i dbang sgyur bzhin// dbyings kyi rdo rje tha mi dad // sbyor ba'i byang chub sems phab
111a6(rgyud 'grel): pos// sa sbrengs sa 'og sa bla yi// gnas skye gsung thugs bsams te// me yengs don grub bzlas pa bya// oM kA la ru pa hUM/ 'dis ni brgya byin l-i sogs pa brgyal bar byed pa'o// oM ya ma rA dza/ sa ngo
111b1(rgyud 'grel): me ya/ ya ma do ru/ Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra yA k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA mA ya/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni dngos grub chen po yang thob par 'gyur ro// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iwikr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni las
111b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'grub bo// ha cang drag min ngal bA min// cung zad ring ba ma yin te// thung dang myi gsal rnam spangs te// tshig gi bar du ma chod pa'o// chen pos bzlas pa 'grub pa 'gyur// 'di ni bsgrub pa'i don
111b3(rgyud 'grel): du byas// las kun bla ma brgyad shes bya// mi shes pa dag dgrol ba'i phyir// bdag gis rtogs par gyur pa brtsams// 'di la 'byung ba'i bsod nams kyis// dpal ldan gshin rje gsheng 'gyur shog/
111b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gshin rje gshing nag po'i sgrub thabs// nA dA ku be raM las byung ba'i don// kun da na k+Sha ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
111b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/
111b6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma la gus de rjes la// gshi ni rje gshing nag rdo rje ni// rab 'ang yan lag 'dus pa yi// bde ba rgyas la phyag 'tshal te// gshin rje gshed nag
112a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs// de nyid blo yis bshad par bya// byedre ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// snying rjes skad cig lhar bskyed la// snying gad+ya pad+ma ya yig dgod// 'od 'phros sbyangs te bla ma dgug// bkod
112a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bsams la phyag dang ni// mchod pa la srogs tshogs bsags to// blo yisu mkha' la gshegasu gsol// de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom// rang bzhin rnams dang bral bas rgyu// 'di ltar yang na mtshan
112a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ni/ rnam par dpyad pas med byas na// 'di ltar smon lam rnam par spangs// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho ho/ da ltar brtan par bsams nas ni// ma yig las byung nyi ma la// sna tshogs hUM las
112a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gram bsam// hU~M las 'od 'phros ra ba'o// de dkyil po las pad+ma ni// dmar po'i steng du zla ba~M ste// de la dbyangs yig rnam par bsam// de steng raM las nyi ma ste// gus la byad bkod la gsal bar byas// de las
112a5(rgyud 'grel): gong bu hUM du gyur// de las rdo rje hUM ldan bsam// de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni// zhal gzhan gshin rje gsheng dang 'dra// rtsa ba'i zhal mi dkar bar bsgom// thugs kar sa bon gsol ba las// 'od 'phros bkug la zhal
112a6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pas// snying gar zhu nas thim byas la// mkha' gsang sbyangs la ho dmar bsam// zhu bas skar mnga' lam zhugs bzhin// mkha' gsang nang du babs gyur pas// bdag nyid yum dang bcas pa gzhu// de las
112b1(rgyud 'grel): thig le bzhi 'phros pas// lha me bzhi yis bskul bar bsam// rje btsun stong nyid la bzhengs la// khyams gsum kun gyi gti mug sel// rje btsun chos nyid la bzhengs la// snying rjes sems can dron mdzod cig/ de rjes
112b2(rgyud 'grel): de yang thim gyur pas// thig le'i ngo bor blta byes la// zhu bas yongs su gyur pa skyes// ya yig sngon po nyid dkyil 'khor// de las rdo rje sa bon bcus// 'od 'phros bstims te gyur pa las// bdag nyid 'jam dpal
112b3(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed// rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon po la// g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar ba ste// rang gi yum dang ldan pa'i lus// rdo rje ral gri 'khor lho dang // chu skyes gri gug thod pa'i phyag/ ma he'i gang na bcas gsus
112b4(rgyud 'grel): chesaglang po stag gi pags pa man bAs// mche gtsigs sbrul gyi chad ldan bskyed// sems ldan 'od 'phros ye shes dgug/ dzaHhUM baM hoHde nas mog dang rna ba sna// lce dong lus yid rnams la yang // mngon
112b5(rgyud 'grel): shes bsgrub phyir lha bsgom bya// k+ShaM dzaM khaM gAM kaM sAM/ de nas sku gsung thugs gsum la// oM AHhUM gsum// bkod pa lha ru dmigs par bya// de nas gshung lnga spyani drangs te// mchod la gsol btab dbang bskur/
112b6(rgyud 'grel): bas// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyi bor blta// de las sa bon yi ge las// 'phros pas yi ge nyi mar bsdu// de nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag tshul du// gtor me ldan pas bzlas pa bya// de nas ldang bar brtsam
113a1(rgyud 'grel): pa nA// sems can don la sems pa yi// ye shes sems dpa' gshegasu gsol// oM AHd+hU yid bzhin 'khor dang rdo rje bzlas// gtso mo khri tshul lo ma gtsigs// pra
113a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis bzlas par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// 'dis ni las kun byed pa ste// 'dod pa thams cad yid bzhin 'gyur// yaM las rlung ste raM las me// kaM las thod pa a las snod // 'dab brgyad
113a3(rgyud 'grel): shaM lnga bdud rtsi lnga// hU~M las kha gdab oM AHhUM/ bsams te me sbyar zhu bas bsdu// sbyangs te oM las 'od 'phros pas// ye shes bkug la bstim bin brlab// sbu gus drangs nas gsol sbyin bya// lha la sogs
113a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs bcus rnams// lha rdzas rdo rje yongasu dag pa'i gtor ma 'ad// gr-ih+Na khA hi gr-ih+Na kha hi ma ma shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug la sogs la// dpa' bo'o nga rgyal gtang mi bya// dngos po dngos bral skye
113a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bral// g.yo ba g.yo med bde ba can// thabs dang shes rab las 'byed cing // don gsum gnyis su med la bzhag/ bdag gi sgrub thabs sbyar ba 'dis// 'gro kun gshin rje gshing thob shog/ dpal gshin
113a6(rgyud 'grel): rjegashed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs shes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po kau ma la rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kArtas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
113b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mung+ga ra kro d+ha ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo thob gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnga' zhing // 'jig tshogs bdud
113b2(rgyud 'grel): las rnam rgyal ni// mthar byed cha la phyag 'tshal te// de yo sgrub thabs bshad par bya// skad cig lha yi rnal 'byor gnas// skyes pa'i 'od kyis 'gro ba sbyangs// 'khor lo chen po spyan drangs nas// rnam ngag dgu yi
113b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bsogs bya// byams dang sI do rje dga' btang snyoms// tshangs pa'i rgyun dang ljon pa yi// stong pa chen po bsgom par bya// bdud kyi phyogs rnams 'jigs byed phyir// bsrung ba'i 'khor los bsgom par bya//
113b4(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes nyi ma'i steng nyid du// ya las rdo rje tho ba ni// rtse mo nyi shur ldan pa yi// lba bar sa bon rab bzhag nas// spro bsdu byas nas nga rgyal bsam// oM sarba bud+d+ha badz+rA swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ gyur pas the ba ga shing rje
113b5(rgyud 'grel): gigishing du bsgom// sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po// rang gi rig mas khyung cing mdzes// g.yas g.yon zhal ni dgor dang dmar // gri gug tho ba ral gri nga // thod pa 'khor lo rin chen mdzes// stag gi pags
113b6(rgyud 'grel): pa sham thabs su// mnabs shing g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba// klu dang dur khrod 'khrugs pas brgyan// mche gtsigs spyan dgar 'jigs pa'i mdangs// me dpung dkyil du gnas pa bsgob// sku gsung
114a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs dang skye mched drug/ rdo rje gsal bar bskyed par bya// dadang rtags gshin gshed kyis brgya na// yig 'bru ba ni yos dgug gtsug bya// bug chen po spros pas mchod// rdo rje dril bu lhun
114a2(rgyud 'grel): bas bstod// hUM hU~M rdo rje stobs po che// rab 'jigs mi mthun zad mdzad pa// rdo rje sgo dbyer med pa'i lha// tho bo rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// sgron me 'o mar ldan pa yis// kho yi bu gdag par byas ma// sangs rgyas rnams kyi
114a3(rgyud 'grel): gas bskal bos// 'gro ba ma lus sbyang bar bya// sngags kyi rgyal po rjes dran poso// khri dang 'bum du bzlas par bya// oM mung+ga ra d+hi ka hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ phyag rgya bkrol nas ngal so ba// gcig dang du ma las
114a4(rgyud 'grel): grol ba// rang bzhin med pa'i snying po can// chos kun gyi ni bdag po can// sems kyi bskal par bsgom par bya// bdag gis rgyud dang bla moM las// rnying po'i drin 'di thob pa nges// bskul nas sgrub thabs 'di byas
114a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ thams cad 'bras bu mngon rlung shog/ khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshad kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rgyu gA ro gyi mkhan po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ mAN+Da d+h+r-ika
114a6(rgyud 'grel): bi dA ra ya ma ri sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thab so/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// thugs kyi de nyid gtso dang mtshungs pa yi/
114b1(rgyud 'grel): lha ni bdud dgra dbyug pa gshin rje gshed// las rnams thams cad mthar mdzad la btud de// mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub phyir bshad par bya// rang lus phyag rgya chen por dran// theg pa chen po'i blor byas nas// bla ma/
114b2(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun rnams la ni// bsod nams tshogs rab bsags par bya// gnyis med sangs rgyas gnyis su med// rkyen skyes chos kun chu zla 'dra// de nyid skye med shes bya'i phyir// dag pa'i sngags kyis bskul la bsgom//
114b3(rgyud 'grel): tshad mod rgyun chad med pa'i sems// na mkha'i thig pa de nyid los// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gdan bsams te// dza las du byug po dkar dang sku// rtsa zhal dkaro la swo dmar zhal// rang gi rig mar mtshungs pa'i
114b4(rgyud 'grel): lus gri gug dbyug pa ral gri dang // thod pa 'khor lo chu skyes 'dzin// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba yu zhabs// chu skyes 'od zer rnon po mnan// myi mgo'i phreng sbyangs stag lpags myanabs// klu dang
114b5(rgyud 'grel): rus rgyan dbus mdzes pa// bskyed la lus ngag yid gsum deng // skye mched rnams la 'dis byin brlab// oM AHhUM/ kl-i dzaM khaM gaM kaM saM dbang bskur cod pan mi bskyod bsam// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa byin gyis brlab
114b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi sprul pas mchod// de nas rdo rje dril ldan pas// bstod pa'i rgyal po brjod par bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje kun tu bzang // mnyam po'i rdo rje maM bskyod pa// rdo rje gsang ba dbyings chen po// ye shes
115a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// yig 'bru gsum gyis byin dran pa'i// bdud rtsi rdo rje lce yis myang // spyi dang bsdu ba byas nas kyang // gsang sngags khri ru bzlas pa bya// oM badz+ra dadAr+d+ha d+hA//
115a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sa chu me rlung 'byung ba'i rim// ye shes thig ler byas nas kyang // gzugs ni sgra nyid ring bzhin dog/ bdag med snying po bsgom par bya// ma rig mun pa 'joms byod sgron mu'i mchog/
115a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud dgra khro bo'i rgyal po'i sgrub thibs 'dis// 'gro ba'i 'jigs chen ngos dgra bcom nas kyang // thams cad gshin rje gshed po nyid mtshungs shog/ dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa
115a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'o sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dI paM ka rAs mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor pa prad+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na kirtisi rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ tsaN+Da khaD+ga
115a5(rgyud 'grel): ya ya.AmA re swA d+ha no nA ya/ bod skad du/ ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lnga phyag 'tshalo// stong pa zhi ba las ni rdo rje'i sku// bdud mthar mdzad pa rab
115a6(rgyud 'grel): tu gtum pa'i zhal// sems can rjes 'dzin thags rjes chen por ldan// ral gri che la btung bshad par bya// skad cig dran pa'i lhar bskyed nas// dam pa dmigs la tshegs bsag bya// tshangs
115b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas bzhi sngon 'gro bas// stong pa dang ni 'khor lo bsgom// pad+ma 'od zer rnon po ste// rang las shugs can gyur pa'i sku// mar ka ta ljang khu'i mdog 'dra la// sngo dang dkar po g.yas g.yon
115b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal// gri gug rAl gri 'khor lo dang // thor pa rin chen chu skyes 'dzin// dpa' bo'i rgyun dang klu yis spras// dbu skra gyen 'greng me dpung dkyil// stag lpags mnabs shing g.yon brkyang ba/
115b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i sku la 'di lta ste// snying gar hUM las rdo rje thugs// mgrin par AHlas rdo rje gsung // spyi bor oM las sku rdo rje// mthing dmar dkar zhing mtshan char ldan// sa snying dkar po maug
115b4(rgyud 'grel): lA kl-i// rdo rje 'dzin sngon rna bar rdzi// name snying ser po sna la khaM// 'jig dbang dmar po lce la go// sgrib sel ljang gu dpral bar kaM/ kun bzang dkar po lteng snar si// spyan drangs mchod bstod
115b5(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badz+ri swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje semase ma la sogs kyis// dbang bskur spyi bor gshin rje gshed// sgo bzhi'i sngogs kyis 'dod lha
115b6(rgyud 'grel): bskul// rang gi lus la gzhug par bya// mr-ing+gi rA dzaHdaN+Da hUM/ pad+ma baM/ khaD+ga ho/ snying gar ye shes nu ba'i rgyun// ba spu khung nas sprul pas mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta
116a1(rgyud 'grel): pU dza badz+rI swa b+hA ba At+ma ka d+ha/ hU~M rdo rje las ni brtson 'grus cha// sangs rgyas rdo rje btul zhugs 'dzin// las mthar mdzad pa'i thub pa po// rdo rje brtson 'grus khyad phyag
116a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas kyang // smr-i bsdu ldan pas bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra khaD+ga d+h+r-ika hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'byung ba rim gyi thig pa la// yi ge gsum du sbyangs nas kyang // bde dang sdug bsngal
116a3(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs pa'i// rdo rje lto bu'i ting 'dzin bsgom// bdag gis rnyed dang bkur sti la// ma bltas sems can la brtsa'i phyir// ral gri rdo rje'i sgrub thabs byas// 'di yis nges 'byung rnyed gyur cig/ rel
116a4(rgyud 'grel): gri ga shin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra su kha pad+ma ya mA ri sA d+ha na nA maM/ bod skad du/ pad+ma gshin rje / shid rab bde ba
116a5(rgyud 'grel): can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rjes su dran ldan zhing // de 'dren thugs rje'i rtags mnga' ba// mtsho skyes zhal la phyag 'tshal te// de yi sgrub
116a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs ba shad par bya// dang por sngags pas khrus byas naso// ku sha'i stan la legs 'dug ste// lus ngag yid gsum pog ldan pas// cung zad 'gro ba'i ldan pas bya// rang gi lhag pa'i ltar ldan
116b1(rgyud 'grel): bos// cod pan rje btsun gzung bar bya// de nas rje btsun spyan drangs te// skyabs 'gro byang chub sems bskyed de// de nas maN+Dal bstar ba ste// me tog dgram zhing mchong tshogs bsham// de nas sems
116b2(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi phyir// bsod nams tshogs bsags gshegs su gsol// bu gcig ltar dran byams pa dang // sdug bsngal bral 'dod snying rje dang // bde thob pa'i dga' ba dang // phun sum
116b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa'i btang snyoms so// snying rje thags kyi rang bzhin dang // ldan pa'i stong pa bsgom par bya// bsrung 'khor pad+ma nyi ma'i steng // ni las chu skyes gyur pa'i sku// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra
116b4(rgyud 'grel): la// g.yas dang g.yon ni sngo dang dkar// gri gug chu skyes ral gri dang // thod pa 'khor lo rin chen 'dzin// thod pa lnga yis dbu bskor cing // phreng ba klo dang dur khrod brgyan// mi dpung skyil krung
116b5(rgyud 'grel): stag lpags banab// bskyed pa cung zad 'jam pa'i mdang so// sku gsung thugs dang skye mched drug/ rang lus ngo bo byin gyis byarlab// dbang bskur rtogs dang ldan pa la// mchod la bstod pa 'dis
116b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes bya// hUM rdo rje dmo tshig rdo rje gsung // rdo rje dbyangs ni zab mo che// 'dod chags rdo rje nyid mtshungs pa// skyon brel rje la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud rtsi myang zhing spro bsdu bzlas//
117a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas phyag rgya dgrol byar bya// oM badz+ra pad ma d+hikA trA hU hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rig pa'i shes rab mnga' bdag gis// steng ldan
117a2(rgyud 'grel): 'ben la thug pa na// gcig kyang mi gnas bang ba che// bsgom b+h+yo bsgom byed med pa yi// rje bcu ni gsung gi dI ni ngag dang // rgyud las mthong ba bris pa 'dis// 'gro kun dri me
117a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa yi// sangs rgyas sa la gnas par shog/ pad ma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka re zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
117a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kArdi sa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
118a1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje ga shed nag po'i sgrub bangs kyi maN+Dal gyi cho ga pad+ma srung ngas mdzad pa bzhug so//
118b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha nA maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bong skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo//
118b2(rgyud 'grel): blabla ma rdo rje ya shes dang // rje btsun mgon la phyag 'chi lo// dngos grub slob dpon mnyes bya'i phyir// rje btsun dkyil 'khor da ma pa yi// cho ga bdag gis bshad par bya// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// sa gzhi
118b3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po yid 'ong la// rin chen spos chus logs spras te// mnyam pa'i sa la dri sogs sbyin// mdzes pa'i gzhi la thig le gzhag/ tA ma la'i lo ma 'am// ras bal gtsang mas dgod par bya// sems can kun
118b4(rgyud 'grel): la rjes brtse bas// phyi nang khrus la gnas nas kyang // skad cig bskyed la tshogs bsags bya// bsrung dang chos 'byung gzhal yas khang // bsang dang chos 'byung gzhal yas khang // bskyed la de yi nang du ni//
118b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog bzang po dgram par bya// zhe sdang rdo rje nas brtsams te// ral gI rdo rje rab tu bskyed// tshom pu re laM lan bdun te// bzlas byas pad+ma nyi zla'i steng // bde gshegs sras bcus bsam par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i/
118b6(rgyud 'grel): tA na na hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ oM rat+na d+h+r-ika/ oM A ro l-ig/ oM pradz+nyA d+hi kaM swA hA// oM mung+ga ra d+h+r-i ka/ oM daN+Da d+h+r-i kaM/ oM pad+ma d+h+r-ika/ oM khaR+Ya d+h+r-ikaM/ oM mo ha ra ti/ oM dwe Sha ra ti/ oM ra ga ra ti/ oM badz+ra ra ti/
119a1(rgyud 'grel): so so'i sku mdog phyag mtshan dang // rgyan dang bzhugs pa'i phyag rgyu rnams// mngon par rtogs pa'i cho ga las// 'byung ba bzhin du gsal bar bskyed// tshogs bsag dkyil 'khor bstim pa dang //
119a2(rgyud 'grel): skye mched sku gsung thugs byin brlab// dbang blang ba dang dgug gzhug bya// mchod po stong bdud rtsi myang ba dang // spro bsdu dang ni bzlas pa rnams// rnal 'byor pa yis legos byas te// 'dod pa'i don rnams gsol ba gdas
119a3(rgyud 'grel): bshags dang bzod pa gsol byas te// de nyid gsum gyi cho ga yis// ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol// dam tshig bskyed pa'i lha rnams ni// snying ga nyid du rnam par bstim// gnyis don dam pa bden pa
119a4(rgyud 'grel): yi// chos kyi tshul la gnas par bya// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// byang chub tu ni bsngo ba dang // smon lam chen po gdab par bya// de ltar nyin mtshan dus drug tu// snying brtse brtson pas dbul bar bya//
119a5(rgyud 'grel): g+hagayeng ba rnam par zhi don du// cho gas bsag maN+Dal ting 'dzin no// sbyor po'i cho ga sngon song bas// gser dang pang zla rnam bsams te// grong bzhin rim par dpyod par bya// oM badz+ra re khe hUM/ pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/
119a6(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra re khe hUM/ a tsan+da maN+Da la hUM/ bsnyen par bya ba'i gong bzhin du// gshegs su gsol dang bsdu ba min// khyad par bsdus pa'i maN+Dal ni// las kyi sngags kyis byin brlabs te// mdzes pa'i sngags
119b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis dgram par bya// ras sam bzang po'i gni ngag la// thig la 'bru sogs bkod nas kyang // bde gshegs sras bcas spyan drangs te// gdan gyi tshul du dbul bar bya// shin tu bsdus pa 'di lta ste// tshom bu gcig
119b2(rgyud 'grel): la mngon brten to// gzhal yas khang du dmigs nas kyang // de nang spyan drang bzhugs su gsol// bsod nams tshogs kyis rgyud sbyangs nas// gsol ba po bsngos lA gshugasu gsol// ma chags brten
119b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snying gar bsdu// sgyu ma'i blo yis zin par bya// bla na med pa'i maN+Da l+ya ni// snying ga'i pad+ma rnam dgra nad // ye shes chen po'i thig la ni// lnga phrag gnyis dang drug phyed kyi// yig 'bru mchog tu rnam bsams
119b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ mtshan dang rdzogs pa'i skur gyur nas// dus gsum tshegs kyi mchod pa bya// rtag tu bsti ba ma yin te// dus med rtag tu brtson pas 'grub// bsam gyis mi khyabo maN+Da la ni// tshe 'di'i zung du 'jug pa las//
119b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi de nyid rnam bsams pa'o// skye med mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas// rtog dang bral ba'i de bzhini nyid// rdo rje lta bu'i pho brang yin// dus gsum rtag tu sangs rgyas nas// skye med de bzhin nyid kyi bdag/ chags sdang
119b6(rgyud 'grel): dbul bas dbul bar bya// maN+Dal kun gyi mchog yon no// bsod nams tshogs kyi maN+Dal las// ye shes maN+Dal rnam par skye// da phyir thabs kyi maN+Dal ni// rnal 'byor pa yis dbul bar bya// thun
120a1(rgyud 'grel): mongs dngos grub bsgrub pa dang // mchog gi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// bdag gis bsam pa bzang po yis// maN+Dal byas pa'i dge ba gang // des ni sems can thams cad kyis// sangs
120a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas zhing khams dag thob shog/ gshin rjeg shing nag po'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / zangs gleng rnal 'byor nA ga bu ra yis// rnal 'byor ma ka ra tri ta nyid la// gu tsha rgyal ba'i bu
120a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid btang nas kyang // tA ru pa ri dur khrod tshal nyid du// rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'khor lo nang // gsol btab rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhal do ru// maN+Dal cho ga bsod snyoms pa yis byas// dang sad rnal
120a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor lnga spyad ldan pa yis// dus rnams rtag tu maN+Dal 'bad par rigs// / rgya gar skad du/ d+har+m+ma ka ya dI paM bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ chos kyi sku'i snang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba// dpal gshin
120a5(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed l-i phyag 'tshal lo// dang po snying rje'i bdag nyid pas// srid pa'i bde la ma chags shing // bdag 'dzin dag la rgyab kyis phyogs// bdag 'dzin yongs su dor bya ste// bdag dang gzhon du mnyam pa dang //
120a6(rgyud 'grel): rang dang gzhan ni blang ba'i phyir// phyi nang bar chad sel ba'i mchog/ chos sku rten mchog gdab pa'i phyir// gshin rje gshed la gus btung ngo de// mchod rten cho ga bshad par bya// zung du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas//
120b1(rgyud 'grel): yi dga' ba yi sa phyogasu// dur khrod dgon pa'i gnas mchog tu// bkra shis sa ni bzang po la// bdud rtsi rnam lngas legs byugs te// spos dang dri yi tshogs rnams dang // gser dang mu tig byi ru sogs// rin
120b2(rgyud 'grel): na rnam mang bcug nas kyang / khrus byas dag pa'i rnal 'byor bas// 'jim pa'i gong bu ril nas kyang // bdag nyid lha ru rnam bsnyeng nas// bsod nams ya shes tshegs bsags bya// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo
120b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs byas la// chos kyi dbyings kyi khang pa dang // gzhal yos khang mchog bskyed nas ni// gzhal yas khang gi dbus nyid du// skye ming snang ba las byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab gsalo ldan bsam// gyur pas
120b4(rgyud 'grel): ro mnyamo thig le'o// de la thugs kyi yi ge ste// de nas thugs mchog nyid du 'gyur// nga rgyal sku gsung thugs bcug ste// zhu bas chos kyi sku ru gyur// de yi sa bon yi ge las 'phros pas gshin rje gshed bkug
120b5(rgyud 'grel): ste// zhal du zhugs nas zhu bar bsdam// bdag nyid thig le chen por blta// phyogs bcur thig le bzhi spos pas// tsang tsi phag mos dbyings ldan ma// gau rI lha mo bzhir gyur te// rje btsun thig le bskul bar bya//
120b6(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun pa nongs shing stong rje khro// sid gsum pa yi ma rig sol// rje btsun bzhings shing rgyal rigs bdud ba'i las ni rgyal ba'i sems ni g.yengs// rje btsun bzhugs shing 'jig rten snyam panan stong pa nyid lo
121a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs sam ni// ci phyir 'jig rten snyan mnan stong pa nyid la sems te bzhugs// bcom ldan rgyal pos bskul nas kyang // lha mo nyid kyang thim par gyur// de la nyi ma sa bon bcas//
121a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas rdo rje mtshan ma can// de la gshin rje gshed mchog sku// rtog pa bzhin du gsal bar bsam// de las mkha' gsong byin brlabs te// ye shes dkyil 'khor bkrug nas kyang // zhu bas khams mchog
121a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i nang // thig le bcu bdun nyid du gyur// de las sa bon gzugs su gyur// yak+She ma med/ ya ts+tsha ni ra/ dza sa do ru Na yo ni rI/ rdo rje sto dang 'khor lo dkar// rin chen gser dang pad+ma dmar// ral gri ljang
121a4(rgyud 'grel): gu tho ba sngo// dbyug pa gar gyi phyag rgyar gyur// de las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku// dgra lnga yum bzhi bsgom par gyur// mal nas skye ba'i tshul nyid du// so so gnas su dgod par bya// de nas bdag gi snying gan
121a5(rgyud 'grel): sa bon dag las 'od 'bros pas// dkyil 'khor dag la pho gyur te// 'khor lo 'khor de'i tshul nyid kyis// gsal ba'i bzlas pa dbul bar bya/ oM hrI hrIwi kr-i tA nA ma hU~M hA phaT phaT swA hA// nA mo b+ha ga ba ti
121a6(rgyud 'grel): tsan/ pra b+hU rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te samya kr-i bud+d+hA ya/ oM hi ru suSh+Te/ sa me sa ma te/ sa ma ye/ sa ma ro bya/ a na lam+be te ra be ya sho ba to/ ma hA te dze/ nai ra ku li nerba Ni/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ hr-i da ya d+hiSh+ThAnA
121b1(rgyud 'grel): dz+har+b+hi te swAt+ma// glatso bo dag lha ji ltar bstan// gti mug sogs la rim bzhin no// oM dzi na dz+r-i// oM rat+nad+hAk+Sha/ oM A r-i lAH/ oM prar+d+ha r+d+haH/ oM mr-ing+ga rAg+d+ha// oM N+Dad+h+r-ika/ oM bAd+mA b+h+yAM// oM khan+da d+hAH/ oM mo hA
121b2(rgyud 'grel): oM dr-i Sha ra ti/ oM r-I ga ra te/ oM badz+ra ra ta/ nyi shu rtsa gcig lnga bcu dang // brgya dang brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni// gtso dang 'khor gyi rim pa yis// bzlas pa bsdu ba'i tshul gyis bzhu// 'od kyi phung por bsams nas ni// de nas skor
121b3(rgyud 'grel): por g.yas thogs te// gu gul a kar nag la sogs// dri yi bdug byas gdug par bya// de nas 'od kyi gong bu las// bcad cing sku gdung gdab par bya// snying por 'brel pa'i rten 'brel dag/ bzlas shing
121b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bya// bkod pa'i tshul gyis mkha' la gzhag/ rdzogs nas lha yi dkyil 'khor la// skye mched byin gyis brlabs pa dang // sku gsuMng thugs dang de bzhin te// dbang bskur dgug gzhug
121b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod dang // bdud rtsi myang gis smin par bya// de nas gsol ba gdab pa dang // bshags dang bsngo ba byas nas ni// sgyu ma'i blo yis zin par bya// de nas smon lam btab nas nI// gnas khang bzang por
121b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhug par bya// dus rnams kun tu mchod pa dang // bskor ba sogs kyis mnyes par bya// na mo rat+na tra ya yA/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA/ he tun+te wAn+ta thA ga to// h+ya bi data te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha/ e baM bA dI ma hA
122a1(rgyud 'grel): shrA ma Na/ gsung ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang po la// mos pa'i bla yas bsko byung byA// nu mo b+ha ga ba pa rAt+na ke t+yA rA d+hA ya/ tA thA gA tA ya/ adz+ra ti sam kra bud+d+ha ya/ tAd+ya thA oM rat+no rat+na/ ma hA t+t+wa/
122a2(rgyud 'grel): rat+na bIr+ya ye swA hA// rnal 'byor sems la gnod gyur na// na mkha' ngag la gdab par bya// tshe ma'i rnam pa gong bzhin te// mtshan med phyir na mchog yin// rkyen rnams tshogs par bya ba'i phyir// chu dang me dang rlung ngagi
122a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ b+hai raM yaM ni rnam bsamos te// 'phros pas rgyal ba sras bcas dag/ bsdus to yaug 'bru la bstims pas// chu la dkar dang me lo dmar// rlung la khro ba sngon po bsam// zhu bis 'od kyi phung por gyur// skor
122a4(rgyud 'grel): phor thogs la gdab par bya// rab gnas bya ba gong bzhin te// de la khyad pa'i yod ma yin// rnal 'byor bsod nams bsags pa dang // bar chod myur du zhi bya'i phyir// bdag gis sku gdung cho ga'i mchog/ mngon
122a5(rgyud 'grel): par brtsams pa'i dge ba 'ongs// khams gsum sems can thams cod kyi// rnal 'byor lo la gnos pa rnams// sgo gsum sdig pa dag gyur to// chos sku gnyis med thob par shog// rgya gar gyi
122a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhan po ka lA pa ma hA zhes bya bas mdzad pa/ mchod rjer gyi chog rdzog so/ rnal 'byir pa pradrA dz+nyA na yos reng 'gyur du byas pa'o// so ma pu ri gtsug lag khang chen du/ nag po zhabs
122b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas// rnal 'byor tshe 'phos nge ba ba la yis// yab mchog d+harmA pA la 'das gyur pa'o// chang du gsol btab rgyal po'o nalA snga ru// mchod rten cho ga me tog tshal du mdzad// spos bcus
122b2(rgyud 'grel): spros med tshul gyi lam mchog 'di // deng sang rnal 'byor rnams kyis gdab par rigs// / rgya gar skad du/ ho ma bi d+hiSh+Ti she kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed kyi ro
122b3(rgyud 'grel): bsreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal gshin d+he gsheng l-i phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// zab mo bcas pa'i rdo rje ni// bla med snying po la btud de// ro bsreg cho ga bshad par bya// sems can sangs
122b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas snying po can// sangs rgyas nyid du rab sbyor ba'i// thabos kyi khyad par ro bsreg pare// rnam pa gnyisu shes bya ste// bsgrubs la bsreg par bya ba dang // dur khrod bsreg par bya ba'o// bsgrubs la bsreg pa
122b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi ste// dang por longs spyod 'khor lo dang // gnyis pa rab tu phye ba la// gsum pa nye ba'i bsgrub pa nyid// bzhi pa mchod rten cho ga yi// dang po ro la khrus byas nas// bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang //
122b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi yi gtor ma btang bar bya// de nas tshogs bsags nas bzung ste// mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs pa dang // bzang po'i khri la bzhag nas kyang // rgyan gyis logs par smras pa la// ga bur la sogs
123a1(rgyud 'grel): khar blud nas// bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab bya ste// snying gar gzungs thag btags nas kyang // rtsa ba'i sngags la de nyid gsum// spel ba'i bzlas pa khri tsom bya// de nas bye brag las byas
123a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ thod pa glang pa dbang po lnga// snying sogs bzhi dang nya bzhi drang // snum dang bdud rtsi lnga dang gnas// rkang brgyad sde pa'i bu gang gu// rgyas pa'i srad bus bcings nas kyang // shun pa'i nang du dril la bzhag/ de nas
123a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi mchod pa ni// rtog pa dang bcas rtog med dang // shin tu rtog med la sogs ni// gang zag sems kyi khyad par yin// de yang rab tu sbyar ba dang // 'dod pa gzhan la spel ba dang // rtog med rlon pa'i rol
123a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo las// byung ba'i bkra shris smon btab nas// tshe las 'das pa'i don gyi phyir// bsngo ba rab tu zin par bya// de ni longs spyod 'khor lo'o// smon lam dkyil 'khor de nyid dang /
123a5(rgyud 'grel): lha yi de nyid las sbyar ba'i// tshe las 'das pa'i don gyi phyir// rgya chen rab tu gdab par bya// sbyang ba gsum du shes bya ste// dang po thal ba btags la btsag/ de nas dri dang sbyar bya ste// hrIHSh+ThiHla ni
123a6(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'gro kun// sbyang bar byed pa'i sngags btags la// khri 'am stong du bzlas pa bya// de nas maN+Dal ngos bsnyems lo// ba yi rnam lngas byugs nas kyang // dri zhim pa yis bsgos pa'i sa// dri yi thig
123b1(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa dag// de nas sgyogs chags ma ng+ga ShaH da// mnyon stong 'jam la dkar ba'os// blangs la dri nom chu yos blam// do nas thal bya dang bsros la// 'dzom pa logs pa'i gong bu bya// de nas snying ga'i
123b2(rgyud 'grel): bon las// 'bros pa'i 'od kyis tshe 'das ni// 'og gi gnas nas bkug byas la// lus ngag yid gsum sbyang bar bya// de nas hUM hUM zhes brjod pas// khya ba'i thig ler zhu gyur te// a dkar thung du gsal bar bya// de
123b3(rgyud 'grel): las 'od zer 'phros pa yis// dbyangs dang gsal yig bsdu bar bya// de las rdo rjer gyur nas kyang // hUM gis mtshan pa las 'phros pa'i// phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams bsdu bar bya// de nas rang gi lha dang ni// yaud na
123b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' ru// bskyed la sku rnams bsdu bar bya// de yang byin gyis brlab pa ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ye badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ bAg+na dz+dza 'gre/ tsat+ta badz+ra 'gre/ de nas byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags// nyi shu
123b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gcig bzlas byas la// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bstim+b+ha sa nas kyong // 'od kyi phung por blta bar bya// de nas rten 'brel ldan pa'i sngags// brjod cing btab la 'khor lor bsgom// sngar g+hi maN+Dal drang ba'i
123b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil// dri yi thog les brgyan pa la// me tog tshom bu bkod pa'i steng // spyan drangs nas ni bzhugs su gsol// de nas 'khor lo rgyal mtshan dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phen gyis brgyan
124a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas na bza' dgang po gsol// dgyod pa shin tu mdzes byas la// skye mtshad sku gsung thugs dang dbang // dgug bzhug mchod dang bstod byas la// bdud rnaM snang d+hA smr-i bsdu bzlas/
124a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs nas bsngo dang smon lam+b+ha btang // de nas gzhalnga yas bzang po'i nang // bzhugs su gsol la rtag tu mchod// ri bsreg gi rus pa'i chu tshwa'i rgyo g+he yin// gA shrI na rje gshed kyi ro bsreg gi tshig zhes bya
124a3(rgyud 'grel): ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya ger skad du/ ga Na tsakra bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya bA/ rje btsun mgon la phyag 'tshal lo//
124a4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams khyad par bsags pa dang // dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba dang // bgegs rnams nye bar zhi bya'i phyir// dengadage gi tshegs 'khor bshad par bya// yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs su// tshegs
124a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi khang pa yid 'ong ba// 'khor khang rim gsum rlan parar+ya gcig/ de nas tsan ngan gur kum dang // dri yi cho gso ni bsgos nas kyang // sa gzhi bzang po logs byas te// rnam lngas skyong nul byas nas
124a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang gzhung dang mthun pa'i maN+Dal la// mdzes pa'i me tog legs bkram ste// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams tshang bar ngas pa// 'byor pa'i yo byad ldan pa dang // bsdu bar 'os pa'i rnal 'byor tshogs/
124b1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus par nI dusdus nas kyang // slob dpon la ni zhu ba dbul// las kyi bum pa byin brlad nas// mchod pa'i bum pa bsags nas kyang // mdzes pa'i me tog legs dang ste// tshig 'dis gsol ba gang ba
124b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// khro bo sngon po mdzes pa tshwa// khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong // nor bu rin chen chas bcings pa'i// dbyug pa phyag na bsdams pa ste// bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyar// dpa' bos gnang gis
124b3(rgyud 'grel): btang du gsol// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su// bzang po'i sgo ni rnam par dubye// gsol ba btab nas nang bkug ste// las kyis bum pasu chu gtor te// mna'i chu blung la gral la dgod// de nas rdo rje
124b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon la// me tog phul te gsol ba gang ba// de nas rnal 'byor pho mo la// me tog gtor ma bskul bar bya// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// lhar bsgom lce lag byin gyis brlab// phyag rgya byin brlab mngon
124b5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs brjed// hUM thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po'i gtso// oM ma hA badz+ra hUM/ a/ srid pa
124b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// ngo bo nyid kyi gdong nas ngag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis// snying po ngom pa mchog tu byed// oM hrIHb+h+yowi kr-i d+hA na na hU~M phaT/ oM mahA badz+ra gan+d+ha/ de nas mchod pa'i khyang par
125a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs// de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs la// snying ga'i sa bon 'dres pa yis// bla ma rje btsun mdun bsams te// mchod yin zhal bsil zhabs bkra dbul// mchod pa'i tshogs
125a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis rab mched nas// de khe na nyid bstod pa bya// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwik+Shi tA na na hUM phaT/ oM mahA badz+ra pra tI ts+tsha swA ha/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hU~M/ oM AHhUM/ de bzhin du puSh+pa dI pe/ gan+d+he/ nai bri d+ye shrab+da/ oM AHhUM/ oM sarba ta thA
125a3(rgyud 'grel): ga ta pu dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje dril bu ldan pa yis// gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// gshin d+h+r-i gshed po shin tu 'jigs// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// rdo rje mi 'jigs phyag 'tshal
125a4(rgyud 'grel): bstod// gshin rje gshing po rab 'jigs pa// nga rgyal rdo rje ngo bo khyod// rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa// rin chen rdo rje ngo bo nyid// 'dod chags rdo rje gtso bo khyod// 'dod chags chos kyi rnam pa
125a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems// thams cad dbyangs ni mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje gsung mchog phyag 'tshal bstod// phrag dog rdo rje ngo bo khyod// gshin rje gshed po las kun byed// sku yi rdo rje rab 'dra ba// ral gri
125a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus// sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'o gtso// dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/
125b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis nyon mongs tshogs rnams las// byung ba'i sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ni// rje btsun 'jam dbyangs spyan lnga ru de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang ni// byang chub
125b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dge 'dun mchog/ slob sogs ngag bya thams cad la// rgyarar bdag ni rjes yi rang // khams gsum rnam rtog dra ba yis// mngon par gtibs pa mun nag la// theg pa chen po'i yi
125b3(rgyud 'grel): shes che// chos kyi sgron mas 'od snang mdzod// rdzogs sangs 'khor ba'i chos rnams las// chos skur mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa// 'khor ba ji srid gnas par du// sems can don mdzad bzhugs su
125b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol// bsod nams tshogs las mngon byung ba'i// dge ba'i bsod nams ma lus kun// sems can 'khor ba las sgrol phyir// thams cad byang chub mchog tu bsngo// mchod pa nyi shu'i tshogs
125b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang // de sogs rol mo'i tshogs rnams ni// rnal 'byor pa yid 'bad pa yi// rdo rje chen po mched byas la// de naso blo yis gshegs su gsol// de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms te// snying
125b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes zir po'i gsal bar bya// de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni// rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang // 'bar ba'i khang pa drag po la// mtshon cha tshogs kyis spras par bsam// nang du chos 'byung dkar po ni// glu
126a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum mtshon pa dang bcas pa// rdo rje gzhal yas khang bskyed la// rnal 'byor bzhi yi tshul dag gis// de nyid dkyil 'khor smin par bya// de nas bdud rtsi byin brlab/
126a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin mchod// de nas mthe bong srin lag gis// blangs pa'i bdud rtsi byugs pa yis// chos 'byung gru gsum dkar dmar bri// de nas bdud rtsi'i thig le yis// mdzes
126a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me tog legs bkram ste// skad cig bskyeng dang dgug gzhug bya// de nas bdud rtsi phul nas kyang // du dag nyid la ni mchod par bya// thabs dang gsang bas blangs nas kyang // lce rtse smin mtshams spyi
126a4(rgyud 'grel): bor gtor// de nas de dag mi dmigs bsgomo// rtsa byi'i dkyil 'khor nyid la ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod nas kyang // ba~Mstod cing bdud rtsi myangs nas kyang // gsal byar dmigs nas bzhugs
126a5(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// de nas zhing skyong 'khor bcasI la// gtor ma rgya chen btang ba ni// yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo yis// bsregs dang sbyangs dang gtor byas lo// maN+Dal bzang po yid 'ong ste// thig le li
126a6(rgyud 'grel): ci dgu byas te// dbus la ye shes 'khor lo bsam// phyogs dang mtshams la zhing skyong brgyad // ma mo sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // bcas pa spyan drang mchod pa bya// oM/ shing gcig dang ni/
126b1(rgyud 'grel): nIni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul phug/ grong dang bzhi mdo dag dang ni// khyad bar du ni khang stong dang // gdol pa'i steng dang thang drang ni// khyad par du ni chu la gnas// nag po drag be drag po che// lhas
126b2(rgyud 'grel): byin mnyam du bsten pa dang // nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug drag/ rga las 'das dang log 'drenu rnams// rgan byang mo dang drag mo dang // mi sdug ma dang u ma dang // rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ma dang // mi thub gzhan gyis
126b3(rgyud 'grel): mi thub ma// nag mo bzang mo nag chen myo// nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma// 'jib byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag me'i gzugs
126b4(rgyud 'grel): dang drag chen mo// mche ba gtsigs pa'i thong chen mo// thod 'phreng phreng tson kha T+wAM ma// sprul chen ral gri dag sta can// rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma// de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro ma// las kun rjes su grub byed ma// sbyor ba'i
126b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rgya chen mo// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku che ste// rdul byed rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo// rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis// thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig/ oM kok+ka D+ha na
126b6(rgyud 'grel): bab+ban d+ha na/ kha khA kha nga na/ sarba duSh+TA na/ ha na ha na/ g+hA ta ya g+ha ta ya mo ka s+ya hUM/ zhes pas bkug la// pad+ma'i gdon la gnas par bsams la// mchod pa lngar byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid dbul te// sngags de nyid kyi
127a1(rgyud 'grel): mjug la// a mo ka s+yA n+na ru hU hU~M phaT swAhA/ zhes pas dbul te/ sa sa ru lI la hUM las rdo rjer byin// byin gyis brlab par bsams pa'i sbu gu'i 'od kyis drangs te mchod par bsams la// de nas/
127a2(rgyud 'grel): chos bshad de// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lto bu ste// dge tsong gsel la zhes bya ba brjod nas// smon lam btab ste/ sems can thams cad sdig med cing // sems can thams cad bde gyur cig/ gang gi lAm nas
127a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog/ ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang // ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// nga lta nyid du rjes brtse bas// rnal 'byor stan bcos gnas la dgod// ces bya bas
127a4(rgyud 'grel): bsngo bar bas gshegasu mi gsol// de nas rnal 'byor pho mo kun lha'i dkyil 'khor du bltas la// dang la dri yis mchod// de nas me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang // lha bshos kyis tshul bzhin du mchod
127a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i chang gis mchod de// lag pa g.yon pas chung bzung nas// g.yas pas rtse gsum pa byas la// tshigasu bcad pa 'dis sbyin te// ltos shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos// 'di
127a6(rgyud 'grel): la the tshom yang ma yin// bram ze khyi dang gdol pa gsum// rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs par bza'// zhes bya bas drang ngo // len pa pos brjod pa/ 'dod chags dri ma bral ba yi// rin thang mang las legs
127b1(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs chos// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal// zhes pas pad+ma'i skor bya dang bcus pas blang // 'og ma rnams la drang ba la 'di skad brjod// sbyor ba'i dus na dngos grub ni// spyod kun
127b2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid de bzhin du// rnal 'byor pas ni kun tu spyad// ji ltar ba bar spyod par bya// zhes bya ba brjod li brim mo// de'i 'og tu sha khu dang gur mar gyis mchod// de nas lha ba shos so sor drangs la// de nas kun gyis pud
127b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la// slob dpon la phul nas// slob dpon gyis cha gnyis su dgos te// cha gcig g.yon gyi phyogs su bgos la byin gyis brlabs la// dkyil 'khor gyi lha la dbul// cha gcig g.yas su bzhag la//
127b4(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs la phyogs skyong la dbul te/ oM a kA ro mu khAm zhes pa'i sngags kyis mchod/ de nas ci bder rol cing longs spyod / skabs der bkra shis bya'o// de nyid yang dag spyod pa yis// rnal 'byor pa ni kun nas
127b5(rgyud 'grel): bodag/ ji ltar bde bar brjod por bya// sgyu ma lta bur mdzes pa yis// gnyis spyong kun 'khyud sogs sbyor ba// lus can don du yang dag spyad// dngos po bral la phyag 'tshalo// de nas lha dang phyogs skyong la gnang pa
127b6(rgyud 'grel): nod pa dang / bzod par gsol ba byas te/ badz+ra sa tras bzod gsol byas te/ badz+ra muHzhes pas gshegs su gsol// dam tshig gi lha snying gar bsdus la// oM pad+ma ko shi hUM/ zhes bsdu'o// oM bodz+ra du pye grah+Na
128a1(rgyud 'grel): sa kya la ma smra gag sa sa// sa gas sa ga shAn tu zam sngags mal soms pam na
128a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la btang ste/ b+hi skror brten la btang ngo // khyim pa'i lhag ma ni khyim pa de nyid kyi myi ma yon pa la bsngo'o// lhag ma de lta bur skal ba med pa la// slob dpon gyi kha nas bdud rtsir byas
128a3(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin no// de nis yin bdag dang 'kho rA l+ya bka shis da smon la mi gdab po// de nas gtor skyel de log pa dang / tshogs kyi khyad sgor me long dang dung bud pa dkrol/ chu canA gyi zan nr-i/
128a4(rgyud 'grel): mched/ de nas nang du leg nas rnal 'byor po mo la yang de bzhin mchod pa bya'o// ma 'ongs skye ba'i tshogs rnams bsags par 'dod pa dang / bslab pa'i lam la zhugaso pa'i rnal 'byor
128a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ don du dri med lung dag bla ma'i man ngag ltar/ ma nor bzung ste bodag dang gzhan la phan phyir bris pa yin// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad po
128a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so//
129a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa slob dpon dpal rdo rje'i blos mdzad pa bzhug so//
129b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya garA skad du/ kr-iny+dza ya mA ri a b+hi sa ma ya kra ma/ bod skad du/ ga shin rje gsheng nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gsheng la phyag
129b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// gus pas bla ma dang ni gshin rje ga shad nag rdo rje ni// nyid mtshungs dang 'dus bde bse yongs gang gzhan gyi don 'jug pa// rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo chu skyes gri gug thod pa phyag na bsdams// zhol
129b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa la 'jig pa sel mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo// dus dgra nag po sgrub pa nyid// gang zhig 'dod nas de nyid rig/ dbang bskur la sogs thob pa dag/ de yaM bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di// byin pas
129b4(rgyud 'grel): bde bar rtogs phyir dang // mtshungs pa rnams kyis dran phyir dang // gong ma byis pa'i tshig dag la// mugu ba bskyed phyir bri bar bya// sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs ldan// sems can don dga' blo
129b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan// byamos pa la sogs yon tan rdzogs// dang dang thos pas rnam brgyan pas// dang por gdong la sogaso bkru ba// snying rje'i bdag nyid sngon du bya// dben pa'i gnas su brtsam bya ste// dur
129b6(rgyud 'grel): khong le sogaso bde gnas la// 'dug nas snying gar pad+ma dang // shin tu 'ong gisal zla ba blta// ya yig sngon po 'od mdzes pa// sems can 'bor pa'i don byed blta// namakha'i khams ni kun gang ba'i
130a1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dang ni rdzogs sangs bsgom// lus kyi bkod pa byas nas ni// de rnams dmigs nas phyag kyang bya// tsar tsi ka sogs kyis mchod pa// byas la sdig pa bshags pa'ang bya// lus dang
130a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag dang yid kyis sdig/ bgyis dang bgyid du stsal pa dang // gang yang rjes su yi rang pa// de ni mgon la dus gsum bshags// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras// 'phags pa rnams kyis bsags pa
130a3(rgyud 'grel): yi/ bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang // dam pa'i chos dang tshegs mchog bcas// rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi// yon tan rgya mtsho khyed rnams la// bdag gis lus ni dbul bar bgyis// dam
130a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos kun ston mdzad pa'i// sgra yis mdzes pas khyed bzhugs gsol// yang dag rdzogs sangs sras bcas pa'i// sbyin pa la sogs ngo bo la// sku gsum ye shes thob bya'i phyir// rab tu dga' bas
130a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bgyi// sems can don phyir yang dag rdzogs// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// dge ba yang dag gang bsags po// byang chub tu ni bsngo bar bgyi// dpal ldan gshin rdzogashed gyur nas// bdag
130a6(rgyud 'grel): gis 'gro la phan bgyi'o zhes// smon lam de ltar btab nas ni// de nas blo yis gshegs su gsol// snying rjes cho ga bzhin bltas nas// sna tshogs stong par rnam par bsam// ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir//
130b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu nyid kyi ni mtshan ma mang // rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir// smon pa nyid kyang rnam par spangs// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba swAt+ma ko haM/ sems de brtan par byas nas ni// raM l+yas byung ba'i nyi ma la// hUM las
130b2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i mdog sngon po// 'od zer 'phro bas kun bskor ba'o// rdo rje kun nas rtse lnga pa// bsrung ba'i don du besgom par bya// rdo rje sa yi dkyil 'khor dang // ra bu gur yang de bzhin no// sangs rgyas zhing na rnam sbyang/
130b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir yang dag bsgom pa yang brtsami bya// de la sna tshogs pad zla bas// rdo rje bzang po'i lus byung ba'i// chos 'byung dkar po grub gsum pa'i// nang du sna tshogs pad rdo rje// gyen 'greng mkha' mnyam bsgom
130b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de nang du ni dkyil 'khor yang // bruM yiga'i 'khor lo las byung ba'i// rtag pa'i yan lag las byung ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yos mdzes par brgyan// do shal se mo do yis mdzes
130b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dA no rtse mo sna tshogs pa// rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bur ldan// sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par mnan// zla ba nyi ma rgyal ba'i gdan// shar gyi phyogs ni dkar po che// lho phyogs ser po yang dag ldan// nub kyi
130b6(rgyud 'grel): cha ni dmar pi sta// byang phyogs mar ka tau lta bu'o// dbang ldan sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba dbus kyi tsha ni bsgom par bya// 'di bzhin sna tshogs rdo rje dang / cig ngos stang g.yogs kyang bsgom bya// rnam pa lnga ni rnam
131a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang nyid de// rnam pa lnga yin gshin rje rnams// 'jigs byed sangs rgyas gzugs shes grags// de yi dbye ba
131a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya// sna tshogs gdun gyi lte ba la// pad+ma zla ba dbyangs yig zung // de las zla ba ka sogs pa// Da D+ha da d+ha ya la yang bsnan pa gnyis 'gyur las byung ba// zla ba dmar po bsgom par bya// 'di dag yongasu
131a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa ni// me long lta bu'i ye shes brjod// de dag gcig gyur mnyam pa nyid// der skyes hUM ni so sor rtog/ bya ba nan tan ldan ye shes// de las skyes pa'i rdo rje'o// nyi ma'i mdangs ldan nor bu 'dra// sa bon dang
131a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas 'od zer 'khrug/ oM badz+ra At+ma kro haM/ zhes bya bas nga rgyal bya'o// de las skya rengs dang po'i mdog can thub pa'i tshogs kyis mdzes pa nyid mtshungs kyis 'khyud sku// sgeg dang khro bo'i gzugs can bde ba mchog
131a5(rgyud 'grel): gi rang bzhin dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa 'obar ba'i ral gri rdo rje gri gug gsor mdzad cing // 'khor lo chu skyes snod ni 'od zer 'bri ba g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams//
131a6(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings ye shes ngo bo ni// rdo rje 'chang gi bdag nyid gang // rnam pa lnga yi ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor zhes ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni rnal 'byor ro// 'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba yi// 'gro ba gsum la gzigs
131b1(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // rang snying ye shes 'od 'phro bas// sna tshogs sangs rgyas gzugs su bya// dga' bde dam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// rang gi lus la mnyam par gzhug/ kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yi// ljongs spyod rdzogs
131b2(rgyud 'grel): par bdag nyid bsgom// de ltar sngags mchog yi ge gsum// dmur po ho gnyis kyis brten pa// ji ltar skar mnga' 'phro ba bzhin// byang chub sems ni de nas gzhug// snying rje chags pa'i sems nyid kyis// rdo rje
131b3(rgyud 'grel): 'chang nyid rang yang zhu// tsa raM tsi ke sogs byams sogs pos// 'khor lo'i gtso bo skul bar byed// snying rjes khros pa'i ngang sgrol bzhengs// khams gsum kun gyi gau ta mug sol// dang sgrol rtsol med sa bzhugs
131b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs// bdud 'di dag las rgyal bar mdzod// 'jig rten mgon pos stong nyid ci ste bzhugaso// ngang sgrol 'jig rten bsod nams kyis bzhengs shig sa byang chub 'dod po'i 'jig rten mgron bos nas// ji ltar
131b5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid ni sems par byed// bskul nas du ba der thim par// de la rje su chags par gyur// de lce'i gru yi ngo nyid du// de la rgud pa ltar bsams nas// khu ba'i gzugs ni yongs gyur te// yaM sngon nyim
131b6(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba// khro bo sngon po 'phro bar bcas// rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rwa rnon 'bar zhing spu ser skya// rmig pas borko zhing 'jigs sbyin pa'i// ma he yi ni rgyab gnas pa'i// rdo rje sngon pa 'od da
132a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas// sa byon bcas pa de'i 'od kyis// ma 'ongs las ngag 'jigs byas nas// bdag nyid la ni yang dag zhugs// 'jigs pa chen po'ang 'jigs byed pa// mA he'i rdo rje
132a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam bsgoms nas// dkyil 'khor gtso bo bsgom par bya// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdud dkyil 'khor// 'od zer drag po spros pas skrong // drag po mun 'dra gzugs drag po// lce 'dril po la 'od 'byin pa/
132a3(rgyud 'grel): sme ra smin ma mgo skyes ser// g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// gshin rje dran pa med par byed// rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po ste// g.yas pa zla bA'i 'ong 'ang ba// g.yon pa khrag dang 'dra bar bshad// rdo rje'i rgyan
132a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis rnam par brgyano// thung zhigasus pa 'phyeng la sbom// mgo ba'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyang // g.yas dang g.yen gyi phyag dag la// thod pa dang ni gi gug bsnams// nying mtshungs shes rab kyis 'khyud cing /
132a5(rgyud 'grel): bde bdu 'joms 'jug gzhan ngor 'ded// g.yas pa'i phyag ni lhag ma la// rdo rje rol gri 'bar ba bsnams// 'khor lo chu skyes g.yon dag la// sbrul gyi dadang pos brgyan du byas// sbrul rgyal ster
132a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' bo yis// skra bcings shin tu 'jigs par byed// tok+Sha ka kra dmar po yis// rna cha gdung kor byas pas 'jigs// rigs ldan khra bo dpung rgyan to// dung skyong zhes bya'i klo nga mi// ser po leg pa'i gdu bu
132b1(rgyud 'grel): byas// pad+ma dkar pos do shal byas// kar ko Ta ni ljang khu ste// se ral ga ru byas pus mdzes// bdung rtsi'i mdog dang 'dra ba yi// nor rgyas bus ni ska rags byas// pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar mdog/ pad+ma chen po rkang
132b2(rgyud 'grel): gdub yin// kun kyang phuT sgra drug po sgrogs// lce gnyis 'che ba'i phreng ba can// de ltar 'khor pa mya dran 'das// gshin rje 'dul ba'i gzugs su shaus// rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i phyir// sdigs kyis yang
132b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag byin gyis brlabs// oM d+harma d+ha tu swa b+hA bya At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya ba ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro// rang snying sa bon 'od kyis bkug/ yang dag rdzogs sangs mkha'i khyab pa// kun tu kha nas gzhug par bya//
132b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba myong bas snying gar bcu// byas nas blo ldan khu ba de// rdo rje lam nas spro bar bya// nying mtshungs pad+ma'i nang du gnas// sa bon ngo bo ldan byas te// sa bon las byung 'khor lo mchog/ sa bon kun gyi
132b5(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs khwa/ me stag tshogs kyis gsal gyur pa// blo ldan cho ga bzhin du bsgomAM// dkyil du yaM sngonI las byung ba// bstan pa'i mtshan ldan 'khor lo can/ shar du k+She dang 'khor los byung // rtag pa
132b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug dkar po'o// g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri phyag/ g.yon ne rin chen chu skyes 'dzin// lho ru ma dpe rin chen las// byung ba rin chen 'byung ldan te// bcom gser gyi mdog 'dra ga/ g.yas na rin
133a1(rgyud 'grel): chen ral gri bsnams// phyag g.yon 'khor lo chu skyes so// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje can// me dang pad+ma lus byung ba// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog/ pad+ma ral gri rin chen dang // 'khor lo
133a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon phyag na dgod // de dang rel gri las byung ba// ljang gu phrag dog gshin rje gshed// g.yas na ral gi 'khor lo bsnams// mdzes pa ne r+ya byA pad+ma g.yon// khro bo'i gzugs rar thamus
133a3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang // zhe stong gshin rje mtshan nyid 'dra// de dge rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis la// gri gug dang ni thod pa bsam// rang gi shes rab lus ngag dang // bde ba'i ngo bor gnyis med gyur// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
133a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par gnon// rtag pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rtsibs kyi car gnas pa// sems can don mdzad bsgom par bya// shar sgor ya dang po ba las// byung ba sngon po'i gzugs can te// g.yas natho ba
133a5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri 'dzin// nor bu mchog dang pad+ma g.yon// tho ba'i sdang gshin gshed 'dra// tsI dang dbyug pa las byung lhor// dbyug pa gshin gsheng mdog dkar po'i// dbyug po ral gri pang 'khor lo//
133a6(rgyud 'grel): nub tu pad+ma gshin rje gshad // Ni las 'dod chags mthar byed 'dra// byang du ral gri gshin rje gshed // ra las phrag dag mthar byed mtshungs// chu skyes sngon po'i khyad par gyis// bsgyur ba lta chung la
133b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byin// kun kyang sbrul gyis rnam par brgyan// rnam 'jig dgod pas 'jigs byed pa// skra ni babar zhing gyen du 'greng // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas bya// ma t+ye bA gtsigs shing 'jigs pa'i zhal//
133b2(rgyud 'grel): gri gug thod pa 'dzin par mdzad// sna tshigs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru// dra bzhin lha mo zla ba gnas// sh+yar lhor dza dang 'khor lo las// lha mo rdo rje tsar tsi ka/ skam mo dkar mo cher khro ba// gti mug gshin rje
133b3(rgyud 'grel): gshing dang mtshungs// lce nub mtshams su s+ya dang ni// rdo rje las byung rdo rje pag/ khro zhing phag gi gdong pa can// zhe sdang gshin+da rje gsheng dang mtshungs// nub dang byang gi mtshangs su ni// rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs
133b4(rgyud 'grel): tsun ma// do las byung pa rab tu dam pa// 'dod chags gshin+da N+ye gshed dang mtshungs// byung shar mtshams su ru las ni// gau r-I ljang gu 'jigs byed mA// pra dog gshin+da rje gshad dang mtshungs//
133b5(rgyud 'grel): sngon po'i g.yas pa dkar po ste// dkar po'i g.yas pa sngon po yin// de dag zhal g.yon dmar po'o// gzhan gyi sngo dang dkar ba'o// mtsham so bzhir Na ye ni rA las// dkyil 'khor mtshams su thong
133b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// ji ltar rang rang sngags bstan pa// bskyed la blo ldan gyis spro bya// hrIHSh+T+r-i la sogs sngags sgra yis// dkyil 'khor bdag po bskul bar bya// sprul pa dpag med spros byas la// sems can don
134a1(rgyud 'grel): ni mchog byas nas// rnam pa kun gyis rang lus la// khro bo dpa' bo gzhug par bya// shar du dzi na dzaMka ces pas// rmongs pas rmongs pa mthar byed pa// rtsibs rtsa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang
134a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la ni de bzhin gzhag/ rat+na d+h+r-ikra tses bya ba yis lho rtsibs rtsa bar pad nyi la// phra ma zhes bya bkug nas nI// cho ga bzhin du gzhag par bya// A ro lika ces pa sngags kyis// 'dod chags gashrin rje 'jigs byed
134a3(rgyud 'grel): las nub tu pad+ma nyi mu la// cho ga yis ni rnam par bsami// nga nyid padz+nyA d+hoka tsas pas// phrag dog neg po 'jigs byed pa// bying du pad+ma 'od rno la// cho ga bzhin du gzhag par bya// mung ga ra d+h+r-ika da nyid kyis// shar
134a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo pad+ma nyi ma la// tho ba mthar byed 'jigs byed pa// mkhas pas cho ge bzhin du bsam// daN DA d+h+r-ika gi sngags kyis ni// lho yi phyogs sgor gnas pa yi// dbyig pa gdul dka' gshin rje'i dgra/ sna tshogs
134a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyi mar dgod// pad+ma d+hakaM ces bya ba 'dis// pad+ma gA shin+da rje gcod byed pa// nub sgor pad+ma nyi ma l+ya// stobs tshan khro bo bsgomo par bya// khaT+Ta d+h+r-ikaM gri de nyid kyis// ral gri gshin rje zung byed pa// byang du pad+ma
134a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma la// bdud tshar gcod pa bsam par bya// sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru// 'di ltar lha mo mchog bzhi bsgom// shar lho mtshams kyi lha mo ni// skam mo khro la 'od bzang ma// mo ha ra ti'i sngags kyis ni
134b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+ma zla bar gnas// de yi nub tu rigs mchog ma// rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba// de Sha ra ti'i sngags kyis ni// pad+ma zla bar mkhas pas dgod// de yi byang gi mtsham su ni// rA ga ra ti'i gsang sngags kyis
134b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma zla bar dbyings can dgod// de yi shar du gau rI ma// pad zla ra badz+ra ra ti yis// phyag 'tshal bas ni 'di dag brgyan// dkyil 'khor phyi yo mtshams bzhi ro// de nyid gsum gyi thod pa ste// de ltar dkyil 'khor
134b3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa spro// bong ba dang bcas bstan par bya// 'khor lo snga ma der thim par// mnyam par gzhag pas blta bar bya// 'di ni shin tu rnal 'byor ro// nag po gshin rje 'jigs byed kyi// dkyil 'khor pa yi ngo bo
134b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ lus dang mig sogs lha rnams kyis// mngon par byin gyis brlab par bya// 'khor lo kl-i las gti mag motshungs// cang zhig khro ba mig la ste// rdo rje mig gi mkhas pas bsgom// rnam par dza dang rdo rje las
134b5(rgyud 'grel): nag po rdo rje dang mtshungs pa// sna la khaM dang rin chen las// pra ma dang mtshungs zlo bA la// lce la gaM dang pad+ma las// pad+ma ri bong can la bsam// 'dod chags dang mtshungs kaM ral gri/ pad+ma ri bong can bzhugs sku//
134b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phrag dag gshin gsheng mi tshungs// lus shes bya ba dpral ba la'o// sa dang rdo rjes lte nga'i steng// rdo rje 'ching 'dra rdo rje'i thugs// sgeg deng khro bo'i gzugs can no// yan lag drug la dgod pa'o/
135a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes don ni sgrub phyir bshad// snying garar+ya hUM dang rdo rje las// grwa shin rje 'joms pa'i thugs rdo rje// mdog dang mtshon char yang dag ldan// mgrin par A dang pad+ma las// 'dod chags
135a2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed 'dra ba// ngag gi rdo rje bsam par bya// dgo bor aM dang 'khor lo las// sku yi 'khor lo 'dra ba lus// phyag dang sku mdog mtshon chas ldan// rdo rje sku mchog de nyid gsum// bskyed la na mkha'i dkyil
135a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchog la sngags kyis ni// byin gyis brlab pa dag kyang bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+taM badz+ra swa b+hA bo At+ma ko ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bIg+nadz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA gau ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba
135a4(rgyud 'grel): t+ma ko haM/ rang snyings bon 'od zer gyis// phyogs bzhugs sangs rgyas sras dang bcas// bkug nas mdun du lta bar bya// de dag las ni spros pa yi// zla 'dra tsar tsi ke sogs kyis// bzung ba'i bum pa dag gis ni
135a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag bkra shis glu la sogs// dar+ya drir dbyings kyang yod byas la// bdag nyid dam ni gzhan dag kyang // dbang bskur ba ni bsam par bya// gshin rje gshed nag mgo la'o// bdag nyid mgo la rdo rje 'tshang // rang snying
135a6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon 'od zer gyis// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la// rang gi mdun du blta bar bya// khro bos bgegs rnams tsher bcang bsrung // yon chab zhabs bsil sogs phul la// oM mung ga ra dzaH'i sngags kyis
135b1(rgyud 'grel): dgug/ oM daN Da hUM zhes bya bas gzhug/ oM pad+ma dI zhes bya bas bcing // oM khaD+ga hoHzhes bya bas mnyes par bya'o// snying ga'i sa bon 'od kyis ni// sangs rgyas kun bkug zhal du gzhug/ snying gar zhu bar byas pa
