304b2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ dgug pa yi la de bzhin mda'// bskrad dang mnan pa dang po bzhin// mnan po'i rjes su 'brang ba yis// gsang pI ny+tsa ni rgya mtshor 'dod// las rnams de dag re re yang // 'phags tshogs mchod sbyin dang po
304b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ nyi ma gnyis par gtor ma sbyin// gsum pa bzlas pa rnam par 'bad// bzhi pa sbyin sreg tshang bar bya// lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor// drug pa bsam gtan rtse gcig bya// bdun pa las kyi lhag chang bskang //
304b4(rgyud 'grel): grangs kyi las la khyad par du/ las kyi gtsor ni gang bsgrub de'i// 'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi// las kyi bye brag 'di shes na// zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad lus bskyob// rgyas pus yon tan drug dang 'byor//
304b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi mos pa rnam bzhir bsgyur// dbye bas bsang sde brgyad dang 'byed// mnan pas dbang po drug 'ching byed// gzhon yang ji ltar de bzhin du/ sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la// dpyad na dngos grub mi 'grib ste// gol te
304b6(rgyud 'grel): yid gnyis za gyur te ma// bsam par 'gyur ram dad pa nyams// de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang // phyir bzlog 'gyur par gdon mi za// dad pa brtan par bsgrubs pas na// na mkha' med par gyur na yang // sngags kyi dngos grub med
305a1(rgyud 'grel): mi srid// lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i// rig sngags slu ba mi srid na// 'dod chags bral ba bshad pa yis// gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// don la
305a2(rgyud 'grel): the tshom med pa yi// mkhas pa lnga ni dngos grub nya// rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge baM// de la bsgrub pa'i dngos grub ring // man ngag dam pa bstan byas kyang // slob ma yid gnyis za gyur na// de la dngos grub ring bar bshad// bla mas man ngag sbas
305a3(rgyud 'grel): byas kyang // slob mi yid gnyis mi za zhing // bla ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes// gces spang byas na 'grub par nges// de yi phyir na sngags pa yis// rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir// bla ma mnyes par bya ba gces// bsnyen bkur byas pas nus mthu
305a4(rgyud 'grel): cho gsang sti brjod pas bar chung med// snron phulta ba byas pas ni/ rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur// rin chen gnyis la grub pa 'byung // dkon par gyur na bsngags pa brjod// bsngags no skyon 'byung 'gyur te// bsdogs pa dge ni
305a5(rgyud 'grel): byas na// ji ltar yod bzhin nor bu yang gi/ gang gis bsngags pa ma byas na// de la 'dod na mi ste ro// dang pa sangs rgyas dang pa chos// dang po dge 'dun dad pa ma// ngad pa bla ma dad pa pha// dngang pa lam tshon dang pa gru// dad pa yid bzhin nor bu ste//
305a6(rgyud 'grel): dadang pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid// dad pa bsod nams nor yin te// de yi phyir na sngags pa yis// rang sems dang pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzhan la gus pas mchog tu bkur rdzogs so// / de nas gzhan yang bshad
305b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsten pa ni// rus sbal po ma zhes bya ba// de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang // 'jim pa skam po nyid dang ni// de bzhin me yi khu ba dang // sgra snang gi ni rdzag dang ka'adi rnams rtag tu sbyar na nI// rang bzhin gyis
305b2(rgyud 'grel): nA nang meng cung // tshe ring dbang po rgyas pa dang // rtag tu lang tsho dar la bab// lha rnams kun gyi byin gyis s+ho// 'di la spyad par mi bya ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ ting 'dzin sngags kyis byin brlabs nas// las kyi rnam smin spyod par byed //
305b3(rgyud 'grel): ga pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// de bzhin cho ga bzhin du bsten// tshes gcig skya rengs shar ba ni// snod la ma reg rus sbal zho// drong ma yal bar btung ba 'am// yang na nyi ma'i spu gus btung // mar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la// 'od kyi
305b4(rgyud 'grel): lo ma btsal nas ni// de nyid nas ni bzung bar bya// zhag gsum chu yi char pa btang // lo ma de bcad bza' bar bya// yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // 'jim pa skam po sbyar nas ni// zhag gsum chu yi nang du sbrang // de blangs nas ni
305b5(rgyud 'grel): yang bskams nas// phye ma byi la'i sbar tshod re// ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas// sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya// me yi sdong po ser po ni// sa yi mar gyis dril nas ni// kha sbyor sbyor dang ldan byas nas// me chu sa yis btsir nas ni//
305b6(rgyud 'grel): btung ba 'am nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // lan tsha bral ba dag la ni// zhag gsum 'chi ba'i sgra brnyan rdzas// nam gyi dus la sngags pas blangs// cha gsum snod du nago gsum gzhag/ kha yi cha ni byug pa ste// dbus ma'i
306a1(rgyud 'grel): cha ni bdud rtsi nyid// rtsa ba'i cha ni dor pa ste// 'di rnams so sor bsten pa na// tha mal 'bras bu gsum gyi phye// byi la'i spar tshad de dang sbyar// ma sbyar na yang nyes pa med// tshogs par bsten nas bza' bar bya// re re bsten
306a2(rgyud 'grel): yang nyes pa myeng // dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshalo// de nas yang dag bshangad bya ba// bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// rdo rje rnams las
306a3(rgyud 'grel): byung ba yi// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis// lho phyogs rgya mtsho pha rgal nas// de nas gshin rje'i grong khyer ni// ga la po yis gnas su byon// mi bzang zhabs ni bcu drug gi/ lcags mkhare sgo myong bcu drug brdzis ye shes
306a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsi gcig mtshan ma yis// dbus kyi lcags mo khar chen po brdzis// de tshe bdud chen las rgyal nas// ha ha hrI ti sgra sgrogs pas// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa// gzing bzhin du ni rib smras pa// dpa' bo chen po ga~M lA tsaM// dpal
306a5(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa bdag gis bgyi// bdag cog srog la snying po rnams// tshul bzhin 'bul gyis dpa' bos bzhes// lha ma yin sde brgyad kyi srog gi yang snying phul ba ni// gshin rjes ya phul ma mos mya// srin pos ra phul
306a6(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin k+She/ mi yis na phul sa bdag swa// btsan gyi rtsa phul bdud kyis da// de rnams gcig tu dril ba ni/ bran du yang ni khas blangs so// gtan tshigs chen po de yi phyir// ye shes lha yis dgongs pa dang // bsnyen pa
306b1(rgyud 'grel): nyam 'og rab chud nas// lha yi bsnyen pa rab chung nas// sngon gyi thugs dam las mi 'da'// mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do// oM ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da yA/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT
306b2(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ de skad smras pa dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa// gshin rje'i pho nya la sogs kun// sgrol ba'i gling du byin gyis brlabs// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / 'khor bcas kun la bka' sgo bri/ lde
306b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyu dus kyi tha ma la// nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin ldan pa la// bka' bsgo ba yis las rnams tshul bzhin gyis// zhes byas dam bcas pa dang // mnan bzhin du mna' bor ro// gtam rgyud kyi rtogs pa rdzogs
306b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra b+hai ra pa pA Ni n+ya/ A pa na shud+d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag mtshan gyi rnam par dgu pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng+ge'i sgra la
306b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// ma rig pa gcod pas glo gug/ gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa 'joms byes rdo rje rtse gcig pa// dran pa'i nyon mongs pa 'jims par byed pas gtun shing // sred pa gcod par byed pas chu gro'o// lus ngag
306b6(rgyud 'grel): gr-i nyes pa 'joms pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o// phrag dog 'joms pas sta re'o// lta ba ngan pa 'joms pas mdung ngo // dbang gi las byed pas mda'o// 'gugs pas lcags kyu'o// las kyi sgrib pa 'joms par byed pas dbyug
307a1(rgyud 'grel): thobo// kha T+wAM gA ni byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid do// shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pas na 'khor lo// ye shes lnga ro mnyam par gyur pas bdag nyid rdo rje'o// mi shes pa'i sgrib pa 'joms pas rdo rje tho ba'o// ral gri'i dngos grub ster
307a2(rgyud 'grel): bas na ral gri'o// mchog tu dga' ba'i sgras sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul bas cad tI'u'o// bde ba chen po dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i thod pa'o// sgrib pa thams cad 'joms
307a3(rgyud 'grel): pas tshangs pa'i mgo bo// bdud las rgyal ba'i rang bzhin gyi phub po// sems can thams cad dang chos thams cad du rtog pa'i rang bzhin med pas rkang pa'o// yang dag pa'i ye shes 'ching bas zhags pa'o// 'jig
307a4(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum las rgya la bsna na gzhu'o// stong pa nyid kyis na rgyu ma'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dril bu'o// chos thams cad byed pa po nyid kyis lag pa'o// chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid kyis na dur khyod kyi ras
307a5(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad stong nyid kyis phub pa nyid kyis skyes bu gas la shing la gtsigs pa'o// chos thams cang 'od gsal ba nyid kyis na me thub po// dam tshig dag pa nyid kyis na thong pa btung bas bkang ba'o// bdud
307a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsdigs pa nyid kyi sdigs mdzub bo// sku gsung thugs rnams ro gcig pa nyid kyis 'phan lce gsum pa'o// chos thams cad 'od sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis na rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba ngan no// rmongs pa'i glang
307b1(rgyud 'grel): popo bral bas na// glang po'i pags pa'o// zhabs g.yab kyi gdan brgyad ni dngos grub chen po brgyad rnam par dag pa'o// mig sman ri lu/ ral gri gser 'gyur/ bcud len rkang byug/ sa 'og/ phyag rgya chen po'o// zhabs g.yon
307b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gdan ni bya rgod la sogs pa brgyad ni dbang phyug brgyad rnam par dag pa ste/ 'dod pa rmongs pa/ khro ba ser sna 'jigs pa gtsang sme/ ngo tsha ba 'phram/ khams gsum gyi mnga' bdag nyid kyis ma he'i gdong pa can no//
307b3(rgyud 'grel): rA gnyis kyis badren pa gnyis rnam par dag pa'o// mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa'o// u to pa ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ma la gro blos kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra ma hA
307b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hai ra pa swa d+ha na/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs chen po'i sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// mun nag lta bu'i sku 'dzin cing // nyi mo 'bum g+hi gzi brjid can/ gdug pa'i mtshon tshwa sna tshogs
307b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// bdud dgra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs bka' ni bsrung ba dang // gdug pa 'dul bar bya ba dang // thar pa thob par bye ba'i phyir// sgrub thabs 'di ni brtsam par bya// dur khrod dang ni chu bo'i 'grim+bu//
307b6(rgyud 'grel): shing gcig dang ni mtshan gcig sogs// dbang dang dgug sogs gnas der bya// dang por rang snying zla ba lo// rang gi sa bon bsam par bya// 'od zer bla ma rang lha rnams// gsol byos phyag 'tshal mchod sogs
308a1(rgyud 'grel): bya// tshangs pa'i bzhi yi bsam gtan ni// byams pas dgra zun mnyam por dmigs// snying rjes sdug bsngal bral bar bsgom// dga' bas tha ra pa thob par dga'// btang snyoms yal bar mi
308a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dor ro// de nas sbyong pa'i byang chub bsgom// ra ba dra ba sbyar bar bya// ma~M yi bu las skyes pa la// sems kyi sa bon bsam par bya// sna tshogs rdo rje bsam gtan bya// de steng hUM las gsal spros pas// bdud dang
308a3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs nI sel byed pa'i// rdo rje ra ba bla re ni// sngags 'di yis ni bsgom par bya// oM suM b+ha nI suM b+ha hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ha~MHb+ha gA bAna? bi byA rA dza hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i sa la
308a4(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' ni// b+ha ga'i dbyings su bsgom par bya// dbus su ya raM baM dang laM// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor ro// de steng sum las ri bo ste// bruM las gzugs kyi bdag po bsgom// de yongs gyur las gzhal
308a5(rgyud 'grel): med khang // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa la// dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang // ka ba brgyad kyis yang dag spras// phyi rol dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor// shing brgyad kyis kyang mdzes par byas// tshig pa
308a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni ma tshig pa// dum bur gyur dang ma gyur pa// 'jigs par byed dang 'jigs pa dang // btsang chen btsugs dang shing la sbyongs// ban+d+ha pu ta li la sogs// shing brgyad la ni gnas pa'o// srin po ro langs
308b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro tshogs// sha za'i gdong can brgyad po ni// bya rog 'ug pa tshogs kyis bskor// gzhal yas khang gi dbus su ni// dang po'i yi ge sogs pa la// zla bas brgyan pa'i chu skyes bsam// dbus su bzhi
308b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan pa bsam// de la ral grir gyur pa dang // ral gri lte bar de nyid bsam// de yongs gyur pas 'jam dpal bsam// gur kum mdog ni gzhon tshul can// ral
308b3(rgyud 'grel): gri g.yas la uta pa~M la g.yon// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab mdzes pa// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// de ltar byang chub lnga bskyed nas// ma las bskyed pa'i nyi ma ni// de yi snying gar bsgom par bya// de las
308b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phros phyogs bcu yi// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la// rig pa'i lha mo khro tshogs kun// spyan drangs nyi ma la bzhugs bsam// de nas 'jam dpal de nyid dang // de bzhin gshegs kun gcig tu gyur// 'od
308b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi gong bu de las ni// 'bar ba dpag tshad brgyad stong khyab// de gyur sems kyi sa bon las/ 'od zer lnga ldan khe dog nag/ 'od zer spo dang bsdu ba dang // de gyur rdo rje gdengs pa ni// kha dog nag por gyur par
308b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de las 'phros sangs rgyas dang // rgyal sras gtso bo la sogs kyis// namakha'i khams kun gang ba yin// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas bsam// sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas// slar byon/
309a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i gzugs la zhugs// rdo rje chen po yongs gyur nas// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs// ma he'i gdong can zhal dgu pa// phyag ni sum cu rtsa bzhi phug/ g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum
309a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad gnyis zhabs// phaT kyi sgra can gsus pa 'phyang // gyin btsugs phod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// stag gi pags pas slang dkris shing // klu brgyad kyis ni brgyan du byas// 'jigs pa'i dus kyi me ltar 'bar// ha ha zhes rgod
309a3(rgyud 'grel): ljags pa skyod cing // 'jigs pa'i khro gnyer me ltar 'bar// 'jigs pa'i spyan ni nyi shu bdun// tshangs pa brgya byin tshogs ze ba// rtsa zhal ma he'i gdong can khro// rwa yi bar na gnas pa'i zhal// dmar po 'jigs
309a4(rgyud 'grel): byed khrag 'dzag pa// steng zhal ser po cung zad khyo// ral pa zur phung lha dang ldan// gzhon nu'i chu lugs 'chang ba po// g.yas pa'i rwa la rten pa'i zhal// dang po mthing kha 'jigs par byed// gnyis pa mdog dmar khro
309a5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i zhal// gsum pa ser po cung zad khri// g.yon pa'i ra la brten pa'i zhal// dang po dkar po rmongs par byed// gnyis pa dud ka khro bo'i zhal// gsum pa nag po ljags 'dral ba// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis glang po
309a6(rgyud 'grel): che'i / pags pa brgyangs te 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa'i phyag gi rim pa bzhin// ka ra ta ri dang b+hi d+hi pa la dang // gtun shing chu gri ka na ya// sta re mdung dang mda' dang ni// lcags kyu dbyug tho kha T+wAM ga/ 'khor lo rdo rje
309b1(rgyud 'grel): tho ba dang // ral gri dang ni cang te'u 'dzin// g.yon pa'i phyag gis go rims bzhin// thod pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // phub chung rkang pa zhags pa dang // gzhu dang rgyu ma dril bu dang // lag pa mi lpags rtse gsum me yi
309b2(rgyud 'grel): thab// zod tshal sdigs mdzub pa dun rlung ras 'dzin// g.yas kyi zhabs kyis go rims bzhin// mi dang ma he glang bang dang // rnga mo khyi lug waM brgyad mnan// g.yon po'i zhabs kyis go rims bzhin// bya rgod 'a
309b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bya rog dang // seng ge khri dang bya rgod chen po dang // ne tso krung krung brgyad po mnan// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// rang gi snying gar bzhugs pa yi// snying
309b4(rgyud 'grel): la nyi ma'i lte ba la// 'od 'phros dgra mgon spyan drangs te// rdo rje bsdu bcings byas nas ni// gsang sngags 'di yang brjod par bya// oM e h+ye hau b+ha ga bAn/ yaM mAn+ta ka gats+tsha ya/ oM sa mA dzaHhUM/ mdun du byon par mos
309b5(rgyud 'grel): pas+yA ni// rang gi sngags btab mchod yon da // sgros dang me tog byug pa drod// mar me la sogs mchod bstod bya// oM yA mAn+ta kA ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha hU~M swA/ oM badz+ra d+hU b+he hU~M/ oM badz+ra pul+le hUM/
309b6(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra gan d+he hU~M/ oM badz+ra dI pe hUM/ oM badz+ra nai bi bye hUM/ snying po'i mjug la brtags la dbul// dzaHhUM ba~M hoHzhes brjod cing dgug cing gzhug la dbang
310a1(rgyud 'grel): du bya// gshin rje gshed po'i nga rgyal bya// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus dang de bzhin yid rnams la// sa snyi phyag na rdo rje dang // na mkha'i snying po spyan ras gzigs// sgrib kun sel dang kun tu bzang // ming gi yi ge pa bskyed/
310a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bsam// oM AHhUM/ rang snying sa bon las 'od 'phros// bde gshegs rnams ni spyan drangs mchod// bdud rtsi lnga gang bum pa yis// spyi bor blugs nas dbang bskur bya// rtsa bar snang mdzod phyag rgya che// oM sarba ta thA ga ta
310a3(rgyud 'grel): b+hi She ka sa b+hA bA At+ma kro haM/ yaM dang raM bskyed rlung me'i steng // thod pa a las bskyed pa yin// nang du bdud rtsi lngas gang ba// hUM zhes pas ni dag par bsamo// aHyis rtogs bya oM gyis 'bar// lus kyi dkyil 'khor mnyes par
310a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam// rdo rje lce yis 'jib par bsam// 'khor bcas 'khor lo 'dus pa yis// stong pa'i sgra brnyan tshul du bya// sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba ni// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lo// rtsa ba'i snying po nye snying bsam// dus bzhi yi ni sbyor
310a5(rgyud 'grel): yis// g.yeng ba med par bsam gtan bya// skabs su ston mo bza' bar bya// lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i rim pa'o// sngags pa gzhan la phan brtson pas// dbang dang dgug dang bsad pa dang / bskrad drang dbye dang rmongs la
310a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs// rgyud las byung ba bzhin du bya// de las 'dir ni drag po'i las// 'khor lo'i las dang sbyin sreg dang // bsam gtan gyi ni sbyor ba rnams// las 'di dag gis brtsam par bya// bla ma smod sogs dam tshig med// theg pa chen
310b1(rgyud 'grel): bopo smos pa dang // sngags kyi rgyud la 'phya ba dang // bsad dam bskrang dram rengs par byed// snying rje yis ni ngan song las// bzlog par bya ba gzhan las min// sngags pas sngon du bsnyen pa ni// bye ba bzlas nas las rnams brtsam// yang nu
310b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma thob nas bya// gzhon du byas na 'jig rten bcas// dkyil 'khor bris sku mdun du ni// dang por mchod pa byas nas ni// snang mdzad kyis ni lus la byug/ zhim pa'i chang ni btung bar bya// sgra bshig gcer bu bya nas ni//
310b3(rgyud 'grel): nam phyed Da ma ru dkrol bya/ brkyang bskum tshul du gnas nas kyang // lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis// ha ha zhes bgang rtse gcig pas// ma yengs pa yis gsang sngags bzlas// de nas 'jigs pa chen po skye// sngags pas 'jig
310b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// 'jigs par gyur na bar chad 'gyur// des na 'jigs par mi bya'o// dngos grub gang 'dod ces gsungs pa// yid la glang 'dod gsol ba gdab// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ mar gyi ngo la sngags pa yis//
310b5(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod ras ni blangs nas su// dag pUr bkrus te brkyang bar bya// sum pa'i sbyor bslu mtshams bcad nas// l-I yis rtogs pa'i lhag ma la// snang mdzad dur khrod thal ba dang // 'bras thug bcas par rung la byug/ brgyangs
310b6(rgyud 'grel): nas mdun du bzhags nas ni// sgra bshig gcer bur byung nas su// lho phyogs su ni kha bltas la/ ma he'i gdong gi sbyor ba yis// ras dang sna gi tsha'i rdzas rnams la// lag pa reg nas gsang sngags ni// 'bum phrag gnyis
311a1(rgyud 'grel): su bzlas pa bya// nyi ma phyung nas bzung nas swA// 'khor lo bri ba brtsam par bya// bya rog sgro rtsa'i smyu gu yis// bcu drug rtsibs can gnyis byas te// g.yas dang gaman skur tshul gyis ni// sum cu gnyis dang bcu pas skor// bags/
311a2(rgyud 'grel): dgra'i sbyor bas de ltar bri// bdag las sprul pa'i khro bo yis// bsgrub bya lta dang phral nas ni// rnam shes bsdus la 'khor lor gzhug/ zhugs par gyur nas 'khor lo dril// thod pa gnyis kyi bar du bzhugs// shi ba'i sku
311a3(rgyud 'grel): yi skud pas dkri// ro bsreg sar ni bsreg shing gis// me sbar nas ni thod pa bsro// sngags pas bsgreng ste rkang g.yon gyis// mnan nas yi ge bcu pa bzlas// ro bsreg la sogs sa 'og gzhug/ rims kyis thebs nas
311a4(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na las 'di brtsam par bya// bsnyen pa la sogs sngar bzhin bya// dur khrod bzhi mdo shing gcig drung // sngags pas gnas nas las 'di bya// grogs mkhar chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa// snang mdzad mi
311a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod rus tshe dang // phub ma dur khrod sel ba la// bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan sor brkyang bye// snying ga lte ba gsang ba dang // lkog ma dang ni smin mtshams su// nang su yi phur bus gdab// tshogs rnams tsher ma rnon pos
311a6(rgyud 'grel): ngagang // thong pa gnyis kyi dbus su bzhug/ gnas bdun grogs mkhar sa dur khrod thal ba dang // gshin rje'i skyes bu khru gang tsam la zhal gcig pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa phyag gnyis ral gri sdigs mdzub zhags// gcer bu
311b1(rgyud 'grel): skra gral de yi thugs kar thod pa gzhug/ mar gyi brgyang dang bcu pa'i yo// ra sregs dur khrad sa dag la// kha sbub bzlog la lho ru kha bstan 'phreng nyal ba zhag/ khyim du 'ongs nas khros nas yi ge bcu pa bzlas// zhag gsum gyis ni 'cha
311b2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// phyung nas 'o mas bkrus nA 'tsho// 'khor lo rim pa phye ba'o// las dri byed pa'i dus su ni// bsam gtan gyis ni 'di ltar bya// 'khor lo med kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gang la bya ba'i bsgrub bya ste// ra las
311b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du// skra bshig gcer bu byas nas ni// til mar gyis ni lus bskus nas// 'dar zhing mdun na 'dug par bsam// lus las sprul pa'i khro bo yis// bsgrub bya bcad cing bcom nas ni/

311b5(rgyud 'grel): rjerdoyis ni zos par bsam// gzhan yang srin po sna tshogs dang // kang ka bya rog 'ag pa stag dang seng ge wa dang khI// de rnams kyis kyang zlos par bsam// bstod pa sna tshogs byas nus su// tshigs gis kyang ni 'di sbyad
311b6(rgyud 'grel): bgo// dkon mchog gsum la smod pa dang // dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog po// dam tshig 'jig par byed pa dang // spyi bo yongs la 'tshe ba 'di// ngan song gsum du nges par 'gro// thugs rjes sgrol ba'i dus la bab// ngan song
312a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang // nad dang gnod pa'i sdug bsngal gyis// tshe 'di nyid la thal bar mdzod// bsam gtan gyi rim par phye ba'o// bla ma'i zhal gyi bka' drin gyis// 'di byas bsod nams gang thob pa// 'gro rnams
312a2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed lta bu// 'khor ba las ni thar par shog/ slob dpon dz+nyA na ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// da 'an khyod kyi bstod pa dzugs so// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra b+hai ri bsdus ti/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs
312a3(rgyud 'grel): byed kyi bstod pa// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM 'jam dpal mkha' las byung ba'i gser mdog can// 'jam dpal thugs la chos kun rang bzhin gsal// 'jam dpal gsung gi dbang phyug
312a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal ba'i dbyangs// 'jam dpral bdog ni re ba'i sems kyis 'dud// thugs mchog 'jam pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // thugs rjes gdug pa 'dul phyir gshin rje'i gshed// 'jigs byed chen po 'jigs pa'i skur bstan
312a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ mi bzang dus mtha'i bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// zhal gdungs khro gnyer smin ma glog ltar 'gyu/ spyan bgrang mche ba gtsigs shing rab tu 'bar// rdo rje'i rtswa gang drag b+h+yo ha hAr bzhad// mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i pho skad gnam du
312a6(rgyud 'grel): 'don// khros pa'i stabs chen bstabs pas khams gsum gnon// sdigs mdzub gnam du bsgrengs shang lho chen 'dul// ljags 'dril tshems chen gtsigs shing khrag gis spyos// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zhal du gtso
312b1(rgyud 'grel): klung can+da ka rgyun thod pa'i phreng bzhags// gcer rigs byed dpung phyug chen po'i tshul// 'jigs byud ma r+g+ha dz+nyAs pa'i zhal gdangs shing // sbrul dgu 'bar bas srid pa zang par d+ha // 'gra dzA s+thA tshugs 'dul ba'i byug+sa d+hA 'bar/ 2
312b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi gnon pa'i zhabs ni bskyang bskum gnas// 'jigs byeng chen po'i sku la rtag tu 'dong // dbu dgu 'bor ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// g.yas kyi zhal gsum bgrad pa ni// mthing khA dmar dang ser bya'i zhal// g.yon gyi zhal gsum gdas
312b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// dkar dang dud kha gonag po'i zhal// dbus kyi zhalo gsum 'bar bya ni// khri dang tshigs dang zhi ba'i tshul// phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar ba las// g.yas kyi phyag mtshan bcu dag ni// rdegs cing 'joms pa'i mtshon cha gdengs// g.yon
312b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyag mtshan bcu drug ni// rol cing stob pa'i mtshan mas mdzes// brjid rngam zhabs kyi tsham ngam las// g.yas kyi zhabs brgyad bskum pa ni// dregs po'i lha brgyad thabs kyis 'dul// g.yon gyi zhabs brgyad brkyang ba ni// dregs pa'i
312b5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo brgyad la rol// 'dod chags chen po 'dul ba'i phyir// rtag tu ling ga rgyas pa'i tshul// drag po'i tshul gyis zhe sdang 'dul// 'dul sku khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// bdud dang gshin rje thabs kyis
312b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dul/ mo mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdung // dbang bsdud khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug 'tshal po'i dkyil 'khor nas// dbang medo dang paso 'dus pa dang // ye shes sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// 'khor bcas khyod la phyag
313a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khar nas// ji lta ban+d+ha na sbrul gyur kyang // rnam dag dbyings lngas ma g.yos pa'i// mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tsham// rdzogs so// rgyu gar skad du/ pan+d+ha NA sto d+ha/ bod skad
313a2(rgyud 'grel): du/ de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM chos dbyings ma bcos mkhyen pa'i thugs// 'jam dpal rgyu yi byang sems sku// uta pal ral gri rab bsnams shing // zur phud lnga ldan gur kum mdog/ zla
313a3(rgyud 'grel): gangan la bzhugs ye shes kyi// sku mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lho// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bdud 'joms la// sangs rgyas sras bcas 'dren pa yis// 'jam dbyangs thugs khros hUM nag po// dngos grub khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje khros pa
313a4(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum sbyong // spro zhing bsdus pas ma ho'o zhal// lcogs 'dril pho gi 'brug sgra sgrogs// hrIHSh+T+rIH'i gsung 'jigs la phyag 'tshal// dbu dgu sum cu rtsa bzhi phyog/ bcu drug zhabs can dpa' bo che// mig sman bder 'dra'i sku mchog ni// 'jig
313a5(rgyud 'grel): dus me 'dra'i goshin rje gshed // gnag dang dmar dang ser zhal dbus// dkar dang dung mdog gnag zhal g.yon// sngo dang dmar dang ser zhal g.yas// zhal dgus srid gsum gsol ba po// gri gug rtse gcig gtun shing dang // chu gri rdo rje dgra sta
313a6(rgyud 'grel): mdung / mdar dang lcags kyu dbyug tho dang // kha T+wAM 'khor lo rdo rje dang // thod pa ral gri De ma ru// g.yas pa'i phyag na rnams pa'o// thod pa mgo bo phub dang rkang // zhags pa gzhu dang rgyu ma dang // dril bu lag pa dur ras dang // gsal shing phub dang
313b1(rgyud 'grel): me thab dang // ro snod sdig mdzub pa dan dang // rlung ras phyag g.yon bsnams pa'o// gnyis ni glang chen ko rlon gon// mi dang ma he grang dang ni// bod bu rnga mo khyi dang lug/ ce spyang g.yas kyi zhabs brgyad gnon// bya rgod 'ug pa bya rog dang // seng ge khra dang mgo bo dang /
313b2(rgyud 'grel): gas can bzhad bya brgyad po la// g.yon zhabs 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lho// mnyam nyid mi g.yo dur khrod rje// ltung ba'i lha gnyis sdig pa'i sku// sdig mdzub drang pos gdul dka' 'dul// go bzlog mnan nas rab tu gsol// ling ga langs shing rtog pa
313b3(rgyud 'grel): spangs// dpa' bo gnas na gnyis med rol// lha min kun sogs dbang pos btung // mun sel thugs kyi mngon gyur pa// rnam rtog gshin rje 'dre ba rnams// nyid rol pa yi rnam rtog gis// gar mkhan ral gri 'bar ba yis// gnyug ma'i gnas
313b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'god pa'o// 'jam dbyangs ye shes snying rje khro// e ma srid gsum gdug pa sel// pu la ma byams gshe ba ltar// btsos ma'i khro byad khyod la phyag 'tshal// de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so// / na mo badz+ra b+hai ra
313b5(rgyud 'grel): bA ya/ stong nyid las byung na mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs// 'jam dpal thugs rje 'khros pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed ni// dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor zhing garo dgu'i nyams dang ldan// khro rgyal dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// zhal dgu
313b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni sum cu rtsa bzhi zhabs bcu drug/ mthing nag mi thung gzugs can gcir bu ma he'i zhal// pheM dang ta ha hi hi drag po'i sgra dang ldan// mi 'gyur 'jam dpal 'de chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// drag po'i stobs kyis bdud bzhi
314a1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms mdzad gshin rje gshed// grub chen brgyad kyi dbugs 'byin skye med mchog sbyin mdzes// sems can re skong las mdzad byams pa thugs rje can// zag med bde rgyas mnyam mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
314a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du// shrI badz+ra b+hai ra bstu ti/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo// mi thung sgeg po sprin 'dra'i mdog/ 'od zer bye ba 'phro bas bzhengs// mtshan ma 'greng ba ma he'i zhal// gnyis med sbyor bas khyod
314a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mdzad// byol song ma lus thams cad kun// bcu drug zhabs kyi thams cad mnan// brgyad bskum zhabs ni brjid par gnas// stobs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// glang po'i bgras pa phyag gnyis 'dzin// g.yas kyi dang po gri gug ste// gnyis pa mtshom
314a4(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig pa 'dzin// gsum pa'i phyag gis gtun shing bsnams// bzhi pa chu gri bzang po 'dzin// lnga pa rdo rje rtse gcig bsnams// drug pa'i phyag gis sA raM 'dzin// bdun pa'i phyag gis mdung 'dzin te// brgyad pa'i phyag gis mngara' 'dzin to// dgu pa 'gugs
314a5(rgyud 'grel): drin lhag kyu 'dzin// bcu pa khyab 'jug dbyug tho bsnams// bcug cig rtog 'dzums kha Ta g+h+ra/ chos 'khor bskor ba bci gnyis pa// btsugasu ma ye shes rdo rje 'dzin// bcu pa'i brdung don thob bsnams// bco lnga dgra gsong ral gri 'dzin// bcu drug cang
314a6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyis meng baju do ma dzin pa phyog tshal brjid// g.yin myong bzang ba dzin// gsan gyi gnyim pam mi mgo ldas // gsus pa gas 'i lus to// na pa'i sgri phyi zhing ba yin// ma ming dad pags pa ra//
314b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu 'dzin thabs kyi don// bdun pa nyon mongs rgyu ma 'dzin// brgyad pa shes rab dril bu 'khrol// dgu brdeg don lag pa 'dzin// bcu pa bri don dur khrod bas// bcu gcig gsal shing nyon mongs 'bugs// bcu gnyis sgeg don me thab 'dzin// bcu gsum
314b2(rgyud 'grel): banA thong tshal 'dzin// bcu bzhi sdigs 'dzub bsngags par mdzad// bco lnga 'phan bsnams dug gsum 'joms// bsgrub bya rlung skur bcu drug ras// g.yon pas 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bstod// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi
314b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gdan// gzhal yas me dpungs dkyil na bzhugs// 'jigs mdzad sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rgya ched mgo bo'i ngo shol can// dbu rgyan thod pa lnga lngas brgyan// dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar// zhal dgu pa la phyag 'tshal bstod// spyan bzlog
314b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa bdun dmar// ljags 'dril zhal nas ha har bzhad// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// ma he'i zhal la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di ni bstod pa'i dam pa yin// rnal 'byor kun gyis rnyed dka' ba// 'od 'byung dad cing gus pasau zhus//
314b5(rgyud 'grel): don yod rdo rje mkhas pas byas// 'di byas pa yi dge ba yis// kun gyis 'jigs byed zhal mthong shog/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa/ pin+d+he ta dron yod rdo rjes mdzad rdzogs so// / pan+di ta
314b6(rgyud 'grel): nying dang / zhing ma ches shes rob bla mas po sbyar ba'o// rgyag po skad du/ ban+du shrI b+hai ra ba mastu te/ bong skong du/ 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo// a mas
315a1(rgyud 'grel): ho 'jigs byed 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rngam byed rgyal po 'jigs pa'i rol stabs can/ dur khrod gnas nas rol sku'i cha lugs ldan// tshangs chen khyab 'jug gzhon nu lha tshigs dang / dbang phyug theg zangs ris rnams ma lus
315a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal du gsol// khros mdzad rngam khro ru lu ru lu ste// thod pa dbu mar khrag bcas zhal du gsol// che phran mang po'i zar bus 'grin zhugs brgyan// glang po che'i pags pas na bza' can+da// zhal dgu khros gtsigs 'jam dpal chos kyi sku// ma he'i zhal 'dzin
315a3(rgyud 'grel): byol song skrag mdzad cing // ra mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'phro zhing // hUM dang chem dang sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// zhal nas ljags 'dril he he he he dza// ston ka'i char sprin gzhon nu 'jigs pa'i zhal// na mkha'i any+dza'i mdog 'dra sngon por snang // bad dang pad+ma rA ga'i
315a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog 'dra gnyis// gser bsregs dang mtshungs che ba'i yon tan ldan// she la dang dung 'dra zla ba zhi ba'i tshul// sre ya ka ltar dung kha rab tu drag/ rku ba bzhin khros byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// thod pa lnga bcu se ral khar bsnams pa// rkang tshil khrag dang
315a5(rgyud 'grel): zhag bcas glo snying gsol// sri ka duSh+TAn hu na ma ra na// shAn ti puSh+Ti ma hA ma ra dza/ las rnams ma lus rdzogs pas mthar phyin pas// sems can khams rnams ma lus kun don mdzad// gri khug la sogs rdzogs pa'i mtshan mar ldan// dbu
315a6(rgyud 'grel): mgo chen po'i tshogs ni gyen du bsgreng // yan lag rags pa'i lho ni thur du bshal// dzA dzA kaM kaM hUM hUM ha la ha/ ha ha ya ya ma ma ra ro zhes// tsa tsha las rnams ma lus kun mdzad pa// slob dpon skur dang de'i dkor khyer dang / kun la gnod byed dam
315b1(rgyud 'grel): paskur pa dang // dam tshig dag la mi gnas sgrol bar byed// rdo rje thong dbyig 'jigs pa'i sgra dang ldan// mi dang ma he la sogs de bzhin bya rag 'ug/ bya rog zhabs kyis gnon pa'i ku tsar bzhugs// ha la 'grin bzang mar khu chen po gsol// a shwang la sogs
315b2(rgyud 'grel): shing dbus dgyes par gsol// spyang ki kang ka 'bar ba ce spyang dang // bya rog khra dang ma hA ru lu ni// bdug pa can rnams ma lus sha za ba'i// tshogs kyi phyogs ni de bzhin sprin ltar gtibs// de 'dra'i dbus kyi gzhal yas khang pa na// tshul du bzhugs pas sems
315b3(rgyud 'grel): can 'gro don mdzad// rol mdzad thugs rjes sbrul la phyag 'tshal lo// bdug pa zhal du gsol la phyag 'tshal lo// las rnams mthar phyin mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// khro tshogs 'jigs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// ud la sngo 'dra'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo//
315b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma brgya yi gzi ldan phyag 'tshal lo// 'ga' zhig mtshan ni 'dzin cing bstod pa dang // de yi yon tan phyogs tsam gzung nas kyang // yid la gnas kyi gzhan du mi smra na// dngos grub gter zhing las rnams ma lus 'gugs// 'jam dpal 'jigs byed
315b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gyi bstod pa// slob dpon las kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
316a1(rgyud 'grel): da gzhin du na gapa da kyir tu ltung jug/
316b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ya mAn+ta ka badz+ra pra b+he da nA ma mU la man tAr+tha/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje gshed po'i rtsa ba'i sngags don rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba/ dpal 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam rgyal khro bo'i gsang sngag
316b2(rgyud 'grel): gang \u0f7f rgyud gzhan kun tu sbas byas shing // ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// rgya mtsho d+ha dang rdo rje ltar// brtag dang 'dar dka' yi phyed pa// ded dpon nyi ma bcud len bzhi no// 'dren sel rnam par sbyong ba'o// dri ri'i grong dang sangs rgyas bzhin// sgo dang byin rlabs mtha'
316b3(rgyud 'grel): yas pa// ji ltar na mkha' lding gi rigs// gcig kyang skye ba'i bye brag gis// rigs kyi bye brag rnam pa bzhi// de dag nang gi dbye ba yis// stong phrag nyi shu gcig la sogs// mtha' yas bshad pa ji lta bar// rtsa ba'i snying po la sogs pa'i// gsang
316b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags gang yin rigs gcig kyang // yi ge bsdu dang gtor ba dang // de bzhin rab tu gtor ba dang // yan lag so sor phye ba yis// sngags don sgro bzhir shes par bya// sngags don de dag re re yang // rnam grangs sgo zhes bya ba yis// sgo mtha' yas par gyur
316b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba'i// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mkhyen pa las// nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes na// 'jig rten pa yis smos ci dgos// 'di ltar sngags don mtha' yas shing // byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab kyang // thub pa bdag nyid
316b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po yis// gang gi don du gang sbyar ba'i// gleng bzhi'i dbang du mdzad pa bzhin// gang gis de ltar sbyar byas pa// de la de yi dngos grub dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis myur bar gsungs// de phyir rgyal ba'i bstan pa la// bdud rnams 'dul bar byer pa yi// khro bo'i mchog
317a1(rgyud 'grel): ni gshin rje gshed // las rnams grub par byed pa la// 'khor lo'i sbyor ba rnams kyi mchog/ sngags kyi nang na rtsa ba ste// khro bo nyid yin mnyes byed cing // de yi bka' bzhin grub byed pa'o// / gsang sdug
317a2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge sum cu gnyis// bcu bdun yin te lngar yang shes// 'di dag rab tu gtor tshul bshad// ya/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed // sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje thugs// ye shes rab tu mi g.yo ba// gzung 'dzin rnam shes dag pa'o// k+SheHzhing khams rnam
317a3(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa na// tshogs mchog gnyis las grub pa'i sku// mchog tu snang bas snang mdzad de// lus dang gnas gzugs dag pa'o// maHsa chen gter gyi 'byung khungs bzhin// yon tan zad med gter rgyur bas// rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ste// longs
317a4(rgyud 'grel): spyo tshor ba rnam dag pa'o// me/ lhun po bzhin du brtan pa yi// chos mchog mi g.yo brnyes pa yang // chos 'od dpag med ston mdzad de// tha snyad 'du shes dag pa'o// da/ sbyin dang snyan smra la sogs pa// 'gro don spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bde gshegs
317a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad don grub pa ste// 'du byed dag pa'i bdag nyid do// dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba kun// thugs sogs chos kyi bdag nyid de// de phyir mi bskyod rdo rje sogs// rgyal ba rnam pa lngar 'dod do// ya/ gzung dang 'dzin pa spong byed pa'i// ye shes zung
317a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin pa ste// lta dman spong ba'i dran pa ni// bde gshegs kun kyang 'gug par byed// ts+tshaNadapyod pa rnam par bral ba yi// ye shes shes rab mthar 'byin yin// yang dag spong ba'i brtson 'grus ni// rgyal ba 'ang sems can don du 'jug/
317b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ nges chog brjod pa mthar yas pa// brjod pa bral ba pad mthar 'byin// rdzu 'phrul ting 'dzin mi g.yo ba// rgyal ba'ang sems can don du 'ching // ra/ rdul bral rnam par mi rtog pa'i// ye shes bgegs mthar 'byin pa ste// dang sogs dbang du gyur pa ni
317b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'ang sems can dbang du byed// byang chub phyogs chos rang bzhin ni// thar pa'i grong khyer sgo yin te// sgrib pa spong ba'i ye shes ni// khro bo sgo skyong zhes bshad do// dzaH'gro 'dzin shes bya stong nyid sa// byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid// gzigs pa rnam
317b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag spyod yul phyir// sangs rgyas spyan zhes brjod pa yin// saHsems can kun du sdud byed pa// snying rjes brlan pa chu yi khams// 'gro ba bdag gir byed pas na// rgyal ba'i yul mchog mA ma kI// do nyes pa sel byed shes rab me// dga' ba chen po'i
317b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid de// dri ma kun nas dag po'i phyir// gos dkar mo zhes 'dod pa yin// ru pa khro dang chags pa gnyis med pa'i// btang snyoms ye shes chags med rlung // 'gro ba gnas nas 'don pa'i thabs// sgrol ma zhes su rnam par bshad// stong pa nyid dang
317b5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje dang // shes rab dang ni thabs rnams las// rgyal ba 'byung phyir spyod yul phyir// 'gro ba skyob phyir yul du 'dod// nar sna tshogs rnam par spras pa'i gzugs// phyag rgya'i mchod pa bla med pa// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// rgyal ba mnyes byed
317b6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'o// yo/ gang zhig rab tu gangangs stan gru// sgra yi mchod pa blo med de// bstan pa dam pa'i dngos nyid chos// mchod pa rgyal ba mnyes par byed// ni dri med rnam par dag pa'i dri// tshul khrims dag pa'i bdag nyid de// bla med dri yi mchod pa 'dis
318a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed/ ra8 khu ba bcud len ro yi mchog/ ting 'dzin rab tu mi g.yo ba// bde gshegs mdzad pa'i bdag nyid do// rgyal ba mnyes byed dam pa'o// gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i bdag nyid ni// byang chub sems
318a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'dod pa'i mchog/ longs spyod mchod pa'i rang bzhin 'di// bud med gzugs su rnam par brtags// lus dang gnas dang longs spyod las// sgrib pa kun du 'byung bas na// 'di dag tsam gyi zag bcas kyi// chos kun yongasu bsdus par 'dod// de dag nyid las bzlog
318a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos// 'bras bu dang ni don dam dang // lam dang bstan pa dam pa yis// zag pa med chos bsdus pa yin// gtso bo yum dang mchod pa dang // de bzhin sgo skyong bcas pa yis// zag bcas zag med dbyer med pa'i// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus// gang
318a4(rgyud 'grel): zhig yi ge 'phreng ba'i don// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bdag nyid du// bsgom dang bzlas la rtson byed pa// myur du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rgyud de/ ya ni rdo rje gshin rje dgra'o// k+She ni rdo rje zhing ngo // ma ni rdo rje sa'o// mi ni rdo rje lhun
318a5(rgyud 'grel): po'o// da ni rdo rje sbyin pa'o// ya ni rdo rje zung ngo // ts+tsha rdo rje dpyod pa'o// ni ni rdo rje nges tshig go// rA ni rdo rje rdul bral lo// dzA ni rdo rje 'gro 'dzin no// sa ni rdo rje kun sdud do// do ni rdo rje nyis sel lo// ru ni rdo rje gnas med do// na ni rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs so// yo ni
318a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gdangs so// ni ni rdo rje dri med do// ra ni rdo rje ror// de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rgyad de// rdo rje gshin rje'i dgra ni zhing dag pa'i rang bzhin no// rdo rje'i zhing ni zhing dag pa'i gzugs so// rdo rje sa ni zhing dag pa'i yon tan gyi bdag
318b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // rdo rje lhun zan zhing dag pa'anas sa// sbyin pa ni zhing dag par dbyang ba la// rdo rje zung mo sgo dag pa'i dang nga ste// 'dug pa dang 'byung ba'i skar// rdo rje byung ba ni sgo dag pa gnyis pa ste// gtong ba dang len pa'i wAr// rdo rje ngas chog ni sgo dag
318b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa ste// dpyod pa dang brtson pa'i sgra'o// rdo rje rdul bral ni sgo dag pa'i ba'i ba ste// sbyong ba dang sbyor ba'i sgo'o// rdo rje 'gro 'dzin ni gnas dag pa'i bzhi'o// rdo rje kun sdang ni gnas dag pa'i bla gab bo// rdo rje nges tshig ni sgo dag pa'i gdan no// rdo rje gnas
318b3(rgyud 'grel): med ni gnas dag po'i snang ba'o// rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs ni longs spyod dang po ste// rab tu spro ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs so// rdo rje gdangs ni longs spyod dag pa gnyis pa ste// rab tu spro ba'i dbyangs dang tshig dag go// rdo rje dri med ni long sa spyod
318b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa gsum pa ste// rab tu spro ba'i dri sna tshogs so// rdo rje ra ni longs spyod dag pa bzhi pa ste// rab tu spro ba'i ro sna tshogs so// de la ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag gi rgyud de// rdo rje gshin rje'i dgra ni lus dang snying ga'i gnas byon
318b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlob pa ste// nag po dang rdo rje ni kha dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje'i zhing ni 'tshogs ma byin gyis rlob pa ste/ dkar po dang 'khor lo ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje'i sa ni lte ba'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste// ser po dang rin po che ni kha dog
318b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje lhun po ni mgrin pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste// dmar po dang pad+mar ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje sbyin pa ni rkang pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste/ ljang gu dang ral gri ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje zung ni lag pa g.yas
319a1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis rlob pa ste// dkar po dang thob mo kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje dpyod pa ni lag pa g.yon byin gyis rlob pa ste// sngon po dang dbyug pa ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje ngas tshig no kha byin gyis rlob pa ste// dmar po dang pad+ma ni kha dog dang ma na
319a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// rdo rje rdul ni gsang ba'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste// ljang gu dang ral gri ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje 'gro 'dzin ni 'tshogs ma'i gnas su g.yas phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste/ dkar mo dang 'khor lo ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje kun sdud ni lte
319a3(rgyud 'grel): nga'i gnas su g.yon phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste// mthing ka dang rdo rje ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje nyes sel ni mgrin pa'i gnas su g.yon phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste/ dmar mo dang pad+ma ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje gnas med ni rkang pa'i gnas
319a4(rgyud 'grel): su g.yon phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste// ljang gu dang ut+pa la ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs ni mig byin gyis rlob pa ste// dkar mo dang me long ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje dngas ni rna ba byin gyis rlob pa ste// dmar mo dang gling bu ni kha
319a5(rgyud 'grel): dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje dri med ni sna byin gyis rlob pa ste// mthing ga dang spos phor ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// rdo rje ro ni lce byin gyis rlob pa ste// ljang gu dang ro snod ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyis gsang sngags kyi rgyud de/
319a6(rgyud 'grel): ya rdo rje gshin rje dgra'i sa bon no// oM badz+ra ya mA ri rdo rje gshin rje dgra'i gsang sngags so// k+She rdo rje ring gi sa bon no// oM badz+ra k+She tra rdo rje zhing gi gsang sngags so// ma rdo rje sa'i sa bon no// oM badz+ra ma hI na dri// rdo rje sa'i gsang sngags so// me rdo rje
319b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan po'i sa bon no// oM 'ja ma ru/ rdo rje ldan pa'i gsang sngags so// dA rdo rje sbyin pa'i sa bon no// oM badz+ra dA na/ rdo rje sbyin pa'i gsang sngags so// ya rdo rje rung gi sa ban na/ oM badz+ra ya ma rdo rje zung gi gsang sngags so// ts+tsha rdo rje dpyod pa'i sa bon no// a
319b2(rgyud 'grel): tsar tsa na rdo rje dpyod pa'i gsang sngags so// ni rdo rje nges tshig gi sa bon no// oM badz+rA ni rug ti rdo rje nges tshig gi gsang sngags so// rwa rdo rje rdul bral gyi sa bon no// oM badz+ra rA rdo rje rdul thal gyi gsang sngags so// dza rdo rje 'gro 'dzin gyi sa bon no// oM badz+ra dza
319b3(rgyud 'grel): g+ha d+ha ra rdo rje 'gro 'dzin gyi gsang sngags so// sa rdo rje kun sdud kyi sa bon no// oM badz+ra sang ha ra ni// rdordo rje kun sdud kyi gsang sngags so// rdo rje nyel sel gyi sa bon no// oM badz+ra dor nying // rdo rje nyes sel gyi gsang sngags so// ru rdo rje gnas med
319b4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon no// oM badz+ra ru ni la rdo rje gnas med kyi gsang sngags so// Na rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs kyi sa bon no// oM badz+ra Na na ru pa/ rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs kyi gsang sngags so// yo rdo rje gdangs kyi sa bon no// oM badz+ra yo ya ge yaM rdo rje gdangs kyi gsang
319b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags so// ni rdo rje dri med kyi sa bon no// oM badz+ra ni ra ma la rdo rje dri med kyi gsang sngags so// ra rdo rje ro'i sa bon no// oM badz+ra rA sa rdo rje ro'i gsang sngags so// gsang sngags kyi yi ge tshig 'di dag la brten nas// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
319b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag rnams legs par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// de ni yi ge rab gtor ba// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// de nas yi ge gtor ba yi// sbyor ba tshul bzhin bshad par bya// gsang sngags yi ge sum cu
320a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis// bsdu ba bcu bdun dag tu shes/ gdug pa 'dul ba'i las rnams la// gtor ba 'di ni bshad par bya// dang po ra ya zhes gang gsungs pa// gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed// k+ShiM zhes bya bas dgra rnams kuni//
320a2(rgyud 'grel): zad par byed par gdon mi za// ma zhes bya bas de bzhin du// de dag myur du gsod par byed// me zhes bya ba'i ri bo yis// kun nas gnon par byed par bshad// da zhes bya ba 'joms pa ste// lus dang yan lag ma rungs byed// de nas phyi rol bshad bya ste//
320a3(rgyud 'grel): ya zhes bya bas de bzhin du// 'jigs cing rnam par g.yeng bar byed// ts+tsha zhes bya bas pags pa nas// snying gi mthar yang za bar byed// ni zhes bya bas lhag ma rnams// cung zad lus par mi byed do// ra zhes bya bas gzugs rnams kun// rdul
320a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du ni bsnyil bar byed// dza zhes bya bas dbang po rnams// rmugs par byed par gdon mi za// sa zhes bya bas yi dgras bzhin// 'khor nas 'khyim par byed pa yin// do zhes bya bas bzang po yang // dman pa dag tu byed par 'gyur// ru zhes
320a5(rgyud 'grel): bya bas khrag rnams kun// sbu gu'i gnas nas rmongs par 'gyur// na zhes bya bas thams cad du// rnam par 'dren par byed par bshad// yo zhes bya bas las dag la// kun nas sbyor bar byed pa'o// ni zhes bya bas de bzhin du// dbang po nyams
320a6(rgyud 'grel): byar byed pa skye// ra zhes bya ba dran pa'i gnas// bral bar byed par bshad pa'o// sgrub par byed pas tshul bzhin du// rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog bsgoms te// gsang sngag/ sa yi ge bcu bdun 'di// tshul bzhin sbyor ba gang shes pa// de ni ring po
320b1(rgyud 'grel): mi thogs par// gdug pa 'dul ba gdon mi ba// gzhan yang gsang sngags yi go ni// dpag bsam shing dang nor bu bzhin// dgos pa thams cad sgrub byeng do// skra dang yid la byed pa yi// rjes su mthun par 'gro ba yin// ya zhes bya bas 'gugs pa dang //
320b2(rgyud 'grel): bskrad dang dbye ba sogs kyang byed// k+She zhes bya bas bsrung ba dang // gtong dang 'khrug pa'i las kyang byed// ma zhes bya bas rmongs pa dang // bskyed dang shes pa'i las kyang byed// me zhes bya bas bdag nyid la// gang dag dgos pa de sbyor byed// nga zhes bya bas
320b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang // sbyin dang 'dul ba'i las kyang byed// ya zhes bya bas de bzhin du// gang dag bstan pa de sbyor byed// ts+tsha zhes bya bas g.yo ba dang // 'gro 'ong spyod pa'i las kyang byed// ni zhes bya bas 'gog pa dang // ma lus gdon mi za bar byed// ra zhes
320b4(rgyud 'grel): bya bas dga' ba dang // chags dang grags la sogs pa'ang byed// dza zhes bya bas mig 'phrul dang // bskyeng dang / bsgyur ba la sogs byed// sa zhes bya bas bde ba dang rdzogs dang sdud pa'i las kyang byed// do zhes bya bas ring 'gro zhing // / sman la sbyor
320b5(rgyud 'grel): dang sel bar byed// ru zhes bya ba khro ba dang // chags dang kun nas sgra sgrogs byed// nA zhes bya ba thob byed cing // mthong dang 'dod ba 'dren par byed// yo zhes bya ba gang dang ga dr-I// rigs pa kon la sbyor bar byed// ni zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin//
320b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa la sogs sbyor bar byed// ra zhes bya ba de bzhin du// 'ga' dang chags la sogs pa byed/ sgra yi rjes su zhugs pa yis// las rnams gang dang gang byed pa// yi ge gtor ba'i tshul gyis ni// de dag mngor bsdus bshad pa yin//
321a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas bshad par bya ba nisakun nas bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i// gsang sngags sbyor ba'i tshul gang yin// mdor bsdus 'dir ni bshad par bya// thog mar brjod pa'i yi ge ni// ya ma rA zhes gang gsungs pa// yi dgas bdag po bod pa ste//
321a2(rgyud 'grel): las la skul bar byed pa'o// dzA sa zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// rmugs shing 'phrul dang 'khor ba ste// rgyas btab nas ni rmongs 'gyur ba'o// de nyid myur du bskul ba ni// do me ya zhes brjod pa ste// gshin rje dgra yi gsang sngags 'dis// 'bad nas bskul
321a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa ste// rgyas 'debs rnams kyis rgyas btab nas// yi dgas bzhin du 'khyams par 'gyur// gsang sngags tshig rkang dang po 'di// 'gro ba rgyas 'debs dam pa'o// gnyis pa dag tu brjod pa'i sngags// ya me do zhes bya gang gsung
321a4(rgyud 'grel): pa// ma gdon bdag po bod pa ste// las la bskul bar byed par bshad// ru Ni zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// lus kyi gnas rnams thams cad kyi// sbu gu'i gnas rnams thams cad nas// khrag kun yongasu 'dren par bshad// de nyid myur
321a5(rgyud 'grel): du skul byed pa// yo da ya zhes brjod pa ste// gang zhig gshin rje gshed kyi sngags// 'bad nas zlos par byed pa des// ma gdon bzhin du 'gro kun gyi// khrag rnams 'dren par gdon mi za// gsang sngags tshig rkang gnyis pa 'dis//
321a6(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'dren rnams kyis khrag drangs nas// rmongs par bya ba la sbyor ba// gshin rje gshed kyi bka' yis so// gsum pa dag tu gsungs pa yi// ya nga yo zhes gang brjod pa// 'joms byed bdag po bod pa ste// las la skul bar
321b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// ni ra zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// dbang po ga thams cad du// nus pa nyams shing 'gog pa yis// dran pa bral bar byed pa ste// de nyid myur bar bskul ba ni// yak+She ya zhes brjod pa ste// gang zhig gshin rje gsheng po'i sngags// 'bod nas/
321b2(rgyud 'grel): zlos par byed pa des// 'joms byed rnams kyis bcom nas ni// brgyal bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// gsang sngags tshig rkang gsum pa 'dis// shin tu rmongs par byas par 'gyur// bzhi pa dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags// yak+She ya zhes gang
321b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa// za byer bdag po bod pa ste// las la skul bar byed par bshad// ts+tsha ni zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// pags pa mig dang snying gi mthar// bzhi pa dang myang dang bza' ba yis// lhag ma cung zad ma lus byed// de nyid myur du skul pa
321b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rA ma ya zhes brjod pa ste// gang zhig gshin rje gsheng po'i sngags// 'bad nas zlos par byed pa des// gdug pa za bar bya ba la// zla byed rnams kyi za bar 'gyur// gsang sngags tshig rkang bzhi pa 'dis// 'dug pa za ba'i mchog tu bshad//
321b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa dag la gnod byed pa'i// gdug pa tshar gtsad bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni// gsang sngags tshul bzhin gang zlos pa// de yis gdug pa 'jigs pa la// gsang sngags bsdu ba bshad pa'o// gzhan yung rgyal
321b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bstan pa la// kun nas ngang ba'i 'gro ba rnams// de las phan gdags bsgrub pa'i phyir// yi ge bsdu ba tshul bzhin be shang // gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis// tshul bzhin bang ba bkod pa la// gang dang gang du ya dang ni// ni zhes
322a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i yi ge dag/ gsal nas lhag ma brjod byas nas// 'gro la phan 'dogs byed par bshang// ma ra dza zhes gang smos pa// mchi ba dag las gso bar bshad// sa do me zhes smos pa ni// de la de nyid sbyin byed pa'o//
322a2(rgyud 'grel): dang por brjod pa'i gsang sngags 'dis// 'gro la srog sbyin byed pa'o// gnyis par brjod pa'i gsang sngags gang / me do ru zhes smos pa dag/ bdag la nyes par brjod pa la// gang dang gang ni med byed pa// na yo da zhes brjod pa ste// gas
322a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags gnyis pa 'di yis ni// grags pa nyams pa gso bar byed// gsum pa dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags// da yo ra k+She zhes brjod pas// gang dag ji snyed yod pa yi// nor rnams kun tu srung byed pa'o// gsum par gyur pa'i gsang
322a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis// longs spyod nyams pa gso bar byed// bzhi par gyur pa'i gsang sngags gang // k+She tsu ra ma zhes brjod pa// dga' ba'i spyod yul phun gsum tshogs// yongasu srung bar byed pa ste// gsang sngags bzhi par gyur pa 'dis// dga' ba
322a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul thams cad lo// spyod par rang dbang thob pa ste// rgyal po chom kun me la sogs// 'jigs pa dag las thar bar gyur// dad ldan sems can bsrung ba'i phyir// gsang sngags bsdu ba bshad pa'o// de dag tsam gyis rtsa ba yi// sngags
322a6(rgyud 'grel): don kun nas bsdu ba bshad// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yan lag so sor phye ba yi// sngags don cung zad bshad par bya// gsang sngags kun gyi thog ma ru// phyag 'tshal yi ge gang bzhag pa// a ni 'dod nas skye ba med// u ni byang chub
322b1(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed pa// de dag zung du 'byor pa yis// oM ni cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i sgo// a ni mngon par rdzogs byang chub/ da bas yi ge oM zhes bya// bkra shis phun sum chags pa'i phyir// phyag 'tshal yi ge zhes bya ste// gsang sngags gang
322b2(rgyud 'grel): dag brjod pa yi// thog mar yi ge 'di bzhag na// rab tu bsngags zhes bshad pa yin// tha mar phyag 'tshal brjod pa las// ha ni mi phyed rdo rje ste// u ni byang chub sems bskyed pa// oM ni mngon par rdzogs byang chub// de phyir yi ge hUM zhes pa// thug
322b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje brtan byed pa'o// gzhan yang bkra shis yi ge ni// sa ni yang dag mnyam pa nyid// ba ni sgra ston yid 'ong ba// a nI skye ba med pa'o// ha ni sdig pa sreg pa lA// a ni bzhin skye ba med// de phyir swA hA zhes bya ba// bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa ste/
322b4(rgyud 'grel): swA zhes bya ba swa tri ka/ hA zhes bya ba ro tu ha// bkra shis bzhi tshugs shes brjod pa'o// de phyir sngags rnams thams cad kyi// mjug tu tshig 'di bsngags pa yin// de la sogs pa'i sngags tshig la// yi ge yan lag gang ldan pa// de dag bye
322b5(rgyud 'grel): brag rnams phye ste// chos don lha dang las rnams ngag/ bye brag so sor sbyar byas nas// yan lag so sor phye ba yi// sngags don bshad pa zhes bya'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i cho ga'i rgyud de// thog ma nyid du/
322b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du// 'thung ba chen po bzhi'i sa bon du gyur pa// yaM ma raM dzi zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhi// byang dang shar dang // lho dang nub rnams su rim pa bzhin du sngon po dang ser po dang // dmar po dang // dkar po'i
323a1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dang ldan pa// 'od dang ldan pa bsam par bya'o// de nas yi ge maM de las oM badz+ra me s+pha ra Na// zhes bya bas bskul bas// yi ge maM de las// ye shes kyi rdo rje byung nas// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste// 'gro ba
323a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi ma rim pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang // phyi rol dang / nang gi sa thams cad la phog pas// de dag dri ma thams cad yongs su dag par bya ste/ dbyer med par gyur nas// ye shes kyis rdo rje de nyid
323a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / dbyer med par gyur te/ rdo rje de nyid kyang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas yi ge dze de las oM badz+ra dze sa pa ra Na zhes bskul bas// yi ge dzaM de las ye shes kyi chu byung nas// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig
323a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang / bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / phyi rol dang nang gi chu thams cad la phog pas/ dri ma thams cad dag par byas te/ ye shes kyi chu dang dbyer med par gyur te/ ye shes kyi chu de yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur
323a5(rgyud 'grel): to// de nas yi ge raM de las oM badz+ra raM s+pha ra Na/ zhes bya bas bskul bas ri de las ye shes kyi me byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab s+ho/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i zho sdang dang bcas pa'i rnam par
323a6(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa dang phyi rol dang nang gi me thams cad la phog pas/ dri ma thams cad dag par byas te/ ye shes kyi me dang dbyer med par gyur nas/ ye shes me de yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas yi ge yaM de las oM badz+ra yo s+pha ra Na zhes bskul bas
323b1(rgyud 'grel): de las ye shes kyi rlung byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phrag dog dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / phyi rol dang nang gi rlung thams cad la phog pas dri thams
323b2(rgyud 'grel): cad dag par byas te ye shes kyi rlung dang dbyer med par gyur nas/ ye shes kyi rlung de yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas dri ma thams cad yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid/ bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud kyis dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ ye shes rang
323b3(rgyud 'grel): rig pa tsam rgyu ma lta bu chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid du ro gcig par gyur pa ji ltar nus pa de tsam du bsgom par bya'o// de nas snying rje chen po'i sems skyes pas// de ma thag tu byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig
323b4(rgyud 'grel): tu gyur to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de yang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bzhin du dbus sa'i cha dgu dang ldan pa/ gru bzhi sgo dang ldan pa'i phyi rol khor yug kun nas zlum pa/ 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba dang ldan pa dang / dbus kyi cha la yi ge ya
323b5(rgyud 'grel): kha dog mthing ba/ 'od zer gyi 'phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o// shar phyogs kyi tsha la yi ge k+She kha dog dkar po 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o// lho phyogs kyi cha la yi ge ma kha dog ser po 'od zer
323b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi cha la yi ge me kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi cha yi ge nga kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam

324a3(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dkar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no// lho nub tu yi ge yo kha dog mthing ga 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no// nub byang du yi ge ni kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no// byang shar du yi ge ra kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no// 'od zer gyi phreng ba brgyad
324a4(rgyud 'grel): bo de dag kyang / dang po rang rang 'dra ba'i 'od zer las phyi rol zla ba'i 'od zer lta bur gyur pa'o// shar gyi sgor yaM ge ya kha dog dkar po// lho phyogs kyi sgor yi ge tsa kha dog mthing ga/ nub phyogs kyi sgor yi ge ni kha dog dmar po// byang phyogs kyi sgor yi
324a5(rgyud 'grel): rA kha dog ljang gu de dag kyang 'od zer gyi phreng ba can sha stag ste// 'od zer gyi phreng ba de dag kyang dang po rang rang gi 'od zer las phyi rol me'i 'od lta bur gyur pa'o// de ltar ji ltar nus pa zhig bsam pa byas nas// de nas yi ge ya la dmigs te// oM
324a6(rgyud 'grel): 'adz+ra ya mA ri zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ ya las ya'i 'od zer byung nas/ na mkha' khams thams cad du gang bar gyur to// yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po'i sku sha stag tu gyur te/ na mkha'i khams yongs su gang
324b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam mo// de nas sku de dag thams cad 'ong du gyur pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi rang bzhin chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya shel lta bur dkar zhing dngas pa/ gru gsum pa gyen du gnas pa/ nang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa/
324b2(rgyud 'grel): namakha'i khams dang mnyam pa zhig tu gyur par bya'o// sna tshogs rdo rje las kyang ye shes kyi rlung gi phung po chen por gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brten par nus so// de nas yi ge kle las dmigs te/ oM badz+ra kre tra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/
324b3(rgyud 'grel): kri las kye'i 'od zer byung nas/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya thams cad gang bar byas te/ yi ge de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yongs su gang bar byas so// de nas sku de dag kyang 'ong du bu
324b4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur pa las/ bdud rtsi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che pad+ma 'dab ma dang / ge sar dang snying por bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du bsam par bya'o// de nas yi ge ma la dmigs te/ oM badz+ra ma hIn+ni zhes bya ba
324b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ ma las ma'i 'od zer byung bas/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng thams cad yongs su gang bar byas so// de nas yi ge de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la 'dus par
324b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas/ 'od tu zhu bar gyur nas/ rin po che gser gyi rang bzhin du kun nas 'khrig par gyur par bya'o// de nas yi ge me la dmigs te/ oM badz+ra me ru/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas/ me las me'i 'od zer byung nas/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'a#
325a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi steng du yongasu gang bar byas so// de nas yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi sku sha stag tu gyur te/ pad+ma'i snying po gser gyi rang bzhin gyi gzhi la 'dus par gyur pas/ 'od du gyur nas rin po che sku bzhi las
325a2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i ri'i rgyal po lhun po rab tu brtan par gyur par bsam par bya'o// de nas yi ge nga la dmigs te/ oM badz+rad na zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ da las nga'i 'od 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun tu gang bar byas so// de nas yi ge de
325a3(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i sku sha stag tu gyur te/ de dag ri rab kyi rtse mor 'dus pa las/ 'od du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi longs spyod sna tshogs kyi bzhir gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste dpag bsam gyi shing dang / ljon pa'i shing dang
325a4(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang / gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o// gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUr+ya la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang /
325a5(rgyud 'grel): reg bya dang / gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o// bdud rtsi'i chu dang / btung ba'i chu dang / khrus kyi chu dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang / dri dang ro dang / yan lag dang / gnas pas/ khyad par du byas pa'o// gos dang rgyan dang / bza' ba'i
325a6(rgyud 'grel): bye brag dag kyang de bzhin du yon tan gyis khyad par du byas pa ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par bsam par bya'o// de nas yi ge dza la dmigs te/ oM badz+ra dza gad d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas
325b1(rgyud 'grel): dza las dza'i 'od zer byung ste/ phyogs kun du gang bar byas nas/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas spyan gyi sku sha stag tu gyur te/ slar 'dus nas 'ong du gyur pa las/ gzhal med khang gi gzhir gyur pa na/ 'di lta ste gzhi sna tshogs rdo rje las grub cing / phyogs kun du
325b2(rgyud 'grel): yang sna tshogs rdo rje ra ba dang / dra ba 'ang 'khrig par gyur pa de'i nang du/ rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las grub pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzhi grub par bsam mo// de nas yi ge sa la dmigs te/ oM badz+ra sang ha ra Ni/ zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ sa
325b3(rgyud 'grel): las sa'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun gang bar byas te/ de dag kyang mA ma kA'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ slar 'dus te 'od tu gyur pa las/ gzhal yas khang gi bla gab tu gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po tsho sna tshogs kyi gdung dang / phyam tshan dang /
325b4(rgyud 'grel): phya ma dgu po dang / phyam phran dang / len kan gyi dra ba dang / rten ma dang / gzer mig la sogs pa spras pa'i dbus na/ gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnas pa/ phyi rol rdo rje gur gyis yongs su khrigs par gtams pa'o// de nas yi ge
325b5(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs te/ oM badz+ra do ra hi ta zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ do las de'i 'od zer byung nas/ phyogs kun tu gang bar byas te/ de dag kyang na bza' dkar mo sha stag tu gyur nas/ slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las/ gzhal yas khang gi
325b6(rgyud 'grel): gdan du gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste pad+ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas yi ge ru la dmigs te/ oM badz+ra ru ni la zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ ru las ru'i 'od zer byung nas/ phyogs kun tu gang bar byas te/ de dag
326a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bskul bas/ ni lasA ni'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs thams cad du 'phros te/ de dag kyang dri'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ slar gzhal yas khang gi 'khor yug du 'dus te/ dri sna tshogs kyi mchod
326a2(rgyud 'grel): babyin gyis rlob par mdzad par gyur to// de nas yi ge ra la dmigs te/ oM badz+ra ras/ zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul pos/ ra las ri'i 'od zer byung nas/ phyogs thams cad du 'bros te/ de dag kyang ri'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i spru
326a3(rgyud 'grel): sdug du gyur te/ slar gzhal yas khang gi khor yug tu 'dus nas/ ro sna tshogs kyi mtshang ba byin gyis rlob par mdzad par gyur te// de dag rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bsgom pa bshing pa yin// de nas rdo rje'i
326a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi/ yan lag bsgom pa bshang par bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus gnas par// sa bon bcu bdun gyis gang ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa las// cung zad tsam zhig bltas nas ni// de nas 'od zer spros bya ste// phyogs bcu'i
326a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams kun tu/ rgyal ba kun dang de yi sras// rig sngags rgyal po rgyal mor bcas// yi ge 'od kyis spyan drangs nas// snga ma'i gnas su thim par gyur// de yis nyi ma sa bon bcas// nyi ma'i nor bu 'bar 'dra ba'i// ye shes 'od kyi gong bur
326a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ chos sku dag pa'i rang bzhin du// gnyis med ye shes brtan pa las// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskul ba dang // snying rje chen po'i mthas bslang nas// gshin rje gshed ni bzhengs pa bya// sku ni ri sngon 'dra ba 'am// yang na char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog/
326b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon rang dag gam stang zil bzhin du// yang na las kyi bye brag gis// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang nag/ zhal drug phyag dag zhabs kyang drug/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis bzhugs pa la// stag lpags rlon pa na bzar gsol// smin ma spyan dang sgra yang ser/ sen mo spu
326b2(rgyud 'grel): dang pags pa dang // lus kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can// 'bar zhing mtshan ma'ang rab 'bar ba khe con ral gri dkra rnams// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ste// ban+d+ha sdigs mdzub zhags pa ni// g.yon ma'i phyag na bsnams pa la// dpa' bo g.yas brkyang stabs
326b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni// ma he ro dang bcas pa brdzis// mi bzang 'bar ba'i skur gyur pa'o// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// g.yas pas mtshon cha be tsan gdengs// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin// gang dag phyag bzhi 'dod pa na// g.yas na be n+don ral
326b4(rgyud 'grel): gri ste// g.yon na ban d+ha nags pa rnams// 'di la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan ni// bcu gnyis dag gas bco brgyad ngam// yang na brgya dang stong dag dang // 'bum dang bye ba rdul stong du// ji ltar 'dod par bsgom par bya// ji ltar 'dod pa de nyid kyis/
326b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob par gdon mi za// de nas snying ga'i gnas dag la// sa bon bcu bdun gyis gang ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// 'dir yang gnas par lta bar bya// de nas sa bon yaM yig la// sngon bzhin gsang sngags kyis bskul bas//
326b6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i dgra ru gyur nas ni// slar 'dus thugs kyi rdo rjer gyur// sngon po rdo rje mtshon cha can// snying ga'i gnas phyogs nyid du ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs// de nas sa bon gyis gang ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyang //
327a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rje'i thugs kar gnas// da la gsang sngags na 'dar// oM badz+rA yA mA ra/ da nas g.yas ban da// sngam bzhin du sngags kyis bskul// rdo rje'i zhing du gyur nas ni// dkur ba 'khar ltar
327a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha can// mtshogs mar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// sku yi rdo rje bzhu gus par gyur// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra k+She ta de nas sa bon ma las ni// rang gi gsang sngags kyis bskul bas// rdo rje sa zhes bya bar gyur// gser 'dra
327a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen mtshan ma can// lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// mnyam pa'i rdo rje nyid du gyur// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra ma hIn+ti/ de nas me zhes bya ba la// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskal ba yis// rdo rje lhun po zhes byar bshad// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba
327a4(rgyud 'grel): la// me tog pad+ma'i mtshan ma can// 'gul par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// gsung gi rdo rje nyid du gyur// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra mA ra// de nas sa bon da zhes pa// de bzhin gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul// rdo rje sbyin pa zhes byar gyur//
327a5(rgyud 'grel): rin che marka ta 'dra ba la// ral gri 'bar ba'i mtshon cha can// rkang pa g.yas su nyi ma la// las kyi rdo rje nyid du gyur// de la sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra da na de nas dza la bltas nas ni// rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis// rdo rje 'gro 'dzin zhes
327a6(rgyud 'grel): byar gyur/ dkar mo 'khor lo'i mtshon cha can// rdo rje zhing gi g.yon phyogs su// zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni// rdo rje zhing la gzigs par mdzad// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra dzA gad d+ha re// de nas sa laM bltas byas te// de bzhin sngags
327b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskul ba yis// rdo rje kun sdud ces byar gyur/ bain+d+har rdo rje mtshan ma can// rdo rje sa yi g.yon phyogs su// zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni// rdo rjes gzigs par mdzad// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra sa hA ra Ni/ yi ge do la dmigs/
327b2(rgyud 'grel): byas te// de nyid gsang sngags kyis bskul bas// rdo rje nyis sel zhes byar gyur// dmar mo lag ni pad+ma can// rdo rje lhun po'i g.yon phyogs su// zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni// rdo rje lhun po la gzigs mdzad// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o//
327b3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra do ra hi ta/ yi ge ru la dmigs byas te// de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis// rdo rje gnas med ces bya ba// marka ta ut+pa lo shes rab mtshan// rdo rje sbyin pa'i g.yon phyogs su// zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni// rdo rje sbyin pa la gzigs
327b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra ru ni la// de nas na la dmigs byas te// rang gi sngags kyis bskul pa yis// rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs su gyur// dkar mo lag na me long can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdan la ni// mig gi gnas su
327b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra Na na rU pa// yi ge yo la dmigs byas te// ston bzhin gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul// lha mo rdo rje gdangs su gyur// dmar mo lag na pi wang 'dzin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par// /
327b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas rna ba'i gnas la bsam// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra yo ya ga ye// yi ge ni la dmigs nas ni// de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis// rdo rje dri med ces byar gyur// sngon mo lag na 'phreng ba 'dzin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
328a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par// rtswa yi gnas la dasam par bya// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra ni ma la tsa// de nas ral dmigs nas ni// rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis// rdo rje ra zhes bya bar gyur// ljang gu ro ldan zas snod can// mkhas pas lha yi/
328a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas la bsam de la/ sang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra rA sa/ de nas yi ge ya la dmigs// sngags kyis bskul bas de bzhin du// rdo rje zung du gyur nas ni// dkar po rdo rje tho ba can// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// dpung pa g.yas pa'i gnas la
328a3(rgyud 'grel): dgod// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra ya ma/ de bzhin tsa la dmigs nas ni// rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis// rdo rje dpyod pa zhes bya ba// sngon po lag na dbyugs pa can// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// dpung pa g.yon pa'i gnas la
328a4(rgyud 'grel): dgod // de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra tsA ra tsa na// de nas yi ge ni la dmigs byas te// de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis// rdo rje nges tshigs ces bya ba// dmar mo lag na pad+ma can// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// mkhas pas rkan la
328a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra ni ru ka ti// yi ge ra la dmigs byas te// de bzhin gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul// rdo rje rdul bral zhes bya ba// ljang gu lag na ral gri can// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// gsang ba'i gnas
328a6(rgyud 'grel): la bsam par bya// de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra rA dza/ de ltar dkyil 'khor bsgom byas nas// ci nus gsal bar blta bar bya// de nas snying rje chen po yis// gdug pa 'dul phyir khros nas ni// tsa ba'i gsang sngags lan gsum mam
328b1(rgyud 'grel): bdun nam nyi shu gcig brjod pas// khro bo 'bar ba'i ye shes las// 'od zer yi ge mtshon cha dang / rab 'bar sku yang 'phros nas ni// de tshe sangs rgyas zhing yang g.yos// gdug pa'i tshogs kun bcom nas ni// sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang yan lag mgo yi dum bu dang // ro dang
328b2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag nyams pa'i ro// mtshon chas phug pa'i khrag bcas pa// kun nas sprin bzhin 'dus par gyur// de nas sangs rgyas zhing 'di yang // mi bzang dur khrod chen por gyur// shin du rus pa 'bu dang rnag/ khrag dang zhag dang glad pa dang // gsar dang rnying dang tshig pa dang // dri
328b3(rgyud 'grel): yang phyogs su ldang bar gyur// keng rus dag las me yang 'bar// 'bu dang skang mang po dang // kang ka rgod dang bya rog dang // shal dga' ba'i 'dab chags kun// kun nas za zhing 'thab par byed// seng ge stag dang wa dang khyi/ sha la dga' ba'i srog chags kun// de bzhin
328b4(rgyud 'grel): za zhing 'thab par byed// 'byung po yi dgas sha za'i tshogs// ma mo srin mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// kun nas 'du zhing 'tsho bar byed// de nas sprul pa'i tshogs chen kun// sangs rgyas kun dang 'dres gyur nas/ gshin rje gshed la thim par gyur// de nas khro bo gshin
328b5(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed// lus ni ri rab lta bu'i tshad// sku las khro tshogs rngam pa'i tshogs// rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin 'phro zhing 'du// pho nya mngag gzhug mngag gzhug ma// mgyogs shing rab tu mi bsrun pa// go cha sra zhing mtshon cha sno// sde tshogs dpung gis kun nas
328b6(rgyud 'grel): bskor// 'di ltar gang zhig sgom byed pa// do ni gshin rje gshed po dang // mtshungs par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de la gshin rje gsheng po nyid// dgyes nas dngos grub gsol bar byed// de la lha 'am bdud kyi rigs// kun gyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro//
329a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud gshin rje mang pa dang / sa ma sring ma ma pa' 'gro ma// sgrag nas thal mo sbyar byas te// de yi mngag gzug byud par 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na gang gnas pa'i// 'byung po thams cad bran bzhin 'gyur// 'don chu
329a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor lo bsgom pa rgyas pa'o// de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi// cho ga kun nas bsdus pa bshad// nyi ma yi ge ra las bskyed// yi ge ya yis mtshan byas pas// 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba ni// thog mar rang gi snying gar bsam// ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang
329a3(rgyud 'grel): me ni rab tu 'phro ba dag/ rdo rje lta bu'i rlung ldang ba// 'jig rten yongs su khyab par ni// mkhas pas rab tu spro bar bya// 'jig rten rab tu bsregs nas ni// rdo rje rung gis gtor byas pas// chos kun na mkha' lta bu yi// bdag nyid du ni gyur par bya// sngags pas de tshe
329a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa ni// chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa na mkha' bzhin// ming dang mtshan ma bral ba ni// blo gros brtan pas bsgom par bya// de nas snying rje las byung ba// snga ma'i gnas bzhin bsgom bya ba// nyi ma yi ge ya yis mtshan// mkhas
329a5(rgyud 'grel): pas gsal bar bsgom par bya// de nyid yongs su gyur pa las// gshin rje gshed du gyur par bya// zhal dang phyag sogs sngon bzhi bzhin te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo med kyang rung // gdan tsam la ni bsgom par bya// yang na sku dang lhan cig tu// mkhas
329a6(rgyud 'grel): pas rdzogs par bskyed par bya// rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa bzhin// gdan la yi ge 'am mtshan ma rnams// gnyis gnyis dag gam gsum las kyang // bskyed kyang nyes par mi 'gyur te// dngos grub 'bras bu mtshungs par 'gyur//
329b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag zhal kha dog mtshon cha sogs// mang dang nyung dang tha dad dang // de bzhin go rims 'khrugs pa yang // dngos grub 'bras bu mtshungs par bshad// 'on kyang bag med le lo yis// bka' bzhin byas par ma gyur na// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu yis ni// dngos
329b2(rgyud 'grel): grub nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de dag tsam gyis rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i cho ga rnams// rgyas dang bsdus pa'i tshul gyis ni// legs par phye ste bshad zin to// de nas las rnams sna tshogs dag/ mkhas pas bsgrub par bya ba la// dkyil
329b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dag dang mi ldan zhing // ri mo la sogs cho ga dang // brtul zhugs drag po med kyang rung // legs par bsgom dang bzlas pa dang // sbyin sreg 'khor lo'i sbyor ba la// sogs pa'i sbyor ba phra mo la// brten nas mchod la brtson pa yis// las rnams
329b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs grub 'gyur ba// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags gang / rgyud gzhan dag tu sbas byas pa// gshin rje gshed po mnyes byed cing // thugs yin thugs las phyung ste// 'di ni bklag pa tsam gyis
329b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang / phra mo'i gdon rnams skrag byed na// gang zhig bzlas brjod brtson pa yis// gdug pa gdul ba la sogs pa'i// las rnams grub pa smos ci dgos// de bas sngags kyi bzlas brjod kyi// cho ga tshul bzhin bshad par bya// thog mar rdo rje'i dkyil
329b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dag/ snga ma bzhin du bskum byas nas// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// sa bon bcu bdun gyis gang ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dra ba dag/ snga ma'i bag chags kyis bsgom bya// de nas ya la dmigs nas ni// rang gi sngags kyis
330a1(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba yis// khro bo rdo rje zung zhes pa// 'jig rten khyab par spros byas te// rgyal ba sras bcas spyan drangs te// gshin rje gshed du gyur nas ni// khor yug yongs su gang bar bsam// de nas Na yo ni ra yi// yi ge bzhi la dmigs
330a2(rgyud 'grel): yang sngags kyis bskul pa yiste// gzugs pazlas snam skyes nas ni/ yol gzhan rjeg gdag bang ga rnams sa las par ra/ la phyogs bcu thams dun// mchong ba la chags cho byed// la ma sa gas ba dang /
330a3(rgyud 'grel): me dri dang zhal zas dang // sil snyan rdzas la thim par gyur// spyi ru byin gyis brlabs byas nas// khyad par dag tu byin brlab pa// me tog dang ni mar me la// gzugs kyi rdo rje thim byas te// gzugs kyis khyad par phye bar byed // de bzhin bdug pa byug pa la//
330a4(rgyud 'grel): dri yi rdo rjes phye ba yin// yon chab bshos dang gtor ma rnams// de bzhin ro yi rdo rjes phye/ sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs ni// sgra yi rdo rjes phye ba'o// spyi dang bye brag dbye ba yis// rdzas kyang de bzhin shes bya ste// lha mo'i lus nyid phul ba yis// reg
330a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'i mchod par gyur pa'o// de ltar ting 'dzin sa bon dang // sngags dang rdzas dang ldan pa yis// gshin rje gshed po mnyes byas te// rdo rje dpyod pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lus la 'jug par bya// de nas rdo rje'i nges tshig gi/ sbyor bas shin tu brtan
330a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rdo rje rdul bral sbyor ba yis// shin tu dbang du gyur byas te// bzlas pa la ni 'jug par bya// de nas snying kha'i sa bon rnams// rab tu gsal bar dmigs nas ni// ji srid brtan par ma gyur tshe// gsang sngags spro bar mi bya zhing // ting 'dzin
330b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bad de bzlas pa brtsam// gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis// thog mar oM dang ldan byas te// tha mar phaT gnyis ldan byas pa// gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po ste// ma yengs pa yi yid kyis bzlas// dmigs pa brtan par ma gyur tshe// lha dang yi ge zhes bya//
330b2(rgyud 'grel): bdamigs pa gnyis las ma gtogs pa// rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya// de ltar ci nus bzlas nas ni// bzlas pa gtong bar 'dod pa na// gshin rje gshed po zhes bya ba// bdag gis lus la phyung nas ni// mdun na dgyes bzhin bzhugs pa la// bshag
330b3(rgyud 'grel): nga smon lam btab byas te// de nyes du ni mi snang gyur// de nas rang lus la bltas te// chos kun skye ba med dran byas nas// bdag kyang de bzhin mi snang gyur// yang na lha dang mi dpe bar// bzod pa yid kyis gsol nas ni// lhan cig mi snang gyur bar
330b4(rgyud 'grel): bya// de nas stong nyid dran pa yis// langs te rang gyi spyod lam bya// stong nyid blo dang ldan pa na// bsrung ba dag kyang bya mi dgos// dngos grub dag kyang myur du 'byung // byang chub mchog la nye bar 'gyur// gal te sngon gyi bag chags kyis// tha mal lus
330b5(rgyud 'grel): su mthong gyur na// gsang sngags yi ge bcu bdun po// snying ga 'tshogs ma la sogs par// 'od 'bar gdan dang bcas pa dang // rang rang gi gnas su bsam byas te// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig gis kyang // bsrung ba'i bsam pa ldan byas te// lus dang gnas
330b6(rgyud 'grel): dang grogs po dang // rdzas la bltas nas bsrung bar 'gyur// de ltar nyin re cho ga bzhin// yang na dus bzhir sbyar ba bya// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// gshin rje gshed po mnyes par 'gyur// de yi bka' nyan thams cad kyang // sgrub pa po la dga' ba
331a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gal te 'chag gam khrus byed dam// ba zas za dang nyal ba dang // de bzhin spyod lam kun du yang // ji srid g.yengs 'gyur thams cad la// stong pa nyid dam bsrung ba'i shugs// nam kyang gtang bar mi bya ste// shugs btang na ni bsrung ba nyams
