414b6(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa 'gyod bshags slan chad bsdam// yi rang skyabs dang sems bskyed cing // bskul dang gsol ba rnams rgyas gdab bsngo// byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms bzhi la nan tan bsgom// rang rang /
415a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bris sku la// spyan drang lha sogs gshegs su gsol// de nas phyi dang nang gi chos// thams cad de bzhin nyid yin cing // swa b+hA wa yis rjes su brjod// stong pa nyid la gshin tu
415a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhag/ de nas sngon gyi smon lam dran// chos nyid de las yi ge yaM// raM dang hUM ni sngo dmar nag/ de dag so sor gyur pa las// rlung dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang // rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba gur// blo dang ldan pas bsrung ba ni//
415a3(rgyud 'grel): namakha' mnyam pa rab tu bsgom// de'i dbus su paM bsam zhing // dang po'i dbyings yig d+hIHngag las// sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba dang // d+hiHlas 'jam dpal ye shes sku// gtso ma gser mdog mchog gi phyag/ rdo rje
415a4(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung rin chen spras// mthon mthing zur phud lnga dang ldan// sku yi rigs kyi bdag po bsgom// thugs kar rim par gnas pa yi// 'od zer spro dang bsdus pa las// rnam par snang mdzad nyid du gyur// mtshan
415a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dpe byad nyid kyis brgyan// de yi khyad par gyur pa las// gzhal yas phyi nang bcas pa bsgom// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dril bu ral gri 'phan la sogs// me tog phreng bas
415a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan// sgo dang sgo khyud 'gram rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis spros pa'i// zla ba phyed pa de bzhin no// 'dod yon mchod pa'i lha mo rnams// dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa ste// shar ni gtum dag tu grags//
415b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin lho nub byang gi rim// hA ha rgong dang dpal gyi nags// ki li ki li shes par bya// me la sogs pa'i rim pa yis// tshang tshing can dang 'bar ba'i 'od// 'jigs sde dang ni mun pa can// de yi rim pas brgya byin dang // gshin
415b2(rgyud 'grel): rje chu lha gnod sbyin dang // me lha srin po rlung lha dang // 'byung po'i bdag po dang brgyad ngo // shar gyi lha dbang dkar po ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa glang po zhon// lho yi gshin rje kha dog nag/ dbyug pa 'dzin la ma he zhon// nub kyi chu lha dmar
415b3(rgyud 'grel): skya'i mdog/ sbrul gyi zhags 'dzin chu srin zhon// byang gi gnod sbyin rta yi khri// kha dog ser po bum pa 'dzin// me lha dmar po dbyug gu ste// drang srong cha byad ra la zhon// srin po nag po gri gug lag/ mi ro mi'i khri la gnas// rlung lha
415b4(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu ba dan 'phyar// sha bzhon pa dag dang ldan// 'byung po'i bdag po thal ba'i mdog/ rtse gsum khyu mchog zhon par bcas// 'di dag thams cad phyed skyil krung // ral pa'i thur tshugs mig gsum pa// khro bo'i brjid ldan sbrul

416a1(rgyud 'grel): gdon// sha ba yi dgas rolangs gzhan// byu dang gtsun zan sbrul dag dang // ro langs dum bu tshogs dang rus// mchod rten ce spyang ba ru brgyug/ phyogs kyi rim pas steng dag na// tshangs pa dang /

418b2(rgyud 'grel): ti'i sngags kyis dbyung // badz+ra ra tis go rim// byang shar rdo rje'i mtshams su bsgom// thams cad phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan// lha mo pad+ma zla ba'i gdan// rigs kyi phyag mtshan dag gis bskyod// rang rigs po skul sbyang byas la gzhug/

418b6(rgyud 'grel): mgon sgrib pa sel// kun tu bzang po bsgom par bya// phyag na rdo rje kun tu bzang // thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar bsgom// mig ni gti mug sna phra ma// lce la 'dod chags lus phrag dog/ gau shing po 'dra ba cho ga bya// khro bo sdig pa'i
419a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs can no// snying gar hUM nag/ aHdmar kha// mgo bor oM ni dkar po bsgom// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo las// sku gsum rdo rje spro bsdu bsgom// oM sarba tra thA ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma kots+tsha haM/ oM sarba ta
419a2(rgyud 'grel): thA ga tA waka badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma kro&haM// oM sarba tra thA bau Na kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko haM/ rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun bkug nas// 'dun du dmigs la mchod pas mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta

419a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko ra ha/ brag ca lta bu phul ba de// sgra brnyan nyid du rang la thim// de bzhin bstod pas legs par bstod// gshin rje gshed por rab 'jigs pa// gti mug rdo rje ngo bo khyod// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/
419b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// phra ma rdo rje ngo bo khyod// rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa// rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// 'dod chags pad ma'i
419b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gnas mnyam// dbyangs mchog kun gyi gtso bo'i gtso// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// phrag dog rdo rje'i ngo bo khyed// gshin rje gshed po las kun byed// rdo rje sku dang rab tu mtshungs// phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal
419b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso// dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'chil bstod// de ltar bstod nas lha rnams spro// 'gro ba sbyangs nas
419b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor gzhug/ 'khor lo legs bsdus phung po khams// skye mched yin lag rang bzhin shes// rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba// rnal 'byor ye shes brtan par bsgom// der bsdu ba 'am shar sgo lho// nub byung lha mo
419b5(rgyud 'grel): rim bas bsdu// zhal dgu rdo rje rtse mo ru// 'khor lo bsgom dang rtsa ba dag/ lte ba snying ga de bzhin bsgom// de nas gnas kyi 'khor lo ni// bskyed pa rnal 'byor chen po bya// de brtan ya mAn+ta ka nyid// zhal gsum rjes
419b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnal 'byor bskul// sgom pa rdo rje rtse dang rtsa// lte ba snying ka rnal 'byor che// de rjes 'jam dpal ye shes nyid // dang po sangs rgyas gyur pa ni// rdo rje rtse mo rtsa bar bsgom// lte ba snying ga de bzhin bsgom// de nas gnas
420a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rim pa las// raM ba laM/ yaM rim par dgod// lus glong dag bsdams yid bcings la// 'bar khol bsros pas dbab par bya// babs pas zhi dang snying gar gnas// dbang bzhi'i rim pas thig le
420a2(rgyud 'grel): drang // bde ba mi rtog stong nyid la// rnal 'byor mchog 'dod pa ba yi bsgom de yang dmigs nas spro dang bsdu// gsal dang bstan pa sgro bya zhing // 'dus pa de la rgyun du gzhag/ sems med sems kyis 'od gsal mthong // mthong ba'i
420a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa yongs min te// kun rdzob nyam la rigs pas smras// rjes la phyi dang nang gi chos// yang dag spyad pas grub pa med// phyi rol rdul las grub pa ste// drug cha drug tu go gcig phyir// dpyad bas phra rab grub pa med// phyi rol
420a4(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma dgag mi bya// nang la bdag dang gzhan gnyis kyang // grub dang ma grub dpyad pa yis// bdag med gzhan yang rtag pa dang // mi rtag pa yis bden pa med// gnyis dang gnyis med de las gzhan// rigs pas rab tu
420a5(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas so// de bas chos rnams rnam par dag/ chos sku gzugs sku tha dad med// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis// 'jug dang ldan pa'i rigs shes bya// de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// du ba mar me zla nyi yi//
420a6(rgyud 'grel): rtags rnams rim pas nges par 'byung // de yi rdo rje'i sku 'grub bo// skyon pad zla nyi ma la// d+hIHdang hUM dang nyi ma dang // 'khor lo brgyad kyi rtsibs dang steng // nyi steng snying po las sngags dang // rtsa ba'i snying pos bskor
420b1(rgyud 'grel): ba la// rlung gi rgyu ba shes pa yis// zhi rgyas dbang drag gang 'dod pa// bsam gtan sogs kyis rim pas bzla// de nas sngags kyi bsnyen pa ni// zhe sdang can ngag 'dul ba la// ya mAn+ta ka'i ting 'dzin gyis// snying gar nyi
420b2(rgyud 'grel): ma hA bkod de// spro bsdu sngags kyi yi ges bskor// bdun 'bum snying po oM dang po/ ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT bzlas// ting 'dzin mchod gtor bcas pa'o// des kyang 'dul bar ma gyur nas// de nas zhal dgu 'jigs byed de//
420b3(rgyud 'grel): hrIHSh+T+r-iHspro bsdu shes byas la// las sngags rgyal po sum 'bum bzlas// des kyang khyab par ma gyur pas// lha ni bcu bdun gsal ba yis// rtsa sngags bcu bdun sgro dang bsdu// 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas par bya//
420b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas bsgrub pa bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi dang po ni// mar tshes gnyis la dur khrod ras// khru dro kha sbyor ldan pa blang // thal chen sa dkar bdud rtsi lnga// khrag lnga dug lnga bdud rtsi lnga// kha ba lnga dang tsha ba lnga// ras brgyad
420b5(rgyud 'grel): legs par sbyar byas nas// bya rog sgro dang mi rus la// smyu gu byas la bri ba ni// gshin rje pho mo 'jigs ldan pa'i// rten 'brel 'khor ba'i 'khor lho bri// gsum du bskor la phyi rim la// ri mig 'khor lo bcu drug
420b6(rgyud 'grel): bya// phyogs mtshams brgyad la las kyi sngags// hrIHSh+T+rIHmong dang spel ba dgod// bar ma brgyad la mes brten pa'i// hU~M phaT bsgrub byar bcas pa bri// bar ma re mig bcu gnyis la// rA dzA sa do ru Na yo// ni ra ya~M ts+tshan
421a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams bri// nang ma brgyad la phyogs bzhi ru// ma me dak+She dbus su ya// mtshams kyi kha stong bzhi la yang // bsgrub bya dag la sngags rnams dgong // mag ba phyi ru phyogs par bya// spyi ba
421a2(rgyud 'grel): dpung mgo g.yas g.yon dang // sku g.yas dag dang g.yon pa lnga// 'dom dang rkang mthil snying po dgod// 'tshogs mar oM hrIHlag g.yas la// Sh+NIHwi rkang mthil g.yas pa la// kr-i tA na na rkang mthil g.yon// hUM phaT
421a3(rgyud 'grel): lag mthil gAyon du'o// me dang hUM phaT ming dang spel// bsgrub bya mtshams bzhir bri par bya// phyogs kyi hUM dang phaT brgyad dgod// dza dang yas kyang bskor bar bya// rtsa ba'i snying po so gnyis kyang // zhu bdun lus la bskor bas
421a4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ ya ni snying gar spyi bor k+She// lte bar ma dang kha la me// da nau lce dang kha la dgod// dpung po g.yas dang g.yon gnyis la// yats+tsha re bzhin rkang gnyis la// ni ra rim pas dgod par bya// dzA ni sa ste dpral bar dgod//
421a5(rgyud 'grel): sa ni chu ste lte bar bri// do ni me ste 'grin pa nyid// ru ni rlung ste brla 'doms su// lha mo yum ni g.yon par dgod// na yo ni ra mig rnaM sna// lce dang bzhi la mkhas pas dgod// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag yin// de ltar
421a6(rgyud 'grel): re mig dgu pa yi// dkyil 'khor rgyud las lhag med bri// chag chag khrag chen dur khrod tshon// lha ni bcu gsum dkyil 'khor yang // dbang bskur cho ga lta bur bri// mchod gtor bzang ba sgrol ma lnga//
421b1(rgyud 'grel): sa bdun rgyu las gshin rje'i gzugs// khru gang shin tu 'jigs par bya// 'khor lo dang bcas lho sgor bzhag/ rgyud ltar byas la rab gnas ni// rlung me'i nad du rlang me ldan// ya dang ral gri las skyes pa// de 'dra
421b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhug cing bka' bsgo'o// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'khor na gnas// lto bo srid gsum phyogs skyong dang // gshin rje pho mo las byed rnams// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu gas pas bsgom// sa bdun 'khor lo'i rdzas rnams la// de
421b3(rgyud 'grel): yi bdud rtsi rjes dang bsre// gzugs brnyan sor brgyad bya ba dang // 'khor lo yi ge sngar ltar dgod// lho sgor gshin rje'i mdun du yang // thod pa gsum la kha sbyor bzhag/ de ltar bri bi'i rnal 'byor pa// skra grol gcis
421b4(rgyud 'grel): bu bdud rtsis byugs// lho phyogs ma he zhal ltar sbyor// mchod gtor gsol ba gdab pa shis// de nas rnal 'byor bzhi rdzogs nas// ya mAn ta kar bsgyur byas lo// snying ga'i nyi ma hUM 'od kyis// rgyal ba sras bcas khro bo
421b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams// bsgral te bsgrub bya'i ye shes dang // bsrung ba rang gi snying gar gzhug/ rang nyid dbang dang gzi byin bskyed// de yi 'jig rten lha dag kun// chos skyong rnams dang bral bar bya// zla ba phyed du bdun 'bum bya// 'khor
421b6(rgyud 'grel): la'i gzugs la gzhug po ste// khug nas 'khor lo'i las shes so// zla ba phyed du rnal 'byor pa// ro mig dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor du// lho nas zhugs shing lho ru blta// snying ga'i snying pa spros pa yis// las kyi gshin rje
422a1(rgyud 'grel): lto ba dkrug/ gshin rje bka' bsgo phyogs skyong dang // gshin rje'i tshogs rnams mngag pa yis// oM dang tIHSh+T+rI/ wi kr-i sogs// steng dang shar lho nub byang gis// phyogs skyong bskul bas
422a2(rgyud 'grel): khyab 'jug sogs// bsgrub bya'i rnam shes reg bya 'dren// bsgrub bya'i sems dang reg bya skyong // de nas 'pho la rings pa yis// gshin rje'i lto bar de nas 'ongs// brgya byin sprul po 'khor tshogs kyis// gzugs phung
422a3(rgyud 'grel): mig gi khams bcas dkrugs// gshin rjes tshor ba sna tshogs dkrugs// klu yis 'du shes sna khams dkrugs// gnod sbyin 'du byed lce tshogs rnams// dkrugs pas skyo nas lto bar yang // steng 'og mtshams
422a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi de bzhin du// srog gcod sha za khrag mthung zhing // mdangs 'phrog dbugs len par yang byed// lus lci la sogs 'byung ba chud// rnam shes 'pho ba'i las byed cing // gshin rje'i lto bar 'gugs par byed//
422a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bum khrag gsum gyis dgugs gzhug pa// hrIHSh+T+rIHbcu pA'i las yin no// de nas 'khor lo kha sbyar du// bsgrub bya 'khor lo'i khang stong bzhag/ thod pa kha sbyar nang bcug la// bcu gsum dkyil 'khor dbus
422a6(rgyud 'grel): su bzhag/ rnam rnal 'byor bzhi rdzogs rtsa ba'i sngags// gtso bo thugs ka 'khor de bzhin// bkod la bzlas pas sngags dang lhas// dkyil 'khor 'di dang gzhan bskul lo// sprul pas gzhan bskul rigs rigs
422b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya'i yi gi rtsa dang ni/ bdud rtsi bcu dang sems blangs la// dkyil 'khor lha la dbang bskur zhing // lhar bsgrub dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bya// zla gcig nyi ma bzhi ru bcad// bzhi tshan bdun dang zhag gnyis te//
422b2(rgyud 'grel): dang por gsal gdab tha mar bshags// pra ma ya hUM phaT dang ni// rak+ta tsa ra pa ya dang // mur tsa pa tsa pa ya dang // dum pa sarba mA ra ya// rim pas sngags dang ming spel bzlas// 'bum gyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur//
422b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo hrIHSh+T+rIH'i sbyor ba ni// gong du bstan pa de nyid do// las la chos skyong gshin rje dang // khro bo rnams ni de bzhin bskul// bsgrub pa po yang skra grol zhing // gcir bu bdud rtsi lngas byugs la// lho sbyor lho ru phyogs pa yis
422b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang DA me ru dkrol lo// ha hA zhes pa'i sgrub pa po// gsum maM dpa' brtson rang nyid bsgrub// ya ma me da k+She lnga yis// zhe sdang la sogs las skyes pa'i// sbrul mgo glang mgo bya yi mgo/ 'brug mgo phag gi mgo bo can//
422b5(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i rgyal po lnga bskul ba// skye rga na 'chi'i 'khor lo bskor// yats+tsha ni ra shan pa bzhi// gsod pa shu gcod dang za bar byed// dzA sa do ru drag mo bzhi// gshin rje'i rgyal po'i chung ma rnams// 'ju skems bsreg cing gtor ba
422b6(rgyud 'grel): yi// bshan pa bzhi yi chung ma ste// legs nyes blta zhing dur khrod nyul// de'i 'khor na zhe sdang can// gsong dang sha la shin tu dga'// mi sdug gzugs ba can mtshon cha thogs// bka' bskul rim pas bsgrub bya la// brtse
423a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul gyis rlung shugs kyis// gshin rje'i lto bar bcug par byasam// so sor dril bar bsnang bar bya// sbyang rjes khro la bsgral bsam zhing // rang nyid 'jigs byung nyid yin 'ad// snyomadu/
423a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs bskyed la bstod par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bka' yi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bdud dang mu stegs lha min btsam// gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos nyid la bzhengs ye shes
423a3(rgyud 'grel): sku/ dang po'i sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dpal// mngon byang ye shes longs spyod rdzogs// ya mAn ta ka phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas thams cad rigs bsdus pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rigs kyi gtso// zhe sdang 'joms
423a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad gshin rje gshed// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing khrod// phyag drug mtshon chas bdud rnams 'joms// lha mchog khyod la
423a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bor bzhengs// byams pa'i stobs kyis sku mdog nag/ khros pas dbu skra kham ser 'bar// rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bstod// zhal dgu khams gsum sa dgu mnan//
423a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu// bstan phyir zhal mdog so sor bstan// mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje spyan dmar rtsa bdun 'bar// bzhad dang khro dang phaT kyi sgra// ha ha hUM hUM zhal rnams
423b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// 'jigs byed khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thabs dang shes rab phyag gnyis ni// 'gro ba skyob phyir glang lcags 'dzin// phyag gzhan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// byang chub phyogs las rnam par sprul// g.yas kyi rdo rje la
423b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas// thams cad gsod par mdzad pa po// g.yon pa'i thod pa la sogs pas// thams cad zil gyis gnon par mdzad// phyag dang phyag mtshan na mkha' gang // gar mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sbrul nag tshangs
423b3(rgyud 'grel): skud dur khrod rgyan// thod rlon phreng ba thar pa'i rgyan// sha khrag tshil zhag rkang la bgyis// dur khrod bdag po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes me chen 'bar zhing 'phro// bde chen mtshan ma gyen du 'greng // ma he'i gdong can
423b4(rgyud 'grel): yum dang bcas// bde chen sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// stong pa bcu drug zhabs rnams kyis// lha brgyad mi dang byol song gi/ gtso bo kun mnan g.yon brkyang zhabs// rtag chad sel la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i sems
423b5(rgyud 'grel): can bsgral ba'i phyir// thugs rje'i thugs ni rab tu khros// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lor sprul// 'jigs byang tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba zhe sdang gzir gzigs nas// 'gro ba'i zhe sdang zhi bya'i phyir// bcom
423b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhe sdang gshed du byon// zhe sdang gshang la phyag 'tshal 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba gti mug sgribs gzigs nas// 'gro ba'i gti mug bsal bya'i phyir// gti mug gshin rje gshed du bzhengs// gauti mug rdo rje 'jom
424a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba nga rgyal mnan la gzigs// 'gro ba'i nga rgyal zhi bya'i phyir// phra ma gshin rje gshed du sbrul// phra ma 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bstod/ 'gro klan
424a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags gdungs gzigs nas// 'gro ba'i 'dod chags sbyang ba'i phyir// 'dod chags gshin rje gshed du byon// 'dod chags 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba khrag dog sgrol bya'i phyir// phrag dog gshin rje
424a3(rgyud 'grel): gshed du byor// phrag dog 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// khyed kyi thugs rje dus nga yin// bstan pa nyams byed sdig can rnams// tshe srogs las ngan dus de sgrol// rnam shes mi bskyod gnasuM phongs// zhe sdang chen po'i
424a4(rgyud 'grel): dus la ba'o// sdig can zhe sdang rnam shes sprul// gti mug chen po'i dus lnga bab// sdig can gti mug gzugs phung sbrel// nga rgyal chen po'i dus la bab// sdig can nga rgyal tshor ba tshim// 'dod chags chen po'i dus nga yin//
424a5(rgyud 'grel): sdig can 'dod chags 'du shes shig/ brag dog chen po'i dus nga yin// sdig can drug dog 'du zing grol// bka' las 'das so dam+b+ha las 'gal// bstan pa 'jig go sdig las byed// kun la gnod do sems can 'tsho
424a6(rgyud 'grel): sleb dab spang dza slob dpon la Ta// sdug can cing la thugs rjes gzigs// 'di la thugs rjes mo bsgral na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can bsgos// khro ba rnams kyang rong la khro// de bas sdig can thugs rjes
424b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol// lus dang rnam shes so sor bye// lus dang sdig las 'dir sgrol la// rnam shes dge ba mi skyong mdzod// bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed bka'// bstan pa bsrung phyir dkyil 'khor lha// 'khor gyi chos skyong gshin rje
424b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// khyed la drag po'i las bcol la// oM rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yi// dkyil 'khor steng du bdag 'bod pas// steng du phyogs skyong lha rnams ni// gza' dang rgyu skar rgyal chen bzhi// gtso 'khor chung ma bu dang g.yog/
424b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rnams la bdag 'bod pas// bdag la don ched gzhon med na// bdag ni sangs rgyas bstan la dga'// khyed ni sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung // sangs rgyas bstan pa zhig la khang // khyed kyi rgyal ba'i bka' rjed dam/
424b4(rgyud 'grel): dam bcas bka' 'di ma bslu bar// bdag gis phyogs skyong khyed bskul gyis// sdig can nyams pa myur du song // oM gyis 'bod kyis lha chen brgyad// tshogs dang bcas pa myur du song // oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA
424b5(rgyud 'grel): na na hUM phaT/ oM ma he shwa ra da ben+d+ha brah+ma ru ti hUM/ g+h+r-i na b+hi r-i ti kaud+hi ma hA ka la che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor gyi/ shar gyi dur khrod gtum drag na/ shAr phyogs skyong bar dam bcas pa'i// hrI
424b6(rgyud 'grel): zas bskor ba'i brgya byin ne// lus mdog dkar po glang po khon// g.yas na rdo rje dril bu g.yon// dur khrid rin chen rgyan dang ldan// chung ma bu dang bran g.yog 'khor// rnal 'byor bdag ni khyed 'bang bas// khyed la don
425a1(rgyud 'grel): ched gzhan yod min// bdag ni sangs rgyas bstan la dang // khyed ni sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung // sangs rgyas bstan pa zhig la khang // bstan pa 'jigs pa che ge mo// hId+hA yis 'bod kyis
425a2(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin lha// sangs rgyas bka' las khyed ma 'da'// mchod gtor sbyin pa chus ma gsan// 'khor gyi pho nya las la bskul// bstan pa 'jigs pa'i las ngan 'di// zhags pa can gyis mgul nas chings// lcags kyu
425a3(rgyud 'grel): can gyis snying nas drongs// lcags sgrog can gyis 'di bsdoms la// las kyi rlung gis rgyab nas phul// las kyi gshin rjes mdun nas gsu// stobs chen rnams kyis 'di khug cig/ dmigs pa'i rten la thim par gyis/
425a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rdza lta ba'i 'khor lor chug/ mtshon chu du ma'i char phob la// sdig can 'di yi tshe srog tshang // srog la dbang bas 'di srog tshod// dbugs la dbang bas 'di dbugs phrogs// sha za rnams kyis 'di sha zo// sdig can
425a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis pags pa dang // khrag dang zhag dang tshil dang rkang // rang rang dbang bas so sor khyer// gtang dang khas blangs bstan pa srungs// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi krI tA na na in+d+ra ye hrI// che ge mo ma ra ya hUM phaT// rdo rje 'jigs
425a6(rgyud 'grel): byed dkyil 'khor gyi// lho yi dur khrod ha ha rgod // lho phyogs skyong bar dam bcas pa// gshin rjes bskor ba'i gshin rjes ni// lus mngag nag po mi ha zhon// g.yas na dbyug pa zhags pa g.yon// dur
425b1(rgyud 'grel): khrod rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// chung ma bu dang bran g.yog 'khor// rnal 'byor bdag ni khyed 'bod pas// khyed la don tshan gzhan yod min// bdag ni sangs rgyas bstan la dang // khyed ni sungs rgyas bstan pa bsrung // sa
425b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bstan pa zhig la khang // bstan pa 'jigs pa'i che ge mo// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kri tA na na hUM phaT/ Sh+Ti yis 'bod pa gshin rje sogs// rim par bskul bar shes par bya// oM hrIHSh+Ti wi kri tA na nA ya ma yai Sh+Ti che ge mo
425b3(rgyud 'grel): mA ra ya hUM phaT// de nas sngags kyi gnang la dbab// bcu pa phyogs skyong spel bas bzla// gzugs la dug tshon phur pa lngas// gnas par gdab pa man ngag yin// rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor gyi// 'og phyogs skyong
425b4(rgyud 'grel): bar dam bcas pa'i// sa yi lha mo klu chen brgyad// rdo rje'i mog can dkar po'i phyogs// gtso bo'i chung mo bu dang 'khor// lus mdog phyag mtshan rang rang rtags// a dang phuHyis 'bod pa dang // las kun 'khor
425b5(rgyud 'grel): la bcol bar bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i ta na na hU na gra phu pha phu pheM pi bi po che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT// khro bo mtshon cha dpag med kyis// sdig can 'di la rnam par gzir// rdo rje zhag pas mgul nas bzung // rdo rje lcags
425b6(rgyud 'grel): kyus snying nas drongs// rdo rje lcags sgrog ngam du chings// rdo rje mtshon gyis rnam par choms// 'khor lo 'bar bas rab tu khos// tho ba dbyug pas rdul du brdungs// mnga' dang mdung gis thal byang phug/ gri gug dgra stsas
426a1(rgyud 'grel): lha zug phrol// ral gri chu gris dum bur gtubs// me rlung las kyis rnam par gtor// rgyal ba'i bka' yin khro bo'i las// 'khor gyi pho nya'i dus la bab// sdig can 'di la snying rje med// khro bo
426a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi thugs rje yis// 'khor gyi gsang ba'i sdig can 'di// mi skyong zhing du 'di bsgrol la// rgyal ba'i sras su 'di bsgrubs shig/ rgyal ba'i thugs ngam nges mthar phyin// rdo rje 'jigs byed las byed pa// ya yi las byed
426a3(rgyud 'grel): ya ma ya// ya yis 'bod ngo khyod bskul lo// les kyi gshin rje khyed bskul lo// khro bo sbrul gyi gdengs ka can// khams gsum khyod kyi lha na 'khor// skye rgyun moche'i 'khyer lo bskor// bsnun pa 'jigs pa'i sdig
426a4(rgyud 'grel): can 'di// g.yas kyi gri yis srog snying chod// myur du mchi ba'i las la sbyor// g.yon gyi thod pa snying gar spro// kha ru brngubs shig khA hi paM// tsit+ta rak+Sha ma ra khe hi/ sdig can tsit+ta rak+ta khA hi/ las kyi gshin rje nges sprul pa'i/
426a5(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod bdag po gshin gyi rje// nag po gel bgA ral gri zhags// khyod kyi lto bar skye 'gro 'gro// sdig can 'di yi tshe sreg tshug/ zhags pas rung la ral gris gtubs// sdig can srog rtse mar rbang // phra ma rdo rje'i las byed
426a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ ma yi las byed ma ru rtse// ma yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo// srog gi bdag po ma ru tse// glang mgo gshin rje ya ba ti// skye 'gro khyod kyi lte rtsa gcod// g.yas kyi gri yis lte rtsa tshang // myur du 'chi ba'i las la sbyor//
426b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi thod par lte khrag spyos// kha ru brngubs shig khA ti bi// zhags pas bzung nas ral gris gtubs// kha ru rngubs shig khA ti pi// pI ta rak+ta ma ra khA hi// sdig can na gra rak+Sha khA haM// 'dod chags rdo rje'i las byed ga
426b2(rgyud 'grel): me yi las byed smyo byed de// mau yis 'bod de khyed bskul lo// mdangs kyi bdag po bya mgo can// myos byed gshin rje bi bai tra// skye 'gro khyod kyis mgrin rtswa tshong// g.yas kyi mda' yis 'grin rtsa chod// myur du 'chi ba'i las la
426b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor// g.yon po thod pas mgrin khrag spyos// kha ru brngubs shig khA hi pi// mgrin pa rak+ta mA ra khA hi// sdig can mgrin pa rak+ta khA hi// phrag dog rdo rje'i las byed pa// da yis las byeng bum bu rdzi// de yis 'bod do khyod
426b4(rgyud 'grel): bskul lo// dbugs kyi bdag po bum bu rdzi// 'brug mgo gshin rje ku be ra// skye 'gro yongs kyi bla dbugs btsang // g.yas kyi dgra stas bla dbugs tshang // 'chi ba'i las la myur du sbyor// g.yon gyi thod pas bla khrag spros/
426b5(rgyud 'grel): kha rlo brngubs shig khA hi pi// pri ta rak+ta mA ra khA Ni// sdig can bI ta rak+ta khA hi// gautI mug rdo rje las byed pa// kI'i las byeng baM sa te// k+She yis 'bod ngo khyod bskul lo// tshe'i bdag po baM sa ta// bag mgo gshin rje k+She pa la// skye
426b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro'i tshe rnams khyod kyis chung // g.yas pa'i dbyug pas tshe brdungs shig/ 'chi ba'i las la myur du sbyor// g.yon gyi thod pas bla khrag spyos// kha ru brngubs shig kha ru pi// mun d+ha rak+ta ma ra kha ti// sdig can mun d+ha rak+ta khA hau/
427a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje tho ba'i las byeng // yaM'i los byed ya ma ra// yi yis 'bod ngo khyod bskul lo// gsod byed bdag po bya sangs ni// sha ba'i mgo can gshin rje drag/ skye 'gro khyod kyi gsod par byed// g.yas kyi gri yis tshe srog
427a2(rgyud 'grel): gcong // g.yon gyi zhags pas dum du bsdoms// rdo rje dbyug pa'i las byed pa// ts+tsha'i las byed tsa ra na// ts+tsha yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo// ba shu byed bdag po tel ba ste// tsaM spyang mgo can gshin rje rno// skye 'gro khyod kyis bsha' bar byed/
427a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi gri yis ngags bshus la// g.yon gyi zhags pas dam du bsgoms// rdo rje pad+ma'i las byed pa// ni'i las byung ya mo ni// ni yis 'bong ngo khyod bskul lo// gcod byed bdag po rmi gra pa ni// rmig pa'i mgo can gtum po mgyogs
427a4(rgyud 'grel): skye 'gro khyod kyis gtub par byed// g.yas kyi dgra stas rab tu chong // g.yon gyi 'khor los rab tu phye// rdo rje ral gri'i las byed pa// rA yi las byed rol tshwar dgu/ rA yIs 'bod do khyod bskul lo// ma byed bdag po rA hUM la// chu smin mag
427a5(rgyud 'grel): can gshin rje 'jigs// skye 'gro khyod kyis za bar byed// g.yas kyi 'khor los dum bur gtubs// gauyon gyi lcags kyus rab tu zung // rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor gyi// las byed rnams kyi chung ma brgyad// dmar ba mo khrag gau ral pa
427a6(rgyud 'grel): can// gri gug thod pas lag gnyis 'brel// las kyi gshin rje'i chung ma yin// khams gsum skye 'gro lto bar chug/ gcod cing sha khrag za la dga'o// 'khor lo bskor cig gshin rje'i yum// dzA sa do ru'i las byed ma// tsa rtsi phag mo
427b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs can ma// go ri bzhi'i bka' nyan ma// dus bzhi 'byung ba'i lha mo bzhi// sha khrag drod dang dbugs la gtod// dzA sa do rus khyod 'bod kyis// sdig can 'di yi sha khrag drongs// dbugs 'di khyod kyis myur du phrol// sgo ba'i pho nya
427b2(rgyud 'grel): bka' nyan cing // na yo ni ra'i las byed ma// zung zhig chings shig rab tu bsnams// 'khor lor gnon pa'i las gyis shig/ dus la bab po tsan tra dza// bka' las ma 'da' sa ma yA// rnal 'byor ma bslu dkar me dkar// bstan pa bsrungs
427b3(rgyud 'grel): shig dar ma dpal// ya ma med k+Sha tshi ge mo mA ra ya rbad rbad/ ya dza ni re che gi mo mA ra ya khA hi khA hi// dzA sa do ru che ge mo mA ra ya dz+wa la dz+wa la/ Na yo ni rA che ge mo mA ra ya dzA/ gshin rje'i lto bar 'khor lo bskor// gshin rje'i 'khor gyi
427b4(rgyud 'grel): pho nya'i tshogs// bya dang sbrul dang gcan gzan khyi// sha zan thams cad myur du rgyug/ sdig can 'di la rnam par rol// rang rang pags pa sha dang khrag/ zhag dang tshol dang rkang mar rus// dbang po don snying skal pa kha'o//
427b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas las la sbyor ba ni// rgyal pa gtum po tsin+da li// 'khor lho thod pa kha sbyar gzhug/ lho sgor thod sbyang steng du bzhag/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams// dbang med skye 'chi'i las la bskul// mtshan cha sna tshogs 'dzin
427b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// las kyi gshin rje pho mo skyeng // ya yis dgug gzhug bcing ba dang // gnyis med gshin rje'i lto ba dkrub/ khru gang gshin rje'i bskyed sogs yang // de ltar las mkhan dgu sogs bya// bsgrub bya ni las 'khor lo dang //
428a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la bskyed dang ngagu sogs bstim// khro bo chos skyong bka' bsgo zhing // snying po bdun 'bum bzla ba dang // sha chen khrag chen gtor ma bzang // bsgrub bya skyabs med khro bos bsgral// de nas nyi ma
428a2(rgyud 'grel): lngar phye la// nyi mo so sor mtshan mo dril// las sngags rtsa sngags so so la// sum 'bum 'bum phrag dag tu bzlas// sngags kyi lha rnams so sor bskul// rdo rje 'jigs byed sngags brjod pas// gti mug gshin rje gshed
428a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnams// dzi na dzi/ sgrogs phyogs skyong bskul// khro bos gshin rje ded cing bskul// sgrub bya'i ske nas 'khor los lus// so sor gang dang so sor khyer// sha dang khrig sogs sbyin pa'i rgyu// phung po khams sogs
428a4(rgyud 'grel): lhar bya zhing // sems ni mi bskyod zhing du 'phang // khro bo phyogs skyong gshin rje yi// ge yon gyi mtshon chas 'gugs byed cing // g.yas kyi mtshon chas gsod par bsam// snying rjes khros pa'i las la bskul// de nas sbyin
428a5(rgyud 'grel): srag mnan pa ste// pa mes bsgral ba'i dur khrod du// 'khor lo gshin rjes mnan pa sba// thab khung khrung gang gru gsum bya// khru phyed brko zhing rdzas ngan byug/ dur gyi shing la dur khrod mes// sbar la me lha gshin rje nga
428a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'jigs byed bskyed sogs bya// rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor ba yis// gzugs brnyan mi rus phye ma dang // de yi rjes dang sgo sen dang // rnam snang chu dang bcas pa rnams// nam byed ngag nas nam phyed sreg/ hU~M tshun d+ha ra
428b1(rgyud 'grel): dgas pa ru// rnam snang du yi sbyor ba ni// bla ma'i ngag la legs blangs la// gnas su sbas na nges par 'grub// de nas rtags sam nges 'phos nas// bsgrub bya de la dbang bskur zhing // bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i cho ga yis// mi bskyod
428b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing du nges par skye// rgyal ba'i thugs rjes gnang ba la// rnal 'byor pa de 'gro don 'grub// rgyal bas bden par gsungs pa dang // bdag gis brgyud pa'i mnan ngag mthong // ting 'dzin ma gsal sngags mchod// yang na rdzas
428b3(rgyud 'grel): ma tshogs pa yin// 'on kyang zhe sdang kho na dang // dam tshig nyamos pa dag kyang srid // tsaN+Da l-i yi mtshon bsnun la// las kyi gshin rje'i 'khor lo bskyed // gnas su yi ge dgod pa dang // lhor bar 'khor lo bri bar bya// mtshan
428b4(rgyud 'grel): mo sngags kun gcig tu bzla// nyin mo so sor phyed la bzlas// rdo rje 'jigs byed bris sku la// sgron ma chen po'i mchod pa 'bul// spro bsdu bskul don snga ma bzhin// zla ba phyed kyis de nges 'grub// de nas de yi lpags pa ba shu//
428b5(rgyud 'grel): lha yi gnas kyi sha rnams kun// bzung nas rjes la las kun la// 'khor lo lha yi sbyor ba yis// zhi dang rgyas pa dbang la sogs// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'khor los bsgru'o// mchod dang gtor ma rgya chen dang // snying rje kho nas
428b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya// rjes thob mnyam par gzhag pas 'grub// bskyed dang rdzogs dang gnyis med pa'i// bsam gtan bzlas pa spro bsdu yis// rtog tu bsnyen pa bya ba yin// nges kyang grub bor ma gyur zhing // mtshan ma
429a1(rgyud 'grel): lam rtags rnams med// 'khrugs dang nor pa byung ba dag/ dam tshigs nyams pa yin pas sbyang // dbang bskur tshogs kyi mchad pa dag/ sngon gyi sgrub dpan nyid ngam// grub thob sgrub pa
429a2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu byed// de mnyes byas la zhu ba bya// rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud nyid kyi// cho ga shes pas dbang bskur ro// de nas cho ga'i rim pa yis// 'jam dpel rnal 'byor gsal ba la// ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang // skye mched
429a3(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs dbang bskur la/ mi bo stong tsang pan ldan po yoM// snying gar zla dkyil yi ge d+hIHoM d+hIHswAhA phyogs bzhir bzla// sngags dbyibs chos la spro bas+t+ra bsam// rjes la mtshang gtor bzlas pa 'bang// gnyis dang
429a4(rgyud 'grel): mo'i bar chad skang / zhag drug zla drug lo drug tu// bsnyen pa'i cho ga dpa' bas bya// thun gcig zhag gcig zla ba la/ tshe gcig bskal bar bka' min bsgrub// lam mchog 'di ni yun rings min// dam tshig
429a5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje thabs ldan na// zla drug nang du rtags mthong bas// rgyal ba mnyes byed mngon spyod sbyang // de rjes rjes thob 'gro ba la// phan phyir 'khor lo'i las la 'jug/ phyi rol pa dag bstan la gnod// rang rig dam tshig nyams
429a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dag/ mchod dang gtor ma bzlas la brtson// bsrungs pa dag gis 'gyangs pa la// ngag mnan bzlog pa'i 'khor lo bya// 'khor los sngags sbyor rim pa dang // rdzas ngang ting 'dzin rim pa dang // bsnyen sgrub
429b1(rgyud 'grel): las sbyor zla drug gis// rgyud ltar 'khor lo sbas pas 'grub// de las khyad par rnal 'byor pas// mnan dang bzlog pa'i cho ga ni// sngon du bsnyen dang rtag tu bsgom// gzhan du rgyal ba'i bka' las 'das// mar tshes brgyad la
429b2(rgyud 'grel): bri ba ni// ras ngag sngon ltar rdzas kyis brgyang // yung ba ba blas kha bsgyur ba'i// sngon gyi rdzas kyis 'khor lo bri// 'khor lo'i yi ge dbri dang bsnan// las kyi bye brag shes pa yis// ma ra stam+b+ha bcu pa'i mthar// pra ma ra
429b3(rgyud 'grel): ya stam+b+ha ya laM// mkhas pas ya ma bzhi yi mthar// kha stong bzhi la long ga bskor// de bzhin spel ma zhag lnga bzla// dang po zhag la bsnyen pa dang // tha ma lkug pa'i chu la mnan// zhag bdun dag gis nges par gnon// yang
429b4(rgyud 'grel): na mi 'jigs bsrung ba ni// rtag par bsgom pa de nyid mchog/ 'khor lo 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bskyeng // de nyid gsum gyi sgo bsdus bsrung bya min nyal ba'i sa min spang // shar du phyogs shing gsum la skyabs// rten 'brel
429b5(rgyud 'grel): mthu yang thabs yin pas// bram ze srid bsrung las byung ras// tshes brgyang dag la 'bras chus brgyad // tsan dan dkar po til dkar dong // gu gul dkar pos legs byas la// gur ku ma gi wa ngo legs sbyar
429b6(rgyud 'grel): bas// bcu bzhi'i snga dro bri ba ni// bcu gnyis sor ni zlum por bskor// phyi rol rdo rje ra ba la// me ri hUM dang rab tu ldan// de nas cha mnyam bzhi ru bskor// phyi rol 'khor la sum cu gnyis// rtsa sngags 'khor lo'i
430a1(rgyud 'grel): rtse mor dgod// rtsu bar oM ni drug bcu bzhi// bsrung ba'i ming ni mtha' brten bri// rtsibs mtshan hUM phaT mtha' brten pa'i// bar chod dag gi ming dag bri// rI mIg kA li ngag gis dgang // de nas
430a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bcu drug la// hrIHsogs brgyad ni brgyad por bri// brgyad la ming dang bsrung bar bcas// sngar bzhin rtsa bar oM gyis brten// mtshan la phaT brten gzhan dag bri// ri mig dag la A li yin// de bar brgya
430a3(rgyud 'grel): la snying po nI// a thung bsnun pas brgyad bri'o// rtsa bar a brten bsrung ba bzhag/ mtshan mar hUM phaT gzhan bstan no// de nang d+hIHdbus bzhag pa yi// phyogs bzhir oMd+hIHswatwA dgod// stong pa bzhi la ming bcas
430a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung // oM gnyis hriHk+Sho shar yin la// de ma ma nI byang nub lho// srong la mnal legs byug la// me tog nag pi bcu bdun dgang // de steng bzhag la rnal 'byor bzhi// rdzogs nas gtor ma gtang dang bcol// bzlas
430a5(rgyud 'grel): pa spro bsdu yi ge dang // bcas pa'i phyag mtshan sna tshogs dang // rdo rje sa bzhi ra ba gur// rtag tu de nang gnas pa gdags// yang na rtag tu mtshang bar bya// mgul lam gtsug dang dpung g.yon gdags// khro bo was
430a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'jigs mi nus// phyir bzlog 'khor lo 'dod na'ang // sngon bzhin rnal 'byor bzhis bskyed ngam// rgyud las myur dang skad cig las// rnal 'byor gsal bas 'grub par// stong dang snying rje mi ri dang // rang ku
430b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas bdud bzhi bzlog/ de nas 'khor lo sa bzhi ni// steng du oM las lha chen dgu// rtsa sngags rnams la gshin rje brgyad// las mkhan brgyad dang pho nya brgyad// bshan pa brgyad ni bskyed pa ste// dkyil
430b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rang lha'i mngag pas bzlog/ hUM las rdo rje'i mig can rigs// phaT las 'og tu klu chen brgyad// rtsa sngags bdun bzlas bzlog par bsam// de nas 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu la// steng 'og phyogs skyong bskyed pa dang /
430b3(rgyud 'grel): de na nga drug las snying po las// gshin rje'i drug ni bskyed pa dang // de bzhin rang bzhin re re gzhug/ gnyis med gyur pa las brtsol ba// so so lus phong ljang gu'i mdog/ g.yas kun 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang //
430b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon kun sdigs mdzub byed pa yis// phas kyi 'byung po bzlog bsams la// snying gar ye shes sems dpa' ni// 'jam dpal ting 'dzin spro bsdu bzlas// bdun brjod sku yi rigs rnams gzhug/ ye shes gshin rje gshed//
430b5(rgyud 'grel): byasams nas// ya man+ta ta ko bdun brjod la// gsung rigs thams cad bsgral zhing gzhug/ dam tshig 'jigs byed gsal ba yis// hrId+d+haSh+T+rI/ bdun brjid thugs rigs gzhi/ bAcu gsum yon tan rtsa sngogs brjod//
430b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis rgyal ba thams cad gzhug/ de bzhin bdun bdun nang rim du// phyi nas brjod pas bzlog pa'o// sems ni ting 'dzin d+hIHla snga// ngag ni ye shes aHla sngo// lus ni dam chog oM la sngo// rdo rje bzlas pa ldan pas zhal/
431a1(rgyud 'grel): yang na pho mo ma nor ba'i// thod par 'khor lo'i bri ba ni// rdzas dus sngon bzhin legs bris la// ma ra'i gnas su stam+b+ha bzhag/ steng gi thod pa spyi rdol la// ling ga tshan lngas btags pa drang //
431a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags gsum tha mar stam+b+ha btags// d+hIHsrahA yis bsrung bar bya// zhag ga mthun nam zla ba ru// thun gcig dus gsum dag tu brab// non pa'i rtags dag nges pa dang // ba bla yung bas g.yam nag la// nang du sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
431a3(rgyud 'grel): ri rab bris pa yis// mi 'bab mtsho ru mnan pa bya// ba bla yung ba ldod ros dang // 'gi wang dag gis thab khung ni// khru gang gru bzhi par byugs la// skyer pa dur khrod shing dang ni// seng ljang glang po che ya spangs// rgyal
431a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i me sbar me lha ser// 'jigs byed bskyed sogs gsal ba la// ba bla yud kar yung bla dang // glang po che yi sha sregs pa// byung du phyogs pa'i ming dang bsreg/ zhag bdun bsregs na rdo rje 'dzin// gnon cing rengs pa'i
431a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'o// yang na pra ba nag dong dmar// cho ga sngan mas de bzhin mnan// dam tshig bskangad ba'i cho ga yis// bsrung ba shin tu bsdus te bzang // stong dang snying rje kho na yis// bsrung ba mchog gis sangs rgyas
431a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// sngags rnams rgyun du bzla ba dang // dge gzhan gtor ma ngag la brtson// dam tshig bla mas legs bskyangs na// bar tshing thams cad bzlog par 'gyurar// las kun sngon du bsnyen pa ni// zla ba nyis
431b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bzhag bdun dang // las sbyor zhag re spyir dgos pa// bsgrub pa po yis shes par bya// bskrad pa rgyal mtshan ras blangs la// sngon gyi rdzas kyis 'khor lo bya// sngags spel ling ga shes pas dgod// dgug
431b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhug rim pa zhag bdun bsgrub// so bdun dag la rta dang ni// bsgrub bya zhon pa'i gzugs byas te// rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng lho phyogs// nyi mo'i nyin mong tsaN+Da li// lus la skye che'i mar byugs nas/
431b3(rgyud 'grel): nim pa'i shing la nges 'dzeg pa'o// thod par nyi phyed sbrum de bzhar// bya rogo tshang bsregs thal po dang // dur khrod thal ba bsres pa ni// de'i mgo la blug cing byug/ rgyal mtshan ras bsregs thal ba dang // bsres pa de yi
431b4(rgyud 'grel): rkang la bsku// dur khrod sol ba bya rog khrig/ bya rog rus pas shing shun la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris byas la// de'i dkyil du bsgrub bya yi// ling ga ming sngags sbrel ba bri// bya rog dag gam sa bdun la// byas
431b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mgul du de btags te// lho ru phyogs pas de sngon bzhag/ sa bdun skyes las gshin rje ni// dbyug thogs de'i rgyab nas 'dod// dgug gzhug gsal bas sgrub pa yi// rtags byung zhag bdun lon po dang // lo
431b6(rgyud 'grel): lo gshin rje'i lto bar bzhag/ ling ga bsgrub bya'i snying gar sde// nim pa'i shing gcig rtsa ba ru// lho ru phyogs pas bskyal bar bsgreng // de nas sbyin sregs bya ba ni// rlung gi thab khung dbus su ni// nim pa
432a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras phug bya rog tshang // da du ra shing dur khrod shing // dur khrod shing gis me sbar la// me lha ljang gu bskyed pa dang // 'jigs byed bskyed sogs gsal ba la// gcir bu skra grol lho phyogs pas// bya rog khyim cha
432a2(rgyud 'grel): sbal pa khyi// sha dang rnga mo'i rtug pa tshang // byi la'i khrag gis sbrus la bsreg/ yi ge bcu pa gtsor byas la// ming dang bcas pas grub pa yin// zhag bdun byas na grong khyer skyong // smyo bar bya ba sbrang dang mtshungs// sha tshan da du ro 'bras bsreg/
432a3(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa ni// bram ze ldom bi ma he rta// bya rog 'ug pa ne la sbrul// khrag gis 'khor lo brgyad dag bri// mkhas pas sngags dgod spel bas bzlas// bram ze rigs ngan thod pa bzhag/ sa bdun dag la ma he rta// gzugs
432a4(rgyud 'grel): 'a shing shun ling gu sba// sgo gnyis rus pa gnyis la ni// bcu pa'i sngags sbrel bri ba dang // sgro gnyis bcings la lpags par gzhug/ nim pa'i shing gi steng du bzhag/ sa bdun rgyu la bsgrub bya bya// ma he rta la bskyon byas nas// da du
432a5(rgyud 'grel): ri'i thal ba dang // tsher mas bcu pa'i sngags bzla'o// las sbyar ling ga bsgrub byar sgra// chu 'grem 'thabs par sba zhing bskyal// de nas chu dang me yi thabs// tshe ra ma 'o ma can gyi shing // dur khrod shing dang 'bras phu bo la// dur khrod gtu
432a6(rgyud 'grel): bo'i me sbar te// lha ni dmar nag bskyed pa dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed bskyed pa la// ma he rta dang bya rog 'ug/ rma bya sbrul gyi sha bsreg bya// yi ge bcu pa ming spel bas// rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyang 'bying // de nas dbang dang dgug pa bstan// gur
432b1(rgyud 'grel): kum gi wang srin lag khrag/ 'khor lo brgyad dag bri bar bya// thod pa gnyis la 'khor lo bri// 'khor lo dgug gzhug dril la gzhug/ gur kum gi wang srin lag khrag/ sa bdun sbrus la bsgrub bya yi// sor mo bcu drug gzugs brnya
432b2(rgyud 'grel): sha khrag 'gi wang gur kum gyis// gro ga'i 'khor lo snying gar gzhug/ me tog spos phor dus gsum mtshad// nub tu phyogs pas rtsa sngags bzla// seng ldeng me la thod pa bsro// bcu pi'i snying po las sbyor bya// 'gyang na dur
432b3(rgyud 'grel): khrod rdzas 'khor lo// gsang ba'i 'khor lo sngags bye ba// ro sregs sol ba spra tshil dang // tsha ba gsum dang rdzas gzhan la// bsgrub bya mtho gang kha so gtsigs// 'khor lo snying gar bcug byas la// g.yon brkya ma he'i zhal sbyar/
432b4(rgyud 'grel): brabyas/ mnan la yi ge bcu pas dgug/ sbyin sreg thob khung zla gam du// tsan ngan dmar po gur kum dang // gi wang srin lag khrag gi byug/ seng ldeng me la lha gnyis dmar// rke tshe'i gzugs rten nya dang chang // tIl dang 'bras
432b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi tsher ma dug/ bdud rtsi lnga dang khrag sbrus lo// nub tu phyogs pas dus gsum du// brgya rtsa brgyud ni zhag bdun bya// sha lnga rnam snang rdo rje'i chu// chang dang bsregs na rgyal po sogs// thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba yin// yi ge bcu
432b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor bas bya// rgyas par 'dod la rgyas pa'i las// bsgrub pa po yis 'di ltar bya// rgyal po khyim bdag ras blangs la// gur kum gi wang tsan dan gyis// 'khor lo brgyangs la bri bar bya// sra ba gru bzhi ser por sba// srad bu ser pos
433a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gram dkri// maN+Dal ser po'i steng du bzhag/ byang du phyogs pas bsam gtan sngags// rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor bas bya// me tog ser pos dus gsum mchod// phra ma gshin rje gshed mnyam pa'i// rgya
433a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i las ni gang 'dod pa// rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub par 'gyur// sbyin sreg rgyas pa'i thab khung du// u dum wa ra'i shing la mi// s+phar lo lha gnyis ser po bskyed// til nas mar dang 'bras zho dag/ byang du bltas pas stong du bsreg/
433a3(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod pa de rgyas par 'gyur// sngags dang ming du bcas bsregs na// gang 'dod rgyas par 'gyur ba'o// zhi ba'i las dag 'di ltar bya// stong dang snying rje 'jigs byed ldan// tsan dan til dkar gur kum dang // gi wang gi ro tsA na
433a4(rgyud 'grel): yis// 'khor lo brgyad dang yi ge dgong // sra ba zlum po dkar po sba// srad bu dkar pos dkri byas la// maN+Dal dkar po'i steng bzhig ste// shar du phyogs pas zhi bas bsgrub// me tog dkar pos dus gsum mchod// sbyin
433a5(rgyud 'grel): sreg thab khung zlum po ru// pa la sha la me sbar la// ma lha rdo rje 'jigs byed dkar// bskyed dang dgug sogs legs par mchod// shar du kha bltas til-I dang dmarA// sbrang rtsi'o ma dur ba dag/ dus gsum ngag tu zhag bdun bsreg//
433a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan gyi bar chad zhi// las gzhan kun dang spogs pa ni// 'khor lo'i rdza so dang sbyor bas dbye// man ngag rgyud pa bla ma bstan// rdzas dang dam tshig ting 'dzin gsal// sngags la gus na 'grub pa las// me gsangs gzhan du mi
433b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub po// thams cad rdzas dang 'khor lo dang // bsam gtan sngags la brtson pa dang // bsnyen pa brtul zhugs dpa' ba dang // bla ma la gus gsangs na 'grub// de las gzhan pas mi 'grub pas// rgyud ltar snod brtag 'a
433b2(rgyud 'grel): pas gsang // ma gsangs snod ngan la bshad pas// dpon slob 'di dang phyi mar brlag/ rgyud don bla ma la brten nas// mos pas 'di byas mkhas pas bkod// sgra nor don log nyes pa rnams// rdo rje 'jigs byed chos skyong
433b3(rgyud 'grel): bshags// rgyud dang gdams ngag la brten te// 'gro la bsams nas sgrub thabs bris// 'di las dge ba tsa thob pas// bdag gzhan rdo rje'i sku thob shog/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdo rje 'od ces bya ba/
433b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po bai ro tsa nA rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// mkhas pa chen po bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta de nyid dang // lo tsa ba g+han d+harma ma tis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab nas// bdag
433b5(rgyud 'grel): khyung po rnal 'byor pas// bi ka ma la shI la nyid du tha ma chen po de nyid dang // lo tsa ba de nyid la mnyes par bsten nas zhus pa'o// man ngag dang dkyus 'di phrad nas nges par gtan l-i phab pas nyams su tshor ba yod do//
434a1(rgyud 'grel): dngul rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba zhes bya ba bzham
434b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra b+hai ra wa badz+ra maN+Dal pra ka bi d+hi nA ma// bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la phyag 'tshal
434b2(rgyud 'grel): lo/ na mkha' lta bur dngos bdag med// dus mtha'i 'od ltar lha rnams 'bar// shes rab thabs 'dres gnyis su med// rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal nas// de nyid thob 'dod rig can la// de'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad
434b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyud pa'i rim 'ongs man ngag thob// rgyud sde shes shing cho ga mkhas// dam tshig la gnas byin rlabs yod// sbyin sogs snying rje slob ma 'dzin// gnod sbyin rigs 'dus bstan la gus// de ni dka' yang slob dpon rigs
434b4(rgyud 'grel): bzung bar bya ba'i slob ma ni// dang gus snying rje shes rab yod// dge sdig rnam smin 'bras bu shes// sdom gnas dul zhing khro ba spangs// brtul zhugs dpal 'od sems stobs brtson// sems gcig don med bsgrub pa 'dod
434b5(rgyud 'grel): zab dang rgya che 'dzin la gnas// de las gzhan pa 'dir mi gzung // dur khrod la sogs dben bsdad de// maN+Dal mchod gtor rdzas bsngags la// sdom dang sngags kyi slob ma bsrung // rnal 'byor bzhi gnas 'bum
434b6(rgyud 'grel): khri stong // snying po las dang rtsa sngags bzlas// chos skyong bsnyen po rtags mtshan grangs// bsnyen pa grub nas sta gon te// dbyibs sngags ches dang ldan pa yis// phyogs dang dbyibs dang kha dog la// btsal
435a1(rgyud 'grel): brtag tu dag tu bya// dkar dang zlum dang shar la sogs// 'bol snum gyo nga dang yang ba yis// rnyed legs slang dang dbrog par bya// yang na rin gyis nyo yang rung // lha mo dbang byang rnal 'byor bzhis
435a2(rgyud 'grel): spyong nyid dragur rdo rje'i gdan// oM b+hu khaM gis chos nyid mkhar// hUM laM hUM sogs 'byung ba'i rim// badz+ra ma de'i sngags brjod cing // rak+Sha rAk+Shas rdo rjes bsrung // sa ro dbyung zhing sbyang bar bya// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad k+ShiM// sa dang par/
435a3(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa dang // spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par ni// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// brjod la lha mo mkha' la bteg/ bdud rtsi khrag chen pa yi dri// sor bzhi mtho gang gru bzhir brtsig/ slob dpon khrus bya dri zhim dang // bdud rtsi lngas byug dur
435a4(rgyud 'grel): khrod kyi// phyag rgya lngas brgyan cod pan dang // stong smad gos ldan gdan la bsdad// rdo rje dril bu snying rjes bzung // 'gro ba bsgral phyir dkyil 'khor 'jug/ rnal 'byor chen pos gnas pa la// dris brgyan rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// slob ma bzhi
435a5(rgyud 'grel): yis gsol ba gdab// 'gro kun gti mug mnan mthong nas// 'gro ba'i gti mug gsal ba'i phyir// bcom ldan gti mug gshed du byon// gti mug 'jigaso byed phyag 'tshal bzhengs// 'gro kun nga rgyal gyis mnan gyis// 'gro kun
435a6(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal zhi bya'i phyir// bcom ldan phra ma gshed du byon// phra ma 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal ba zhes// 'gro kun 'dod chags gzir gzigs nas// bcom ldan 'dod chags gshed du byon// 'gro ba'i 'dod chags sbyang ba'i phyir// 'dod chag
435b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byeng phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro kun phrag dog bcings mthong nas// 'gro ba'i phrag dog bsgral ba'i phyir// bcom ldan phrag dog gshed du mdzad// phrag dog 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bzhengs// 'gro kun zhe sdang gis gzir gzigs
435b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i zhe sdang sbyang ba'i phyir// bcom ldan zhe sdang gshed du sprul// zhe sdang 'jigs mdzad phyag 'tshal bzhengs// rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor kun gyis mngon gyur pa// sdig pa thams cad nyams byed cing //
435b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa kun 'byung mgon por bri// gsol ba'i sgra de brag ca ltar// gsal nas chos nyid dag la bzhengs// snying rje chen pos 'gro ba kun// dug lnga'i gnas nas bsgral bsams la// hUM hU~M badz+ra utISh+Tha brjod la rdo rje gsor bas bzhengs// /
435b4(rgyud 'grel): Ta dang ma las rdo rje'i can// g.yas dang g.yon gyis khams gsum blta// sangs rgyas kun bskul bgegs bskrang bsam// rkang las hUM 'od rdo rje'i sa// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pad// ral gro ra ba g.yas brkyang sogs gar dang bcas pas
435b5(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum du// dkyil 'khor bskor la bsrung ba bya// hUM nga ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor byed// nyon gcig bgegs rnams kun nyon gcig/ lus ngag yid la gnod pa kun// lha klu gnod sbyin la
435b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs khyed// de ring gzhan du 'gro bar gyis// gal te mi 'gro 'dug gyur na// rdo rje 'bar ba'i lus ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'di yis bgegs byed kun// lus ngag yid gsum dag par bya'o// de nas gnod mdzes sngags kyis bsrung // hag+sa
436a1(rgyud 'grel): g+hA ta yis phur pas gdab// mchod dang gtor mas khro bo mchod// bdag dang slob ma bsrung bar gsol// lha mo dmigs nas mchod pas mchod// skyobs pa shAkya seng ge yis// drag po chen po bdud kyi sde// stobs
436a2(rgyud 'grel): chen dag kyang de ltar bcom// de ltar bdag gis bdud las ni// rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// lha mo khyod kyis dbang mdzod cig/ lha mo slar thim sa sta gon// de nas lha gnas bdud rtsi'i dris// thig le me tog tshom bu bya// lha bskyed
436a3(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug bcing bgyes la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // stong dang snying po ci nus pas// mnyes par byas la gsol ba gdab// pus mo'i lha nga pad ma la// g.yas gtsugs g.yas pas spros thogs te// bcom ldan gshin rje
436a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs rdo rje// rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo// slob ma rnams la rtse phyir dang // bcom ldan khyed la mchod pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor snying rje'i bdag nyid can// mgon po bdag ni 'bri bgyid cing // bdag nyid khyed la gus pas mchod
436a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan bka' drin gnang bar 'os// 'khor lo 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas tha ma sa cad bdag la dgongs// 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang // gzhan yang sngags la gnas pa'i lho// 'jig rten skyong
436a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'byung po rnams// sangs rgyas bstan la dga' ba yi// rdo rje mig dang ldan pa rnams// de ring rdo rje 'dzin min bdag/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor 'di// 'gro la phan phyir bri bar byed// ji ltar nus pa'i nyer spyod kyis//
436b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su brtse phyir nye bar gsol// bdag dang slob mar bcas pa dang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni grogs kun la// bsrung dang nye bar skyob pa ni// khyed kyis bya bar 'os legaso// de ltar lan gsum brjod pa ni// dkyil 'khor sta gon mkha'
436b2(rgyud 'grel): la bteg/ de nas nag nog rtsa ba spang // gser sogs rin chen sa yang rung // lho yangs mgrin ring mchu 'phyang ba// bco brgyad rang rang mtshan mos gdab// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // tsA ti'i kha rgyas gos kyis dkri// lha bskye
436b3(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug mchod bstod bzla// zhu ba bdud rtsi'i chu yis dgang // me tog phreng ba ar+g+ha'i snod // rdo rje dang bcas ku sha'i gdan// lha gnas dag gam rim pas bzhag/ skabs der ru ba'i sleb ma dag/ khrus dang maN+Dal mchod pa
436b4(rgyud 'grel): dag/ me tog las gzung gus pas ni// dkyil 'khor phyi sgor bsdang bar bya// dngos grub 'dod pas dad pa yis// 'jig rten pha rol la dmigs te// rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten 'di dmigs mchog mi
436b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// de ltar spro ba bskyed nas ni// dad pa bskyed pa'i slob ma la// cho go ji bzhin sems bskyed cing // tshig 'di dag gis lan gsum brlab// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshol lo// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu
436b6(rgyud 'grel): mchi// sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags// 'gro sogs dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung // byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can ma lus bdag gis 'gron du gnyer//
437a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong sbyang par bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ 'gro ba thams cad bdag gis bsgral// de nas gus pas slob dpon la// tshig 'dis lan gsum
437a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab// dpal chen khyod bdag ston pa po// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i// dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol// byang chub sems ni bdag la gsol//

437a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// khyod ni theg chen snod yin no// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje gsang sngags mthu yis ni// ye shes mnyam med yang dag mnyes// shAkya
437a5(rgyud 'grel): song gi sogs mchog gis// gsang sngags mnyi ma med mthu yis ni// 'jigs pa chen po bdud kyi sde// stobs chen dag kyang nges bcom nas// 'jig rten rjesu gshegs nas kyang // 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das//
437a6(rgyud 'grel): bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de don bshad nas mkha' gsang nas// byin rlabs dbyung ba rnam snang dmigs// gnas gsum byin brlabs mchod pa bya// gsang sngags mchog
437b1(rgyud 'grel): tu der sems bskyed// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// mchog gsum po la skyabs
437b2(rgyud 'grel): mchi// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ni// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // gsum bdag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin re bzhin nam dus drug tu// chos dang zang

437b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gnas par bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// sdom pa yau ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang // sems can don bya'i tshul khrims//

438a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir// dri chu'i sbyor chu sbyin par bya// oM hIHbi shAd+d+ha sarba d+harmAHpA pa ni sh+tsa saM sho d+ha ya sarba bi kalpa a pa na ya hUM// las dang rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pa'i// sku sha sngags dang stan du sbyin// lus tshad
438a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum sgril las sngags kyis// mdud pa lha dang bsrung ba gdags// bar chad sdig pa zhi bya'i phyir// zhi ba 'am man dag sbyin bsreg bya// de nas spro ba'i chos bshang bya// gtor ma bting zhing mchod bstod pazla// thams cad
438a3(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa 'jig rten du// 'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung srid// u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin// rgya 'am na 'am res 'ga' 'byung // gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog 'di ni// de bas kyang ni rnyed par dka'// gang phyir sems can
438a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med don// bla na med pa byed par nus// bskal pa dpag tu med pa ru// gang gis mtshams med sdig byas pa// dkyil 'khor 'di 'dro mthong ba yis// sdig pa thams cad zad par byed// grags pa mtha' yas
438a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags spyod pa'i// tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos// skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni// go 'phangs bla na med par 'gyur// gang gis sngags spyod mchog 'di la// blo gros shin du dri med na// sdug bsngal thams
438a6(rgyud 'grel): cangad 'byung ba yi// ngan 'gro thams cad 'dis spong ngo // bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams gyis// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcos kyis// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams bsrung // thog mchog 'dir
438b1(rgyud 'grel): ni khyed rnams kun// legs pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyed rnams 'di ru 'gro bzhin par// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas slob ma sems
438b2(rgyud 'grel): spro bar// maN+Dal me tog legs su dbul// 'dod pas seng ge bzhin du nyal// las sngags bzlas shing bla mas bsrung // nam langs khrus dang maN+Dal bya// rmi lam bzla zhing ngan na bzlog/ de nas kha dog lnga ldan pa'i/
438b3(rgyud 'grel): thothig sku gsar pa nyi shu'i cha// nyis 'gyur zhe sdang rdo rje dang // gti mug gshed du dmigs pas bsgril// 'bar ba'i lta stangs lcags kyu dang // yid kyis rigs lnga gzhug par bya// oM dIp+ta driny+dzi aM ku shi dziHmchod
438b4(rgyud 'grel): lal gsol ba gdab par bya// oM AHpra yats+tsha mo ha kI la re swa tsakra su tra NA yA hUM/ slob dpon slob mas thig gzung ste// nub dang shar bsdad thig gdab po// ye shes gzhal ya sau gsal bar gdab// sngags 'dis
438b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad bskul// oM an+ta n+yA nu ga taHsarba d+harmaHpa ra s+pha ra NaM/ a nu ga taHsarba d+harmAH/ a t+yan tA nu prA baSh+Ti sarba d+harme hUM/ de skad brjod la dza tra brjod// shar du drangs la rdzogs par gdag
438b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas dam tshig thig gdab po// slob dpon rjes su slob ma 'brang // cha gar bor la shar lho nub// byang phyogs dri zhing thig bzhi gdab// tshangs thig gnyis gdab dkyil 'khor thig gi phyi nang du// bdun bdun bta/
439a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bor la gnyis// nyi 'od rdo rje pad+ma phreng // pho brang dbang ldan mtshangs nas bkod// de nas dur khrod rin chen nas// nag dkar ser dmar ljang gu lnga// bad mar bzhag la lha skyed cing /
439a2(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug mchod la tshon du 'gyur// phyag rgya ting 'dzin gsang sngags brjod// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM// khru tshur g.yon pa dbang ldan du// dkar ser dmar ljang nag por bri// sbom phra sgro yi nyi shu cha// sbom prA
439a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon chad pa la// chad dang nor nyams 'thab dang 'chi// thod pas bkab la bsrung ba'o// dkyil 'khor nang gi thig gnyis la// pho brang nag po 'jigs byed dngos// gzhi la sna tshogs rdo rje bya// phyed la rdo rje'i
439a4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba nag/ phyed dang gnyis la snam bu rigs// lha'i phyag mtshan bri bar bya// phyi rol cha gnyis sgo bzhi rigs// gcig ni ya phubs phyed brtsigs pa// de yi phyed ni na mkha' stong // bzhi la rta babs chos 'khor gdugs
439a5(rgyud 'grel): cha gnyis brtsigs pa 'dod yon byed// dra ba cha gnyis mda' yab phyed// mtshams dang sgo khyud 'gram rnamasu// rdo rje rin chen zla phyed mdzes// bum pa do shal dril bu ras// 'phan dang bum pa sna tshogs mdzes// gru bzhi
439a6(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi// thig bzhi dag kyang yang dag ldan// shar ni dkar po chen po ste// lho nub byang dag ser dmar ldang // dbus su rdo rje 'khor lo shar// lho ru rin chen pad+ma nub// byang du ral gri 'khor lo ma// bden
439b1(rgyud 'grel): thal rdo rje bang ma rlung // dbang ldan ut+pa pal tho ba shar// lho sgor dbyug pa pad+ma nub// byung sgor ral gri nyi zla la// lha'i mdog gi mtshan ma dgod// me 'od dmar po phreng ba nag/ pad+ma sna tshogs phreng bas bskor// gdu/
439b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bla re ba dan 'phan// 'dod pa lnga yi mchod pa dgram// bum pa phyogs sam lha yis dgod// gtor ma rgya chen dag kyang bsham// de nas slob dpon rgyan spras pas// dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor bzhi ru bsgrub// bsgrubs nas phyir
439b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyung shar sgo nas// slob dpon 'jug cing dbang blangs la// gnang ba thob nas slob rnams// dkyil 'khor 'jug dang dbang gnang sbyin// khrus bsam maN+Dal sems dad pas// khang pa'i phyi rol dag tu bzhag/ mkha' gsong nas
439b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyung rnam snang gzugs// bsrung dang gsang sngags zlos su gzhugs// lha la phyi nang mchod dang bstod// slob dpon de nyid der rol bya// de nas lha la gsol ba ni// slob ma 'jug dang dbang bskur phyir// 'dod chags chen po
439b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba yi// 'khor lo gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// bdag gis mthong nas slob ma rnams// gzhug phyir khyed la gsol ba 'debs// nam mkha' lngas byung mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med po'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'
439b6(rgyud 'grel): che rang bzhin// rdo rje 'jigs byed bdag grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog du bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa'i skyon bral yon tan
440a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan// 'dod chags kun gyis rjes su chags// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis bsgrub mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ 'dod nas grol ba de bzhin ga
440a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod// kun gyi mchog gyur dngos grub che// dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i lha// rdo rje dngos grub chen po mchog/ phyag na rdo rjer bdag grub mdzod// sems
440a3(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi yid la khyab// sems can kun gyi yid la gnas// sems can kun gyi yab nyid de// 'dod chags bde ba'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol//
440a4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma gdong g.yogasa~M bum chus bsang // a khaM bI ra hUM zlos gzhug/ gdong g.yogs bcing zhing me tog dang // rdo rje gtad pas sems bskyed bya// sarba yo ga tsit+ta uta pa dA ya mi/ oM su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho sid+d+hi badz+ra ya
440a5(rgyud 'grel): thA su khaM// rigs kyi bu khyod gang la dga'// skal bzang bdag ni bde chen la'o// thog ma med zhag 'khor ba nas// deng 'dir yan chad sdig bgyis dang // bgyid du stsal dang yi rang bshags// gtso bo slan ched mi bgyid
440a6(rgyud 'grel): sdom// gang yang rgyal ba sras bcas dang // 'gro ba'i legs byas dge ba la// de dag kun la yi rang nas// thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// bsam pa thag pas byang chub par// 'gro
440b1(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal gsal ba'i phyir// de nas skyabs mchi bar bgyi// byang chub sems gnyis bskyed nas ni// 'gro ba deng nas mgron bos nas// bdag sangs rgyas nas 'gro ba kun// srid pa'i mtsha las bsgral bar bgyi// deng nas
440b2(rgyud 'grel): khang pa'i nang du gzhug/ de ring sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rigs su bu khyod zhugs pas na// ye shes rdo rje ngas bskyed bya// ye shes rdo rje mchog thob na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ba// rnams
440b3(rgyud 'grel): la smras na dam tshig nyams// rdo rje me tog mgor bzhag ste// 'di ni sku'i rdo rje ste// dam tshig sku yi dngos grub thob// dam tshig dngos grub 'di smras na// khyod kyi mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// snying la
440b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag zhugs pa ste// gal te tshul 'di smras nA ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams na bsreg par byed// dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub thob// 'thung zhig rdo rje'i chu 'thung zhig/
440b5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra a mr-i taM u da ka ThaH// brjod pas rdo rje dri chu blud// yang ni rdo rje stir bzhag la// deng nas bzung ste khyod nyid kyi// rdo rje 'jigs byed nga yin pas// brnyas par ma byed bsgo ba nyan// brnyas dang ma brnyas byas na ni// nyam nga
440b6(rgyud 'grel): ma spangs dus byas nas// rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyud sde mkhas dang byas pa mang // dikyil 'khor man ngag thob pas s+ho/ de nas maHla
441a1(rgyud 'grel): tog yon// phul la dbas pa'i gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje dbab par mdzad du gsol// brjod la rtse gcig pa yi sems// skyil krung rtsog rtsog por
441a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdad la// spyi bo snying ga lte ba rkang // baM laM raM yaM dz+nye dag las// chu dang swa dang me dang rlung // dkyil 'khor bzhi bskyed dz+haiM gis bskul// bskyod par bskul dang rlangs pa zhu// bdud rtsi 'bab cing ye shes skyed// babs par bsams
441a3(rgyud 'grel): nas bskul bar bya// rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT A be sha ya sto b+ho ya ra ra ra ra rtsa la ya hUM trA~M dz+r-IM phaT/ lus ngag yid ni gang phebs la// gti mug gshed sogs gtso bo cher dpa'/
441a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag la a dmar smra ru gzhug/ lus la tiSh+Tha badz+ra dang // laM dang dbang gis brtan par bya// ye shes lha rnams de la dbab// de ltar phebs pa dam pa'o// dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor bar bya// lho'i sgo nas 'jug
441a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// sangs rgyas nas 'dir slob ma rnams// da lta yang dag nyid du gzhug/ lho rnams gang gi rigs yin dang // dngos grub gang yin 'bab par shog/ pra tIts+tsha ho brjod pas dbul// me tog gar babs
441a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi lha// zhi sogs las kyang de yis shes// gtsug gtor spyan thugs mchog 'grub cing // sku gzhan 'khor rnams thun mong ngo // dkyil 'khor re khA gang nye'i rigs// phyi rol byung ba lan gsum bskya
441b1(rgyud 'grel): des kyang ma bab dbang mi bskur// de nas snang ba dri bar bya// lha yi rigs dang mthun pa 'grub// mig la oM bsgom ye shes spyan// rdo rje sems dpa' dbye bar bsam// rdo rje 'jigs byed deng khyod kyi// mig ni yang dag 'breng bar byed//
441b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mig ni bla med pa// phye bas thams cad mthong bar shog/ gdong g.yogs bkral la dkyil 'khor bzang ba bstan// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// mthong nas dad pa rab tu bskyed// khyod ni 'jigs byed rigs su skyes// sngags
441b3(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// tho ba rdo rje 'jigs byed nas// zhe sdang 'jigs byed par du bstan// slob dpon lha la phyag gsum bya// dkyil 'khor gzhug pa'i cho ga ste// nyon mongs sgri ba byang bar bstan//
441b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob mo dbang thob phyir// rin chen bang mdzod bu smad bcas// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum yang // dang gus dga' bas dbul bar bya// gdugs dang bla re ba dan sogs// mchod pa dag dang rgyan bzang ngam// dur khrod rgyan
441b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis legs brgyan la// lho sgor bsrung bar shes par bya// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod chen stsal ba ltar// bdag kyang rab tu skyob pa'i phyir// na mkha' rdo rje deng bdag stsol// lan gsum de brjod gsol ba gdag
441b6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dbang bskur yon rnams dbul// de nas slob ma rnal 'byor bzhis// bskyed la dbang bskur lha mo dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed slob dpon nyid// rig pa'i dbang lnga bskul bar bya// bkra shis sgra brjod dkra shis par//
442a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'jigs byed mkha' 'gros byed// gsang ba gsum nas byung ba yi// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskul ba// rdo rje chu yis bum dang
442a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur// oM badz+ra kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// las bum khrus bya rnam rgyal dbang // rigs kyi spro bsdu shes bya la// chu dang 'brel bas de bzhin kun// gser sogs thor tshugs cod pan dbang // sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag
442a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa// rigs lnga'i dbang bskur dag pa 'di// spyi gtsug rgyal por dbang bskur bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na pau tra la a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che// rdo rje 'jigs byed rdo rje'i dbang // sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang chen 'di// yang
442a4(rgyud 'grel): dog khyod la bskur bar bya// oM badz+ra a d+hi ba tI tr-i a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ chos rnams rnam dag rnam par thar// shes rab pha rol phyir gnyis med// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// dril bu'i dbang bskur
442a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po long // oM badz+ra sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra g+har+N+Na b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// de nas rdo rje ldan pa'i lag/ spyi bor bzhag pas ming dbang sbyin// dngos po gang dang gang snang ba// de de rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis dag/ sangs rgyas
442a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rang snang ba'i// oM badz+ra sarba ta nA mA b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdo rje che ge mo brjod do// rig pa'i dbang lnga lha mos bskur// ye shes lha lnga chos nyan rig/ nyin dang bsgrub pa kun la dbong // des rig pa'i dbang thob bo//
442b1(rgyud 'grel): denas slob dpon dbang don du// / yon dbul gsol ba gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang // slob dpon dbang bskur bdag la stsol// dkyil 'khor lha yaM de nyid dang /
442b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyi ni las dag dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig dang // gsang ba mchog gi sdom pa rnams// sems can kun don bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje slob dpon podag la gsol// de nas lho sgor gdan dang khri// cho ga
442b3(rgyud 'grel): shes pa slob ma gzhan// bgegs gsal rgyan bzang dur khrod brgyan// slob dpon mi ldog dbang sbyin no// lag g.yas rdo rje bskyed nas ni// de nas rdo rje sbyin par bya// thag mtha' med pa'i rdo rje ni// rdo rje sems dpa'
442b4(rgyud 'grel): rje rang bzhin// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dag pa'i bdag/ oM badz+ra mahA hUM// de bzhin g.yon par dril bu skye ni// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i
442b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yis// dag pa'i srid pa grub par byed// oM oM badz+ra g+hata a/ rang 'dri'i dam tshig phyag rgya ni// dam tshig phyag rgya de bstan pa// rang yid gzugs ni bstan par byed// 'di ni rang gi 'dod pa'i lha/
442b6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig phyag rgyar grags shing gnas// shes rab bcu drug lon pa la// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan po'i// lag pa gnyis kyis yang dag mkhyud// slob dpon dbang du bskur bar bya// brjod la de don de la bstan//
443a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar mi ldog dbang bstan nas// de ni dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan// dran pa bzhi dang spong ba bzhi// rkang pa dbang po shar sgo sogs// bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs yin// ting 'dzin rnams
443a2(rgyud 'grel): ni kha khyer bzhi// gzungs sgo dag ni lha mo'i tshogs// tshogs gnyis rdzogs phyir rgyan sna tshogs// gsung rab yan lag phan dril sogs// byang chub yan lag bdun rnams ni// dra ba dra phyed me long sogs// ye shes lnga
443a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan dkar sogs phyogs// ma 'dres ye shes lha rnam bzhi// chos kyi 'khor lo rdo rje phreng // sna tshogs rdo rje rigs lngar 'dul// nyes pas mi gos sna tshogs pad // bdud rnams bsregs pas ye shes nyid// nyon mongs
443a4(rgyud 'grel): ser phyir zla ba'i gdan// snying rje brlan phyir bum pa brgyad// bde chen spyod pas mchod pa'i tshogs// dur khrod gdan gyis gshin rje 'joms// phyag 'tshal gdug pa 'dul ba po// rnam shes zhe sdang chos kyi dbyings//
443a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid// zhal dgu rnam thar gyis 'jug pa// dbus zhal gsum ni sku gsung ba// g.yas gsum thabs kyi sku gsung thugs// g.yon pa shes rab rnam thar gsum// rwa gnyis thab dang shes
443a6(rgyud 'grel): rab la// ma he dreg pa'i bdud rnams 'dul// spyan gsum dmar ba snying rje gsum// byams pa nag po dag pa rags// khro ba bdud 'dul sbrul gyis klubs// klus brgyan gshin rje gar dgus ldan// byang chub
443b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs chos so gnyis phyag/ phyag mtshan lha min 'dul byed pa'i// nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis gtso// gcir bu chos sku mtshan 'greng ba// bde ba chen po sku yi rtags// phyag gnyis glang po'i lpags pa ni// thugs rje thabs kyis
443b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba skyob// stong pa bcu drug zhabs bcu drug/ zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags rims// 'dul phyir lha dang mi sogs bya// dbu skra nang gi ye shes 'bar// gzugs sogs phung po gti mug sogs// ye shes bzhi yis gzhan gshed//
443b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi// zhal gsum rnam thar ngo bo ste// mdog gis zhi sogs phyag mtshan yang // rigs rigs las dang mthun pa dag/ nye ba'i nyon mongs 'byung ba bzhi// byams sogs tsar tsa la sogs so// 'dog zhal phyag mtshan sngon dang

443b5(rgyud 'grel): ltar lta yi de nyid do// de nas mtshan ldan dbang thob cing // rigs dang saM la ldan pa la// rnal 'byor bsgrub cing dbang bskur la// blo ma ngag las 'dir blang bya// shes rab ye shes bzhi pa yang // slob ma bzang la sbyin
443b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de nas slob dpon las kun bstan// lho sgo la sogs phyogs bzhi ru// rin chen pad+ma rdo rje dang // 'khor lo'i gdan la de bzhag la// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sems can kun la thams cad du
444a1(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// rin chen chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// rin chen gnas su pad+ma sogs// smras la rjes su gnang ba sbyin// de nas rdo rje'i brtul zhugs dbang // sngon bzhin rdo rje dral
444a2(rgyud 'grel): bu sbyin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa sa ma ye tiSh+Tha e Shas+t+ra/ d+ha ra yA mi hi hi hi hi he hUM/ de ring sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na gnas// phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// khyod kyis rtag tu bzung bar

444a5(rgyud 'grel): to uta ti t+yA a ta ta na d+ha b+ha wa sing d+ha ye kye che ge mo zhes bya ba tA thA ga ta satwa sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu wa swa/ phyag rgya sngags 'di'i mthu yis ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// khyod ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// 'gri
444a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu ni lung ston 'gyur// de nas dbugs dbyung dam tshig sbyin// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi// khams gsum ni sdig med pas// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar// khyod kyi nam yang mi bya'o// mtha
444b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya ha na hU~M phaT/ de ni sngags brjod pa'o// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'drir// mthong dang zhugs pas dbang bskur bas// sdig pa kun las rnam grol nas// khyod ni dge ba nyid du gnas// gang phyir bde chen thig
444b2(rgyud 'grel): chen 'dir// yang yang mchi ba yod pa min// gzung dang bcing bar mi nus pas// 'jigs med dag par 'gro don gyis// srid pa shin tu dag pas na// khyod ni srid pa sdug bsngal bzlog/ rdo rje phyag rgya bya ba 'di// gang zhig
444b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid 'thob the tshom med// byang chub sems ni btang mi bya// dam pa'i chos kyang mi spong zhing // smang bar bya ba ma yin no// mi shes pa'am rmongs pa la// 'di ni smra bar mi bya'o// rdo rje dri bu'i
444b4(rgyud 'grel): phyophyag rgya dag/ nam yang btang bar mi bya'o// slob dpon dag kyang mi spang ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rang gi de nyid mi spang zhing // bka' thub kyis kyang gdung mi bya// ji ltar bde bas bde bzung nas// 'di ni ma

444b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu 'am bcu gcig dbul ba yang // rdo rje dril bzung skyob dpon gyis// de nyid gsum brjod spyod par bsam// yaM raM a a oM aHhUM/ mas yar rim pas de dag kun// sngo dmar dkar 'od dmar dang ldan// dkar
445a1(rgyud 'grel): nag rim pas bsgom par bya// de nyid gsum brjod rang sa bon// hUM gi 'od dang bcas par sbar// yaM las ba dan gyis mtshan pa'i// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu dbyibs sngo// raM las raM ldan gru
445a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dmar// a gcig skyed po mgo rlon gsum// gcig ni bdud rtsi'i snod gyur pa// hUM dang bi mu shu ra dang // da ha go kun rnams kyang // phyogs mtshams sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga// sa bon ltas la gsal ba dang // oM dang a
445a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM gsum brjod la// sa bon rnams las bdud rtsir gyur// ba~M la thug pas a bzla bo// der ltung hU~M de gyur rdo rje// gyur pas bdud rtsi 'bar sbyangs bya// rdo rje'i lte bar zla ba hUM// oM gyi 'od dang bcas pa yis// ye shes bdud
445a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsi der dbab bya// rang nyid 'khor lo'i lha rnams dang // dkyil 'khor lha rnams bdud rtsi myang // de nas phyogs skyong phyogs phyogs su// yod pa de dag gsal bar bsam// shar du rgya byin dkar po ni// g.yas na rdo rje dril bu
445a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon// yum bcas dur khrod rin chen rgyan// glang po dkar po zhon pa gcig/ g.yas su tshangs pa sor po ste// 'khor lo mtshan ma g.yas dang g.yon// g.yon na stobs rgyu ljang gu dang // zhing skyong glang po'i mgo bo can//
445a6(rgyud 'grel): lho ru gshin rje nag po ste// dbyug pa zhags pa ma he zhon// g.yas su nye dbang ser po ni// ral gri ba dan g.yas dang g.yon// g.yon du dung skyong ser po dang // zhing skyong nag po me he'i gdong // nub tu chu lha dmar po ste/
445b1(rgyud 'grel): chu srin sbrul zhags chu srin zhon// g.yas su khyab 'jug smug po ste// 'khor lo sbrul zhags g.yas dang g.yon// g.yon du mtha' yas sngon po dang // zhing skyong chu srin gdong can dmar// byang du gnod sbyin nor sbyin ser// shing
445b2(rgyud 'grel): tog ne le rta dkar zhon// g.yas na dbang phyug chen po sngo// rtse gsum pad ma g.yas dang g.yon// g.yon na nor rgyas dmar po dang // zhing skyong rta yi gdong can ljang // dbang ldan 'byung po'i bdag po dkar// rtse gsum zhags pa
445b3(rgyud 'grel): khyu mchog zhon// g.yas na smin drug pu ni sngo// mda' gzhu gnyis ni g.yas dang g.yon// g.yon na 'dzeg po dkar po dang // zhing skyong khyu mchog dkar po can// ma ru me lha dmar po ste// phreng ba spyi blugs ra yi khri// g.yas na
445b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bdag dkar po ste// dbyug gu pad+ma g.yas dang g.yon// g.yon na rigs ldan ser po dang // zhing skyong ra yi mgo can dmar// bden bral srin po dmar po ste// gri dang thod pa ma'i khri// g.yos na stobs bzang dmar po ste//
445b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na ral gri g.yon na phug/ g.yon na pad+ma dmar po dang // zhing skyong srin po'i mgo can dmar// rlung du rlung lha sngon po ni// ba dan zhags pa sha ba zhon// g.yas na legs ldan nag po ste// g.yas na gri khug g.yon
445b6(rgyud 'grel): pa drung // g.yon na pad+ma chen po dkar// zhing skyong sha ba'i mgo bo can// 'di dag thams cad rus pa dang // rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan// chung ma bu dang 'khor g.yog bcas// sna tshogs gzugs dang mtshan ldan
446a1(rgyud 'grel): bskum// wA la lU yi 'khor dang ldan// lha min ma ni phyogs sbyang 'khor// klul ngan 'gro gsum par 'khar// bsam zhing phyug rgyu bzhis 'dug / stang rdzas 'asngal dang mchad/
446a2(rgyud 'grel): pas byams// byams pa'i sbyin par 'di bshad do// de kun rang rang yid dga' bas// snyoms 'jug tshul du bsrubs pas ni// thams cad bdud rtsi'i gzugasu gyur// oM hU~MH'khor lo phyag mtshan las// shar du rnam

446b2(rgyud 'grel): byed 'og phyogs skyong // rdo rje zhe stang 'jigs dang mtshungs// dkar dang dmar po glayas dang g.yon// rdo rje ral gri g.yas gnyis na// pad+ma 'khor lo gI yon par 'dzin// thams cad yum bcas nyi zla dang // rdo rje 'khor

446b4(rgyud 'grel): bya chos nyid dang // bde ba chen po rtogs par bsgom// me tog spos dang mer me dri// zhal zas sgra dang rol mau dbul// aM in+d+ra ye sahAM/ tIHya ye swahA/ Sh+TaMHwa ru Na ye sAhA/ wi ku be ra ye swAhA/ kri I sha na ye s+yAH
446b5(rgyud 'grel): d+hi ag+na yai sar+b+ba/ nA naM ri trI ye s+yAt+ma/ na bA ya be yi sAtra/ dzA tsan+da ye swaH/ dzA an ye saH/ phaT brAd+d+hA ye sAn+ta/ phaT baM ma tsi tI ne srAH/ sarba b+h+ye te b+h+yo sA swAH/ ha ha/ hi hi/ huM hu te te/ ho ta/
446b6(rgyud 'grel): pheM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni zang zing sbyin pa'o// / de nas rdo rje dril bzung la// gti mug rdo rje ngo bo khyod// gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// ston pa sangs rgyas
447a1(rgyud 'grel): kun rang bzhin// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod // gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa// rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal

447b2(rgyud 'grel): lha'i mtshan ma de bzhin no// zhi la til sogs rgyas laM zho// dbang la me tog dmar po bya// gsang ba lan tshwa ske tshe dug/ mar la sogs pas rdzas rnams dbul// thob bsang me zhi rab tu sbar// bram ze rgyal po rje rig

448a1(rgyud 'grel): g+na ye swA hA/ u dum wa ra'i'o// oM badz+ra bo d+hi brik+Sha ye swAhA/ byang chub shing gi'o// oM badz+ra la ta ye swA hA/ blag sha'i 'o// oM badz+ra ku ba ra ya swA hA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o// oM badz+ra d+ha da ye swAhA/ 'o ma'i'o// oM badz+ra d+ha hi ye swA hA/

448b3(rgyud 'grel): ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA// zhes brjod la bsku'o// de nas shun pa lngas bsku ste// oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+ho \u0f85haM/ zhes pas bkru'o// de nas las kyi bum pas bkru// ji ltar bltam pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol

449a2(rgyud 'grel): rdul snod dag tu nI// 'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi yis// gser gyi thur mas spyan dbye ste// oM tsak+Shu sa man ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni badz+ra swA hA/ de nas gong gi gsol bstod bya// 'gro kun gti mug gzir mthong nas// zhes pas gsol/

453a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas sems ma'i rgya// spyi bor gzhag pa sngags brjod pas// spyi bor rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan// mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gung mo rtse sbyar te// mdzub mo'i gung mo'i tshigs
453b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la// yid tsam bcag la lhag par sbyar// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya ste// dpral gzhag rnam snang gis ni mtshan// gung mo rin chen gzugs ltar bya// rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgya ste// rna g.yas steng
453b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhag rin chen mtshan// sder mo pad ma'i myu gu ltar// byas la gung gnyis rtse sprad de// yid rtsam thur du gzhag byas la// chos kyis rdo rje ma yi rgya// lhag par gzhag pas snang mtha' byas// rdo rje thal mo sbyar
