553a3(rgyud 'grel): pas 'khor lo gnyis bris te/ hoH'i yi ge'i bar du ming bcug la/ nag nag la sogs pa kha dog ngan pa spungs pa'i rdza phor kha sbyar du/ mar dang sbrang rtsis yang dag par bkang ste skud pa dmar pos bcings la gzhag go/ de nas
553a4(rgyud 'grel): kha nub tu bltas la/ gshin+da rje gshed dmar po'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pas/ thun gsum du me tog dmar pos mchod cing / zla ba dmar po la gnas pa'i bsgrubs bya kha dog dmar po bsams te/ rang gi lus las 'od 'phros pa'i 'od
553a5(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis rab tu bkang bas shin tu myos par gyur te/ rkang pa gnyis kyi mdun du 'gyel bar bsam zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o// gal te dbang du ma gyur na mar dang sbrang rtsi spangs pa'i 'khor lo kho na/ seng ldeng sol ba'i dud pa
553a6(rgyud 'grel): meng pa'i me lo gdung bar ba'o// de dog gi sngags ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na ne hU~M hU~M phaT phaT toHche ge mo ma ma ba sha~M ku ru dza/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT ba She Ta che ge mo ba sha ma na ya ShaT/ dbang gi che ga'o//
553b1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod kyi rus sa ma ra dza sa las byas pa'i ras la chos kyi khu bas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ yi ge dza'am tiH'i bar du bcug pa'i ming bris te/ rdza per kha sbyar ram bud med kyi thod pa kha sbyar gyi bar du gzhag la/
553b2(rgyud 'grel): gos dmar pos gtums te me tog dmar pos mchod cing / rgongs thun nyi mu lta bu'i gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sku zhags pa dang ljags kyu 'dzin pa bsams la/ bsgrub bya'i snying gar lcags kyus phrog cing / ske nas zhags
553b3(rgyud 'grel): pas bcings la drangs par bsam// gral te 'ong bar ma gyur na dr-i nas seng ldeng gri ma la gdung par bya'o// oM hrIHShIHbi kr-i tA na na hUM phaT phaT dzaHdwe ba dat+taM A kArba ya dzaHrkang pa dgug pa'i cho ga'o//
553b4(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod kyi ras la ba bla'am yung ba'i khu bas/ 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ yi ge lam gyi khongs su bcug pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming bris te/ rdza phor ser po kha sbyar du gzhag/ rdza phor la re khA gru bzhi pa bdun bris te/
553b5(rgyud 'grel): de steng du ri rab lcog chen po brgyad dang ldan pa yi gre hUM nang du bcug pa/ lcog gi steng du sa'i dkyil 'khor li gyis mtshan pa/ sna tshigs rdo rjes bskor ba skud pa ser pos bcings te/ bdag nyid gshin rje gshed ser po bsams
553b6(rgyud 'grel): la bsgrub bya ser po kha lhor bltas nas sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'dug pa la/ gser gyi ri bdun dang ri bo mchog rab kyis mnan cing / sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan par bas
554a1(rgyud 'grel): te bzlas par bya'o// oM d+hIHts+tshiHbi kr-i tA nA nA hUM dz+nyA phaT phaT laM de ba ban+d+ha sas+thA na k+ShaM b+hA ya lAM/ mnan pa'i cho ga'o// mnan par 'dod pas/ de bzhin du ming nang du bcug pa'i 'khor lo gnyis mngan
554a2(rgyud 'grel): par bris te/ l+ya nga ba dat+ta s+yA y+ya thA ra b+hU kA ra ya kr-I tI n+ti/ wA ra ya dz+ya bi ruM piM gaM de wa dat+ta yadz+nyA data ta s+yA wAka s+t+ra b+hU ni krU ru laM/ bzlas pa byas pas mnan par bya ste/ ngag man+dan par bya ste/ ngag mnan pa'i cho ga'o//
554a3(rgyud 'grel): sprugs par 'dod pas du khrod kyi ras le 'khor lo gnyis mngon par byis te/ lcang de bai dat+tas+thA mA bAn yuM ba~M// zhes pa nang du gzhog/ gshin rje gshing myi sbyor ba yis/ bausmai b+hA byA lkug gi snyi du rab tu zhugs shing / sa'i dkyil
554a4(rgyud 'grel): khor ba'i yi swA ba ma tr-ig+na lA~M bA d+yA b+hU stAr dru byas te/ rengs pa'i sbyor ba'i tsho gas 'khor lo gnyis bri ba dang / sgom pa dang munan par byas nas bzlas par byan oM d+hi Sh+T+rIHbikr-i tA na nai hUM hU~M phan+d+ha phuT pa de bad+yA
554a5(rgyud 'grel): s+thA ma?sa? m+b+hak+Sha k+kA dug+h+r-i s+m+R+YuM chosna yis gos pa rmongs pa dz+dzarIR+YA// mya zung gyi nas la ste me n+na / dzi ts+tsha hrI Ats+tsho TA dang / nim pa'i ma dang / ma m+b+ha 'i/ dzu ba~M biHsa~M/ ro mAM bas pa'i
554a6(rgyud 'grel): bo dang / rang gi sdigs mdzub kyi khrag gis sdug tsha byas la// bya rog go sgro rkang gi smyu gus 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ yi ge hUM gi nang du bsgrub bya'i ming gzhug/ kha lho phyogs su bltas pa gzhan rma tra
554b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can/ zhabs g.yon brkyang bas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ bzhin mi sdug cing mche ba gtsigs pa/ shin tu mi bzad cing zhal gyi ljags glog lta bur 'gyur ba/ bskal pa'i me lta bu'i 'od zer can phyag mtshan
554b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phyar ba/ char 'bab pa'i sprin lta bu/ lto ba che zhing dbu skra drang sma ra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ mgrin pa'i dbugs chu 'dzan gyi glog lta bu/ hUM gas yongasu gang bar bdag nyid rnam par byasams te/ 'dun du
554b3(rgyud 'grel): du bsgrub byi gos dri ni rdul po gyon cing / lus thams cad thal bas byugs shing me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ spyi bo dang 'tshogs ma dang / snying ga dang lag pa'i rtsa ba dang pus mo rnams kyi sngags kyi tshogs byas pa'i go
554b4(rgyud 'grel): dang srung ba rnams dang phral nas de'i lus la gnas pa'i lha rnams drangs shing bsdus te/ rang gi lus la rab tu btsug pas/ de nas khrong pa stong pa lte bur bltas la/ khro bo'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs/ mtshon tshwa rnam pa sna tshogs
554b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag na'i phyar ba sprul te/ bsnun cing dum bu brgya stong du byas nas/ sha dang tshil bu dang rus pa rnams za zhing / khrag kyang 'thungs la bsregs shing thal ba byas nas/ mdun gshin rje char 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi mdog can
554b6(rgyud 'grel): lta bu ma hi la gnas pa/ dbyigs te dang zhags pa 'dzin cing lto ba che ba/ zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa'i gzugs su rnam par bsams te/ de'i snying gar gnas te nges za bar bsams la/ sngags bgrang
555a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// de nyid kho na'i cho gas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ yi ge hUM dang phaT kyi nang du ming bcug pas de bzhin kho na'i bsam gtan la gnas pas/ bsgrub bya lha dang bral zhing kha drug can me'i
555a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la gnas shing / khro bo'i gzugs mi sdug pa rnams pa sna tshogs kyis ral gri dang / mtshon shing dang / dgra staM dang / mdung dang / zhags pa dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum dang / lcogs tho la sogs pa'i
555a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha rdeg pa dang / dum bu brgya ru bcad par bsam+b+ha zhing / bya rog dang 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / ce spyang dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis za bar bsam zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o// oM hrIH
555a4(rgyud 'grel): Sh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA naHhUM hUM phaT phaT de ba dat+taM mA rA ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+TIHbi kr-i tA na na hUM de ba dat+taM mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ gsang ba'i cho ga'o// / de bzhin du 'khor lo bsgrub bya'i ming phaT kyi nang du bcug pa bris te/ thod pa kha
555a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar du gzhag laM/ skud pa sngon pos dkris pa ste/ nyi ma phyed kyi dus su dur khrod dong brus la bcug la/ gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ bsgrub bya gnyis rta dang ma he la zhon cing / lag na mtshon cha 'phyar ba/
555a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pas gnyis ka gnas por sprul te/ 'thab mo byed par bsam zhing sngags bzlas te/ oM dz+haiHSh+T+rIHbi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phoT de ba dat+taM yadz+nyA dat+ta b+he de sha ya phaT/ sdang ba rnam par dbye ba'i
555b1(rgyud 'grel): tshichoga'o/ 'khor lo de nyid kho na g+hanyis su yi gI ts+tsha dang phaT mi khongs su bcug pa bris la thong pu khyA sbyar byas nas smyuspyad pa nag pos dkris te/ dur khrod du sras la gshin rde g+ha b+heng g+h+ri g+hor byA dang ldan pa'i mdun du
555b2(rgyud 'grel): las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ de thog tu dz+nyA mo// de'i thig tu bsgrub bya rnam pa sngon po bsams te/ rdo rje khro bos brab cing lho phyogs su 'gro bar bsams la sbeng par 'gyur ro// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na ne hUM hU~M phaT phoT dzi bad
555b3(rgyud 'grel): uts+tshu Ta ya phaT phaT/ bskrad pa'i cho ga'o// khro bo gshin rje gshed mthar byed ni shin tu dmar ba/ sbyor ba ni dur khrod kyi thal ba dang / dug dang / tshe dang / ske tshe dang / chu tsha
555b4(rgyud 'grel): bas dur khrod kyi ras lde 'khor lo gnyis/ gtor ma'i cho ga bstan cing gsungs pa dang / zla ba zla ba'i tshes bcu bzhi l-i sha lnga dang / bdud rtsi lngas bzlas pa'i yul la bskus shing ldan par byas na/ shin tu gdung
555b5(rgyud 'grel): b+habAr byed pa'i mchog khri phrag gcig gis 'byung po rnams// stong phrag gcig gis mkha' 'gro dang / yi dgas tshogs rnams gsod par byed/ bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag/ lus rnams thams cad 'ongadi
555b6(rgyud 'grel): yis byed// bzlas pa bye bas 'grub par 'gyur// bye ba lnga yis smos ci dgos// slongs mo za zhing mi bzlas te// ma spangs pa yang chags mi bya// dam tshig rtag tu brtan bya zhing // rnal 'byor chen po sngags bzla'o//
556a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rig pa'i sems can kun// byams pa'i sems ni rtagA tu byA// nyin+da re nying de zla re dang // lo re bzhin du rtag pA r+ya// dab+ha gA drug cu rtsa bzhi gtong // glu tor m+b+ha drug n+d+ha nA bzhi 'bul// zhen
556a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad zhi ba dang // bsod nams yang ni 'phel ba'i phyir// de las 'dir ni 'byung po yi// gau tor mi'i cho ga bstan par bya// dri chen dri chub sres pa'i chus// maN+Dal gru gsum byas nas ni// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor
556a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// phyogs skyong rnams ni yang dag dgug/ sngags 'di yis dgug par bya// sngags ni/ oM In+na ya hIHya mA ya Sh+NIHbA ru NA ya bi/ ku bai rA ya k+Shi/ I sha nA ya taM/ Ag+ni ye a/ nai ri ta ye nA/ bA ya bA na/ tsan+na ya hUH
556a4(rgyud 'grel): Ad+ha ya d+hI/ brAdz+dzi NAM phaT/ ba s+yA d+hA rA ye phoT/ baM ma tsI ta N+De s+ya/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo tAM/ hU~M hrIM tAM/ d+hA ts+tsha nAM/ pheM pheM pheMHsaSh+Ta/ zhes+yai pa 'dis rtag tu bzla' ba ji skad pre dang btung ba dzi snyed pa thams cad kyi phung gshin rje gsheng la
556a5(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya'o// de rnams 'dis mnyes par bya zhing bzod par gsol nas// ji ltar bde bar gshegs su gsol// bdag gis bsod nams ji snyed gang bsags 'di yis 'jig rten rnams// ma lus mya
556a6(rgyud 'grel): ngan rnam bcom de ni byang chub snod gyur te// bdog dang 'gro ba rnams kyang byang chub lam la nges sbyar nas// don dam bde bas legs ldan sangs rgyas sku ni thob par shog/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bu yi// grub pa'i
556b1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ya s+ya dwe b+hA ni/ sems can rnams su bran phyir du// gnas brnyan byung chub snyid byos mdzad/ dngal ga shin rje gshed kyi las chags kyi 'khar la'ang kha na nyid gsal byed pa zhes bya ba/ sgrub pa'i
556b2(rgyud 'grel): thab sa rdzogs so// paN+Di ta rdo rje gangan pa ni ska l-i ki'i zhal snga nas dang // dbul lo tsa ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// /
556b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ rak+ShA ya mA ri sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje dgra dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ gshin rje dgra de mar po la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM yig dmar po 'bar ba la me 'bar bar lta ste/ de'i steng du// aHyig gis
556b4(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi bum+b+ha pa'i snod chen po'o// de'i nang du go kud hA na bi r+ya shu mA mu/ de rnams thams cad 'o ma'i rang bzhin ltar rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i rjes sku snod kyi shar du glang po la zhon pa'i dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'o// lhor ma ha la
556b5(rgyud 'grel): 'on pa'i gshin rje dbyig pa 'chang ba'o// nub tu chu sbyin la zhon pa'i chu lta zhigs pa 'dzin pa'o// byang du gter laM zhon pa'i lus ngan po phyog na na kA lI dang bi dza~M bA ra can no// marA ra la zhon pa'i me lha phyag na phreng ba can no// bden bral
556b6(rgyud 'grel): du srin po ro la zhon pa ral gri 'debs pa'i phyag can no// rlung du ri dgas la zhon pa'i rlung lha rlung dar 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du glang la zhon dbang phyug rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa can no// dbus su tshangs pa'o// de'i mdun du zla
557a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lha phyag na ku mu ta can no// rgyab tu nyi ma la phyag na pad+ma can no// g.yas su sa'i lha mo dam bca' la mngon par phyogs pas bzhugs pa'o// g.yon du thag bzangs ris gzhon nu'o// de ltar yongs su bskor
557a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bzhugs po'i 'byung po'i tshogs ma lus pa skad cig gis stong pa nyid las sems can rnams yongs su gyur pa las gshin rje'i dgra'i skur dmigs te de rnams kyi ljags la rdo rje nas 'bru tsam bsgom se te de rnams la gtor ma nye bar
557a3(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar sngon gyi sa bon las bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i steng du/ hUM yig dmar po las skyes pa'i mi mgo rlo ya tshan pa'i dbyug tho nges par bsgom par bya'o// de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gan
557a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i hUM yig dmar po bsam par bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje hUM yig yongs su gyur par bsam par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das mA'i gsang bar 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma la aM yig dmar po yongasu gyur pa'o// de'i rjes su sngags brjod par bya ste/
557a5(rgyud 'grel): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de'i rje su lte ba'i 'og der pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du/ hrIHyig dmar po 'bar bar bsam par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das zhal cig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yon gyis thod pa
557a6(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis gang ba dang / g.yas kyis mi mgos mtshan pa'i dbyug tho dmar po 'chang ba/ ma he Sha'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma la bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o// shes rab ma dga' bas myos pa thod pa skam pos mgul ba brgyan pa/ zhal
557b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis ma/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig sbyor bas bzhugs pa/ de lta bur gyur pa'i gshin rje dag thun gsum mam bzhir bsgom/ gtor ma sbyin no// bu maM hI khAM hUM zhes pas dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa'i
557b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags so// oM in+d+ra ya hIHya ma ya Sh+TiHba ru NA ya bi/ ku be rA ya kr-i/ i shA na ya tA g+hA ya tAg+na ye A/ ne ne ri t+ya nA/ bA ya beny+tsan+na ya hUM/ ar+thA ya tsU pra h+ma NA yA phaT/ ba su d+hA rA yA phaT+ra/ be ma tsi tA Ne sA/ sarba b+hu te b+h+yo hA/ hI hI h+ni/
557b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM/ pheM pheM pheM swA hA/ gtor ma'i sdigaso// gang cung zad za ba de thams cad gshin rje'i dgra la dbul bar bya'o// slob dpon chen po blo bzang snying po zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i gshin rje'i dmar po'i sgrub thabs rdzo gos so// lho'i/
557b4(rgyud 'grel): skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i drage slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang blo skad gnyis/ smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// gshin rje gshed dmar yon tan 'byung gnas
557b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs chos// rgya gar dpe 'di bod kyi myi rtogs pas// dam pa se tsa'i rig 'dzin skad gnyis pa/ chos kyi bzang po'i dpe las gus pas bsgyur/ sa'i steng na ste zlos ltar gyur cig/
557b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya man+ta ka ni wa na na yo na ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo// de la re zhig dang por bdag gis
558a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad gshin rje gshed dmar po'i go 'phang la dgod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po bsgom par bya'o// snyam du bsams la/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyis
558a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'i chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur stong pa nyid ro gcig par bltas te/ stong pa nyid la rab tu thim pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad bdun brdzun gyi mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral zhing cir yang ma grub pa'i stong pa nyid du
558a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrim par bya'o// de'i ngang las skad cig gis ji ltar zlos phyogs pa'i rgya chen por bar mtshams med cing snying po gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje'i sa gzhi 'bar ba dang / de'i steng du bar du 'khrigs pas bum bu gcig tu gyur pa'i sri zhing
558a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i rdo rje ra ba dang / de'i steng du bar mtshams med par gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje'i mda'i dra ba dang / de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i bla ri dang / de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i gur 'bar ba dang / de'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa sor bro g.yas su shin tu
558a5(rgyud 'grel): drag po 'khor ba rtsibs kyi rtse mo la nye bar gnas pa'i shin tu 'jigs pa'i khro mo bcu dang bcas pa'i lte bri'i nang du/ rlung dang / me dang / chu dang / sa'i dkyil dang / ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs
558a6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i ma he mar nag shin tu khros pa rus rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyab tu/ gshin rje yab yum zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang bas mnar pa'i bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshing dmar
558b1(rgyud 'grel): po TI ma byed pa'i 'od can zhalnga gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas na khams gsu rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyug tho dkar po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na bdud ma lus pa'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ brgyad
558b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis lo'i rnam pa can/ mi mgo lnga'i phreng bas dpral bar brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang / klu brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa/ khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul bar 'phyang ba/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs bsnams
558b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sma ra dmar skya dbu skra dmar ser gyen la rdzes pa/ thung zhing sbom pa/ gsus pa che ba/ nyi ma lta bu'i spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa/ zhal khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhol ba cung zad gdangs pa/ khro bo'i tshul gyis
558b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhad pa'i zhal/ lcags bsgyur ba/ yum rdo rje ro langs mas mkhyud pa/ lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra grol ba/ phyag g.yon na gdug pa bdud kyi khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas
558b5(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje gri gug 'dzin pa/ ma go bo skam po lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyang ba/ de la gzhon yab nyid 'dra ba can bsgom par bya'o// de la sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i shar gyi 'dab ma la nyi ma la gnas pa'i gti
558b6(rgyud 'grel): mug gshin rje gshed sku mdog dkar po/ rdo rje tsa rtsi ka nag po la 'khyud la/ lho'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i phra mo gshin rje gshed sku mdog ser po/ rdo rje phag mo ser mo la 'khyud pa/ nub kyi pad+ma'i 'dab
559a1(rgyud 'grel): ma la/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sku mdog dmar po// rdo rje dbyangs can ma dkar mo la 'khyud pa/ byang gi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i phrag dog gshin rje gshed sku mdog
559a2(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu/ lha mo go rI ljang la 'khyud pa'o// gti mug gshin+da rje gshed la sogs pa'i dpa' bo bzhi ni zhal gtso/ phywa gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na rim pa bzhin 'khor lo dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang ral gri 'dzin pa/ phyag yon
559a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cang khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa// de las gzhan thams cad gtso bo dang mtshungs pa'o// rdo rje tsar tsi kA la sogs pa'i dpa' mo bzhi ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas rdo rje gri gug/ g.yon pa khwa
559a4(rgyud 'grel): gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ spyan gsum pa/ mche ba gtsags pa/ dbu skra grol ba bsgom par bya'o// me'i mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dob ma la/ mu men gser chab kyi bum pa/ tsa tu ra
559a5(rgyud 'grel): sa ma yas gang ba/ bden bral gyi mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ gser gyi bum pa ka sto ris gang ba/ rlung gi mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ byi ru'i bum pa sah+las gang ba/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma
559a6(rgyud 'grel): lang dngul gyi bum pa ga pur gyis gang ba/ bum pa bzhi ga yang kha thod pas bcad pa bsgom par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i rang nyid lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa'i thug
559b1(rgyud 'grel): karar sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i dbyug tho dkar po'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge hUM dmar pos mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o// de la bcom ldan 'das nyid la ni mi skyod pas rgyas btab pa'o// gti mug gshin
559b2(rgyud 'grel): g+hashed la sogs pa bzhi la nI go rims bzhin rnam par snang mdzod dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i snying po ni/ oM hrIH
559b3(rgyud 'grel): waM kr-i tA nan hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes pa'o// de ltar bshad par gyur mod kyang / phun tshogs sku ni dpag med de/ chu'i gter las chu 'dzin gyis/ chu blangs zad par mi 'gyur bzhin// gshin rje gshed dmar po rdzogs pa'i rnal
559b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor zhes byi bi/ mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ shwa k+ShA ya mA ri pa~M tadz+nyo pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin
559b5(rgyud 'grel): go shed dmor po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i mnA ngag/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo// dag cing dri med bdud bzhi 'joms/ dpa' bo ga shi ne rje gshed btud de/ dpal ldan gshin
559b6(rgyud 'grel): rje gshong rgyud las// smras pa bla ma'i lung gi bo shang // phyi dang nang dang gzhan rnams kyis// dus dgra'i tshol 'di shes bya ste// lho phyogs sa 'og rim pa bdun// sgo med mun khung bcu drug nas// chos kyi rgyal po'i la
560a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor dadabye ba 'bum bcas gshin rje ste// grub pa'i dngos grub phun sum tshogs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis nyi ma'i mdog ltar gsal// ma he la bzhugs de yi gshed yin te// ltar bcas 'jig rten
560a2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gtsug gis mchod // gdug cing gtum pa'i skye bo gang // log par ltung ba gai shin+da rje yin+da// snying rjes basbyin la gzhug pa'i phyir// tshwar gcod pa ni gshed yin no// ka li ya ste A li ma// ga yas dang g.yon
560a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gshin rje ste// kun dar ma ni dbus gnas su// gang zhig gnyis su med dri gshed // nyi ma zla ba'i lam gnyis por// 'gro ba gang yin gshin rje ste// de yang dbus su gang gnas pa// ye shes de ni gshed yin no// dman
560a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snying gi dbus song rtsa// nyon mongs ngo bo nyid yin no// srid pa'i rtsa ba gshin rjer bshad// rnal 'byor pa la tshul de nyid// ma gnas yang dag ye shes nyid du 'gyur// da ni de yi gshed yin no// gzung pa ya ste 'dzin
560a5(rgyud 'grel): rtog ma// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog ni// 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gshin r+d+he ste// a ni rnam par skye ba med// ri ni gang yon snying rje'o// stong nyid snying rje ro gcig pa// mi gnas mya ngan 'das te gshed// gang zhig lus ngag
560a6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi ni// snyings ma gang yin gshin rje ste// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis// dngas par gyur pa gshed yin no// mdor na srid pa'i kun rtog tshegs// gang yin gshin rjer bshad pa ste// rnam par dag
560b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ye shes sku// kun mkhyen pa ni gshed du gsungs// lte snying 'grin pa spyi bar ni// bdud bzhi gnas pa gshin rje ste// mthar byed bzhi ni gshed yin no// ya la sogs pa'i yi ge ni// ma dag las kyi gshin rje ni// mi
560b2(rgyud 'grel): babang srid pa'i las kyis gzir// dag pas dpal ldan dus kyi dgra/ srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol zhing // dngos grub bde chen mchog ster yin// ya ma gnyis su 'dzin pa ste// spros med 'od gsal an tararA brjod//
560b3(rgyud 'grel): ka yig bla mas bstan pa nyid// gshin rje mthar byed ces byer grags// 'tsho ba zhes bya srog tu brjod// 'tsho ba'i dbye ba zhes bya ba// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i srog/ 'od gsal rnam par mi rtog pa// srog gi gsang
560b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di gang gis shes// thams cad grub cing rang dbong 'gyuraro// gzhan yang srid dang zhi bo las// srog ni de bzhin gnyis su brjod // dngas ma dang ni skyigs mar gnas// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// bla ma'i thugs
560b5(rgyud 'grel): shes bya ste// mi phyung brtan pa'i gus pa yis// ltos pa med pa'i bsnyen bkur bya// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// mi 'gyur ba ni srog gi mchog/ de las gzhan pa'i bskyod pa yi// yig 'bru rnams dang phyag mtshan dang // phyag
560b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya snying po la sogs pa// rgyal ba sras bcas srog yin te// dang pas thug so dam bskul bar bya// stong nyid snying pa'i snying rje can// rnal 'byor lam pa rnams kyi srog/ dngos grub chen po 'dod rnams kyi// srog ni ngam
561a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor dang bye ba 'bum bcas gshin rje ste// grub pa'i dngos grub phun sum tshogs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis nyi ma'i mdog ltar gsal// ma he la bzhugs de yi gshed yin te// lhar bcas 'jig rten
561a2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gtsug gis mchod// gdug cing gtum pa'i skye bo gang // log par ltung ba ga shin+da rte yin+na// snying rjes bskyon la gzhug pa'i phyir// tshwar gcod pa ni gshed yin no// ka li ya ste A li ma// g.yas dang g.yon
561a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gshin rje ste// kun dar ma ni dbus gnas su// gang zhig gnyis su med dri gshed // nyi ma zla ba'i lam gnyis bor// 'gro ba gang yin gshin rje ste// de yang dbus su gang gnas pa// ye shes de ni gsheng yin no// dman
561a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snying gi dbus song rtsa// nyon mongs ngo bo nyid yin no// srid pa'i rtsa ba gshin rjer bshad// rnal 'byor pA la tshul de nyid// ma gnas yang dag ye shes nyid du 'gyur// da ni de yi gshed yin no// gzung ba ya ste 'dzin
561a5(rgyud 'grel): rtog ma// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog ni// 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gshin rje ste// a ni rnam par skye ba med// ri ni gang yon snying rje'o// stong nyid snying rje ro gcig pa// mi gnas mya ngan 'das te gshed// gang zhig lus ngag
561a6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi ni// snyings ma gang yin gshin rje ste// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis// dngas par gyur pa gshed yin no// mdor na srid pa'i kun rtog tshegs// gang yin gshin rjer bshad pa ste// rnam par dag
561b1(rgyud 'grel): srog ni phyi dang nang du gnas// rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste// 'khor bar gnas pa rnams kyi srog/ stong nyid snying rje mi 'gyur bde// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i srog/ srid pa dang ni mya ngan 'das// rtsa yis bdag nyid
561b2(rgyud 'grel): lus la gnas// lte ba mgrin snying spyi bo la// rlung me chus zhes bya ba// phrag dog zhi sdang chags dang rmongs// lus dgra yid gsum mi phyed gnas// bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnas// sdug bsngal kun 'byung lam dang 'gog
561b3(rgyud 'grel): bden pa bzhi yi ngo bo nyid// rgyun mthun rnam smin skyes bu can// dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu bzhi// srid pa'i skye gnas bzhi po dang // e baM ma yA yi ge bzhi// de bzhin ya mA rA dza bzhi// spyan dang mA ma gos dkar sgrol// yum bzhi
561b4(rgyud 'grel): po yi rnam pa ste// g+ha shrIn rje shes rab pad+ma dang // bgegs shes bya ba mthar byed bzhi// tshad med bzhi dang mthar byed bzhi// dga' ba bzhi dang skad cig bzhi// dam tshig las chos phyag rgya che// phyag rgya che yi rang bzhin no// rig
561b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ye shes bzhi yi dngos// sku bzhi ye shes bzhi dang ldan// kha mos gsum la sogs thams cad kyi// bdag nyid chen po rdo rje 'dzin// bdud kyi bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir// de phyir gsong bya bshad par bya// A li kA li'i sbyor
561b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yisad lus ngag yid gsum bsrung bar bya'o// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar gsal bas// A li kA li'i rab brjod pas// spyi gtsug nas ni rkang mthil bar// shos rab thabs kyis skor phyogs su// mi phyed par ni bcing
562a1(rgyud 'grel): bar byas A li kA li rtsa gnyis po// thabs dang shes rab yi ges bsrung // gnyis med rtsa ni rdo rje bsrung / phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid do// rang gi gsang sngags rgyal po la// shes rab thabs kyi ye shes mchog
562a2(rgyud 'grel): thog ma nas ni mtha' ru sbya ro// AM AHhUM phaT sbyor ba yis// hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje yis/ rang gi gsang sngags brtan par la gyur ro// rang ming rigs kyi yi ge ngag/ ya dang ma yi nang bcug ste// A li kA li gnyis med pa'i//
562a3(rgyud 'grel): za ma tog gi nang son la// lte ba'i chu skyes 'og tu sngas/ brgya byin gyis kyang mi tshubs na/ sha dz+ra phra mo smos ci dgos+ya// thabs dang shes rab ro gcig pa// rnam par mi rtog bde ba che// 'od gsal ting 'dzin mchog gi ni// lhag
562a4(rgyud 'grel): nga'i bsrung ba gzhan med do// sa chu bos kyang mi phyed // a IM/ i I/ A I/ r-i rau/ laM l-I/ e AM/ o IM/ aM AHau a ra pa tsa mr-i hUM phaT/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dz+wa dz+nyA nya/ Ta brA Da Da Na/ ta tha da d+hA na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma
562a5(rgyud 'grel): ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa hak+Sha/ shes rab yi ges 'jig rten dang / 'das pa'i bsgrub bya dbang du 'gyur// rtag tu bsgrub pa paM rnams// thabs kyi yi ge brtan par 'gyur// yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags kyis// lhag pa'i
562a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga ni mnyes par bya// bla ma'i man ngag rjes 'brang 'di// blo ldan slob mas bskul ba'i phyir/ mi long lngar gsol byas pa la// bla ma ltar bcas bzod mdzad rigs// dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun// bdud bzhi'i ngagra las
562b1(rgyud 'grel): Asnru ga/ gawAn sh+le shA ts+tsha bA pa wAnAH sa byA g+h+rar+b+ha kA R+Sha Sh+Tab+h+ya twAt+yA bAd+d+ha bas smra sa dang pa rmugs sag pa da/
562b2(rgyud 'grel): grub brnyes pa d+hA ra pAr+Na a tsar+ya de nyid dang / glo bo lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis/ chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi gzungs su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/
562b3(rgyud 'grel): rAk+ShA ya mA ri de shi pA d+hI wA na/ bod+ma skad du/ gshin+da rje mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyi sa brlab pa'i rim pa/ khams gsum po nI ma lus pa// snying rjes chags pa'i ngo bo nyid// bde chen gshin rje gshed po la// btud de 'dar
562b4(rgyud 'grel): ni byin brlabs bshad// de la 'drir ni rim pa 'dis// rnal 'byor byang chub 'dod pa yis// dad pa chen po brtan byas te// bla ma'i kha las shes par bya// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gsang sngags dang // bla ma bkur dang mkha' 'gro
562b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen// ji ltar gsungs pa'i rdo rje la// mchod sogs las su rung bar bya// maN+Dal sogs yo byad dang // bum pa dkyil 'khor gsang sngags brI// lha yi gzugs brnyan gsal ba dang // bzlas dang mchod sogs
562b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon 'gro bas// bgegs sbyang gsol ba gdab pa dang // dam chog gzung dang sems bskyed bya// oM badz+ra yo ga tsit+to twA da yA mi su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hiM sid+d+hi badz+re ya thA su khaM/ de nyid gsum gyi skad cig la// lus
563a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs ye shes gsum du bya// ji skad gsungs pa'i man+da ngag gis// rang nyid ye shes dran pa dang // rdo rje sgra ni brjod par bya// cho ga las byung chu sogs lnga'i// ji bzhin dbang ni sbyin5// 'dod na rang snying pad
563a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dab la// yi ge lnga ni dgong par bya// hUM b+h+rUM aM dzing khaM kha dog lnga yi 'od zer gyis// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// sangs rgyas la sogs yon+da tan tshogs// 'od ni gsal bas yang dang yang // bkug nas spro dang brtan par bya// rdo rje
563a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang dbyer med pa// skad cigo nyid la thob par 'gyur// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// gsang sngags rgyal po bris pa yis// maN+Dal byin la 'di skad do// gdod nas rang bzhin rnam dag mchog/ 'od gsol srid
563a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum kun gyi bzhi// shin tu bde ba'i bde ba sde// sems kyis yid ni de ltar blta// bsdus te dmar pos thig le bya// bla ma'i man ngag gi rjes 'gro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas pa'ang sbyin// bu ga'i sbyor ba dam pa yis// yid ni bde
563a5(rgyud 'grel): ba tsan du 'phang // de ltar rte nI dang bArtan med par// gang la gang gis bdag gisu 'dzin ming // gdod nas skye ba mod pa yi// skye sogs spyos las 'das pas na// spros pa nyid ni spros med pas// zung 'jug 'od gsal bde tshan nyid//
563a6(rgyud 'grel): bde bas bde ba rtog pa'o// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ye shes che// gang na btsal yang mi rnyed de// bla ma mnyes thabs kha las so// de ni rtog pa tsam gyis ni// srid dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// 'ching ba kun spangs rnam grol gyi// ye shes
563b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni thob pa'o// 'jig rten gsum na mnyam pa spangs// 'di ni bla ma gshin rje'i dgra ra gyur pas// bdag la rjes su gzung bas dngos grub thob// de don gzhan la'ang sbyin phyir yi ge ru// bris la bla ma mkha' 'gro bzod
563b2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// phong la ma yin man ngag med la min shin tu ces pas phangs pas phangs par bya// de ltar bla ma'i drin las zab mo gsal phye bas// 'gro kun lhan cig skyes dga' bode pa'i gtso// kun khyab bde gsal me tog ye
563b3(rgyud 'grel): shes zung 'jug sku// thob nas bde bas bde la rnam rol dgyes par shog/ gshin rje mthar byed dmas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa grub thob kyi 'khor los bsgyur bA bram ze dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa
563b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha ra paN A tsAr+ya dang / glo bo lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyi bsgyur ba'o// / bong du 'gyur ba'i byin rlabs kyi bka' la 'di las zab pa tshang ba byin
563b5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs che ba mnyan pa/ brgyud pa dang ldan pa med pas su thod thong la ma byin// bsnyen pa yongasu ma rdzogs na mkha' 'gro mi'i bka' changad 'ong bas shin tu myanyan// rjes gnang ma thob par dpe'ang ma ston a zhes bla ma
563b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar shar phyogs pa gsung / sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// rgya gar skad du/ de wi d+ha ra pra b+hA d+hiSh+Tha na// bod skad du/ lha mo 'ong 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa/ bcom ldan
564a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das gti mug dga' ma la phyag 'tshal lo// ma lus srid pa'i gti mug rnams// mthar byed ma la rab btud nas// spros med bdud rtsi za ba yi// ting 'dzin gyis byin rlabs bshad// maN+Dal la
564a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs sta gon bya// bdag bskyed bzlas pa mchod gtor dang // 'khor lo tshogs kyis mnyes byas la// yon bcos dang pa'i slob ma la// sdom pa byin la dam la bzhag/ de nas 'dun po drag po yis// bla ma la ni gsos
564a3(rgyud 'grel): ba gdabA// pad+ma'i dbus gnas zla ba la// oM skyes lha mo mnyam bzhengs dkar// chu shel gri gug pad+ma'i snod// thugs kar 'dzin pa rgyan gyis brgyan// 'od dkAr 'phro 'du shel lta bu// de ltar gnyis kwa gsal byas nas
564a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i snying gir dzi bzhin gyi// lha mo 'thon+da te snying gar gzhug/ dwe yi brang dkyil I skyes pa// gri gug a si mtshan thod nang du// phyed nub tsam du bsam par bya// de yi 'od kyis khams gsum gyi// gnyis 'dzin 'khri ba kun
564a5(rgyud 'grel): bcad do// bdag med shes rab dam pa yis// sangs rgyas mchod de de rnams kyiso// stong nyid ye shes bkug la bstim// thod po'i 'od kyis srid gsum gyis// 'dzin pa'i duHkha kun gsal te// zag med bde bas
564a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gas mchod// mi rtog bde chen ye shes mchog/ bkug la gnyis su med par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde stong gi/ ye shes zung 'jug rmad byung gis// bdud rtsis lus gang brtan g.yo yi// bcud
564b1(rgyud 'grel): da bor bsams byas la/ b+h+ra ma'i ting 'dzin nus pas dbab// oM hrIHSh+TIHbI kr-i nA na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAt+ma/ a mo ta ra ti A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya hUM hUM dzA dzA dzA ya a U/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ li l+lI/ e AM/ o o/ a
564b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phyar dang g.ya drang nang pa dang / bde spyod d+ham+b+has nAM skye bar 'gyur// d+hI srid zan du khaMs prasmA nAs// yon phul mnyes pas dam tshig btsun// bru~M me bsten byas btsun par bye// bla ma bri ba mi bde ba'i// slob ma'i dngos grub
564b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa ni// chur shes smyig rgyu ji bzhin no// ting 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi byin brlabs grub thob kyi bdag po mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan
564b4(rgyud 'grel): bo de ba A ka ra dang / lho tsaM ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las// dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs pa Ni ta d+ha ra paN A tsar+ya dang lo tsa ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te slar dag par byas so// snga 'gyur
564b5(rgyud 'grel): la 'di tshan che tsamA ganga'o// gsungs so// / rgyu gar skad du/ pra b+hA wa d+hA ra sA d+hA naM/ bod skad du/ 'od 'dzin sgrub pa'i thabs/ bdud rtsi'i mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag
564b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// gang zhig gang zhig kha zas nyung ba yis// 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis phongs na// sems nyid bza bar bya ba'i phyir// ting 'dzin gyi bcud len bshad// gsum la skyabs song byang chub sems// gnas bzhi la sogs sngonas
565a1(rgyud 'grel): bas skad cig nyid lasna yul rnams dang // yul can stong pa'i dang nyid las// puM las 'tsho skyes dbus son pa'i// nyi ma'i dbus su lha mo ni// chu shel lta phu gri gug dang // bdud rtsi bum pa g.yas dang ga
565a2(rgyud 'grel): dar dkar gos dang rin chen rgyan// lang tsho rgyas shing sha rgyas ma// li pa'i sgra dang bung ba'i dri// mdzes ldan mA yo brang dbus// rang dang 'dra ba'i lha mo ni// dngas pa'i shel drung mu tAM ga ltar// dkar zhing 'tshar ba'i 'od can ba
565a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rang snying shing 'bras ltar// rtse mo gyen lta rtsa lnga dang // bcas pa phyed nas mtshon gyis gtsang // steng gi phyogs ni sangs rgyas lnga'i// rtswa dang bcas te ltos med dbul// nyon mongs lnga'i rtswa sbubs nas// dri ma ma lus bshad
565a4(rgyud 'grel): lam nas// 'thon te rgyu mtsho'i ngogs su bsgyur// rtsa stong bum pa'i bdud rtsis bkang // lus dang rtsa dang khams bdud rtsi// ye shos rgyal po'i rlung rgyus te// khru ma mar gyis gang ba ltar// rang gi lus dang dri bzhin sems// zag med
565a5(rgyud 'grel): bye bas rab rgyas te// dmigs shing spros pa bcas pa yi// ting 'dzin la gtad de gzhag/ de ltar yang yang gos pa yis// ting 'dzin zas su mi 'gyur pa'i// srin bu kun yang 'dzag 'gyur bas// dadon bya phyir gsang sngags dang /
565a6(rgyud 'grel): smon lam che la 'bad par bya// de ltar rten na zag med kyi// ting 'dzin mchog ni skye ba dang // gnyid rmugs la sogs byed pa'i zas// til tsam dgos par mi 'gyur ba'i// sgra dkar gnyer mi spong ba dang // lus rgyas dngos shing na
565b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgyas thig le rgyas shing 'jig mi 'gyur// dus min mchi byas mi gos te// phyi nang 'kha' 'gro bran du 'gyur// 'dre sogs gnod par mi 'gyur zhing // 'gro kun dga' zhing dbang du 'gyur// ci 'dod dam pa'i mchog lta ster te// 'dod
565b2(rgyud 'grel): sred ma lus rab bcang nas// dus kyi dgrar ni myur 'gro'o// de ltar blo mas gnang ba yi// mAn ngag gsal la nongs mchis rnams// bzod par gnang zhing de yi ni// dge bas gshin rje gsod gyur cig/ 'od 'chang ma'i sgrub
565b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs ting 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi man ngag ting 'dzin la mnga' brnyas pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// lo pAn snga ma dang 'dra/ 'di'i man ngag cig sngar yang snyan brgyud du byung 'dug
565b4(rgyud 'grel): stedagazhung sngar ma 'gyur gsung // / rang gi sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag byin rlabs dang bcas pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros pa chen po zhe sdang gshin rje la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor
565b5(rgyud 'grel): gang la phyi dang ni// nang gi 'chi ltas brtag bya ste// nges par 'chi 'gyur rlung las te// gsum mam lto 'am bdun la sogs// g.yas g.yon rlung ni ma 'gyur na// nang gi rtswa dang rlung thog le// las mi rung
565b6(rgyud 'grel): bas mchi ltas su// brtags nas glu ba'i rnal 'byor bya// g.yas nas lnga dang g.yon nas gcig/ skyes dang sdud pa'i khyad par ro// glo g.yas sa la phab byas nas// brla g.yon steng du rkang g.yas bzhag/
566a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi rkang mgo spring bar sgril// lag g.yon nu mnyes mchan khung gzhug/ lus mjid dpung pa g.yas la bskur// dpung pa g.yas pas khA bcus la// rdo rje'i bzlas pas slu bar bya// nges
566a2(rgyud 'grel): 'pho bar ma gyur tshe// rngubs la mtho chung g.yas kyis bkag/ g.yon nas 'gro 'ong bya ba dang // rlung bcing min ngag gdam pa'o// 'khrul 'khor bzlog ste bya ba ni// g.yon nas 'bro bar 'dod na'o// de ltar phyi
566a3(rgyud 'grel): dus chos grangs la// brtags nas gal tI mi 'pho na// dus la bab pas rnams shes 'ab // 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan la yang // zhen pa'i tsA ba rab bcing nas// longs spyod lus dang ngag la sogs// lha dang bla ma
566a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro drug la// ltos pa med par mchod sbyin bya// lus la chags dang zhen pa ni// skad cig tsam yang mi bya'o// gnas dang grogs sogs gzhalnga med dang // lhararA ni yang dang yang dran pas// bla ma 'ba' zhig bsam par
566a5(rgyud 'grel): byAbya/ drag ldan bsam pas skyabs song lo// dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po// dmigs pa'i spyi bor bsgoms byas nus// dbu ma gnyis ni sbyang byas la// snying dbus hUM las sgro rnams bklag/ sems rten d+hA ni yar
566a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phangs te// bla ma'i hUM ni snying ga khar bsdu// 'dod tshe 'og tu mi dgug go// yang na sgo gzhan bkag rjes la// rtsa gnyis thabs shes yi ges dgog/ snying dbus dbu mir zla khaM hUM// de stengs hUM ni skar mda' ltar/
566b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i rlung dang sbyar bar bya// yang na 'od kyis 'pho ba ste// gzhu dbyibs 'khrul 'khor bya rjes su// lta bar rlung bcas zla ba hUM// snying dbus gong bus bu ga dgag/ stobs kyi yi ges sems drangs nas// lha yi thugs
566b2(rgyud 'grel): kar 'phangs te bsre// gnas gzhan gang du skye 'dod par// yi ge gsum gyis drangs te 'phong // yang na spros med rnal 'byor pa// sna tshogs stong pa'i gzugs nyid las// 'od gsal dang du 'pho ba ste// phyag rgya chen po nyid
566b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// rang gi sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag slob dpon drang la 'dzin gyi gdams pa de nyid kyi mdzad pa'o// paN+Di ti rgya gar mngon shes can dang // bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gros khu bas bsgyur ba las// phyis so'i steng na 'gran
566b4(rgyud 'grel): zla dang bral ba d+hAr paN A tsAr+ya dang // mdun lo tsa ba shes rab rin chen gyi grong du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// / byin gyis rlabasa'i rim pa dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo//
566b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas ri dang dur khrod du// rim po gnyis dang bzlas pa dang // mdun bskyeng mchog dang gtor ma sogs// phul bla ma las lung nod// rang nyid dpal ldan dmar po'i sku// gong bu nyid du gsalo bA yi// n+ya gro d+ha'i
566b6(rgyud 'grel): sdong po ni// brgya byin gnas su sleb pa'i rtser// bla ma lhar lha dbu ma yai// sgo ni rab tu dbye bar bya// snying gnas hUM ni skar mnga' bzhin// steng gi sgo nas rab 'phangs te// rdo rje gsum dang dbyer med de// bsre ba gsu
567a1(rgyud 'grel): ni dran byas nas// spros med nyid la sems gzhag bya// ye shes chen pos byin rlob 'gyur// 'pho ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa dpal 'dzin chen pos
567a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / bla ma shar phyogs pa chen po d+ho ra par+Na A tsAr+ya dang // gr-i bo lo tsa ba dge slong pradz+nyA rat+na sa sku mkhar nyi gzungasu bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ag+ne de
567a3(rgyud 'grel): ba pU dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ me'i lha mchod pa zhes bya ba// ma lus gdug pa'i sems ldan pa// bla ma la ni sdang ba sogs// gzhom phyir drag bying tshi ga ni// gshin rje 'joms mdzad mchod phyir bshad// 'bum ni yongasu rdzogs
567a4(rgyud 'grel): pa nas// dge ba'i mtshan ma mthong 'gyur zhing // lha dang bla mas mthong 'gyur na// 'grub 'gyur gzhan du nyams par 'gyur// dus dang thabs dang rdzas dang ni// cho gas bsgrub par bya ba ste// rnam dag bzhir ni shes par bya// sgrub
567a5(rgyud 'grel): po sten pa mthar son dus// drag po'o stobs dang mig dmar sogs// drug po'i gza' skar rgyu ba'i dus// mar ngo'i zla ba'i bcu bzhi sogs// drag byed 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus// rgyu ni rlung ni rgyu ba'i dus// dgun smad mtshan phyeng
567a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyar gyi smad// sna bug g.yon nas rlung rgyu'i dus// g.yul 'gyeng la sogs skye bo rnams// rab tu 'khrug pa'i sems ldan dus// 'di ni drag po me yi lha// mchod pa'i rnam rig dus su bshad// de nas gnas kyi mtshon
567b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni// byang du gnas dang mdog nag dang // rtsub cing tsher ma skye ba dang // drag po'i lha tshogs gnas pa'i phyogs// de ni dran byed me'i gnas// thab sogs cho ga bshad par bya// thab khung gru gsum sor nyi shu// zab su sor
567b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu ldan pa ste// rdo rje dang ni rtse gsum bri// zla ba rdo rje mtshan sna tshogs// rdzas kyi rim pa bshad bya ba// rngo mo'i rtug pa rdo thal dang // me tog nag po cher ma'i shing // sor brgyad khrag spags tsha ba gsum// dug khrag skye tsha
567b3(rgyud 'grel): lan cha dang // dgra'i dri ma la sogs dang // mar til 'bres so nas sran gro dur ba ku sha thod par bsre// mdog nag gzugs dang rus sbal gzugs// zhe sdang so 'chang khro gnyer ldan// gdong nag mig ni dgrad pa'o// dgra
567b4(rgyud 'grel): bopo dgu dang bral zhing dbye// hUM ldan ku shas gsang gtor brim// oM badz+ra satwa a/ kU sha bkram la me ni sbar// shan pa 'am ro bsregs me yiswA so// aM ek+She dzA la dz+wA la raM/ me dbus raM las byung ba yi// ra nag zhon pa khros
567b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs// bgrang phreng ral pa dbyug pa can// drang srong nag pos bskor tsing+ge gnag/ de nas dgug cing spyan drangs te/ au AHhUM au e h+ye hi ma hA b+h+ye tA de ba raM Shi dwi dzA dzAHhUM baM toHau ag+ne kro d+hA dwe dza phaT/ au
567b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra NA~M ti khaM phaT/ oM badz+ra ar+g+ha phaT/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe phaT/ oM badz+ra d+hu pe phaT/ oM badz+ra A lo ke phaT/ oM badz+ra nai bi d+ya phaT/ oM badz+ri shaM p+ta phaT/ mchod pa'o// dzi a/ ku ru ku ru/ puSh+pa d+ha pa/ dI pa/ gin+d+ha/ nai bi d+ya/ shap+ta/ a~M
568a1(rgyud 'grel): dang swAHsa thog mthar brgyan// sbyang ba'o// chu gnyis ya ra de bzhin du/ me lha'i kha la rab bkrod la// pus mo'i bar+ya bcug lag pa yis// gsum mAm bdun du g.yas nas dbul/ ag ne/
568a2(rgyud 'grel): sarba pa paM da hA na/ badz+nyA ya/ bAdz+re puM sha ya/ sarba pA bau b+hA wa ti/ a pra ti d+ya ta ya/ hA bi ka ya/ ma hA baM la/ badz+ra g+hAsmA ri/ bo d+hi b+hok+ShA yA/ au dang swAt+tas thog mthar brgya ni/ oM ag+ni dI ba ro Shi mahA te dza gnod byed mA ra
568a3(rgyud 'grel): ya phaT/ de nas snying gar lha'i gzugs ji bzhin bskyed la de bzhin mchod// oM ya man+ta kA mu ka ta mu ka ta mA ra ya phaT/ oM hrIHSh+TiHbi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra bet+ti li/ a su kA mA ra ya phaT/ dzi ni dzika
568a4(rgyud 'grel): rat+na d+h+ri ka/ A ro li ka/ pradz+nyA d+hig/ mo ha ra ti/ dwe Sha ro tAM/ rA ga ra tI/ badz+ra rA tAM/ mung+ga ra d+h+r-i ka/ der+N+Na d+h+r-i kA/ pad+ma d+h+r-i ka/ khan+ma d+h+r-i ka/ a mu ka ma ra ya phaT/ tsas pa nau khyad par ro// de nas mchod cing bskyong de byis+dza// slar yang lhag
568a5(rgyud 'grel): mas drang srong mchod// tshangs mgon mchog gi sras po gzi dang ldan// me yi las ster 'jog rten me yi lha// 'bar ba'i nang na sku brjid rgyan gyis klubs// phyag 'tshal 'dod don byin la khyer brtson mdzod// bzod par gsol
568a6(rgyud 'grel): nas gshegs par bya// dngos grub zhu zhing lhag chad bskang // gsang dang rengs pa la sogs pa// ji ltar yi sbyor bas 'grub// de ltar gshin rje gshed dpal mchod pa yis// srid gsum nyon mongs bud shing kun
568b1(rgyud 'grel): sregs nas// 'gro ba'i mun sel ye shes lnga 'od 'byur// rdo rje mye yi go 'phangs la gnas shog+sa/ dngal gshin rje gsheng dmar po'i byed me cho ga zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad
568b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha ra paN a tsAr+ya dang / dge slong shwe rab rgyal mtshan gyis mang yul du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ amr-i
568b3(rgyud 'grel): tA d+hiSh+Tha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba// 'dzum pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas// gshin rje gshed dpal gnyer byed na// de yi bsten bya dam tshig ni// byin
568b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad// de la rnal 'byor pas dben pa'i'o gnas ri'i phug gaM dur khrod la sogs pa ma'i skye bos dben par byas la// bcud lam nyams pa'i dri chen dang // g+hon 'dzi dang / ba ru ra dang / a ru ra dang / zla ba dang /
568b5(rgyud 'grel): mA dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ramA dang / so ga'i dus ma yin pa'i dus su 'dus byas pa'i ba ra na dang / legs par sbyar ba'i ril bu u rin d+ha pa'i snod dang / la ba dmar po'i na bza' dang bcas pa sta gon du byas la/ ji
568b6(rgyud 'grel): blang bshang nga'i rim pa gnyis sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa dang gter ma 'ong phul zhing / slob dpon la yon phul nas 'khor la/ lhan cig skyes dga'i gnyug ma'i bde ba che/ gnyis med mnyam sbyor srong zhi dus
569a1(rgyud 'grel): dgra dpal ldan phyag 'tshal 'dir ni brtser dgongs nas// brtan g.yo 'jigs mdzad dam tshig mchog sgrol mdzod// ces lan gsum mo// de nas slob dpon gyis ji ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten thams
569a2(rgyud 'grel): cad de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo shes twa rang gi bu byin gyis brlab par bya'o// snying gar dbu ma'i nang du hUM // phyogs bzhir b+h+rUM a dz+riM khaM ngo // dbus dang mtshams bzhir mu be shu ma ra'o// kha dag ni rigs dang mthun par ro//
569a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du lte ba dang mgrin par dgod par bya'o// de nas lus kyi 'dug stangs dong rlung rlan par bya zhing / snying gi'i yi go las so so'i kha dog dang mthun pa'i 'od zer byung nas ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tham
569a4(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi dang sku dang gsung dang thuT dang yon dang phrin las sku lnga'i rnam par bkug s+ho// yi ge lho la so sor bsdu'o// de lta bu'i rim pa kho na ye shes lngas 'byung ba lnga sbyang zhing slar yang yum lnga'i rnam pas bsdu'o// de bzhin
569a5(rgyud 'grel): du lte ba dang mgrin pa las kyang ste/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa sbyang ba'i phyir ro// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras dus kyi dngos grub bsdu ba'i phyir ro// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dang / nyon mongs pa ni bdud te/ ye shes
569a6(rgyud 'grel): su byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ro// de yang dus gsum du gnas pa'i phyir ro// slar yang 'og gi 'khor lo yi ge dang bcas pa snying khe'i hUM li bsdu zhing yi ge brgyad kyang bsdus te/ de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad
569b1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bo hUM cha lnga pa'i rnam pas bstim zhing / oM d+hIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAh+ma/ pany+tsa mr-i tod+b+ha Ta sa ma yA tiSh+Tha badz+ra dzA dzaHhUM baM hoHmung+ga ra tI ha ha ha ha hUM/ spyi bor me tog dang bcas pas brtan
569b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ 'dod pa la sogs pa dang / dus gsum gyi dngos grub rigs lnga dang / dpa' mo lnga dang / ye shes lha la sogs pa'ang brtan g.yo thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par shis pa tsU 'di'o// zhes nges par
569b3(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ dag pa rjes su dran pas rnam par shes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid rtag tu chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos shing g.yo ba med pa nyid li sems gnas par
569b4(rgyud 'grel): byas la sems b+h+ra mas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas tshad myed pa'i sems kyis bzlas pa dang gdug pa can rnams bzlog par bya'o// ngo nas yang ji skad gsungs pa'i ril bu 'am+ba/ thong ba chang gis bka
569b5(rgyud 'grel): ba slob ma la sbyin zhing / dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo'i/ dngos grub bdud rtsi las byung ba// sngags mchog gis rab bsngags pa// dam tshig 'di ni khyod la sbyin// nges kyang blangs te
569b6(rgyud 'grel): 'thungs pas lus thams cad byang chub sems kyi rgyun gyis gang ste/ zag pa med pa'i bde bas tshim ste/ 'dod pa'i sred pa ma lus pa zad nas bde ba dang rab tu mi rtog pa'i ye shes zung du 'jug
570a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bskyeng bar bya'o// de nas rgyun ma chad par gsum mam/ bdun nam thun bzhi la sogs pa ji ltar nus pasna brtan par bya ste phan yon ni dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs
570a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rim dang mthar thugs pa ni dam tshig 'dis bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gsheng dmar po nyid mngon du byed pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid las thos so// bdud rtsi lnga yis byin gyis brlab po'i rim pa rnam
570a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal bi ru bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har paN A tsar+ya dang / lo tsa ba zhe sdang rdo rjes mang yul gyi gtsug la ga tshan por zhus shing
570a4(rgyud 'grel): bau sgyur ba'o//
571a1(rgyud 'grel): mamanas tsha rkye rnas dang / phyi klog pa'i yan gces byab bzhugs so//
571b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsakra rak+Sha d+hISh+ThA na priSh+Ta yo pa dwe sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i byin brlabs dang / phyir bzlog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang gshin rje gshed la
571b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsum ro muny+dzam bde chen po// dpal ldan gshin rje 'joms mdzad la// btud de de yi 'phrin las ni// bsgrub phyir 'phrul 'khor cho ga bshad// bsnyen pa byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ji lta'i sbyor bas
571b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul 'khor rnams// sgrub na de'i byin gyis brlabs// blang bya de nas yang ni sgrub// dben par maN+Dal sogs byas la// rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor mchog/ mchod dang gtor ma bum pa bzlas// sbyin sreg de bzhin chos
571b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung la// phyogs skyong bkod la phyi rol du// rnal 'byor gto ro ma byin la bsgo// de nas dang bcas slob ma ni// khrus byas thal mo sbyar byas la// b+h+ra ma la ni phyogs par gzhag/ skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la sogs dang /
571b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyu so lnga'i sdom pa sbyin// dz+r-IM skad gsungs pa'i las rab 'byams// bsgrub pa'i bsam pA nyer gzhag ste// paM las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng // hUM byung dus dgra dmar po bsam+ba// snying dang mgrin par ya bsgom pa// lce
571b6(rgyud 'grel): bar ro mog dgu pa'o// oM che ge mo'o// zhi bo dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rengs shing gsang pa rnams 'dod pa ltar 'grub par gyis shig sitAM/ dbus so'o// ts+tshan+tI/ wi kr-i tA na na/ g.yas skor gyis
572a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhir ro// hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mutshams bzhi lha'o// bcu gnyis rtsi byas ni ser po la// k+She dza ya yig dbus dang gAyas// g.yon du 'god par bya ba nyid// lho ru ma yats+tsha yig go/ nub tu yi ge me do ni/
572a2(rgyud 'grel): byang gi gsum la do ru Na// rtsibs mtsha mas 'god pa'i yi ge naM// na yo ni ra lan gsum mo// de nas ri mig phyi me la// oM ya ma rA dza se ngo me ya/ yA me do ru Na yo da yau/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+ShaM yets+tsha nau rA ma ya hUM phaT/
572a3(rgyud 'grel): smr-ihA/ 'khor lo kha sbyar rab dmigs la// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// rgyal ba'i 'phrin las thams cad dang // mthu dang yon tan kun bsdus la// snying dang mgrin pa'i 'khor lo gzhug/ slob dpon dmar po'o 'khor lo 'ang //
572a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar me nI me gcig la// mar me gcig chang ji bzhin du// ma nyams 'phel ba 'phangs pa bzhin// slob ma'i snying dang mgrin par klan// gsang sngags rgyal po bcu bzhi dang // rtsa ba'i gasngags ni sngon 'gro ba'i// yi ge bcu gnyis lung
572a5(rgyud 'grel): byin la// bris zhing bsgrub pa byas pa yi// 'khor lo'i rdzas ni lag byin la// brtan phyir rdo rje spyi bor gzhag/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra tsikra rak+Sha sa mA ya mu dra ho// brtan dang g.yo ba'i bcud kun kun las// mi bskyong zhi dang dbang byed pa// snron
572a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod dam pa'i 'khor lo ni// rab 'byam las rnams bsgrub phyir zung // 'di ni ding na so gzung byas te// mi 'bral bar ni bya ba'o// da ni rjesu gnang ba yi// las ni thog med myur ba dang // lha mnyes pa dang rim gnyis kyis// grig
572b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dam par 'gyur ba'o// gzhan du 'khor lo rtsom pa ni// mi mkhas 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing // sngar byas dngos grub gang 'dod pa// phye phung chu la sogs bzhin no// 'khrul 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa/ mkhas zhing
572b2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal 'dzin chen pos mjing ba rdzogs so// de nas yang dag bshad pa ni// bsang dang rings dang bskrang la sogos// bya 'am gzhan gyis byas kyang rung // phyi
572b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog rim pa 'ang gis lto byar bya// 'jigs dang bar chod mtshan ma Sh+Tam+b+ha// rmi sa gas ngan pa b+hUng g+hur tshe// bzlog pa drug tu bya ba ste// rdza sA da sngags dang ting 'dzin// rlung dang many+dzum mod dag dang ni// snang po med pa'i bsgrung
572b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// de la re zhig rnal 'byor pas// seng ldeng dbyug pa gla rtsi dang // gi baM shwa dag gu gul dang // gan+ta trai la dang yungs ki rari da // mu men b+hi ru si laM dang // tsan dan dmar sogs de bzhin d+ha// li khri mtshal dkar 'dus byas
572b5(rgyud 'grel): lAlu sa bon+da sngags las bcu gsum lta re// bskyung la bcu gsum gnas su gzhag/ hUM k+She ma mi da dza saM do ru yats+tsha ni rA// snying go mig drung d+hU ba s+yA// khyA dang lte ba'i 'og bAk+ko gnyisaM// beR+Ya gnyis phrag pa gonyis rlung
572b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// de bzhin spyi bor gtsug la rig// ji ltar ni sdong gsheng sogs sgom/ rjes rnams bsngos te lus la bcang // tshongs dang khyab 'jug drang srong sogs// log par byed pa'i rig sngags kyis// nam yang tshugs par mi
573a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// phyi'i byang rdzas kyis phyir bzlog bya'o// shin tu dran par byed pa yi// rig 'dzin la sogs mong gyur na// de bzlog pa'i cho ga ni// tshad med sems sogs sngon 'gro bas// gsang sngags
573a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis dag par bya// oM shU n+ya two dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ na mkha'i dkyil du bsam bya ba// bai raM las byung bang nyi'i steng // sna tshogs rdo rje yongs gyur pa'i// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgom bya ste// rtsibs bcwa
573a3(rgyud 'grel): mu khyod lte bar bcas// b+h+rUM las byung ba'i gnas bcu la// hUM byung rgyu dang bsre ba las// ji ltar 'byung ba'i khro bo bskyed// dbus su rang nyid gshin rje gshed // mdog gnag mkhros pa ma tre'i steng // de ltar bskyed
573a4(rgyud 'grel): nas cho ga bzhin// rdo rje gsum du bya ba dang // gzhug dang bcing sogs legs byas nas// Tak+ki rA dza grangs med pas// gnod byed gdung zhing dgug la gzhug/ rdo rje'i glo gon ting 'dzin ni// snying ga'i sems
573a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i gnas smra srung bya ni// dmigs la bzlas te 'khor bas so// dus dus gtor ma sbyin par bya// gzir ba'i sbyin sreg mtshan phyed na// khro bo bcu la sbyin par bya// phyi'i byang sngags kyis phyir bzlog pa'o//
573a6(rgyud 'grel): gal te rnal 'byor lo po la// rtog dang mtshan mas g.yangs pa'i byang // bang bzlog pa'i rnal 'byor ni// rlung gi sbyor ba brtsam bya ste// u pa tan+ta d+ha ra na// Da mi bya gra mu sa la// g.yo dang 'jug pa'i rlung gzung ste// dbu mar
573b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ba ye shes rlung // kun byed rnam rtog 'joms pa'o// nyon mongs las kyi rlung shugs dag/ ye shes chen por byed pa ste// su yi mthus kyang mi tshugs so// nang byung rlung gis phyir bzlog pa'o// gdon dang 'jigs dang /
573b2(rgyud 'grel): byang dang nad// b+har du gcod pa'i chos rnams kun// phyi rol gyur pa la yin pas// phan tshun bsre ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// ji ltar dug la bdud rtsi bzhin// bar gcod ye shes chen por bya// 'jigs sogs rtog pa'i bdud
573b3(rgyud 'grel): byung na// 'dzin mkhan rtog par rang nyid kyang // pha rol gdon du bsgyur byas la// gdon nyid gang yin 'dod byar bya// de ltar rang nyid gnod byed ni// lhar lha pha rol de bzhin no// de nas bla ma dran byas nas//
573b4(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed brtan g.yo lha dang sngags// su yis su la gnod byed pa// 'khrul po'i mtshan ma rang sar grol// 'dzin po kun bshig spros med kyi// ting 'dzin chen po skye bar 'gyur// nang gi byang ting+ga nge 'dzin gyis phyir
573b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa'o// mthar thugs ye shes bdud gyur pa// sdug bsngal 'khor ba 'dor 'dod dang // blang bya mya ngan 'das pa ste// gnyis su rgyu ba nyid yin no// de nyid lam du bya ba yang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gsung bzhin
573b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad// dmyal sogs 'khor ba'ang legs shes na// sangs rgyas nyid las ma g.yos te// phung po lnga ru gnas phyir ro// ye shes lnga ni yin pa'i phyir// lus kyi dri chen la sogs lnga// bde gshegs
574a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga nyid bdud rtsi lnga// rig ma lngar ni bzhugs phyir ro// rgyal sras brgyad du gnas phyir ro// lha mo drug tu gnas phyir ro// 'jigs byed bcu nA yin phyir ro// de ltar thams cad sangs
574a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi// dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig rang bzhin la// nad 'joms sman la dog bzhin du// 'ga' zhig 'di la dor byur 'dzin// gal te 'khor ba nyid yin yang // 'khor ba thog ma dbus mtha' med// skye dang 'gag
574a3(rgyud 'grel): pa kun kyang spang // skud cig rdul gyi cha spangs la// yod min med min yod pa 'ang min// sgyu ma'i glang po ji bzhin du// skye la skye ba yong min pas// sgyu ma'i skyes bus sgyu ma yi// bud med 'dor ba dog dang
574a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs// de ltar bsgoms pas 'khor ba la// 'dor 'dod ma spangs par yang grol// gal te rang nyid bde ba yi// zag med dbyings la sems dga'i na// gnyis med snying rje lhan cig skyes// zung du 'jug
574a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgom par bya// don gnyis 'byor pa'i sangs rgyas ni// bdag don kho na ma yin te// 'bangs rnams bde la mi 'god par// rgyal srid rang bde'i phyir bzung na// gzhan phung mjug tu bdag kyang phung // bdag
574a6(rgyud 'grel): ni til tsam med pa'i phyir// bdag gi don gyis ci zhig bya// bdag med ye shes lhan skyes kyis// bdag sreng ma lus zab bcang nas// gzhan don kho na'i blo yis ni// mi gnas lhan cig skyes dga'i mchog
574b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod min cir yang snang ba nyid// rang bzhin spros dang bral ba ni// shel la tshon gyi kha dog ltar// sna tshogs stong pa'i gzugs nyid ni// bde stong gsal zhing mi rtog pa// brtan g.yo sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor nyid//
574b2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su khyab pa'i ring bzhin ni// spros med byang chub sems su gnas// gang+ga du btsal yang mi rnyed de// bcom ldan gA shrI na rje gu shed dmar paM// lhan cig smye dga'i zung 'jug ni// gdong nas gnas pa yin phyir ro//
574b3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar shes pas 'khor 'das la// blar dor na maukha'i sbyin bzhin du// rang bzhin gyis ni zhi bar 'gyur// mthar thug ye shes kyi byang rnal 'byor gnyis kyis phar bzlog pa'o// /
574b4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bla ma'i drin las thob par gang gyur pa// gshin rje gshed dpal gsang ba'i man ngag gsang ba 'di// dri med ji bzhin gsal bar byas lo nongs pa kun// chos dbyings yin phyir ye shes che rnams bzod mdzad
574b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs// gnyug myur gnas pa bde chen snying rjes brnyan gyur pa// bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad dpal ldan dus dgra dmar po nyid// 'di byos dge ba'i mthu yis srid gsum 'gro po ma lus pas// chu la chu ltar rang
574b6(rgyud 'grel): gi ye shes chen po ro gcig rtogs gyur cig/ phyir zlog pa'i man ngag gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba// bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po'i zhal gyi gdams pa// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
575a1(rgyud 'grel): bo dngos grub mchog brnyes pa'i dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan b+h+yo a nu pa mA ra k+She ta dang / la tsA ba dang ma yon tan gyis/
575a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// dus phyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi gzungs su// rgya gar shar phyogs kyi mkhas pa chen po dar pa Na A tsar+ya dang // lo tsa ba blo bo shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus so// 'di
575a3(rgyud 'grel): dpe skabs su rgya gar bal po thams cad du rgyun chad pa las phyis dbu rgyan mkha' 'gro ma brgya mtsho'i gos can las/ rnal 'byor sen ta wa len tas zhus te byung ngo // /
576a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub thabs bzhugs// /
576b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ya mA karma ra dza d+harma sa d+ha na maHbod skad du/ lus kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jigs byed chen po la phyag 'tshalo// 'chi ba'i yi dgas rgyal po ni// 'chi bdag
576b2(rgyud 'grel): bdud ces bya byas te// 'gro ba kun gyi lus kyi bsdud// lus dang grib ma'i tshul bzhin du// 'gro ba kun la snang bas te// phung po nyid mtshams sbyor ba'o// 'jigs pa de'i gzugs mthong na// mi shesas
576b3(rgyud 'grel): ya ma ston cig skyes 'i de'i gang gis bdud na/ dri dang 'byung // de ji ltar gnas na nas rang gi srog gi bdud/ gang la yod na/ lhag pa'i phyogs na gnas pas te/ dkun gyi srog lon par bya brtse gas pa can la phyag 'tshal lo//
576b4(rgyud 'grel): de la 'chi bdag skyes bu'i gzugs// TIgashing rje/ khru gang yi dgas gos len pa la br-i// nag po zhal gcig gshin rje'i gdon snga TaHphyag gnyis pa// 'jigs pa ral ma pa mche bzhi brtsigs// rgyan
576b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs bcad do rje nye thul med rus pa'i phreng ba can// g.yas pas ya ma'i dbyug pa can// sdigs 'dzub zhabs pa gAyon na bsnams// ma he dag la saM gnas pa bri// de nas rnal 'byor chen po yi//
576b6(rgyud 'grel): mdun du gnas la zhi tshul dang stag/ gnas bya// 7gas yAng na sa ti rnam gsumu las// hUM las nag po chen pos te// yi ge bcu gcig brjog cad byas la// ras lo bris pa bzhin du bsgom/
577a1(rgyud 'grel): oM ka la rU pa ya ma rA dzA hUM phaT/ de nas bsnyen pa bya bar gsungs// dur khrod nags tshal sod byastsa la// bzlas brjod byas pa'i tshul dag gis// ho h+Na bzhad cing 'ong bar rigs//
577a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon du gyur nas b+ha li sbyin// de la bsnyen pa'i snying po 'di'o// oM kA la rU pa b+hi mA yak+Sha hUM/ ma hA rIsha naM/ na ra sid d+hI ya sarba b+hU ta rakA r+thaM A d+hi pa ta ye/ ya ma ra dza ye hUM phaT [\u0f7f]swA hA
577a3(rgyud 'grel): thig ma mtha' dang yang dgra ldan// bcu bsnyen pa dang gtong sa gnyis ra hra la bag sa di nga gas bzhi phye ba bsnyen pa yan// rim pa bzhin du ma phye ba// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par shes// grub te mngon du gyur pa na
577a4(rgyud 'grel): sha chen gtor ma chen po sbyin// oM ka lu rU pa ya ma rA dzA hUM/ i daM ba liM grih+na khA kha/ khA hi khA hI/ tshogs la sogs pa sngon du sbyin// de ltar grub nas las byas t+ye// ban+da d+ha mtshan ngan bzang po brtu la// dum
577a5(rgyud 'grel): bu gcig gum gnyis pa la// bral ba'i ngos nas rtag par dring // ma thod dgra li ro ras la// gnod sbyin bebs twa'i gzugs// snag tsho bya rog khrag dang ni// dur khrod sol ba bong bu'i chus// mi rkang smyu gus ldeg
577a6(rgyud 'grel): par bri/ spyi bo'i ngos kyis phyogs dag la// ras la 'khor la bri bar bya// rim pa gsum bskor ljon pa la// rim pa gnyis pa dag la ni// rtsibs gnyis gnyis kyi tshad la bris// de la gsang sngags de gang ba ni//
577b1(rgyud 'grel): ma ma sha truM a mu kaM/ 'khor lo lte ba'i dbus su bri// shar nas bar+Nams 'di ltar bri// two sa ya/ dz+nyA sA yaM/ a gang ta yA/ a gAt+ta yAM/ shwo sha ya/ sho shra ye/ hA na ha na/ dA ha drA ha/ pan+d+ha pa tsa/ ban d+hA bAn d+ha/
577b2(rgyud 'grel): tsUr na tsU rin+ta/ rim pa tha m+b+ha drAg ne// shwar nas brtsams nas 'di ltar bri/ tsak+She badz+ra nA g+hi rA pa tA yaM/ k+She tra pA l+yaM/ tshinra d+ha tshin d+haM/ b+hin d+ha b+hIn d+haM/ b+hu kaM b+ha dzaM pA tI/ ru d+hi ra/ arge bo/ oM mA ra yaM/ badz+ra ye badz+ra ye
577b3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ya hUM phaT/ bar du dgra'i ming rus bri// rgyab srubs dag lnga gsang sngags bri// srud pa sngon po nag po yis// thod pa de ni bsdam par bya// r-i shing me la bran d+ha sogs// de ltar zhag gsum byas nas kyang // las N+ya
577b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bdag khru gang pa// zhal gcig mche bArtsigs phyag gnyis pa// glog mkhar bdun dang rnam snang dang // durar+ya khrod sol ba'i rgyu dag la// bodA bu chu yis gzugs byas te// de'i snying khor thod pa gzhug/ 'khor
577b5(rgyud 'grel): lo la bris sdigs bzlas te// mar tshes bzhi dang brgyad dag la// dur khrod lha khang dag dri mA nA na// de ltar las 'di rdzogs gyur na// gad+ya la bya ba'i dngos po de// rang gi bdud kyi dpung du 'gyuR+Sha// 'chi bdag yI dgas
577b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po ni// me dros mtsho'i 'bri dkyil la// ri nag dgu'i pha mtha' ste// spos dang ri bo'i bar dag na// mchu dang zheng du cha mnyam mtsho// de 'og dpag tshad lnga brgya'i 'og/ 'chi bdag yi dgas rgyal po'i gnas
578a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba lhag pa'i phyogs na gnas// gsus de'i yum de tsa mun tri// rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa la// ya gnyis dag gi bar du yang // ro ras ngag la gzugs bri ba// zhal dang phyag zhabs sngon bzhin bri// de
578a2(rgyud 'grel): la 'aN+Di bdag tsa munA tI// nag mo mi gosum khro gnyer can// kha gdangos sgyu rjes nu ma 'byung // gsus chen dud 'gro'i gos gyon la// g.yas nai tri shul g.yon pa yang // me'i thod pa dag dang sbyor// mi'i rgyas pas bsdams
578a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// bar du 'khor lo gzhug par bya// de nas 'chi bdag 'khor lo ni// snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya// de la ya ma pho mo'i 'khor lo ni// ras la 'chi bdag tshul bzhin du// rtsibs brgyad gnyis dang ldan pa'i// dbus
578a4(rgyud 'grel): nAs brtsams nas 'di bzhinA bri// mo ma sarba sha two/ lte ba'i dbus su bri bar bya// sha ra nas rim pas 'di bzhin bri// a mu ka s+ya/ du na du na/ ban d+hA ban d+haM/ ma tha maM thA/ Tha \u0f89\u0fa4maH thAM/ tsU dzA ra dza ro/ dze raM nA b+hau/ d+hi r-i
578a5(rgyud 'grel): ge nA/ rim pa tha ma dag la ni// shar nas rim pas 'di lta ste/ nyi gA na shi baM/ yau ra ri tshwas ye/ a bi sha ya/ dzaM baM tri da yaM/ tshin+da d+ha tshan d+haM/ ma de pa shi bi/ ma ra ya/ nA sha ya/ hUM phATaM/ 'khor lo gnyis kyi baR+Sha du yang
578a6(rgyud 'grel): gang la ya bya ba'i ming rus gzhug/ bla mas 'chi bdag bsam byas te// srog gi snying po gdon par bya// gos sngon gyon pas de bzhin du// yum maM las mkhan dpa' bo ni// yum gyi srog snying bcu pa gdon/ oM hri mun
578b1(rgyud 'grel): Di baM hUM phaT swAhA/ yab yum 'khor lo gang yin pa// gong gi thod par gzhug par bya// shrI ba'i sgra'i skud pa 'am// mi rgyus dag gis mkhas pas bsdam// mi'i rgyus pas gzungs thag bya// gtso dang gzungs kyi bzung byas nas
578b2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal steng bzhag bzlas pa bya// 'khor lo steng 'og sngags bzla ba// gtso dang gzungs kyi 'bum phrag bzlas// de nas bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang // dur khrod dam ni lha khung ngam// lha klu drag po'i gnas su mnan// lha la sogs ba shi
578b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bstunA// de'i bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams snang // dben pa'i phyogs su byas nas ni// bla ma pha ma mchad pa'i gnas// de la gnod pa'i dgra bo rnams// gang b+h+ring yang ni bsgral par bya// de tshe bsgral bar ma byas ni// rang nyid 'chi bar
578b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yin// gsang bya gzhan la bstan mi bya// las kyi go shin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub thabs/ slob dpon la li ta badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// bal po thugs rje chen po dang // bod kyi ban der lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis
578b5(rgyud 'grel): babasgyur ba'o//
579a1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rjeg shed mar ba'i sngags btub zhes bya ba bzhugaso
579b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya mA ri man+ta saM gra na ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags btu ba zhes bya bya/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// rab tu dben par rab gtsang bas// mchod pa dang
579b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas sngags btu'o// bden pa tshad me dri pha rol phyin// 'phags lam rnam thar phyogs rten 'brel// byang chub mchod rten 'khrul 'khor la// bden pa'i dang po ka nas bzung // rten 'brel mtha' mar me mchog/ A li kA li
579b3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'o// dang por rnam thar drug pa sbyin// de nas rnam thar lnga pa'o// dri nas rnam thar bdun pa la// phyogs kyis brgyad pas brgyan pa'o// pha rol phyin pa'i gnyis pa la// phyogs kyi brgyad pas brgyan pa'o// de nas phyogs
579b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bzhi pa bya// 'phags lam gyi ni drug po la// rten 'brel gyi ni dgu pa sbyin// rnam thar gyi ni lnga pa la// rten 'brel gyi ni bdun pa sbyin// rnam thar gyi ni drug pa'o// yang ni de nyid sbyin par bya// rnam thar gyi ni lnga pa la// rten 'brel
579b5(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa sbyin par bya// 'phags lam gyi ni drug pa la// rten 'brel dgu pos brgyan par bya// rnam thar gyi ni bdun pa la// rton 'brel dang pos brgyan pa'o// 'phags lam gyi ni gsum pa dang // rnam thar gyi ni drug pa la//
579b6(rgyud 'grel): rten 'brel gyi ni dgu pas brgyan// de nas 'phags lam drug pa sbyin// rnam thar drug pa de nas sbyin// yang ni de nyid sbyin par bya// de nas yang no 'phags lam drug/ rnam thar gyi ni drug pa la// rten 'brel dgu pas brgyan
580a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// 'phags ldum gyi ni brgyad pa la// rten 'brel gsum pas brgyan pa'o// de nas rnam thar 'dun pa sbyin// yang ni de nyid drug pa sbyin// de nas phyogs kyi rtag pa la// rten 'brel gyi ni bdun pas brtun
580a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas rnam thar drug pa'o// yang ni de nyid sbyin par bya// de nas phyogs kyi drug pa la// rten 'brel gyi ni bdun pas brgyan// rnam thar gyi ni drug pa ston// nA dri med pa ni bAlI la// pha rol phyin pa'i dang pos brgyan// 'phags lam yim
580a3(rgyud 'grel): ni mtha' ma la// rten 'brel gsum pas brgyan pa'o// rnam thar gyi ni bdun pa la// phyogs kyi brgyud pas brgyan pa'o// de nas rnam thar lnga pa d+hi na// yang ni de'i drug pa sbyin// yi ge sumo cu rtsa gnyis te// las kyi sngags te nad ma
580a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis// rang rang las kyis kha bsgyur bas// las rnams thams cad bde blag bsgrub// rten 'brel gyi ni dgu pa la// spyi bor rnam par thar lnga pas brgyan// de nas phyogs kyi lnga pa la// rnam thar bdun pas 'og nas brgyan// de nas
580a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi bcu pa sbyin// de nas mnga' bdag bcu drug mtha'// de nas phyogs kyi gsum pa la// phar phyin ldi pas 'og nas brgyan// de la rnam thar bdun pa sbyin// rten 'brel gsum pas spyi bor brgyad// de nas mdo'i bdag
580a6(rgyud 'grel): drug mthar// de nas phyogs kyi dang po la// rten 'brel gsum pas brgyan pa'o// bden pa yi ni dang po la// rnam thar bdun pas 'og nas brgyan// de nas rten bral gsum pas brgyan// de nas 'phags kyi lam bzhi pa la/
580b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi brgyad pas brgyan pa'o// de nas 'phags lam tha ma la ni// lan gnyis su ni sbyin par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i sa bon nI// lan+d+ra gnyis bar du sbyin par bya// de nas rnam thar gnyis pa la// pha rol phyin pa'i lnga pa sbyar//
580b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhas byas gnyi su'o// de nas phyogs kyi bzhi pa la// phyogs kyi dang po 'og tu btags// de la phyogs kyi brgyad pas brgyan// de nas phyogs kyi lnga pa la// phyogs kyi brgyad pas brgyan par bya// gdug pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi ni// 'khrul 'khor
580b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni phyi rol la'o// bzlas pa dang ni 'khrul 'khor la// sngon du sngags btu dag par bya// gzhan du dbang po'i dgra bo'i bzhin// mchod pa chen po byas nas ni// slob ma la ni rjes gnang sbyin// de ltar ma byas nus mthu med// de ltar byas na shin tu sbyar/

582a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas dang las ni thams cang byed par gsungs// gang zhig phun sum tshogs pa yi// b+hA ba thams cad 'dod pa des// nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dag/ r+N+Na bA lta bur sems tsam nyid// bdag kyang
582a2(rgyud 'grel): de yi rang bzhin no// snang dang bcud kyi 'gro ba dog/ sems tsam nyid du sems can kun// yang dag sangs rgyas de sras rnams// bdag gi sems su gnyis med bya// de yi 'od zer lcags kyu yis// sangs rgyas kun
582a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi yon tan nI// sna dang pha rol phyin la sogs// nam mkha' lta bur bsgom par bya// dkar po'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa ni// rang phyogs 'o ma'i 'babs chu bzhin// rang sems de ltar bsgoms pa las// sngon gyi smon lam
582a4(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis ni// snying rjes bskul nas 'di lta ste// sa 'og bar du bsgom par bya// e ma sems can sdug bsngal can// 'khor bar yun du gnas pa dang // thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis// yang dang yang du yun ring
582a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// de rnams kun gyi rtogs bya'i phyir// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed por bsgom// oM bo d+hi tsi trIt+sA da yA mi// zhes brjod do// de las byung ba'i 'od zer ldan// ka la sogs pa'i yi ges brgyan// rim gyis skyes
582a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems nyid ni// sems can yong su 'dzin par byed// kun kyang snying rje'i stobs las byung // gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i sgrub pa gang la yang khrus kyi cho ga bstan pa// de la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa
582b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu/ thog mA nAs mA skyes pa// rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa// thog mA nas zhi ba'i chos thams cad la stsogs pa lhag mar mos pas bdag gi lus dang phyi dang nang thams cad
582b2(rgyud 'grel): rdul phywa rab kyi rnam par dbye bar bya ba'i mi dmigs pa'i spyod pas samyur du grub par byed pas// nang gi khrus chen po la nAn tan du bya'o// gang zhig phyi'i rdzas la chags pa rmongs pa'i blo tson rnam par rtog pa'i dpyod
582b3(rgyud 'grel): pas the tshom sel bar mi nus pa des phyi'i khrus kyi cho ga 'di bya'o// thog mar re zhig hUM yongs su gyur pa las khro bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa// khro gnyer dang bcas pa
582b4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sngon po 'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer 'khrug pa// dang po'i rdo rje 'gying ba nga rgyal dang bcas pa rdo rje chen po 'od zer 'bar po'i me stag 'phro ba// dang por rdo rje gsor zhing bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba ltar
582b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba// rdo rje ny+tsi ma me b+ha bar bar bdag nyid sprul nas// oM d+hU bi d+hU pi kA ya d+hU pi pyA dz+wA lI ni swAt+ma/ zhes brjod cing / rdo rje bsdams pas nang du byastan+na twe/ bar dang bAcaswA pa/ mthe bo rdo rje rtse spring nas phyir 'gyed
582b6(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje me'i dam tshig gi phyag bcings nas// bdag nyid 'ber bar bya'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas bzod par dka' ba'o// de'i rjes su bskyed rims che bar bstan pa bzhin du rdo rje go
583a1(rgyud 'grel): cha ste/ de'i rjesu oM b+hUrdzA la oM hUM swAhA/ zhes sa bzung la/ chu gsum du byas la sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs nas khrus byed pA'i sar gzhag ste// de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya bcings la chu
583a2(rgyud 'grel): 'am chu'i snod gnas lnga bgegs thams cad bsgreng pa'i cheng du 'og dang steng bcing bar bya'o// oM b+hu dz+wa li so hUM swA hA/ zhes rig pa 'di brjod cing / gong du bshad pa'i sa cha gsum po lngas cha gcig gis bshang lam
583a3(rgyud 'grel): bkrus te/ lag pa gnyis bkrus la nye reg bya'o// chu gnyis le hUM zhes brjod cing / lus po thams cad khrus byas te/ cha gsum pas mgo bkrus nas/ oM bu dz+wa la hUM swA hA/ zhes pa 'dis nye bar reg nas rang gi mgo
583a4(rgyud 'grel): la sngags dang bcas pa'i chu gtor nas/ rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag byin gyis brlabs nas khros byed sa nas ldang bar byed do// de'i rjes la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus gos la gtor
583a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ ji lta ba bzhin gyon nas yi ge brgya pa brjod cing // yid kyang chu'i gnas kyi bsrung ma gshegs nas/ skad tsog gis lha'i de rgyal gyis de'i sngags yid kyis brjod pacing bsam gtan gyis khang pa'i drung du
583a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bar bya// de nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus la// rig ma nges nye bar reg la/ hU~M phaT ces pa lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bgegs thams cad bskrang nas// bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs te/ yang bdud rtsi
583b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags kyis stan la sogs pa dang bsam gtan khyang ba la byug pa la sogs pa gtor nus nye bar reg par bya'o// sa ma ya sta zhes brjod cing / phyag g.yas pa bkan par bya la// gung mo dang srin lag tsam bkug nas/
583b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya 'dis rkang pa gnyis kyi nang du bcug la/ d+hU tsog pur bsdad de smra ba bcad la pad+ma'i tshul gyis kha la yang yang reg par byas/ lan gnyis sam lan gsum du rna ba gnyis dang mig gnyis dang sna dang / kha dang lag
583b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis dang / lte ba dang mgo la reg par bya ba ni mgo bkru ba'i cho ga'o// de ltar khrus byas pa 'am ma byas kyang rung // ri'i sulo la sogs pa dben 'i gnas su chags pa thams cad dang bral bas spyod lam yangs pa
583b4(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcad la/ 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa nye bar bya ste/ de laM hUM gI yi ges 'gro ba thams cad stong par byas la// bi ma lo d+hA d+hI hUM zhes pa brjod pas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i steng du
583b5(rgyud 'grel): oM a pa tsa la bi re swA hA/ zhes pas gser gyi rang bzhin gyi steng du/ oM a bats+tsha la hUM zhes pas rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi ri'i rgyal po tshad med po/ me tog dang shing thog sna tshogs pas brgyan pa nags tshal gyis
583b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing gis brgyan pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod dang ldan pa'i yid du 'ong bar bsgoms te/ der hrIHyi/ yi ge las pad+maHde'i steng du i li dang po// a yongasu gyur pa las
584a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor// de'i steng du k+Shi rnam par bsam mo// de'i sgra dang 'od zer gyi sgra dang sbyin gyi tshogs kyi na mkha' thams cad khyab par bsam/ 'od zer de dag gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs su gyur te/ tshur
584a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dug nas k+Sh+mI de nyid la thim par gyur/ k+ShiM de nyid yongs su gyur pa las gnod sbyin mo longs spyad can ma zhes bya ba lang tshe rgyus pa/ sgeg pa'i ro dong ldan pa/ mdzes ma lha mo'i gzugs lta bu 'dzin pa/ sku mdog ljang gre/
584a3(rgyud 'grel): gos+t+r-i dkar pos smad g.yogs dang snying g.yogs byas pa/ phyag g.yon po dpag bsam gyi shing la 'dzus pa/ phyag g.yas pa me tog kha dog lnga dang ldan pas brgyan pa/ steng na gdug dkar po rang bzhin gyis gnas
584a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gying ba'i tshul gyis 'gying zhing g.yo ba de ltar rnam por byasam mo// de nasna gong du bstan pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya nges byin gyis brlabs te kha lta bu'i phyag rgya bcings te/ oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes pas/ rang gi thugs
584a5(rgyud 'grel): ka nAs gshin rje gsheng gong du bstan pa'i gzugs can rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ sku la 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba/ nyi ma bye ba lta bu dang ldan pa/ bgegs ma lus par 'jigs par bying ba/ 'jig rten gsum po
584a6(rgyud 'grel): bsdigs par byed pa'i khro bo cig spros la/ de la bka' bsgo ba byas pas gnod sbyin mo bkug nas/ bdag gi sku la zhugs nas slar phyir spros te/ gnod sbyin mo'i mgo bdag gi zhabos kyis mnan nas gnas par
584b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom mo// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa lnga sogs pa dang / mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas/ gong bzhin du gdan dang mchod yon dbul ba dang / mtheb mdzub gnyis skam pa ltar byas la/ sor mo gzha
584b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams phyir ba skyeng de/ zhabs bsil gyis sngags kyi zhabs bsil phul la/ dam tshig ma'i phyag rgya bstan te/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya gong du bstan to// 'dir dam tshig mo ni lag pa gnyis
584b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sor mo rnams phun tshun bsnol te srin lag gnyis phyir bkyed la tshigs gsum pa bkug ste bya ba ni/ 'di ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyu'o// oM b+haM ga wa ti dri sh+ya ho// de bzhin du lha mo rang rang gi
584b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa nas byung ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sngags bzung bar bya'o// de nas oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas dbang bskur bar bya// de phyag rgya gong du bstan zin to// de nas mchod yon lngas mchod // oM gyis yi ge las
584b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i me tog dang / dri dang / mar me dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / dung dang / rnga rings dang / rag dung la sogs pa'i sgo'i bye brog dang / glu deng gar dang / sgeg mo dang / bzhad ma dang / rlung g.yab dang / rgyan mtshan
584b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ra ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rnga dang / gos dang / dpung rgyan dang / do shal dang / rkang gdub dang / bla bre dang / dra ba dra phyed dang / g.yer gau'i dra ba dang / gzhal yas khang dang / ji lta ba bzhin du gnas la yod pa
585a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ngagazhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs mthong ba dang / thos pA la stsogs pas nA mkha' khyab par khengs pas/ gnod sbyin mo la mchod pa bya bar bsam/ de nas gong bzhin du dril bu dkrol zhing byin
585a2(rgyud 'grel): rlabs kyis phyag rgyas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs te/ gong bzhin du gnod sbyin mo'i rin po che'i re la gnas pa/ sgrub pa'i dbang du gyur pa/ rang gi gzugs kyi sbyin gyis na mkha' gang bAr byed pa de nyid thun gosum
585a3(rgyud 'grel): mam bzhi bsgoms pas nges par 'grub bo// gang zhig bsgoms pas 'grub par mi nus pa des rtog pa las bshad pa'i sngags bzhin du bzlas par bya'o// de las bzlas par bya ba'i sngogs ni/ oM b+haM ga wi ta
